bkl_brn_intro_01.base_text: Look at you motherfuckers just walking in here with your stupid ass-masks. I can't fucking believe Rust wants to be one of you freaks. Regardless, two things are gonna go down now.
bkl_brn_intro_01.loc_text: Look at you motherfuckers just walking in here with your stupid ass-masks. I can't fucking believe Rust wants to be one of you freaks. Regardless, two things are gonna go down now.

bkl_brn_intro_01b.base_text: I'll start by blowin' off the head of this piece of shit mechanic, and after that we're gonna paint this room with your clown-blood as well. And the best part is that there's jack shit you can do about it.
bkl_brn_intro_01b.loc_text: I'll start by blowin' off the head of this piece of shit mechanic, and after that we're gonna paint this room with your clown-blood as well. And the best part is that there's jack shit you can do about it.

bkl_brn_intro_02.base_text: I don't know what made Rust stab us in the back, but I really don't give a shit, as I never cared for that silver-haired fucker. But you are a couple of fucking fools for coming here, you hear me?
bkl_brn_intro_02.loc_text: I don't know what made Rust stab us in the back, but I really don't give a shit, as I never cared for that silver-haired fucker. But you are a couple of fucking fools for coming here, you hear me?

bkl_brn_intro_02b.base_text: There's no chance in hell you're getting out alive. Firstly, you're gonna witness me put a bullet through this mechanic's head, and after that my crew is gonna fuck you up good.
bkl_brn_intro_02b.loc_text: There's no chance in hell you're getting out alive. Firstly, you're gonna witness me put a bullet through this mechanic's head, and after that my crew is gonna fuck you up good.

bkl_brn_intro_03.base_text: I wasn't really surprised by Rust's betrayal, you know? He was always an old and greedy fuck. But blood needs to be paid with blood, and you made a big-ass mistake by coming here.
bkl_brn_intro_03.loc_text: I wasn't really surprised by Rust's betrayal, you know? He was always an old and greedy fuck. But blood needs to be paid with blood, and you made a big-ass mistake by coming here.

bkl_brn_intro_03b.base_text: You thought this was a rescue mission or what? Nah, it's not gonna play out like that. You fools are gonna witness me kill this piece of shit mechanic first, and then you're gonna join him in the afterlife.
bkl_brn_intro_03b.loc_text: You thought this was a rescue mission or what? Nah, it's not gonna play out like that. You fools are gonna witness me kill this piece of shit mechanic first, and then you're gonna join him in the afterlife.

bkm_cs1_01_01.base_text: Yes sir, we'll help you with that right away.
bkm_cs1_01_01.loc_text: Yes sir, we'll help you with that right away.

bkm_cs1_01_02.base_text: Yes ma'am, we offer international wire transfers at a reasonable rate.

bkm_cs1_01_03.base_text: A new account. We can get that sorted right away.

bkm_cs1_01_04.base_text: Why do they think I give a fuck about their money? Why do they?

blm_cs1_01_01.base_text: I know what's going on over there, and I want a slice of the pie. Load a bag with money, and toss it over the yellow wall near Jimbos, the auto-repair shop. Ya hear me? And I see one bag crossing the street, I'll call the cops.
blm_cs1_01_01.loc_text: I know what's going on over there, and I want a slice of the pie. Load a bag with money, and toss it over the yellow wall near Jimbos, the auto-repair shop. Ya hear me? And I see one bag crossing the street, I'll call the cops.

blm_cs1_01_02.base_text: Hey, assholes. You want me to keep my fingers off 911? Then throw a moneybag over the yellow wall by the auto-repair shop. Do it, now! An' I see one of you motherfuckers try and get a bag across the street, I'm onto the cops.
blm_cs1_01_02.loc_text: Hey, assholes. You want me to keep my fingers off 911? Then throw a moneybag over the yellow wall by the auto-repair shop. Do it, now! An' I see one of you motherfuckers try and get a bag across the street, I'm onto the cops.

blm_cs1_01_03.base_text: You don't know me, but I see what you're up to, and I want in. Throw some money over the yellow wall by Jimbo's. And none of you guys better try and cross the road, or I'll call the cops. Ya hear me?

btc_fri_cbf_01.base_text: I have been running guns in the Caribbean for a while. It's been very profitable, but some of the old movers in the region don't approve of my presence on the local market. The Bolivian Sosa Cartel specifically. As they could not compete with me on level terms, they decided to attack my operation - sinking one of my ships, stealing my merchandise and killing my operatives. That was very unwise. Now they must pay. You will collect that payment, in blood.
btc_fri_cbf_01.loc_text: I have been running guns in the Caribbean for a while. It's been very profitable, but some of the old movers in the region don't approve of my presence on the local market. The Bolivian Sosa Cartel specifically. As they could not compete with me on level terms, they decided to attack my operation - sinking one of my ships, stealing my merchandise and killing my operatives. That was very unwise. Now they must pay. You will collect that payment, in blood.

btc_fri_cnc_01.base_text: I've had some problems with pirates in the Caribbean. I need you to go to Miami and solve these problems for me.

btc_fri_end_a_01.base_text: Ernesto Sosa never saw it coming. With him dead, the Sosa's Miami operations lie in ruins. My point has been made.

btc_fri_end_a_02.base_text: They will wonder how this happened, but they will know who did it. And they will learn not to fuck with me.
btc_fri_end_a_02.loc_text: They will wonder how this happened, but they will know who did it. And they will learn not to fuck with me.

btc_fri_end_a_03.base_text: I applaud your skills. Punishment came to Ernesto Sosa silently, but with deadly certainty. They will learn to fear The Butcher.
btc_fri_end_a_03.loc_text: I applaud your skills. Punishment came to Ernesto Sosa silently, but with deadly certainty. They will learn to fear The Butcher.

btc_fri_end_b_01.base_text: I believe the Sosa Cartel may now be regretting their decision to try to intimidate me. Their Miami operation now lies in ruins, and I can do business in peace again. Thank you for delivering my message.

loc_brb_cbf_01.base_text: Dear Friends, we're going back to New York. Theres something buried in the foundation of the old Brooklyn Bank that Bain was after. Could be a way out of this current predicament we're in. While we're there, it might be a good idea to pick up some extra operating cash to keep us going. Replacing all of Bain's equipment isn't going to be cheap I can tell you, and the stuff I've got running as backup isn't going to hold up for long, yeah? At the moment, we're open targets.

loc_brb_end_01.base_text: Nicely done, dear friends. We're still in a lot of trouble but old Locke is going to take care of you, yeah? I know I made some promises, and I'm still working on getting answers. Calling in all my favors for this one. Gotta pay off the Butcher too- don't want her nipping at our heels after Alaska. Have a short breather, lay low for a bit, while Mr Lindenhurst tries to figure out what's so special about this medallion dinges. I got a feeling that we haven't even cut through the frosting on this cake, yeah?

loc_des_end_01.base_text: Well done, friends. We got what we came for, but that last... we need to figure out our next move. After you left the warehouse, Murkywater comms went completely dark, off the grid. We hurt the Kataru good, but we don't know how they will retaliate, and Bain would want us to keep going, no matter what happened to him. Duke is going to have his hands full figuring out the next piece of this puzzle and what those boxes are actually good for. Until then, we lay low... plan... and survive.
loc_des_end_01.loc_text: Well done, friends. We got what we came for, but that last... we need to figure out our next move. After you left the warehouse, Murkywater comms went completely dark, off the grid. We hurt the Kataru good, but we don't know how they will retaliate, and Bain would want us to keep going, no matter what happened to him. Duke is going to have his hands full figuring out the next piece of this puzzle and what those boxes are actually good for. Until then, we lay low... plan... and survive.

loc_jr1_21_02.base_text: Bakgat! Now, onwards, my friends. The airlock awaits you!
loc_jr1_21_02.loc_text: Bakgat! Now, onwards, my friends. The airlock awaits you!

loc_jr1_21_03.base_text: And..open the sesame! Bravo, my friends! Now, please, get in the fucking airlock.
loc_jr1_21_03.loc_text: And..open the sesame! Bravo, my friends! Now, please, get in the fucking airlock.

loc_jr1_22_01.base_text: Make sure all you fine people are inside, the outer door must close before the inner door can open.
loc_jr1_22_01.loc_text: Make sure all you fine people are inside, the outer door must close before the inner door can open.

loc_jr1_22_02.base_text: Make sure your gang are safely gathered in the airlock. The outer door cannot close until this is so.
loc_jr1_22_02.loc_text: Make sure your gang are safely gathered in the airlock. The outer door cannot close until this is so.

loc_jr1_22_03.base_text: Please, everyone into the airlock. The doors are designed so that the inner cannot open until the outer is closed.
loc_jr1_22_03.loc_text: Please, everyone into the airlock. The doors are designed so that the inner cannot open until the outer is closed.

loc_jr1_23_01.base_text: It will just take a moment, gentlemen. Perhaps use the time to assess your current situation re ammo.
loc_jr1_23_01.loc_text: It will just take a moment, gentlemen. Perhaps use the time to assess your current situation re ammo.

loc_jr1_23_02.base_text: It will open in a second or two. And then...
loc_jr1_23_02.loc_text: It will open in a second or two. And then...

loc_jr1_23_03.base_text: Any second now. Does anybody know any jokes?
loc_jr1_23_03.loc_text: Any second now. Does anybody know any jokes?

loc_jr1_24_01.base_text: Ah! There it is! Now, please, out of the airlock and into the inner complex!
loc_jr1_24_01.loc_text: Ah! There it is! Now, please, out of the airlock and into the inner complex!

loc_jr1_24_02.base_text: The door is opening! Good! Now, if you would be so kind, please storm the inner complex.
loc_jr1_24_02.loc_text: The door is opening! Good! Now, if you would be so kind, please storm the inner complex.

loc_jr1_24_03.base_text: Ah, the door opens! Now, let us proceed into the inner complex with speed and violence.
loc_jr1_24_03.loc_text: Ah, the door opens! Now, let us proceed into the inner complex with speed and violence.

loc_jr1_25_01.base_text: Come on, no need to be nervous. Out of the airlock, friends!
loc_jr1_25_01.loc_text: Come on, no need to be nervous. Out of the airlock, friends!

loc_jr1_25_02.base_text: The inner complex is nothing to be scared of.
loc_jr1_25_02.loc_text: The inner complex is nothing to be scared of.

loc_jr1_25_03.base_text: It would be beautiful if we could do this with you hiding in the airlock, but... alas...
loc_jr1_25_03.loc_text: It would be beautiful if we could do this with you hiding in the airlock, but... alas...

loc_jr1_26_01.base_text: Get to the control room - the black heart of the facility. From there, you can open the vaults and grab all that, as you say, 'good shit'.
loc_jr1_26_01.loc_text: Get to the control room - the black heart of the facility. From there, you can open the vaults and grab all that, as you say, 'good shit'.

loc_jr1_26_02.base_text: Now. Overlooking this area you will find the control room. From there the vaults in this part of the facility are controlled. That would be useful, yes?
loc_jr1_26_02.loc_text: Now. Overlooking this area you will find the control room. From there the vaults in this part of the facility are controlled. That would be useful, yes?

loc_jr1_26_03.base_text: This area has several vaults, which can be opened from a control room. We want what's in the vaults so necessity demands we get to the control room.
loc_jr1_26_03.loc_text: This area has several vaults, which can be opened from a control room. We want what's in the vaults so necessity demands we get to the control room.

loc_jr1_27_01.base_text: The control room is up there. You see?
loc_jr1_27_01.loc_text: The control room is up there. You see?

loc_jr1_27_02.base_text: The control will be found overlooking the complex.
loc_jr1_27_02.loc_text: The control will be found overlooking the complex.

loc_jr1_27_03.base_text: You see the control room up there?
loc_jr1_27_03.loc_text: You see the control room up there?

loc_jr1_28_01.base_text: You can only open one vault at a time, and I should make you aware that not all vaults contain loot. How you figure out which to open is your problem.
loc_jr1_28_01.loc_text: You can only open one vault at a time, and I should make you aware that not all vaults contain loot. How you figure out which to open is your problem.

loc_jr1_28_02.base_text: Now, only one vault can be opened at a time, and not all vaults are containing the loot. I will leave it to you to figure out which is worth opening.
loc_jr1_28_02.loc_text: Now, only one vault can be opened at a time, and not all vaults are containing the loot. I will leave it to you to figure out which is worth opening.

loc_jr1_28_03.base_text: Only one vault can be opened at a time. Further, only certain vaults have loot within them. How that is determined is up to you, but I have confidence in your ability.
loc_jr1_28_03.loc_text: Only one vault can be opened at a time. Further, only certain vaults have loot within them. How that is determined is up to you, but I have confidence in your ability.

loc_jr1_29_01.base_text: Yes, I do believe I hear a vault opening. Excellent! Keep at it, gentlemen!
loc_jr1_29_01.loc_text: Yes, I do believe I hear a vault opening. Excellent! Keep at it, gentlemen!

loc_jr1_29_02.base_text: Ahhh, do my ears deceive me or is that the sound of a titanium vault opening. Maintain your efforts, friends!
loc_jr1_29_02.loc_text: Ahhh, do my ears deceive me or is that the sound of a titanium vault opening. Maintain your efforts, friends!

loc_jr1_29_03.base_text: Ahhh, if any sound is sweeter than that of an opening vault it is that of bagging loot. You are producing a symphony for my ears!
loc_jr1_29_03.loc_text: Ahhh, if any sound is sweeter than that of an opening vault it is that of bagging loot. You are producing a symphony for my ears!

loc_jr1_30_01.base_text: All right, my dear friends. That's enough loot to make this op worthwhile. You decide if you want to keep going. Every extra dollar, rand and rouble strengthens our friendship, yeah? For sure.
loc_jr1_30_01.loc_text: All right, my dear friends. That's enough loot to make this op worthwhile. You decide if you want to keep going. Every extra dollar, rand and rouble strengthens our friendship, yeah? For sure.

loc_jr1_30_02.base_text: Great. That loot will satisfy our arrangement... however, if you wanted to carry on... I am just saying... hmmmm?
loc_jr1_30_02.loc_text: Great. That loot will satisfy our arrangement... however, if you wanted to carry on... I am just saying... hmmmm?

loc_jr1_30_03.base_text: That is a good amount of loot, friends. Enough to make this worthwhile. Still, if you feel like you still got a little lead in your pencil and wanted to fuck Murkywater a little longer... you can get more.
loc_jr1_30_03.loc_text: That is a good amount of loot, friends. Enough to make this worthwhile. Still, if you feel like you still got a little lead in your pencil and wanted to fuck Murkywater a little longer... you can get more.

loc_jr1_31_01.base_text: That is the first of some fucking sweet loot! Excellent! Now, you will find a large vertical shaft nearby. Send loot up it by cable. I will look after it.
loc_jr1_31_01.loc_text: That is the first of some fucking sweet loot! Excellent! Now, you will find a large vertical shaft nearby. Send loot up it by cable. I will look after it.

loc_jr1_31_02.base_text: Ah! The first bag! You will find a vertical conveyance near the vaults that will relay the loot up to me. It will be perfectly safe!
loc_jr1_31_02.loc_text: Ah! The first bag! You will find a vertical conveyance near the vaults that will relay the loot up to me. It will be perfectly safe!

loc_jr1_31_03.base_text: The first bag! Bellissimo! Now, close to the vaults you will find a tall vertical shaft with cables. Attach the bags to the cables, and they will be lifted to me.
loc_jr1_31_03.loc_text: The first bag! Bellissimo! Now, close to the vaults you will find a tall vertical shaft with cables. Attach the bags to the cables, and they will be lifted to me.

loc_jr1_32_01.base_text: And I believe that about does it, my friends! Now, please ensure that our hard-earned loot is placed on the cables and conveyed up to me.
loc_jr1_32_01.loc_text: And I believe that about does it, my friends! Now, please ensure that our hard-earned loot is placed on the cables and conveyed up to me.

loc_jr1_32_02.base_text: Wonderful! I believe that that is enough to make this a worthwhile venture. Please, ensure all of the bags are placed on the cables and sent up to me.
loc_jr1_32_02.loc_text: Wonderful! I believe that that is enough to make this a worthwhile venture. Please, ensure all of the bags are placed on the cables and sent up to me.

loc_jr1_32_03.base_text: Bravo, my friends! Now, to proceed, please attach the bags to the cables in the large vertical shaft. I am at the top, and will receive them safely.
loc_jr1_32_03.loc_text: Bravo, my friends! Now, to proceed, please attach the bags to the cables in the large vertical shaft. I am at the top, and will receive them safely.

loc_jr1_33_01.base_text: It's a beautiful painting. Last seen on the walls of a well known South American dictator. See how the artist captured the light and all that shit? Beautiful.
loc_jr1_33_01.loc_text: It's a beautiful painting. Last seen on the walls of a well known South American dictator. See how the artist captured the light and all that shit? Beautiful.

loc_jr1_33_02.base_text: I don't know much about fine art, but I know some poe will pay through the arse for that.
loc_jr1_33_02.loc_text: I don't know much about fine art, but I know some poe will pay through the arse for that.

loc_jr1_33_03.base_text: It's a masterpiece. Thought lost for decades. I'd hang it in my crapper, but it's worth a shitload of cash.
loc_jr1_33_03.loc_text: It's a masterpiece. Thought lost for decades. I'd hang it in my crapper, but it's worth a shitload of cash.

loc_jr1_34_01.base_text: Fuck knows what that thing is. They say it has a curse. Makes your nose look like a dick. So why people pay craploads for it, I don't know.
loc_jr1_34_01.loc_text: Fuck knows what that thing is. They say it has a curse. Makes your nose look like a dick. So why people pay craploads for it, I don't know.

loc_jr1_34_02.base_text: Maybe I should've studied this ancient stuff more. Could the curse be true? Ah, it's just old shit worth money to me.
loc_jr1_34_02.loc_text: Maybe I should've studied this ancient stuff more. Could the curse be true? Ah, it's just old shit worth money to me.

loc_jr1_34_03.base_text: This was found by our "tomb raider" division. They're great guys. Drink like fucking micks though.
loc_jr1_34_03.loc_text: This was found by our "tomb raider" division. They're great guys. Drink like fucking micks though.

loc_jr1_35_01.base_text: This thing has secrets that can topple the government. Wanna see what the President keeps in a folder called "Gentlemen's Interests"? Yeah, you do - for sure!
loc_jr1_35_01.loc_text: This thing has secrets that can topple the government. Wanna see what the President keeps in a folder called "Gentlemen's Interests"? Yeah, you do - for sure!

loc_jr1_35_02.base_text: This server has secrets, recordings, data that can change the world. And all my saved games. Yeah, for sure.
loc_jr1_35_02.loc_text: This server has secrets, recordings, data that can change the world. And all my saved games. Yeah, for sure.

loc_jr1_35_03.base_text: It's made of metal and plastic, but this server has secrets that makes Pandora's Box look like a fucking kiddies toy-chest.
loc_jr1_35_03.loc_text: It's made of metal and plastic, but this server has secrets that makes Pandora's Box look like a fucking kiddies toy-chest.

loc_jr1_36_01.base_text: I won't tell you what this is, 'cos you'll fucking shit your undies. Just don't press any buttons.
loc_jr1_36_01.loc_text: I won't tell you what this is, 'cos you'll fucking shit your undies. Just don't press any buttons.

loc_jr1_36_02.base_text: We stole this from a lab not a million miles from here. Two hundred thirty eight thousand six hundred and six miles, to be precise.
loc_jr1_36_02.loc_text: We stole this from a lab not a million miles from here. Two hundred thirty eight thousand six hundred and six miles, to be precise.

loc_jr1_36_03.base_text: All right now, careful with this. You press the wrong buttons and there's no telling what you might turn into.
loc_jr1_36_03.loc_text: All right now, careful with this. You press the wrong buttons and there's no telling what you might turn into.

loc_jr1_37_01.base_text: Yoohoooooo! Send the bags up here, my friends!
loc_jr1_37_01.loc_text: Yoohoooooo! Send the bags up here, my friends!

loc_jr1_37_02.base_text: The bags will be perfectly safe with me. Send them up, please.
loc_jr1_37_02.loc_text: The bags will be perfectly safe with me. Send them up, please.

loc_jr1_37_03.base_text: Do you see the shaft? Yes, just send the bags of loot up here.
loc_jr1_37_03.loc_text: Do you see the shaft? Yes, just send the bags of loot up here.

loc_jr1_38_01.base_text: And... yes, that is a satisfactory piece of business! All of the bags! Now, please, attach yourselves to the cables, join me up here and let us meet in person!
loc_jr1_38_01.loc_text: And... yes, that is a satisfactory piece of business! All of the bags! Now, please, attach yourselves to the cables, join me up here and let us meet in person!

loc_jr1_38_02.base_text: Let me see, one, two. Yes, all here! Now, please use the cables to join me up here.
loc_jr1_38_02.loc_text: Let me see, one, two. Yes, all here! Now, please use the cables to join me up here.

loc_jr1_38_03.base_text: One, two, buckle my shoe. Yes, it would seem all of the bags are present. Now, please, attach your good selves to the cables and join me.
loc_jr1_38_03.loc_text: One, two, buckle my shoe. Yes, it would seem all of the bags are present. Now, please, attach your good selves to the cables and join me.

loc_jr1_39_01.base_text: Come on, gentlemen! Don't be shy! Come and say hello.
loc_jr1_39_01.loc_text: Come on, gentlemen! Don't be shy! Come and say hello.

loc_jr1_39_02.base_text: Yes, that's right, all of you up the shaft, please.
loc_jr1_39_02.loc_text: Yes, that's right, all of you up the shaft, please.

loc_jr1_39_03.base_text: I'm keen to meet you all. Please, zipline up the shaft.
loc_jr1_39_03.loc_text: I'm keen to meet you all. Please, zipline up the shaft.

loc_jr1_40_03.base_text: Hello, to you, my new friends!
loc_jr1_40_03.loc_text: Hello, to you, my new friends!

loc_jr1_41_01.base_text: Now, there will be time for longer hellos later, but we should really make our escape now, yes?
loc_jr1_41_01.loc_text: Now, there will be time for longer hellos later, but we should really make our escape now, yes?

loc_jr1_41_02.base_text: We can get better acquainted later, but I feel now would be the opportune time to, how you say, GTFO, yes?
loc_jr1_41_02.loc_text: We can get better acquainted later, but I feel now would be the opportune time to, how you say, GTFO, yes?

loc_jr1_41_03.base_text: We can get to know each other over whiskey and cigars later, because I feel that now would be the perfect time for a getaway, yes?
loc_jr1_41_03.loc_text: We can get to know each other over whiskey and cigars later, because I feel that now would be the perfect time for a getaway, yes?

loc_jr1_42_03.base_text: This way, my friends, with all haste.
loc_jr1_42_03.loc_text: This way, my friends, with all haste.

loc_jr1_43_01.base_text: Our escape chopper is out here, but you will also see a lot of radar equipment. With this, they could follow us anywhere we could fly to.
loc_jr1_43_01.loc_text: Our escape chopper is out here, but you will also see a lot of radar equipment. With this, they could follow us anywhere we could fly to.

loc_jr1_43_02.base_text: Once we are outside you will see our escape helicopter, as well as a large array of advanced radar equipment. State of the art. It could track us anywhere west of the Rockies.
loc_jr1_43_02.loc_text: Once we are outside you will see our escape helicopter, as well as a large array of advanced radar equipment. State of the art. It could track us anywhere west of the Rockies.

loc_jr1_43_03.base_text: Our escape by helicopter is imminent, but we must cover ourselves. Beyond the door Murkywater has an impressive array of radar equipment.
loc_jr1_43_03.loc_text: Our escape by helicopter is imminent, but we must cover ourselves. Beyond the door Murkywater has an impressive array of radar equipment.

loc_jr1_44_01.base_text: It would be best if these radars were destroyed. Yes?
loc_jr1_44_01.loc_text: It would be best if these radars were destroyed. Yes?

loc_jr1_44_02.base_text: We want to get away cleanly so these must be destroyed. I can leave that to you, yes?
loc_jr1_44_02.loc_text: We want to get away cleanly so these must be destroyed. I can leave that to you, yes?

loc_jr1_44_03.base_text: Please, destroy the radars. Stab their fucking eyes out, so to speak.
loc_jr1_44_03.loc_text: Please, destroy the radars. Stab their fucking eyes out, so to speak.

loc_jr1_45_01.base_text: I've got some C4 for the job right here.
loc_jr1_45_01.loc_text: I've got some C4 for the job right here.

loc_jr1_45_02.base_text: Thankfully, I have a supply of C4 right here.
loc_jr1_45_02.loc_text: Thankfully, I have a supply of C4 right here.

loc_jr1_45_03.base_text: This cache of C4 should deal with the radars, yes?
loc_jr1_45_03.loc_text: This cache of C4 should deal with the radars, yes?

loc_jr1_46_01.base_text: Do not forget. Take out those radars. I'll get the chopper ready.
loc_jr1_46_01.loc_text: Do not forget. Take out those radars. I'll get the chopper ready.

loc_jr1_46_02.base_text: So. I will prepare the helicopter. You will deal with the radar dishes. Agreed?
loc_jr1_46_02.loc_text: So. I will prepare the helicopter. You will deal with the radar dishes. Agreed?

loc_jr1_46_03.base_text: Almost open. Remember, you deal with the radars, and I will prepare the helicopter.
loc_jr1_46_03.loc_text: Almost open. Remember, you deal with the radars, and I will prepare the helicopter.

loc_jr1_48_01.base_text: Use the C4 to send those radars tumbling, my friends!
loc_jr1_48_01.loc_text: Use the C4 to send those radars tumbling, my friends!

loc_jr1_48_02.base_text: That's right. C4 each of those dishes.
loc_jr1_48_02.loc_text: That's right. C4 each of those dishes.

loc_jr1_48_03.base_text: Remember, you must apply the C4 to each of those radars.
loc_jr1_48_03.loc_text: Remember, you must apply the C4 to each of those radars.

loc_jr1_49_01.base_text: Excellent. They are blind! Blind as a bat. Though bats are supposed to be blind, and locate prey by echolocation, so that is...
loc_jr1_49_01.loc_text: Excellent. They are blind! Blind as a bat. Though bats are supposed to be blind, and locate prey by echolocation, so that is...

loc_jr1_49_02.base_text: That was a bulleye, yes! Now we can fly away and worry not a jot about being followed!
loc_jr1_49_02.loc_text: That was a bulleye, yes! Now we can fly away and worry not a jot about being followed!

loc_jr1_49_03.base_text: It saddens me to see such beautiful hardware reduced to ruins, but it is a necessary evil. Now, our clean escape is assured!
loc_jr1_49_03.loc_text: It saddens me to see such beautiful hardware reduced to ruins, but it is a necessary evil. Now, our clean escape is assured!

loc_jr1_50_01.base_text: Okay, friends, let us now move the lootbags to the helicopter. Do not dawdle now!
loc_jr1_50_01.loc_text: Okay, friends, let us now move the lootbags to the helicopter. Do not dawdle now!

loc_jr1_50_02.base_text: And now, if you would be so kind, the loot bags to the helicopter? Please?
loc_jr1_50_02.loc_text: And now, if you would be so kind, the loot bags to the helicopter? Please?

loc_jr1_50_03.base_text: Now, please, bring the loot bags to the helicopter.
loc_jr1_50_03.loc_text: Now, please, bring the loot bags to the helicopter.

loc_jr1_51_01.base_text: I have a nice spot, just for those loot bags... right here.
loc_jr1_51_01.loc_text: I have a nice spot, just for those loot bags... right here.

loc_jr1_51_02.base_text: We're almost done, but may I remind you again about bringing the bags to the helicopter?
loc_jr1_51_02.loc_text: We're almost done, but may I remind you again about bringing the bags to the helicopter?

loc_jr1_51_03.base_text: Just bring thoses bags to the chopper, dear friends.
loc_jr1_51_03.loc_text: Just bring thoses bags to the chopper, dear friends.

loc_jr1_52_01.base_text: Damn, and shit. The aircrew are sloppy as kak. Helicopter ain't got no fuel. Hey, can you hook up the fuel line?
loc_jr1_52_01.loc_text: Damn, and shit. The aircrew are sloppy as kak. Helicopter ain't got no fuel. Hey, can you hook up the fuel line?

loc_jr1_52_02.base_text: Kak! Some sloppy bastard forgot to refuel the chopper. Hook up the fuel, would you?
loc_jr1_52_02.loc_text: Kak! Some sloppy bastard forgot to refuel the chopper. Hook up the fuel, would you?

loc_jr1_52_03.base_text: Ach! Some poes has been joyriding this bird. Gas is empty. Can you be a good chap and hook up the fuel line?
loc_jr1_52_03.loc_text: Ach! Some poes has been joyriding this bird. Gas is empty. Can you be a good chap and hook up the fuel line?

loc_jr1_53_01.base_text: I know it is an imposition, but do you think you could connect the fuel hose to the helicopter?
loc_jr1_53_01.loc_text: I know it is an imposition, but do you think you could connect the fuel hose to the helicopter?

loc_jr1_53_02.base_text: Can I remind you that this chopper is grounded until it is refueled?
loc_jr1_53_02.loc_text: Can I remind you that this chopper is grounded until it is refueled?

loc_jr1_53_03.base_text: Yes, it would be most agreeable to get some fuel in this chopper.
loc_jr1_53_03.loc_text: Yes, it would be most agreeable to get some fuel in this chopper.

loc_jr1_54_01.base_text: Ah kak, they know we're trying to fuck off. They're going all in! Hold steady, friends!
loc_jr1_54_01.loc_text: Ah kak, they know we're trying to fuck off. They're going all in! Hold steady, friends!

loc_jr1_54_02.base_text: Looks like a last desperate attempt to clip our wings, hey? Stand firm, brave warriors.
loc_jr1_54_02.loc_text: Looks like a last desperate attempt to clip our wings, hey? Stand firm, brave warriors.

loc_jr1_54_03.base_text: They're throwing everything into this. Hold them off, my friends. They'll kill you, but they'll fuck me proper. For sure.
loc_jr1_54_03.loc_text: They're throwing everything into this. Hold them off, my friends. They'll kill you, but they'll fuck me proper. For sure.

loc_jr1_55_01.base_text: Right, the fuel tank is full, the blades are spinning and the cargo is secure. Time to get out of here. Gentlemen, please join me aboard!
loc_jr1_55_01.loc_text: Right, the fuel tank is full, the blades are spinning and the cargo is secure. Time to get out of here. Gentlemen, please join me aboard!

loc_jr1_55_02.base_text: Great. We got a full tank, lots of green lights and we're fat with stolen loot. Hop aboard, my friends. Let's conclude this.
loc_jr1_55_02.loc_text: Great. We got a full tank, lots of green lights and we're fat with stolen loot. Hop aboard, my friends. Let's conclude this.

loc_jr1_55_03.base_text: Ah, bravo! We're fueled and ready to go. Please, make your way aboard and let us get out of here. This was a fine day.
loc_jr1_55_03.loc_text: Ah, bravo! We're fueled and ready to go. Please, make your way aboard and let us get out of here. This was a fine day.

loc_jr1_56_01.base_text: We are finally almost finished! Please, join me at the helicopter!
loc_jr1_56_01.loc_text: We are finally almost finished! Please, join me at the helicopter!

loc_jr1_56_02.base_text: The end is upon us. And it is a good ending! Please, into the helicopter!
loc_jr1_56_02.loc_text: The end is upon us. And it is a good ending! Please, into the helicopter!

loc_jr1_56_03.base_text: We are done, my good friends! Everyone into the helicopter!
loc_jr1_56_03.loc_text: We are done, my good friends! Everyone into the helicopter!

loc_jr1_57_01.base_text: Ah! That fucker owed me $20. Ah well.
loc_jr1_57_01.loc_text: Ah! That fucker owed me $20. Ah well.

loc_jr1_57_02.base_text: I liked that guy. We'll send his wife a ham. Yeah, for sure.

loc_tag_cbf_01.base_text: Dear friends. Commissioner Garrett has arrested the Elephant on trumped-up charges in order to get an item he has, that the owners of Murkywater- these Kataru people, want. He's making a deal to give it to them in exchange for what we can only guess is the body of Bain, now that they're done with him. The item obviously very important for them to risk exposing themselves and I wouldn't bet against the whole thing being about Bain's Grail-Dinges. We don't know yet what the Elephant's doing in all of this, if he's still solid with us, and we couldn't help him right now even if we wanted to, but Garrett will be in his FBI headquarters tonight preparing for the exchange, so we're going to ruin his plans.
loc_tag_cbf_01.loc_text: Dear friends. Commissioner Garrett has arrested the Elephant on trumped-up charges in order to get an item he has, that the owners of Murkywater- these Kataru people, want. He's making a deal to give it to them in exchange for what we can only guess is the body of Bain, now that they're done with him. The item obviously very important for them to risk exposing themselves and I wouldn't bet against the whole thing being about Bain's Grail-Dinges. We don't know yet what the Elephant's doing in all of this, if he's still solid with us, and we couldn't help him right now even if we wanted to, but Garrett will be in his FBI headquarters tonight preparing for the exchange, so we're going to ruin his plans.

loc_tag_end_01.base_text: Well done, friends. We pulled the rug from right under Commissioner Garrett and I expect his next few hours won't be very pleasant. Oh, to be there when he goes to his meeting empty-handed, yeah? Bain would be proud. As soon as you get back to the safehouse, Duke should get cracking on examining the Elephant's box. We've got to know how it connects to the one you acquired in Las Vegas, to Bain's grail-dinges and these Kataru chops. Then we plan our next move.
loc_tag_end_01.loc_text: Well done, friends. We pulled the rug from right under Commissioner Garrett and I expect his next few hours won't be very pleasant. Oh, to be there when he goes to his meeting empty-handed, yeah? Bain would be proud. As soon as you get back to the safehouse, Duke should get cracking on examining the Elephant's box. We've got to know how it connects to the one you acquired in Las Vegas, to Bain's grail-dinges and these Kataru chops. Then we plan our next move.
