pln_al1_56_05.loc_text: Good find. But you'll need more C4. Keep searching.

pln_al1_cbf_01_01.base_text: Gensec have a brand new vault - the Investment Safe. Unbreakable, they say, and they're showcasing it at the arena. The door is made of their new compound - Vivinite. But everything has a soft spot. With a bit of C4 and a new circular cutter, we can steal their cash out right from beneath them.
pln_al1_cbf_01_01.loc_text: Gensec have a brand new vault - the Investment Safe. Unbreakable, they say, and they're showcasing it at the arena. The door is made of their new compound - Vivinite. But everything has a soft spot. With a bit of C4 and a new circular cutter, we can steal their cash out right from beneath them.

pln_al1_cnc_01_01.base_text: Gensec are showing their unbreakable vault at the arena. We're going to use the Alesso concert to prove them wrong.
pln_al1_cnc_01_01.loc_text: Gensec are showing their unbreakable vault at the arena. We're going to use the Alesso concert to prove them wrong.

pln_al1_cnc_01_02.base_text: Alesso is playing at the Gensec arena. We're going to teach them that nothing can stop the Payday Gang.
pln_al1_cnc_01_02.loc_text: Alesso is playing at the Gensec arena. We're going to teach them that nothing can stop the Payday Gang.

pln_al1_cnc_01_03.base_text: Alesso is in town tonight. Going to use his concert as cover to hit Gensec at their arena.
pln_al1_cnc_01_03.loc_text: Alesso is in town tonight. Going to use his concert as cover to hit Gensec at their arena.

pln_al1_intro_01_01.base_text: Tickets for Alesso's show were swapping hands for $400! Whatever happens tonight, someone is getting rich.
pln_al1_intro_01_01.loc_text: Tickets for Alesso's show were swapping hands for $400! Whatever happens tonight, someone is getting rich.

pln_al1_intro_01_02.base_text: Here it is - the Gensec arena. This Alesso gig is the biggest show it's seen. Let's make sure it goes down in history.
pln_al1_intro_01_02.loc_text: Here it is - the Gensec arena. This Alesso gig is the biggest show it's seen. Let's make sure it goes down in history.

pln_al1_intro_01_03.base_text: Ah! Been some good gigs here. And Alesso's is the biggest one yet.
pln_al1_intro_01_03.loc_text: Ah! Been some good gigs here. And Alesso's is the biggest one yet.

pln_art_end_01_01.base_text: Great job! I'll start moving this stuff through our fences right away. Enjoy your payday, gang!
pln_art_end_01_01.loc_text: Great job! I'll start moving this stuff through our fences right away. Enjoy your payday, gang!

pln_art_end_01_02.base_text: Expertly done! Collectors will pay big figures for this stuff. You did great, gang!
pln_art_end_01_02.loc_text: Expertly done! Collectors will pay big figures for this stuff. You did great, gang!

pln_art_intro_01_01.base_text: Let's hope we can be as successful as last time. Hit it, gang.
pln_art_intro_01_01.loc_text: Let's hope we can be as successful as last time. Hit it, gang.

pln_art_intro_01_02.base_text: We did it once, we can do it again. Get in there, and boost that art, clowns.
pln_art_intro_01_02.loc_text: We did it once, we can do it again. Get in there, and boost that art, clowns.

pln_as1_01_02.base_text: Jesus, it looked bad on the news, but...
pln_as1_01_02.loc_text: Jesus, it looked bad on the news, but...

pln_as1_01_03.base_text: City of Angeles. Looks like the quake made a few more...
pln_as1_01_03.loc_text: City of Angeles. Looks like the quake made a few more...

pln_as1_02_01.base_text: I got Vlad on the line.
pln_as1_02_01.loc_text: I got Vlad on the line.

pln_as1_02_02.base_text: Vlad's very keen on talking to you on this one.
pln_as1_02_02.loc_text: Vlad's very keen on talking to you on this one.

pln_as1_02_03.base_text: Vlad's pretty upset about these safes. Wants to talk to you.
pln_as1_02_03.loc_text: Vlad's pretty upset about these safes. Wants to talk to you.

pln_as1_03_01.base_text: You heard him. The trucks are around here somewhere.
pln_as1_03_01.loc_text: You heard him. The trucks are around here somewhere.

pln_as1_03_02.base_text: Okay, trucks are somewhere on this freeway.
pln_as1_03_02.loc_text: Okay, trucks are somewhere on this freeway.

pln_as1_03_03.base_text: You heard the man. Let's find those trucks.
pln_as1_03_03.loc_text: You heard the man. Let's find those trucks.

pln_as1_04_01.base_text: Come on, find that second truck.
pln_as1_04_01.loc_text: Come on, find that second truck.

pln_as1_04_02.base_text: Second truck can't be too far from the first. Find it.
pln_as1_04_02.loc_text: Second truck can't be too far from the first. Find it.

pln_as1_04_03.base_text: Where's that second truck? Gotta be around here somewhere.
pln_as1_04_03.loc_text: Where's that second truck? Gotta be around here somewhere.

pln_as1_05_01.base_text: Great. Now crack those trucks open. Let's see what Vlad was shipping.
pln_as1_05_01.loc_text: Great. Now crack those trucks open. Let's see what Vlad was shipping.

pln_as1_05_02.base_text: Now, get those trucks opened. Let's get inside them.
pln_as1_05_02.loc_text: Now, get those trucks opened. Let's get inside them.

pln_as1_05_03.base_text: Good. Now we can open the trucks up and see what that crazy Ivan was shipping.
pln_as1_05_03.loc_text: Good. Now we can open the trucks up and see what that crazy Ivan was shipping.

pln_as1_06_01.base_text: Well, at least it isn't nukes this time.
pln_as1_06_01.loc_text: Well, at least it isn't nukes this time.

pln_as1_06_02.base_text: You can bet they're important if Vlad sent us to this hellhole for them.
pln_as1_06_02.loc_text: You can bet they're important if Vlad sent us to this hellhole for them.

pln_as1_06_03.base_text: Tiaras, nuclear warheads, and safes. Just another job for Vlad.
pln_as1_06_03.loc_text: Tiaras, nuclear warheads, and safes. Just another job for Vlad.

pln_as1_07_01.base_text: I know it's not Hollywood glamour, but someone better gets those safes outta there.
pln_as1_07_01.loc_text: I know it's not Hollywood glamour, but someone better gets those safes outta there.

pln_as1_07_02.base_text: Come on, crew. Get the safes out. Put your back into it.
pln_as1_07_02.loc_text: Come on, crew. Get the safes out. Put your back into it.

pln_as1_07_03.base_text: Get the safes out, gang. Yeah, I know it's over a hundred degrees, but get to it.
pln_as1_07_03.loc_text: Get the safes out, gang. Yeah, I know it's over a hundred degrees, but get to it.

pln_as1_08_01.base_text: Gonna have to get through there. I'm sending you C4.
pln_as1_08_01.loc_text: Gonna have to get through there. I'm sending you C4.

pln_as1_08_02.base_text: A little C4 will deal with that. I'm sending some now. Hold on.
pln_as1_08_02.loc_text: A little C4 will deal with that. I'm sending some now. Hold on.

pln_as1_08_03.base_text: Telling the pilot to return with the C4 to bust you through there. Just hang in there.
pln_as1_08_03.loc_text: Telling the pilot to return with the C4 to bust you through there. Just hang in there.

pln_as1_09_01.base_text: All right, the C4's on the ground. Grab it!
pln_as1_09_01.loc_text: All right, the C4's on the ground. Grab it!

pln_as1_09_02.base_text: There's the C4, gang. Someone grab it.
pln_as1_09_02.loc_text: There's the C4, gang. Someone grab it.

pln_as1_09_03.base_text: Take the C4, crew. That will deal with the construction yard wall.
pln_as1_09_03.loc_text: Take the C4, crew. That will deal with the construction yard wall.

pln_as1_10_01.base_text: All right. Now slap the C4 on there. We're busting our way out.
pln_as1_10_01.loc_text: All right. Now slap the C4 on there. We're busting our way out.

pln_as1_10_02.base_text: Great. Now go blast that obstruction. It's your way out.
pln_as1_10_02.loc_text: Great. Now go blast that obstruction. It's your way out.

pln_as1_10_03.base_text: Now go deal with obstruction to the yard over there. You're getting out that way.
pln_as1_10_03.loc_text: Now go deal with obstruction to the yard over there. You're getting out that way.

pln_as1_11_01.base_text: All right. Safes are in. We're getting out through the yard. Make sure the truck is there!
pln_as1_11_01.loc_text: All right. Safes are in. We're getting out through the yard. Make sure the truck is there!

pln_as1_11_02.base_text: And that's it for the safes. Now I want that truck in the yard. We're closing this one!
pln_as1_11_02.loc_text: And that's it for the safes. Now I want that truck in the yard. We're closing this one!

pln_as1_11_03.base_text: Great. All the safes are in. Now let's see the truck back at the yard, gang - hustle!
pln_as1_11_03.loc_text: Great. All the safes are in. Now let's see the truck back at the yard, gang - hustle!

pln_as1_12_01.base_text: Gang, get into the construction yard! Hurry!
pln_as1_12_01.loc_text: Gang, get into the construction yard! Hurry!

pln_as1_12_02.base_text: Guys, I need you in the construction yard. It's the only way out.
pln_as1_12_02.loc_text: Guys, I need you in the construction yard. It's the only way out.

pln_as1_12_03.base_text: Get to the construction yard! Hurry!
pln_as1_12_03.loc_text: Get to the construction yard! Hurry!

pln_as1_13_01.base_text: Guys, the pilot is circling! Drop the flare!
pln_as1_13_01.loc_text: Guys, the pilot is circling! Drop the flare!

pln_as1_13_02.base_text: Gang, the pilot can't see you. You need to light that flare.
pln_as1_13_02.loc_text: Gang, the pilot can't see you. You need to light that flare.

pln_as1_13_03.base_text: Light the flare, gang. Pilot is blind without it.
pln_as1_13_03.loc_text: Light the flare, gang. Pilot is blind without it.

pln_as1_14_01.base_text: We don't have time to load and unload the safes. The chopper's just going to carry the truck. It can do it. You just need to get in!
pln_as1_14_01.loc_text: We don't have time to load and unload the safes. The chopper's just going to carry the truck. It can do it. You just need to get in!

pln_as1_14_02.base_text: No time to load the chopper. It's just going to grab the truck, so you need to be inside!
pln_as1_14_02.loc_text: No time to load the chopper. It's just going to grab the truck, so you need to be inside!

pln_as1_14_03.base_text: Get inside the truck! The chopper is going to airlift the whole damn thing out!
pln_as1_14_03.loc_text: Get inside the truck! The chopper is going to airlift the whole damn thing out!

pln_as1_15_02.base_text: Hope that cable holds. Wait, did I add the weight of the safes...?
pln_as1_15_02.loc_text: Hope that cable holds. Wait, did I add the weight of the safes...?

pln_as1_15_03.base_text: Flying like angels over...that ruin of a city. Great job!
pln_as1_15_03.loc_text: Flying like angels over...that ruin of a city. Great job!

pln_as1_16_02.base_text: Man, the city's a ruin. Roads, buildings...everything's screwed.
pln_as1_16_02.loc_text: Man, the city's a ruin. Roads, buildings...everything's screwed.

pln_as1_16_03.base_text: Guys, the wreckage is incredible. Rubble blocking everything.
pln_as1_16_03.loc_text: Guys, the wreckage is incredible. Rubble blocking everything.

pln_as1_17_01.base_text: The trucks are here somewhere. Vlad's guys will be too, so watch your fire.
pln_as1_17_01.loc_text: The trucks are here somewhere. Vlad's guys will be too, so watch your fire.

pln_as1_17_02.base_text: The trucks are somewhere near. Keep an eye out for Vlad's couriers too. Don't drop them!
pln_as1_17_02.loc_text: The trucks are somewhere near. Keep an eye out for Vlad's couriers too. Don't drop them!

pln_as1_17_03.base_text: Find those trucks! And don't shoot Vlad's guys if any of them are still around.
pln_as1_17_03.loc_text: Find those trucks! And don't shoot Vlad's guys if any of them are still around.

pln_as1_18_01.base_text: There's no way you're hauling those out on your backs. Hold on, I'm going to find you a transport.
pln_as1_18_01.loc_text: There's no way you're hauling those out on your backs. Hold on, I'm going to find you a transport.

pln_as1_18_02.base_text: You'll never carry those out. Gonna need a transport, and a way out. Give me a minute, I'll find something.
pln_as1_18_02.loc_text: You'll never carry those out. Gonna need a transport, and a way out. Give me a minute, I'll find something.

pln_as1_18_03.base_text: The safes are way too heavy to carry, and those trucks are screwed. Gonna need another transport. I'll find something - hang tight.
pln_as1_18_03.loc_text: The safes are way too heavy to carry, and those trucks are screwed. Gonna need another transport. I'll find something - hang tight.

pln_as1_19_01.base_text: Damn, place is wrecked. Still looking. Hang in there.
pln_as1_19_01.loc_text: Damn, place is wrecked. Still looking. Hang in there.

pln_as1_19_02.base_text: This would be easier if the city wasn't a ruin. Just hold on.
pln_as1_19_02.loc_text: This would be easier if the city wasn't a ruin. Just hold on.

pln_as1_19_03.base_text: I'm still looking. Damn, LA is smoked. Hold them off.
pln_as1_19_03.loc_text: I'm still looking. Damn, LA is smoked. Hold them off.

pln_as1_20_01.base_text: Got it! Construction yard, with a truck. Looks like the best way out of here, but you'll need C4 to bust that wall. Sending it now. Mind the safes!
pln_as1_20_01.loc_text: Got it! Construction yard, with a truck. Looks like the best way out of here, but you'll need C4 to bust that wall. Sending it now. Mind the safes!

pln_as1_20_02.base_text: Gang, there's a construction yard across the river! Got a truck parked up. Reckon it's our best way out. Sending you C4 now. Protect the safes!
pln_as1_20_02.loc_text: Gang, there's a construction yard across the river! Got a truck parked up. Reckon it's our best way out. Sending you C4 now. Protect the safes!

pln_as1_20_03.base_text: Crew, I'm guessing that that construction yard across the way is your best bet for getting out. They have a truck. Sending you some C4 to bring the wall down now.
pln_as1_20_03.loc_text: Crew, I'm guessing that that construction yard across the way is your best bet for getting out. They have a truck. Sending you some C4 to bring the wall down now.

pln_as1_21_01.base_text: That truck looks perfect. Now get the safes loaded on board - all of them.
pln_as1_21_01.loc_text: That truck looks perfect. Now get the safes loaded on board - all of them.

pln_as1_21_02.base_text: That will do! Start getting them out and into the truck!
pln_as1_21_02.loc_text: That will do! Start getting them out and into the truck!

pln_as1_21_03.base_text: Get the safes loaded onto that truck!
pln_as1_21_03.loc_text: Get the safes loaded onto that truck!

pln_at1_brf_03_01.base_text: We're using a magnetic crane to drop a little present in the path of the Gensec convoy - a steel container of professional badasses. Hit the trucks, and get the loot to the getaway. These docks have a rich history of heistery, gentlemen - do it proud.
pln_at1_brf_03_01.loc_text: We're using a magnetic crane to drop a little present in the path of the Gensec convoy - a steel container of professional badasses. Hit the trucks, and get the loot to the getaway. These docks have a rich history of heistery, gentlemen - do it proud.

pln_at1_brf_05_01.base_text: We have a stolen ambulance all ready to set up a roadblock, and a Gensec convoy en-route from Dulles. It's an old trick, but a classic. Get whatever's in the trucks to your escape driver. We're deep in Indian country here, gentlemen, so expect a fast response from D.C.'s finest.
pln_at1_brf_05_01.loc_text: We have a stolen ambulance all ready to set up a roadblock, and a Gensec convoy en-route from Dulles. It's an old trick, but a classic. Get whatever's in the trucks to your escape driver. We're deep in Indian country here, gentlemen, so expect a fast response from D.C.'s finest.

pln_at1_cbf_01_01.base_text: I'm sure you guys have tangled with Gensec before. They're the East Coast's premier provider of security solutions, if you believe their brochure. But, PR aside, these guys are serious. Today, we hit them.
pln_at1_cbf_01_01.loc_text: I'm sure you guys have tangled with Gensec before. They're the East Coast's premier provider of security solutions, if you believe their brochure. But, PR aside, these guys are serious. Today, we hit them.

pln_at1_cbf_01_02.base_text: Gensec are a big security company on the East Coast. Got a great reputation with the banks and politicians, but today we're going to see what we can do about that. Got a tip-off about a convoy coming into the city. We're going after it.
pln_at1_cbf_01_02.loc_text: Gensec are a big security company on the East Coast. Got a great reputation with the banks and politicians, but today we're going to see what we can do about that. Got a tip-off about a convoy coming into the city. We're going after it.

pln_at1_cbf_01_03.base_text: Gensec's overland armored convoys employ a lot of ex-military types, providing firepower and muscle, and they move everything from little Jimmy's favorite baseball card to the Crown Jewels. We got a line on a convoy moving into D.C. Let's see what we can get.
pln_at1_cbf_01_03.loc_text: Gensec's overland armored convoys employ a lot of ex-military types, providing firepower and muscle, and they move everything from little Jimmy's favorite baseball card to the Crown Jewels. We got a line on a convoy moving into D.C. Let's see what we can get.

pln_at1_cnc_01_01.base_text: We got Gensec trucks moving through the suburbs. Go hit 'em.
pln_at1_cnc_01_01.loc_text: We got Gensec trucks moving through the suburbs. Go hit 'em.

pln_at1_cnc_02_01.base_text: We've got an armored transport making an unscheduled stop downtown.
pln_at1_cnc_02_01.loc_text: We've got an armored transport making an unscheduled stop downtown.

pln_at1_cnc_03_01.base_text: We're intercepting Gensec trucks about to unload at the docks.
pln_at1_cnc_03_01.loc_text: We're intercepting Gensec trucks about to unload at the docks.

pln_at1_cnc_04_01.base_text: It's a beautiful day for a picnic at the park. And an armed robbery.
pln_at1_cnc_04_01.loc_text: It's a beautiful day for a picnic at the park. And an armed robbery.

pln_at1_cnc_05_01.base_text: The underpass is a vulnerable spot for the convoy. Hit it hard.
pln_at1_cnc_05_01.loc_text: The underpass is a vulnerable spot for the convoy. Hit it hard.

pln_at1_cro_01_01.base_text: I knew we could trust that sniper! He delivers. Don't waste time - get to work on that transport!
pln_at1_cro_01_01.loc_text: I knew we could trust that sniper! He delivers. Don't waste time - get to work on that transport!

pln_at1_cro_02_01.base_text: That's one hell of a shooter! He got 'em good! Now, let's do our part. Let's get our loot!
pln_at1_cro_02_01.loc_text: That's one hell of a shooter! He got 'em good! Now, let's do our part. Let's get our loot!

pln_at1_cro_03_01.base_text: Outstanding marksmanship. Three trucks got it. They're ready, gang - get out there.
pln_at1_cro_03_01.loc_text: Outstanding marksmanship. Three trucks got it. They're ready, gang - get out there.

pln_at1_cro_04_01.base_text: I've never seen shooting like that. Four shots, and four transports are taken out. Make it count.
pln_at1_cro_04_01.loc_text: I've never seen shooting like that. Four shots, and four transports are taken out. Make it count.

pln_at1_dow_01_01.base_text: Well, no turning back now! That was a hell of a bang! Get into that truck and do your part of the job!
pln_at1_dow_01_01.loc_text: Well, no turning back now! That was a hell of a bang! Get into that truck and do your part of the job!

pln_at1_dow_02_01.base_text: Well, our explosives guy delivered. Two transports have stopped. Get to work!
pln_at1_dow_02_01.loc_text: Well, our explosives guy delivered. Two transports have stopped. Get to work!

pln_at1_dow_03_01.base_text: Hot damn! Three trucks are pulled over. Their crews are on the street. Hit them hard!
pln_at1_dow_03_01.loc_text: Hot damn! Three trucks are pulled over. Their crews are on the street. Hit them hard!

pln_at1_dow_04_01.base_text: Boom! That couldn't have gone better. All four trucks are stopped and ready for your attention. At 'em, gang!
pln_at1_dow_04_01.loc_text: Boom! That couldn't have gone better. All four trucks are stopped and ready for your attention. At 'em, gang!

pln_at1_end_01_01.base_text: Haha! You did it! This jewelry should be worth a few bucks don't you think?
pln_at1_end_01_01.loc_text: Haha! You did it! This jewelry should be worth a few bucks don't you think?

pln_at1_end_01b_01.base_text: Great job. I'll get my contacts fencing the shinies. And see what I can find out about that blueprint. Stay tuned.
pln_at1_end_01b_01.loc_text: Great job. I'll get my contacts fencing the shinies. And see what I can find out about that blueprint. Stay tuned.

pln_at1_end_02_01.base_text: That's a lot of cash! Nice job!
pln_at1_end_02_01.loc_text: That's a lot of cash! Nice job!

pln_at1_end_02_02.base_text: Well done gentlemen! Some hard-earned cash!
pln_at1_end_02_02.loc_text: Well done gentlemen! Some hard-earned cash!

pln_at1_end_02b_01.base_text: Outstanding work. You guys spend blow through some of that cash. I'll see what I can find on this blueprint.
pln_at1_end_02b_01.loc_text: Outstanding work. You guys spend blow through some of that cash. I'll see what I can find on this blueprint.

pln_at1_end_03_01.base_text: Sweet, sweet gold! Great job everyone!
pln_at1_end_03_01.loc_text: Sweet, sweet gold! Great job everyone!

pln_at1_end_03_02.base_text: That's gonna be worth a fortune! Great job!
pln_at1_end_03_02.loc_text: That's gonna be worth a fortune! Great job!

pln_at1_end_03b_01.base_text: I've already got interested parties lined up to take the bullion. I'll also dig up what I can regarding this blueprint.
pln_at1_end_03b_01.loc_text: I've already got interested parties lined up to take the bullion. I'll also dig up what I can regarding this blueprint.

pln_at1_gen_01_01.base_text: Cops on the way! Let's go!
pln_at1_gen_01_01.loc_text: Cops on the way! Let's go!

pln_at1_gen_01_02.base_text: Go Go Go! Cops will be here any minute!
pln_at1_gen_01_02.loc_text: Go Go Go! Cops will be here any minute!

pln_at1_gen_01_03.base_text: Hurry! Cops are already on their way!
pln_at1_gen_01_03.loc_text: Hurry! Cops are already on their way!

pln_at1_gen_02_01.base_text: Use whatever you got to open that sucker up!
pln_at1_gen_02_01.loc_text: Use whatever you got to open that sucker up!

pln_at1_gen_02_02.base_text: Get that open, and get whatever is in there!
pln_at1_gen_02_02.loc_text: Get that open, and get whatever is in there!

pln_at1_gen_04_01.base_text: Keep the cops off the drill.
pln_at1_gen_04_01.loc_text: Keep the cops off the drill.

pln_at1_gen_04_02.base_text: This shouldn't take long, hold your ground.
pln_at1_gen_04_02.loc_text: This shouldn't take long, hold your ground.

pln_at1_gen_04_03.base_text: Defend the drill. Should be through in a couple of minutes.
pln_at1_gen_04_03.loc_text: Defend the drill. Should be through in a couple of minutes.

pln_at1_gen_05_01.base_text: Good job, now get the bags to the van so we can get the hell out of here!
pln_at1_gen_05_01.loc_text: Good job, now get the bags to the van so we can get the hell out of here!

pln_at1_gen_05_03.base_text: Get the bags to the van!
pln_at1_gen_05_03.loc_text: Get the bags to the van!

pln_at1_gen_06_01.base_text: Use those roofs to your advantage!
pln_at1_gen_06_01.loc_text: Use those roofs to your advantage!

pln_at1_gen_06_02.base_text: You could probably get some good covering fire going from one of those roof tops.
pln_at1_gen_06_02.loc_text: You could probably get some good covering fire going from one of those roof tops.

pln_at1_gen_07_01.base_text: While you're at it, see if you can find anything in those stores that's worth some cash.
pln_at1_gen_07_01.loc_text: While you're at it, see if you can find anything in those stores that's worth some cash.

pln_at1_gen_07_02.base_text: Check the stores if you want some extra money.
pln_at1_gen_07_02.loc_text: Check the stores if you want some extra money.

pln_at1_gen_08_01.base_text: Use those offices as your advantage!
pln_at1_gen_08_01.loc_text: Use those offices as your advantage!

pln_at1_gen_09_01.base_text: Woah, some of the loot got caught in that explosion. Lucky for us, there is more in there.
pln_at1_gen_09_01.loc_text: Woah, some of the loot got caught in that explosion. Lucky for us, there is more in there.

pln_at1_gen_09_02.base_text: Looks like that shape charge got the best of some of the loot. Get the rest!
pln_at1_gen_09_02.loc_text: Looks like that shape charge got the best of some of the loot. Get the rest!

pln_at1_gen_09_03.base_text: Woah, we lost some loot in that explosion! Well, no time to waste! Look trough the rest of the deposit boxes.
pln_at1_gen_09_03.loc_text: Woah, we lost some loot in that explosion! Well, no time to waste! Look trough the rest of the deposit boxes.

pln_at1_gen_10_01.base_text: Woah! Bulldozer in the truck! Take him out! I guess they were expecting trouble.
pln_at1_gen_10_01.loc_text: Woah! Bulldozer in the truck! Take him out! I guess they were expecting trouble.

pln_at1_gen_10_02.base_text: Watch out! Bulldozer in the transport!
pln_at1_gen_10_02.loc_text: Watch out! Bulldozer in the transport!

pln_at1_gen_11_01.base_text: Great job! I'm sending the van, keep looting!
pln_at1_gen_11_01.loc_text: Great job! I'm sending the van, keep looting!

pln_at1_gen_11_02.base_text: I'm sending the van, keep bagging the stuff!
pln_at1_gen_11_02.loc_text: I'm sending the van, keep bagging the stuff!

pln_at1_gen_11_03.base_text: Alright! The van should be coming in soon!
pln_at1_gen_11_03.loc_text: Alright! The van should be coming in soon!

pln_at1_gen_12_01.base_text: Great job! I'm sending the boat, keep looting!
pln_at1_gen_12_01.loc_text: Great job! I'm sending the boat, keep looting!

pln_at1_gen_12_02.base_text: I'm sending the boat, keep bagging the stuff!
pln_at1_gen_12_02.loc_text: I'm sending the boat, keep bagging the stuff!

pln_at1_gen_12_03.base_text: Alright! The boat should be coming in soon!
pln_at1_gen_12_03.loc_text: Alright! The boat should be coming in soon!

pln_at1_gen_13_01.base_text: Great job! I'm sending the helicopter, keep looting!
pln_at1_gen_13_01.loc_text: Great job! I'm sending the helicopter, keep looting!

pln_at1_gen_13_02.base_text: I'm sending the helicopter, keep bagging the stuff!
pln_at1_gen_13_02.loc_text: I'm sending the helicopter, keep bagging the stuff!

pln_at1_gen_13_03.base_text: Alright! The helicopter should be coming in soon!
pln_at1_gen_13_03.loc_text: Alright! The helicopter should be coming in soon!

pln_at1_gen_14_01.base_text: It's open! Let's see what we got!
pln_at1_gen_14_01.loc_text: It's open! Let's see what we got!

pln_at1_gen_14_02.base_text: It's open! Open those deposit boxes!
pln_at1_gen_14_02.loc_text: It's open! Open those deposit boxes!

pln_at1_gen_14_03.base_text: It's open! Get the stuff out of the deposit boxes!
pln_at1_gen_14_03.loc_text: It's open! Get the stuff out of the deposit boxes!

pln_at1_gen_15_01.base_text: He's here, throw in the stuff!
pln_at1_gen_15_01.loc_text: He's here, throw in the stuff!

pln_at1_gen_15_02.base_text: Alright he's here! Get the loot over there!
pln_at1_gen_15_02.loc_text: Alright he's here! Get the loot over there!

pln_at1_gen_16_01.base_text: The truck's open. Get in there and crack the safeboxes. We need at least two bags of loot.
pln_at1_gen_16_01.loc_text: The truck's open. Get in there and crack the safeboxes. We need at least two bags of loot.

pln_at1_gen_17_01.base_text: We're in, but you still got to deal with the deposit boxes. You got to get three bags back to the pick-up. Hustle!
pln_at1_gen_17_01.loc_text: We're in, but you still got to deal with the deposit boxes. You got to get three bags back to the pick-up. Hustle!

pln_at1_gen_18_01.base_text: It's open! Deal with the deposit boxes, and grab the loot. Four bags is our minimum.
pln_at1_gen_18_01.loc_text: It's open! Deal with the deposit boxes, and grab the loot. Four bags is our minimum.

pln_at1_gen_19_01.base_text: You're through the first truck. Now start cracking boxes and bagging loot. Five bags, so move it, guys!
pln_at1_gen_19_01.loc_text: You're through the first truck. Now start cracking boxes and bagging loot. Five bags, so move it, guys!

pln_at1_gen_20_01.base_text: Well, what do have we here? Military blueprints! Let me investigate this.
pln_at1_gen_20_01.loc_text: Well, what do have we here? Military blueprints! Let me investigate this.

pln_at1_gen_20_02.base_text: This is interesting. Military blueprints in a Gensec transport. I'll look into it.
pln_at1_gen_20_02.loc_text: This is interesting. Military blueprints in a Gensec transport. I'll look into it.

pln_at1_gen_20_03.base_text: Military blueprints in a high security transport? I'll see what I can find.
pln_at1_gen_20_03.loc_text: Military blueprints in a high security transport? I'll see what I can find.

pln_at1_har_01_01.base_text: This is going to be bumpy, so brace yourselves! Only one truck to deal with. As soon as the doors open, hit it hard!
pln_at1_har_01_01.loc_text: This is going to be bumpy, so brace yourselves! Only one truck to deal with. As soon as the doors open, hit it hard!

pln_at1_har_02_01.base_text: Sorry about the accommodations, but it will be worth it. We got two trucks out there. As soon as the doors open, hit them hard!
pln_at1_har_02_01.loc_text: Sorry about the accommodations, but it will be worth it. We got two trucks out there. As soon as the doors open, hit them hard!

pln_at1_har_03_01.base_text: Hope you guys are holding up in there. Three trucks have pulled over. When the doors open, get at them!
pln_at1_har_03_01.loc_text: Hope you guys are holding up in there. Three trucks have pulled over. When the doors open, get at them!

pln_at1_har_04_01.base_text: Hate to see you guys cooped up like that, but we snagged four trucks. Get out there, and get at them!
pln_at1_har_04_01.loc_text: Hate to see you guys cooped up like that, but we snagged four trucks. Get out there, and get at them!

pln_at1_intro_01_01.base_text: Alright! We stopped the convoy, now get it open and secure the loot!
pln_at1_intro_01_01.loc_text: Alright! We stopped the convoy, now get it open and secure the loot!

pln_at1_intro_01_02.base_text: The transport is stopped! Open it, bag the loot, escape. Simple.
pln_at1_intro_01_02.loc_text: The transport is stopped! Open it, bag the loot, escape. Simple.

pln_at1_intro_01_03.base_text: There you go, armored transport served on a silver platter, just open her up and secure the loot.
pln_at1_intro_01_03.loc_text: There you go, armored transport served on a silver platter, just open her up and secure the loot.

pln_at1_intro_02_01.base_text: Our man is in position, and the target just turned on to McCarty. Almost there. Almost there...
pln_at1_intro_02_01.loc_text: Our man is in position, and the target just turned on to McCarty. Almost there. Almost there...

pln_at1_intro_02_02.base_text: The Gensec trucks just turned into our guy's sight. Wait for it... Wait for it...
pln_at1_intro_02_02.loc_text: The Gensec trucks just turned into our guy's sight. Wait for it... Wait for it...

pln_at1_intro_03_01.base_text: C4 is in place. Just need to press this button and...
pln_at1_intro_03_01.loc_text: C4 is in place. Just need to press this button and...

pln_at1_intro_03_02.base_text: Explosives are placed. Gensec transports on approach. Almost there...
pln_at1_intro_03_02.loc_text: Explosives are placed. Gensec transports on approach. Almost there...

pln_at1_intro_04_01.base_text: The target is spotted. Just need to get you into position and...
pln_at1_intro_04_01.loc_text: The target is spotted. Just need to get you into position and...

pln_at1_intro_04_02.base_text: OK, guys, here they come. Get that crane moving!
pln_at1_intro_04_02.loc_text: OK, guys, here they come. Get that crane moving!

pln_at1_intro_05_01.base_text: OK, Gensec is approaching. Gun that engine. Move! Move!
pln_at1_intro_05_01.loc_text: OK, Gensec is approaching. Gun that engine. Move! Move!

pln_at1_intro_05_02.base_text: Gensec in sight. Get those rigs moving. Go! Go! Go!
pln_at1_intro_05_02.loc_text: Gensec in sight. Get those rigs moving. Go! Go! Go!

pln_at1_intro_06_01.base_text: Our driver has pulled the ambulance over and ran for it. And here comes the target, right on schedule...
pln_at1_intro_06_01.loc_text: Our driver has pulled the ambulance over and ran for it. And here comes the target, right on schedule...

pln_at1_intro_06_02.base_text: Gensec on approach. Let's get this jam started. OK, hit it.
pln_at1_intro_06_02.loc_text: Gensec on approach. Let's get this jam started. OK, hit it.

pln_at1_par_01_01.base_text: Woah, jackpot! We hit 'em good! That truck is out of action. Get to work!
pln_at1_par_01_01.loc_text: Woah, jackpot! We hit 'em good! That truck is out of action. Get to work!

pln_at1_par_02_01.base_text: Bullseye! You guys OK? That was one hell of a collision! Get to work on those transports!
pln_at1_par_02_01.loc_text: Bullseye! You guys OK? That was one hell of a collision! Get to work on those transports!

pln_at1_par_03_01.base_text: Holy crap! We knocked all three trucks off the road. Make it count!
pln_at1_par_03_01.loc_text: Holy crap! We knocked all three trucks off the road. Make it count!

pln_at1_par_04_01.base_text: That's a Royal Flush, gang. Every God damn truck is ready for the picking. Get to work!
pln_at1_par_04_01.loc_text: That's a Royal Flush, gang. Every God damn truck is ready for the picking. Get to work!

pln_at1_und_01_01.base_text: Must be that drivers first day. The dumbass stopped for the ambulance! Now it's your turn, gang. Get out there and do your job!
pln_at1_und_01_01.loc_text: Must be that drivers first day. The dumbass stopped for the ambulance! Now it's your turn, gang. Get out there and do your job!

pln_at1_und_02_01.base_text: The roadblock worked and two transports have stopped. Get to work, and get 'em open!
pln_at1_und_02_01.loc_text: The roadblock worked and two transports have stopped. Get to work, and get 'em open!

pln_at1_und_03_01.base_text: They fell for it. Three transports. Crews are on the street, trying to figure out what's happening. Hit them hard!
pln_at1_und_03_01.loc_text: They fell for it. Three transports. Crews are on the street, trying to figure out what's happening. Hit them hard!

pln_at1_und_04_01.base_text: Outstanding work! All four trucks are stopped and ready. Make it rain, guys!
pln_at1_und_04_01.loc_text: Outstanding work! All four trucks are stopped and ready. Make it rain, guys!

pln_bb1_01_01.base_text: Benevolent Bank. A Neoclassical beauty. But business calls. We're going to need some codes, so get to their servers.
pln_bb1_01_01.loc_text: Benevolent Bank. A Neoclassical beauty. But business calls. We're going to need some codes, so get to their servers.

pln_bb1_01_02.base_text: It's a beautiful building, but we're bringing ugly business. We'll need codes to get deeper in, so look for their servers.
pln_bb1_01_02.loc_text: It's a beautiful building, but we're bringing ugly business. We'll need codes to get deeper in, so look for their servers.

pln_bb1_02_01.base_text: You know the drill. Watch for guards and cameras. Keep civilians in check. Look around for keycards, and the bank manager - anything that might help.
pln_bb1_02_01.loc_text: You know the drill. Watch for guards and cameras. Keep civilians in check. Look around for keycards, and the bank manager - anything that might help.

pln_bb1_02_02.base_text: You know how this goes. Eyes peeled for security. Civvies need to be controlled. And keycards are always useful.
pln_bb1_02_02.loc_text: You know how this goes. Eyes peeled for security. Civvies need to be controlled. And keycards are always useful.

pln_bb1_03_01.base_text: That's the server room. Get inside and get me connected.
pln_bb1_03_01.loc_text: That's the server room. Get inside and get me connected.

pln_bb1_03_02.base_text: The server room. Get me hooked up, guys.
pln_bb1_03_02.loc_text: The server room. Get me hooked up, guys.

pln_bb1_04_01.base_text: Hook me up. I should be able to get into their system from here.
pln_bb1_04_01.loc_text: Hook me up. I should be able to get into their system from here.

pln_bb1_04_02.base_text: Patch me in. I can do some mischief from here.
pln_bb1_04_02.loc_text: Patch me in. I can do some mischief from here.

pln_bb1_05_01.base_text: Damn it! Looks like we need local access. Most likely one of the staff terminals. Figure out which one. Try 'em all, if you have to.
pln_bb1_05_01.loc_text: Damn it! Looks like we need local access. Most likely one of the staff terminals. Figure out which one. Try 'em all, if you have to.

pln_bb1_05_02.base_text: Firewalls are tripped. We're going to need a local port - one of the staff terminals. Check them out.
pln_bb1_05_02.loc_text: Firewalls are tripped. We're going to need a local port - one of the staff terminals. Check them out.

pln_bb1_06_01.base_text: Ok, I'm in! Stand by. This shouldn't take me long.
pln_bb1_06_01.loc_text: Ok, I'm in! Stand by. This shouldn't take me long.

pln_bb1_06_02.base_text: I'm in. Hold on, guys - I need a little time.
pln_bb1_06_02.loc_text: I'm in. Hold on, guys - I need a little time.

pln_bb1_07_01.base_text: Connecting. We can only do them one at a time, so fingers crossed this is the right one.
pln_bb1_07_01.loc_text: Connecting. We can only do them one at a time, so fingers crossed this is the right one.

pln_bb1_07_02.base_text: Connecting now. Better pray this is the right one.
pln_bb1_07_02.loc_text: Connecting now. Better pray this is the right one.

pln_bb1_09_01.base_text: That was the wrong computer. Try another one. Maybe there's a way to figure out which terminal we need.
pln_bb1_09_01.loc_text: That was the wrong computer. Try another one. Maybe there's a way to figure out which terminal we need.

pln_bb1_09_02.base_text: That was the wrong terminal. Keep trying. Look for some clue, clock is ticking and we need to find the right one.
pln_bb1_09_02.loc_text: That was the wrong terminal. Keep trying. Look for some clue, clock is ticking and we need to find the right one.

pln_bb1_10_03.base_text: This one's a wash-out. Another one. Quick!
pln_bb1_10_03.loc_text: This one's a wash-out. Another one. Quick!

pln_bb1_11_01.base_text: Alright! Got the code! Start the time lock.
pln_bb1_11_01.loc_text: Alright! Got the code! Start the time lock.

pln_bb1_11_02.base_text: That's the code! Great. Now get it working on that time lock.
pln_bb1_11_02.loc_text: That's the code! Great. Now get it working on that time lock.

pln_bb1_12_01.base_text: One of the staff terminals is holding a code. Find it, and start hacking.
pln_bb1_12_01.loc_text: One of the staff terminals is holding a code. Find it, and start hacking.

pln_bb1_12_02.base_text: There will be a computer in one of the staff rooms that we can hack. Find it.
pln_bb1_12_02.loc_text: There will be a computer in one of the staff rooms that we can hack. Find it.

pln_bb1_13_01.base_text: The alarm disabled the time lock. It's a setback but not a fail. There's a maintenance room on the roof. Get there. We should be able to reboot it.
pln_bb1_13_01.loc_text: The alarm disabled the time lock. It's a setback but not a fail. There's a maintenance room on the roof. Get there. We should be able to reboot it.

pln_bb1_13_02.base_text: The alarm shut down the time lock. Stay cool. There's a maintenance office on the roof. Get there. We should be able to rewire it.
pln_bb1_13_02.loc_text: The alarm shut down the time lock. Stay cool. There's a maintenance office on the roof. Get there. We should be able to rewire it.

pln_bb1_14_01.base_text: And now we wait. Anyone have any good stories?
pln_bb1_14_01.loc_text: And now we wait. Anyone have any good stories?

pln_bb1_14_02.base_text: Now we wait for the time lock to run down. Did I ever tell you about my grandpa and his heisting days?
pln_bb1_14_02.loc_text: Now we wait for the time lock to run down. Did I ever tell you about my grandpa and his heisting days?

pln_bb1_15_01.base_text: Hold the cops off until the time lock runs down.
pln_bb1_15_01.loc_text: Hold the cops off until the time lock runs down.

pln_bb1_15_02.base_text: Bunker down, gang. Hold the line until the time lock finishes.
pln_bb1_15_02.loc_text: Bunker down, gang. Hold the line until the time lock finishes.

pln_bb1_16_01.base_text: There's a ladder leading to the roof. Over the garage.
pln_bb1_16_01.loc_text: There's a ladder leading to the roof. Over the garage.

pln_bb1_16_02.base_text: There's an access ladder over the garage. Should be able to get to the roof there.
pln_bb1_16_02.loc_text: There's an access ladder over the garage. Should be able to get to the roof there.

pln_bb1_17_01.base_text: Good. There's the circuit box. Rewiring it should do a hard reset on the time lock.
pln_bb1_17_01.loc_text: Good. There's the circuit box. Rewiring it should do a hard reset on the time lock.

pln_bb1_17_02.base_text: Rewire those circuits. That should reset the time lock.
pln_bb1_17_02.loc_text: Rewire those circuits. That should reset the time lock.

pln_bb1_18_01.base_text: That should do it. Now start the time lock again. I hope that it worked.
pln_bb1_18_01.loc_text: That should do it. Now start the time lock again. I hope that it worked.

pln_bb1_18_02.base_text: OK. Now let's restart the time lock and see if this worked.
pln_bb1_18_02.loc_text: OK. Now let's restart the time lock and see if this worked.

pln_bb1_19_01.base_text: It worked! Great. Now keep the cops off it.
pln_bb1_19_01.loc_text: It worked! Great. Now keep the cops off it.

pln_bb1_19_02.base_text: Great. Now keep the cops away from it.
pln_bb1_19_02.loc_text: Great. Now keep the cops away from it.

pln_bb1_20_01.base_text: While we wait for that, and if you've got the stones, get to the roof and get the zip-line set up.
pln_bb1_20_01.loc_text: While we wait for that, and if you've got the stones, get to the roof and get the zip-line set up.

pln_bb1_20_02.base_text: Now while the time lock counts down, you can get ahead of the action. There's a zip-line on the roof that will need setting up.
pln_bb1_20_02.loc_text: Now while the time lock counts down, you can get ahead of the action. There's a zip-line on the roof that will need setting up.

pln_bb1_20_03.base_text: Right, while we wait, and if you want to get ahead of things, you can get yourselves to the roof. Got a zip-line to set up there.
pln_bb1_20_03.loc_text: Right, while we wait, and if you want to get ahead of things, you can get yourselves to the roof. Got a zip-line to set up there.

pln_bb1_21_01.base_text: The cops messed up the time lock! Get it going again!
pln_bb1_21_01.loc_text: The cops messed up the time lock! Get it going again!

pln_bb1_21_02.base_text: Cops have messed with the time lock. Restart it.
pln_bb1_21_02.loc_text: Cops have messed with the time lock. Restart it.

pln_bb1_22_01.base_text: Come on! Get the time lock going again!
pln_bb1_22_01.loc_text: Come on! Get the time lock going again!

pln_bb1_22_02.base_text: This whole enterprise will be for nothing if you dont get that time lock tick-tocking again.
pln_bb1_22_02.loc_text: This whole enterprise will be for nothing if you dont get that time lock tick-tocking again.

pln_bb1_23_01.base_text: Good. Now keep the cops off of it.
pln_bb1_23_01.loc_text: Good. Now keep the cops off of it.

pln_bb1_23_02.base_text: Great. Now, please, keep the cops away from the time lock.
pln_bb1_23_02.loc_text: Great. Now, please, keep the cops away from the time lock.

pln_bb1_24_01.base_text: Set the zip-line up on the roof, then haul ass to the crane.
pln_bb1_24_01.loc_text: Set the zip-line up on the roof, then haul ass to the crane.

pln_bb1_24_02.base_text: Get the zip-line set up on the roof. Then connect it to the crane.
pln_bb1_24_02.loc_text: Get the zip-line set up on the roof. Then connect it to the crane.

pln_bb1_25_01.base_text: Quite the view, huh? Well, I've got something else to show you. Get to the control booth.
pln_bb1_25_01.loc_text: Quite the view, huh? Well, I've got something else to show you. Get to the control booth.

pln_bb1_25_02.base_text: OK, get to the controls. I've got something planned.
pln_bb1_25_02.loc_text: OK, get to the controls. I've got something planned.

pln_bb1_25_03.base_text: Get to the controls and turn the crane. You're going to like this.
pln_bb1_25_03.loc_text: Get to the controls and turn the crane. You're going to like this.

pln_bb1_26_02.base_text: Yes, that is a giant piggy bank. No, I haven't lost my mind.
pln_bb1_26_02.loc_text: Yes, that is a giant piggy bank. No, I haven't lost my mind.

pln_bb1_26_03.base_text: Get ready to drop Floyd. Yeah, I named him Floyd.
pln_bb1_26_03.loc_text: Get ready to drop Floyd. Yeah, I named him Floyd.

pln_bb1_27_01.base_text: OK, position looks good. Drop it!
pln_bb1_27_01.loc_text: OK, position looks good. Drop it!

pln_bb1_27_02.base_text: It's in position. Let it go!
pln_bb1_27_02.loc_text: It's in position. Let it go!

pln_bb1_28_01.base_text: Keep moving the crane. Can't drop it there.
pln_bb1_28_01.loc_text: Keep moving the crane. Can't drop it there.

pln_bb1_28_02.base_text: Operate the crane, guys. Get that piggy into position.
pln_bb1_28_02.loc_text: Operate the crane, guys. Get that piggy into position.

pln_bb1_29_01.base_text: Come on, gang. You've gotta get the crane in position.
pln_bb1_29_01.loc_text: Come on, gang. You've gotta get the crane in position.

pln_bb1_29_02.base_text: Guys. Operate the crane. Get it into position.
pln_bb1_29_02.loc_text: Guys. Operate the crane. Get it into position.

pln_bb1_30_01.base_text: Boom! How's that for a deposit, Benevolent!
pln_bb1_30_01.loc_text: Boom! How's that for a deposit, Benevolent!

pln_bb1_30_02.base_text: Bullseye! For once, we're helped by a pig.
pln_bb1_30_02.loc_text: Bullseye! For once, we're helped by a pig.

pln_bb1_31_01.base_text: Uhrm... maybe we should have hired Alex after all.
pln_bb1_31_01.loc_text: Uhrm... maybe we should have hired Alex after all.

pln_bb1_31_02.base_text: Ouch! Careful with that crane, guys. This is a gem of a building.
pln_bb1_31_02.loc_text: Ouch! Careful with that crane, guys. This is a gem of a building.

pln_bb1_32_01.base_text: Grab those bags and get them to the vault. Might be a good idea to take some spares too.
pln_bb1_32_01.loc_text: Grab those bags and get them to the vault. Might be a good idea to take some spares too.

pln_bb1_32_02.base_text: Start hauling those bags to the vault, gang. Time to crack this place.
pln_bb1_32_02.loc_text: Start hauling those bags to the vault, gang. Time to crack this place.

pln_bb1_33_01.base_text: Get that bag to the vault. Get the drill assembled.
pln_bb1_33_01.loc_text: Get that bag to the vault. Get the drill assembled.

pln_bb1_33_02.base_text: This place has a formidable vault. Thankfully, I found just the tool for it. Get that bag to the vault.
pln_bb1_33_02.loc_text: This place has a formidable vault. Thankfully, I found just the tool for it. Get that bag to the vault.

pln_bb1_34_01.base_text: Look at that beauty. It's called The Beast. Now start it up.
pln_bb1_34_01.loc_text: Look at that beauty. It's called The Beast. Now start it up.

pln_bb1_34_02.base_text: What a drill. Let's see if it works as good as it looks. Fire it up.
pln_bb1_34_02.loc_text: What a drill. Let's see if it works as good as it looks. Fire it up.

pln_bb1_34_03.base_text: The manufacturers call it a heavy-duty industrial drilling apparatus, but heisters know it as The Beast. Gentlemen, start it up.
pln_bb1_34_03.loc_text: The manufacturers call it a heavy-duty industrial drilling apparatus, but heisters know it as The Beast. Gentlemen, start it up.

pln_bb1_35_01.base_text: I felt the tremor of that starting from here.
pln_bb1_35_01.loc_text: I felt the tremor of that starting from here.

pln_bb1_36_01.base_text: Even diamond bits break! You're gonna need the spare parts to get it going again.
pln_bb1_36_01.loc_text: Even diamond bits break! You're gonna need the spare parts to get it going again.

pln_bb1_36_02.base_text: That vault is tough. The drill bit broke. Get a spare part, quick!
pln_bb1_36_02.loc_text: That vault is tough. The drill bit broke. Get a spare part, quick!

pln_bb1_37_01.base_text: There were spare drill bits in the piggy bank.
pln_bb1_37_01.loc_text: There were spare drill bits in the piggy bank.

pln_bb1_37_02.base_text: I put a few replacement bits for the drill in the piggy bank. Fetch 'em.
pln_bb1_37_02.loc_text: I put a few replacement bits for the drill in the piggy bank. Fetch 'em.

pln_bb1_38_01.base_text: Here we go. Doors open! Let's see how rich we are.
pln_bb1_38_01.loc_text: Here we go. Doors open! Let's see how rich we are.

pln_bb1_38_02.base_text: Vault's breached! Now, let's see what Benevolent has.
pln_bb1_38_02.loc_text: Vault's breached! Now, let's see what Benevolent has.

pln_bb1_39_01.base_text: Holy... Have you ever seen anything like it? Get those doors open. Bag it all.
pln_bb1_39_01.loc_text: Holy... Have you ever seen anything like it? Get those doors open. Bag it all.

pln_bb1_39_02.base_text: Now this qualifies as a score. Clean it out, gang.
pln_bb1_39_02.loc_text: Now this qualifies as a score. Clean it out, gang.

pln_bb1_40_01.base_text: The van's outside. Get stowing that loot!
pln_bb1_40_01.loc_text: The van's outside. Get stowing that loot!

pln_bb1_40_02.base_text: The van is just waiting for you to stash that loot. Get busy!
pln_bb1_40_02.loc_text: The van is just waiting for you to stash that loot. Get busy!

pln_bb1_41_01.base_text: I got a chopper on the way. Start getting the loot to the roof.
pln_bb1_41_01.loc_text: I got a chopper on the way. Start getting the loot to the roof.

pln_bb1_41_02.base_text: Get the loot to the roof, gang. I got a chopper en-route.
pln_bb1_41_02.loc_text: Get the loot to the roof, gang. I got a chopper en-route.

pln_bb1_42_01.base_text: Open up the elevator shaft. The van's waiting for you in the garage.
pln_bb1_42_01.loc_text: Open up the elevator shaft. The van's waiting for you in the garage.

pln_bb1_42_02.base_text: I got the van in the garage, but you need to go through the elevator shaft.
pln_bb1_42_02.loc_text: I got the van in the garage, but you need to go through the elevator shaft.

pln_bb1_43_01.base_text: Perfect.  Now blow the wall and let's get the hell out of here.
pln_bb1_43_01.loc_text: Perfect.  Now blow the wall and let's get the hell out of here.

pln_bb1_43_02.base_text: Great. Now place that C4 and we can start getting out of this place.
pln_bb1_43_02.loc_text: Great. Now place that C4 and we can start getting out of this place.

pln_bb1_44_01.base_text: I've rigged the bus to... Well, just give the signal. And stand back.
pln_bb1_44_01.loc_text: I've rigged the bus to... Well, just give the signal. And stand back.

pln_bb1_44_02.base_text: The bus is all set up to... Well, you worry about sending the signal. Then you'll see.
pln_bb1_44_02.loc_text: The bus is all set up to... Well, you worry about sending the signal. Then you'll see.

pln_bb1_45_01.base_text: Bile's on-site, gang. Start getting the bags to him.
pln_bb1_45_01.loc_text: Bile's on-site, gang. Start getting the bags to him.

pln_bb1_45_02.base_text: Chopper's here, guys. Start hauling the loot.
pln_bb1_45_02.loc_text: Chopper's here, guys. Start hauling the loot.

pln_bb1_46_01.base_text: Now climb down and get the bags to the van. Watch your step.
pln_bb1_46_01.loc_text: Now climb down and get the bags to the van. Watch your step.

pln_bb1_46_02.base_text: The elevator shaft is open. That's the path to the van. Start hauling.
pln_bb1_46_02.loc_text: The elevator shaft is open. That's the path to the van. Start hauling.

pln_bb1_47_01.base_text: Boom! There's a garbage truck positioned to pick up the bags. Dj vu, I know.
pln_bb1_47_01.loc_text: Boom! There's a garbage truck positioned to pick up the bags. Dj vu, I know.

pln_bb1_47_02.base_text: There goes the wall. A garbage truck is your drop-off. Get hauling.
pln_bb1_47_02.loc_text: There goes the wall. A garbage truck is your drop-off. Get hauling.

pln_bb1_48_01.base_text: We just gave the six o'clock news some great footage! Get the loot in the van.
pln_bb1_48_01.loc_text: We just gave the six o'clock news some great footage! Get the loot in the van.

pln_bb1_48_02.base_text: Who said the buses in this town can't keep to a schedule! Get moving that loot.
pln_bb1_48_02.loc_text: Who said the buses in this town can't keep to a schedule! Get moving that loot.

pln_bb1_49_01.base_text: You can finish this when you want, but grab as much as you can.
pln_bb1_49_01.loc_text: You can finish this when you want, but grab as much as you can.

pln_bb1_49_02.base_text: You can finish this now, or you can finish this in style, and empty the place.
pln_bb1_49_02.loc_text: You can finish this now, or you can finish this in style, and empty the place.

pln_bb1_50_01.base_text: Is anyone going to pick up the phone?
pln_bb1_50_01.loc_text: Is anyone going to pick up the phone?

pln_bb1_51_01.base_text: That's the time lock done. Try and keep the sneak going. Now, the vault has a three step clearance control. The first I've already taken care of. Just head there and use the fingerprint scanner.
pln_bb1_51_01.loc_text: That's the time lock done. Try and keep the sneak going. Now, the vault has a three step clearance control. The first I've already taken care of. Just head there and use the fingerprint scanner.

pln_bb1_51_02.base_text: There goes the time lock. You're doing great. Try and keep things quiet. Now, the vault has three steps to open it. First is in the bag - just go there and use the fingerprint scanner.
pln_bb1_51_02.loc_text: There goes the time lock. You're doing great. Try and keep things quiet. Now, the vault has three steps to open it. First is in the bag - just go there and use the fingerprint scanner.

pln_bb1_52_01.base_text: If those lasers are giving you a hard time you can deactivate them with keycards.
pln_bb1_52_01.loc_text: If those lasers are giving you a hard time you can deactivate them with keycards.

pln_bb1_52_02.base_text: Keycards can disable the lasers. Keep an eye out for any.
pln_bb1_52_02.loc_text: Keycards can disable the lasers. Keep an eye out for any.

pln_bb1_53_01.base_text: Don't ask me where I got that thumb. Now verify identification from the security consoles. Shouldn't be a problem.
pln_bb1_53_01.loc_text: Don't ask me where I got that thumb. Now verify identification from the security consoles. Shouldn't be a problem.

pln_bb1_53_02.base_text: When it comes to sourcing things like thumbs I operate a "don't ask, don't tell" policy. Now get to the security consoles.
pln_bb1_53_02.loc_text: When it comes to sourcing things like thumbs I operate a "don't ask, don't tell" policy. Now get to the security consoles.

pln_bb1_54_02.base_text: That's the first console. Now the second.
pln_bb1_54_02.loc_text: That's the first console. Now the second.

pln_bb1_55_01.base_text: Great. Now the last step. Find the managers code. It should be on his computer.
pln_bb1_55_01.loc_text: Great. Now the last step. Find the managers code. It should be on his computer.

pln_bb1_55_02.base_text: Almost there. Final protocol - the managers code. Check his computer.
pln_bb1_55_02.loc_text: Almost there. Final protocol - the managers code. Check his computer.

pln_bb1_56_01.base_text: Connected... Let's see what we have.
pln_bb1_56_01.loc_text: Connected... Let's see what we have.

pln_bb1_57_01.base_text: Got it! Now get back to the vault and enter the code.
pln_bb1_57_01.loc_text: Got it! Now get back to the vault and enter the code.

pln_bb1_57_02.base_text: Got the code. Get back to the vault.
pln_bb1_57_02.loc_text: Got the code. Get back to the vault.

pln_bb1_59_01.base_text: The silent way to open those doors would be to use the keys. If you can find them.
pln_bb1_59_01.loc_text: The silent way to open those doors would be to use the keys. If you can find them.

pln_bb1_59_02.base_text: All doors have keys. If you want to do this quietly, find the keys.
pln_bb1_59_02.loc_text: All doors have keys. If you want to do this quietly, find the keys.

pln_bb1_60_01.base_text: Pick up the thermite. That's our way into the vault.
pln_bb1_60_01.loc_text: Pick up the thermite. That's our way into the vault.

pln_bb1_60_02.base_text: Thermite is our best way into the vault. We've done this before.
pln_bb1_60_02.loc_text: Thermite is our best way into the vault. We've done this before.

pln_bb1_61_01.base_text: Now get to the vault and assemble that rig.
pln_bb1_61_01.loc_text: Now get to the vault and assemble that rig.

pln_bb1_61_02.base_text: Get that thermite back to the vault.
pln_bb1_61_02.loc_text: Get that thermite back to the vault.

pln_bb1_62_01.base_text: Are you ready for the fireworks show?
pln_bb1_62_01.loc_text: Are you ready for the fireworks show?

pln_bb1_62_02.base_text: Time to light it up, guys.
pln_bb1_62_02.loc_text: Time to light it up, guys.

pln_bb1_64_01.base_text: The thermite's done. Now jump in and get that cash.
pln_bb1_64_01.loc_text: The thermite's done. Now jump in and get that cash.

pln_bb1_64_02.base_text: Thermite's burned out. You're all clear. Drop in and start bagging.
pln_bb1_64_02.loc_text: Thermite's burned out. You're all clear. Drop in and start bagging.

pln_bb1_65_01.base_text: They're the keys for the doors inside the vault. Good find.
pln_bb1_65_01.loc_text: They're the keys for the doors inside the vault. Good find.

pln_bb1_65_02.base_text: Those keys will open the doors in the vault. That should help.
pln_bb1_65_02.loc_text: Those keys will open the doors in the vault. That should help.

pln_bb1_66_02.base_text: Guys, switchboards just lit up. Guess that's the alarm.
pln_bb1_66_02.loc_text: Guys, switchboards just lit up. Guess that's the alarm.

pln_bb1_67_01.base_text: Uh... Gang... Elevators are on the move. Expect company.
pln_bb1_67_01.loc_text: Uh... Gang... Elevators are on the move. Expect company.

pln_bb1_67_02.base_text: Elevators are headed to your floor. Keep an eye on that.
pln_bb1_67_02.loc_text: Elevators are headed to your floor. Keep an eye on that.

pln_bb1_67_03.base_text: Guys, the elevators are moving. Expect heat from there.
pln_bb1_67_03.loc_text: Guys, the elevators are moving. Expect heat from there.

pln_bb1_68_01.base_text: There's a cop entering the bank. Here's an idea: take care of him.
pln_bb1_68_01.loc_text: There's a cop entering the bank. Here's an idea: take care of him.

pln_bb1_68_02.base_text: Got a footman checking out the bank. Make sure he's... Welcomed.
pln_bb1_68_02.loc_text: Got a footman checking out the bank. Make sure he's... Welcomed.

pln_bb1_68_03.base_text: Cop just entered the bank. Don't let him get the wrong idea.
pln_bb1_68_03.loc_text: Cop just entered the bank. Don't let him get the wrong idea.

pln_bb1_end_01_01.base_text: It took two hundred years, but the Benevolent Bank has finally been robbed. Outstanding work!
pln_bb1_end_01_01.loc_text: It took two hundred years, but the Benevolent Bank has finally been robbed. Outstanding work!

pln_bb1_end_01_02.base_text: This is a historic day, gang. Haha, you finally cracked the Benevolent.
pln_bb1_end_01_02.loc_text: This is a historic day, gang. Haha, you finally cracked the Benevolent.

pln_bb1_end_02_01.base_text: Let's talk numbers. Thirteen managers over two hundred years, with millions of customers, moving trillions of dollars. And one heist by four badass gangsters.
pln_bb1_end_02_01.loc_text: Let's talk numbers. Thirteen managers over two hundred years, with millions of customers, moving trillions of dollars. And one heist by four badass gangsters.

pln_bb1_end_02_02.base_text: Not only did you boost a crapload of cash, this caper wiped millions off Benevolent's share price. Great work!
pln_bb1_end_02_02.loc_text: Not only did you boost a crapload of cash, this caper wiped millions off Benevolent's share price. Great work!

pln_bb1_end_03_01.base_text: Heisters will be studying your technique for this job for years to come. Great work!
pln_bb1_end_03_01.loc_text: Heisters will be studying your technique for this job for years to come. Great work!

pln_bb1_end_03_02.base_text: You just ensured yourselves a place in the history books, gang. Simply outstanding!
pln_bb1_end_03_02.loc_text: You just ensured yourselves a place in the history books, gang. Simply outstanding!

pln_bb1_end_04_01.base_text: This will forever be a Red Letter day for the criminal community. The day the Payday Gang broke the Benevolent.
pln_bb1_end_04_01.loc_text: This will forever be a Red Letter day for the criminal community. The day the Payday Gang broke the Benevolent.

pln_bb1_end_04_02.base_text: (sings) "They're the gang that broke the bank at Monte Carlo". Outstanding!
pln_bb1_end_04_02.loc_text: (sings) "They're the gang that broke the bank at Monte Carlo". Outstanding!

pln_bb1_intro_01_01.base_text: Security here is tight. We might be able to do this heist silently. But if things go loud, don't worry. I've always got a Plan B.
pln_bb1_intro_01_01.loc_text: Security here is tight. We might be able to do this heist silently. But if things go loud, don't worry. I've always got a Plan B.

pln_bb1_intro_01_02.base_text: It's a big bank, but still a bank. You know the drill. Check the place out, and decide whether to keep things quiet or bring the noise.
pln_bb1_intro_01_02.loc_text: It's a big bank, but still a bank. You know the drill. Check the place out, and decide whether to keep things quiet or bring the noise.

pln_bb1_intro_01_03.base_text: This is the one. Biggest bank job yet. Everything has been training for this moment. You know what to do.
pln_bb1_intro_01_03.loc_text: This is the one. Biggest bank job yet. Everything has been training for this moment. You know what to do.

pln_bigoil_stage1_01_any_01.base_text: Alright, get to the house and find the address, be careful.
pln_bigoil_stage1_01_any_01.loc_text: Alright, get to the house and find the address, be careful.

pln_bigoil_stage1_02_any_01.base_text: OK guys, search the place. I know the address is there somewhere.
pln_bigoil_stage1_02_any_01.loc_text: OK guys, search the place. I know the address is there somewhere.

pln_bigoil_stage1_03_any_01.base_text: Have you found it yet? They probably kept it somewhere safe.
pln_bigoil_stage1_03_any_01.loc_text: Have you found it yet? They probably kept it somewhere safe.

pln_bigoil_stage1_04_any_01.base_text: That's the address! We've got what we need. Get back to the van and we can get out of here.
pln_bigoil_stage1_04_any_01.loc_text: That's the address! We've got what we need. Get back to the van and we can get out of here.

pln_bigoil_stage1_05_any_01.base_text: That seems to be a keycard, we can probably use that later.
pln_bigoil_stage1_05_any_01.loc_text: That seems to be a keycard, we can probably use that later.

pln_bigoil_stage1_06_any_01.base_text: Looks like some codes, that'll come in handy.
pln_bigoil_stage1_06_any_01.loc_text: Looks like some codes, that'll come in handy.

pln_bigoil_stage1_08_any_01.base_text: Looks like some intel. That'll come in handy.
pln_bigoil_stage1_08_any_01.loc_text: Looks like some intel. That'll come in handy.

pln_bigoil_stage1_09_any_01.base_text: There's probably some useful info among these files...
pln_bigoil_stage1_09_any_01.loc_text: There's probably some useful info among these files...

pln_bigoil_stage1_10_any_01.base_text: Those pictures might help us later.
pln_bigoil_stage1_10_any_01.loc_text: Those pictures might help us later.

pln_bigoil_stage1_11_any_01.base_text: That's probably blueprints of the building.
pln_bigoil_stage1_11_any_01.loc_text: That's probably blueprints of the building.

pln_bigoil_stage1_14_any_01.base_text: Holy shit! They've got mines hooked up to the camera system!
pln_bigoil_stage1_14_any_01.loc_text: Holy shit! They've got mines hooked up to the camera system!

pln_bigoil_stage1_15_any_01.base_text: They're coming from the east, by the forest.
pln_bigoil_stage1_15_any_01.loc_text: They're coming from the east, by the forest.

pln_bigoil_stage1_16_any_01.base_text: They're coming from the west, by the construction site.
pln_bigoil_stage1_16_any_01.loc_text: They're coming from the west, by the construction site.

pln_bigoil_stage1_17_any_01.base_text: They're coming from the south by the factory.
pln_bigoil_stage1_17_any_01.loc_text: They're coming from the south by the factory.

pln_bigoil_stage1_18_any_01.base_text: Nice, bring the money to the van.
pln_bigoil_stage1_18_any_01.loc_text: Nice, bring the money to the van.

pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_01.base_text: The Elephant gave us the locations of the biker gang hunting for the scientist's little device. I think they're close to finding him - we need their intel so we can get to him first.
pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_01.loc_text: The Elephant gave us the locations of the biker gang hunting for the scientist's little device. I think they're close to finding him - we need their intel so we can get to him first.

pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_01b.base_text: I'm betting it's in their safe.
pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_01b.loc_text: I'm betting it's in their safe.

pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_02.base_text: Yeah, they're ready for us judging by the number of lookouts... Looks like they have cameras too. Make sure you get close before you hit 'em.
pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_02.loc_text: Yeah, they're ready for us judging by the number of lookouts... Looks like they have cameras too. Make sure you get close before you hit 'em.

pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_02b.base_text: We don't want them stopping us from getting the intel before we get it. Find the safe, it's probably there.
pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_02b.loc_text: We don't want them stopping us from getting the intel before we get it. Find the safe, it's probably there.

pln_bigoil_stage1_end_a_01.base_text: OK the intel is good. It'll help us plan the attack on the big villa that the scientist seems to be hiding in. Let's saddle up and go there.
pln_bigoil_stage1_end_a_01.loc_text: OK the intel is good. It'll help us plan the attack on the big villa that the scientist seems to be hiding in. Let's saddle up and go there.

pln_bigoil_stage1_end_b_01.base_text: OK we got the address - he lives in a high security villa, up in the mountains, real secluded, luxurious area. We will be going in blind with no intel. Arm yourself and let's go.
pln_bigoil_stage1_end_b_01.loc_text: OK we got the address - he lives in a high security villa, up in the mountains, real secluded, luxurious area. We will be going in blind with no intel. Arm yourself and let's go.

pln_bigoil_stage1_end_b_02.base_text: We got the address - problem is we did not get any intel. This means we are coming in hard and with no info on what to expect. Time is ticking - let's get up the mountains and steal this engine.
pln_bigoil_stage1_end_b_02.loc_text: We got the address - problem is we did not get any intel. This means we are coming in hard and with no info on what to expect. Time is ticking - let's get up the mountains and steal this engine.

pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_01.base_text: I don't know how the bikers know we're coming but they do. Maybe all that meth they're doing gives them a sixth sense...
pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_01.loc_text: I don't know how the bikers know we're coming but they do. Maybe all that meth they're doing gives them a sixth sense...

pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_01b.base_text: Anyway get close, hit 'em hard, find the safe, and get whatever intel you can find there. Take all of it.
pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_01b.loc_text: Anyway get close, hit 'em hard, find the safe, and get whatever intel you can find there. Take all of it.

pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_02.base_text: Looks like they expect a fight. I know you will give em one. Find the safe and the address... get as much intel from these scumbags as you can. Let's roll.
pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_02.loc_text: Looks like they expect a fight. I know you will give em one. Find the safe and the address... get as much intel from these scumbags as you can. Let's roll.

pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_03.base_text: Ride or die - that was their motto. Well done. This intel will help us greatly. Study it closely before we hit the scientists house. Let's go get this fusion engine.
pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_03.loc_text: Ride or die - that was their motto. Well done. This intel will help us greatly. Study it closely before we hit the scientists house. Let's go get this fusion engine.

pln_bigoil_stage2_01_any_01.base_text: Alright, do you see the house? Get inside and find the server room. We need to hack into the security system to get to the lab.
pln_bigoil_stage2_01_any_01.loc_text: Alright, do you see the house? Get inside and find the server room. We need to hack into the security system to get to the lab.

pln_bigoil_stage2_02_any_01.base_text: That's the server room, get inside and hook me up to the computer.
pln_bigoil_stage2_02_any_01.loc_text: That's the server room, get inside and hook me up to the computer.

pln_bigoil_stage2_03_any_01.base_text: You can use the keycard you found.
pln_bigoil_stage2_03_any_01.loc_text: You can use the keycard you found.

pln_bigoil_stage2_04_any_01.base_text: Good, now set up the connection.
pln_bigoil_stage2_04_any_01.loc_text: Good, now set up the connection.

pln_bigoil_stage2_05_any_01.base_text: I'm in, this might take a few...
pln_bigoil_stage2_05_any_01.loc_text: I'm in, this might take a few...

pln_bigoil_stage2_06_any_01.base_text: Make sure no one notices the hacking...
pln_bigoil_stage2_06_any_01.loc_text: Make sure no one notices the hacking...

pln_branchbank_cash_brf_speak_03.base_text: Today's our lucky day - cash delivery from the airport to this bank, all sorts of denominations... So I propose we do a little money exchange of our own.
pln_branchbank_cash_brf_speak_03.loc_text: Today's our lucky day - cash delivery from the airport to this bank, all sorts of denominations... So I propose we do a little money exchange of our own.

pln_branchbank_cash_brf_speak_04.base_text: A little cash goes a long way. The local Harvest & Trustee branch bank needs to be lightened of its load.  Let's do this bank hit, get their vault open, and fill our pockets a little.
pln_branchbank_cash_brf_speak_04.loc_text: A little cash goes a long way. The local Harvest & Trustee branch bank needs to be lightened of its load.  Let's do this bank hit, get their vault open, and fill our pockets a little.

pln_branchbank_cash_cnc_02.base_text: We got a cash situation in this bank. They have missed their delivery to the HQ this week. Don't everyone sigh all at once...
pln_branchbank_cash_cnc_02.loc_text: We got a cash situation in this bank. They have missed their delivery to the HQ this week. Don't everyone sigh all at once...

pln_branchbank_cash_cnc_03.base_text: Payday is this week which means the currency's here now. Which means we are too.
pln_branchbank_cash_cnc_03.loc_text: Payday is this week which means the currency's here now. Which means we are too.

pln_branchbank_cash_cnc_05.base_text: Another day, another bank. We can liberate some cash, I'm sure.
pln_branchbank_cash_cnc_05.loc_text: Another day, another bank. We can liberate some cash, I'm sure.

pln_branchbank_cash_cnc_06.base_text: I'd feel bad about hitting another bank if they felt bad about hitting us. So I don't. Let's cash out.
pln_branchbank_cash_cnc_06.loc_text: I'd feel bad about hitting another bank if they felt bad about hitting us. So I don't. Let's cash out.

pln_branchbank_cash_cnc_07.base_text: Shame about all these banks we're hitting, but we all have expenses. Wolf's lifestyle isn't cheap. Go time.
pln_branchbank_cash_cnc_07.loc_text: Shame about all these banks we're hitting, but we all have expenses. Wolf's lifestyle isn't cheap. Go time.

pln_branchbank_cash_stage1_intro_a_01.base_text: OK, the thermal drill you need for the vault is somewhere in the parking lot. Get it before you do your takedown. Then you can go hit that vault. Watch for cameras and bank employees. Do your homework before you go in and remember cash is king.
pln_branchbank_cash_stage1_intro_a_01.loc_text: OK, the thermal drill you need for the vault is somewhere in the parking lot. Get it before you do your takedown. Then you can go hit that vault. Watch for cameras and bank employees. Do your homework before you go in and remember cash is king.

pln_branchbank_cash_stage1_intro_a_02.base_text: OK folks, my guy stashed the thermal drill for the bank vault in the parking lot, so get that first. Watch for guards, keep an eye out for cameras - where there's cameras there's usually a security room... Money time.
pln_branchbank_cash_stage1_intro_a_02.loc_text: OK folks, my guy stashed the thermal drill for the bank vault in the parking lot, so get that first. Watch for guards, keep an eye out for cameras - where there's cameras there's usually a security room... Money time.

pln_branchbank_deposit_cnc_06.loc_text: Who doesn't love a secret, am I right? We've got a bank vault full of 'em to look into.

pln_branchbank_depositbox_a_intro_a_01.loc_text: Looks like we have an opportunity to crack some deposit boxes.

pln_branchbank_depositbox_a_intro_a_02.loc_text: Got a deposit box opportunity in this bank. I have inside info.

pln_branchbank_depositbox_a_intro_a_03.base_text: You know I love safe deposit jobs. And this one sounds sweet...
pln_branchbank_depositbox_a_intro_a_03.loc_text: You know I love safe deposit jobs. And this one sounds sweet...

pln_branchbank_depositbox_a_intro_a_04.base_text: We might have a very valuable object in this bank. I have insurance papers backing that up.
pln_branchbank_depositbox_a_intro_a_04.loc_text: We might have a very valuable object in this bank. I have insurance papers backing that up.

pln_branchbank_depositbox_stage1_brief_0.base_text: Now we're getting into the bank vault. This job is about deposit boxes. You need to get in there and drill that vault. Case the bank first. They're wired out the ass with security cameras and trigger-happy guards.

pln_branchbank_depositbox_stage1_brief_0.loc_text: Take as much as we need, but get more if you feel lucky. Then bag it, and get to the escape van. Let's do this!

pln_branchbank_depositbox_stage1_intro_a.base_text: OK people, my contact thoughtfully stashed the thermal drill you're going to need to crack the bank vault somewhere in the parking lot. Get it, then hit the bank vault.

pln_branchbank_depositbox_stage1_intro_a.base_text: I advise caution - this bank has a lot of traffic. Empty all those safe deposit boxes and make us all happy.

pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_01.base_text: You can't go wrong with gold. The Harvest & Trustee bank is trying to up its liquidity with a large deposit. It's something we should take advantage of, don't you think?
pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_01.loc_text: You can't go wrong with gold. The Harvest & Trustee bank is trying to up its liquidity with a large deposit. It's something we should take advantage of, don't you think?

pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_02.base_text: The Harvest & Trustee bank just got a big gold shipment from South Africa. I think we should make it go away. I can't see they'll miss them much.
pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_02.loc_text: The Harvest & Trustee bank just got a big gold shipment from South Africa. I think we should make it go away. I can't see they'll miss them much.

pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_03.base_text: In unstable times like these, gold's all you can really depend on.  So who wants to go stabilize our economic future? The Harvest & Trustee bank vault awaits.

pln_ca1_108_02.loc_text: And... great! There's the top of the vault!

pln_ca1_109_01.base_text: Damn! All right, that wasn't the vault. C4 the other spot!
pln_ca1_109_01.loc_text: Damn! All right, that wasn't the vault. C4 the other spot!

pln_ca1_111_01.base_text: Bile is waiting for you guys! He's got the winch. Come on, light the flare!

pln_ca1_114_01.base_text: One of BFD's coolant tanks is empty. She needs that water, guys. Grab a refill from the bathrooms!
pln_ca1_114_01.loc_text: One of BFD's coolant tanks is empty. She needs that water, guys. Grab a refill from the bathrooms!

pln_ca1_114_02.base_text: Looks like one of her coolant tanks is finished. Be gents and fetch that girl a refill. Uh, from the crapper.
pln_ca1_114_02.loc_text: Looks like one of her coolant tanks is finished. Be gents and fetch that girl a refill. Uh, from the crapper.

pln_ca1_115_01.base_text: Watch out gang! BFD overheats if you don't give her enough water. Get it from the bathroom.
pln_ca1_115_01.loc_text: Watch out gang! BFD overheats if you don't give her enough water. Get it from the bathroom.

pln_ca1_115_03.base_text: We don't need BFD breaking down on us, crew. Make sure she has plenty of coolant. Get water from the bathroom.
pln_ca1_115_03.loc_text: We don't need BFD breaking down on us, crew. Make sure she has plenty of coolant. Get water from the bathroom.

pln_ca1_116_01.base_text: BFD needs cooling. Refill the tank with water Hurry!
pln_ca1_116_01.loc_text: BFD needs cooling. Refill the tank with water Hurry!

pln_ca1_116_02.base_text: Don't let BFD overheat. Refill that tank with water!
pln_ca1_116_02.loc_text: Don't let BFD overheat. Refill that tank with water!

pln_ca1_116_03.base_text: BFD will break down if she gets too hot. Keep them water tanks full.
pln_ca1_116_03.loc_text: BFD will break down if she gets too hot. Keep them water tanks full.

pln_ca1_117_02.base_text: Will one of you clowns just grab that loot, please?
pln_ca1_117_02.loc_text: Will one of you clowns just grab that loot, please?

pln_ca1_117_03.loc_text: Come on, Dentists' loot is right there.

pln_ca1_118_02.base_text: Dunno what that is, but we got it. Now, back to the car!

pln_ca1_119_01.base_text: All right, that's it! Throw it up onto BFD.
pln_ca1_119_01.loc_text: All right, that's it! Throw it up onto BFD.

pln_ca1_119_02.base_text: Great. Now toss it up onto BFD.
pln_ca1_119_02.loc_text: Great. Now toss it up onto BFD.

pln_ca1_121_01.base_text: Amazing job! Now, climb up on top of BFD  and the blimp will take you to safety. Or grab more loot. Your choice.
pln_ca1_121_01.loc_text: Amazing job! Now, climb up on top of BFD  and the blimp will take you to safety. Or grab more loot. Your choice.

pln_ca1_121_02.base_text: Now get onto BFD and let the blimp carry you up, up and away. Or stay and grab more loot.
pln_ca1_121_02.loc_text: Now get onto BFD and let the blimp carry you up, up and away. Or stay and grab more loot.

pln_ca1_121_03.base_text: Amazing! Just climb up onto BFD and we call it a job done. Or stay behind and really pick the place clean.

pln_ca1_135_01.loc_text: Ka-ching, gang! Maybe we can stop robbing banks and earn our payday on the slots.

pln_ca1_135_02.base_text: Hot damn! You're on a hot streak!

pln_ca1_135_03.base_text: How much did you win? Can we all retire?

pln_ca1_136_03.base_text: It's tacky, but it's fun, and knows it. Welcome to Vegas, gang.
pln_ca1_136_03.loc_text: It's tacky, but it's fun, and knows it. Welcome to Vegas, gang.

pln_ca1_137_01.base_text: These machines are for nickel-and-dime suckers. Don't waste your time.
pln_ca1_137_01.loc_text: These machines are for nickel-and-dime suckers. Don't waste your time.

pln_ca1_137_02.base_text: The Golden Grin never closes. You want to waste time nickel-and-diming the slots...?
pln_ca1_137_02.loc_text: The Golden Grin never closes. You want to waste time nickel-and-diming the slots...?

pln_ca1_137_03.base_text: These machines are small fry. We're here for a bigger prize.
