pln_ca1_159_02.loc_text: Thank you for your time, sir.

pln_ca1_159_03.base_text: Can I ask if you are having a good day, sir?
pln_ca1_159_03.loc_text: Can I ask if you are having a good day, sir?

pln_ca1_159_04.base_text: A very good evening to you, sir.
pln_ca1_159_04.loc_text: A very good evening to you, sir.

pln_ca1_160_01.base_text: This is, uh, Craig in the, uh, Customer Satisfaction Department calling.
pln_ca1_160_01.loc_text: This is, uh, Craig in the, uh, Customer Satisfaction Department calling.

pln_ca1_160_02.base_text: Uh, this is, Francoise. I am calling from the Customer Satisfaction desk.
pln_ca1_160_02.loc_text: Uh, this is, Francoise. I am calling from the Customer Satisfaction desk.

pln_ca1_160_03.base_text: Um, my name is, uh... Tony. Why not. I'm calling from Customer Satisfaction here at The Grin.
pln_ca1_160_03.loc_text: Um, my name is, uh... Tony. Why not. I'm calling from Customer Satisfaction here at The Grin.

pln_ca1_160_04.base_text: This is... Gerd. I'm calling you from The Golden Grin Customer Satisfaction Department.
pln_ca1_160_04.loc_text: This is... Gerd. I'm calling you from The Golden Grin Customer Satisfaction Department.

pln_ca1_161_01.base_text: I wanted to ask if you were thinking of trying our All You Can Eat buffet today?
pln_ca1_161_01.loc_text: I wanted to ask if you were thinking of trying our All You Can Eat buffet today?

pln_ca1_162_02.base_text: I wanted to remind you that our All You Can Eat buffet is now open.
pln_ca1_162_02.loc_text: I wanted to remind you that our All You Can Eat buffet is now open.

pln_ca1_162_03.base_text: I just wanted to make sure that you know that our All You Can Eat buffet is now available.
pln_ca1_162_03.loc_text: I just wanted to make sure that you know that our All You Can Eat buffet is now available.

pln_ca1_162_04.base_text: Our All You Can Eat buffet is now open, and I wanted to make sure that you knew.
pln_ca1_162_04.loc_text: Our All You Can Eat buffet is now open, and I wanted to make sure that you knew.

pln_ca1_163_01.base_text: We have some excellent lobster tails for you to enjoy.
pln_ca1_163_01.loc_text: We have some excellent lobster tails for you to enjoy.

pln_ca1_163_02.base_text: You won't find a better New York steak anywhere, including New York.
pln_ca1_163_02.loc_text: You won't find a better New York steak anywhere, including New York.

pln_ca1_163_03.base_text: If you want your beef rare, we'll just wipe its ass and lead it to your table.
pln_ca1_163_03.loc_text: If you want your beef rare, we'll just wipe its ass and lead it to your table.

pln_ca1_163_04.base_text: We have a fine selection of rare meats from Africa. You ever sampled elephant?
pln_ca1_163_04.loc_text: We have a fine selection of rare meats from Africa. You ever sampled elephant?

pln_ca1_164_01.base_text: We're serving... uh... soup. Made with... uh... vegetables.
pln_ca1_164_01.loc_text: We're serving... uh... soup. Made with... uh... vegetables.

pln_ca1_164_02.base_text: Also... that Italian stuff... uh... spaghetti! You can have as many tins as you want.
pln_ca1_164_02.loc_text: Also... that Italian stuff... uh... spaghetti! You can have as many tins as you want.

pln_ca1_164_03.base_text: We microwave everything so it is as hot and fresh as you can possibly want.
pln_ca1_164_03.loc_text: We microwave everything so it is as hot and fresh as you can possibly want.

pln_ca1_164_04.base_text: You like bread. We got bread. Uh... yeah. Assloads of bread... Sir.
pln_ca1_164_04.loc_text: You like bread. We got bread. Uh... yeah. Assloads of bread... Sir.

pln_ca1_165_01.base_text: We got ice cream too. You like ice cream?
pln_ca1_165_01.loc_text: We got ice cream too. You like ice cream?

pln_ca1_165_02.base_text: Perhaps sir has a sweet tooth? How would you like enough cake to choke a camel?
pln_ca1_165_02.loc_text: Perhaps sir has a sweet tooth? How would you like enough cake to choke a camel?

pln_ca1_165_03.base_text: We got those little pastry balls with the chocolate and cream.
pln_ca1_165_03.loc_text: We got those little pastry balls with the chocolate and cream.

pln_ca1_165_04.base_text: Don't forget we have enough sugary desserts to give you diabetes.
pln_ca1_165_04.loc_text: Don't forget we have enough sugary desserts to give you diabetes.

pln_ca1_166_01.base_text: We got rice. We got fries. We got mashed potato. We got grits.
pln_ca1_166_01.loc_text: We got rice. We got fries. We got mashed potato. We got grits.

pln_ca1_166_02.base_text: And what would you like as a side? Uh... sausage patties? We got 'em!
pln_ca1_166_02.loc_text: And what would you like as a side? Uh... sausage patties? We got 'em!

pln_ca1_166_03.base_text: You can get a side of cornbread with that. Yummy!
pln_ca1_166_03.loc_text: You can get a side of cornbread with that. Yummy!

pln_ca1_166_04.base_text: And if you want, we can even make you toast.
pln_ca1_166_04.loc_text: And if you want, we can even make you toast.

pln_ca1_167_01.base_text: All yours for the price of... say... 18 bucks.
pln_ca1_167_01.loc_text: All yours for the price of... say... 18 bucks.

pln_ca1_167_02.base_text: And how much will it cost you? Shall we say... 18 bucks?
pln_ca1_167_02.loc_text: And how much will it cost you? Shall we say... 18 bucks?

pln_ca1_167_03.loc_text: All You Can Eat, remember. Just 18 bucks.

pln_ca1_168_01.base_text: You're wasting time! Repair BFD, get her working and let's finish this caper.
pln_ca1_168_01.loc_text: You're wasting time! Repair BFD, get her working and let's finish this caper.

pln_ca1_168_02.base_text: Fix up BFD and let's finish this. Come on, crew, we're so close.
pln_ca1_168_02.loc_text: Fix up BFD and let's finish this. Come on, crew, we're so close.

pln_ca1_173_02.base_text: Armory needs a three digit code. You can find the digits throughout the Grin. Get to it!
pln_ca1_173_02.loc_text: Armory needs a three digit code. You can find the digits throughout the Grin. Get to it!

pln_ca1_173_03.base_text: We need a code to open the armory. Three digits. Colour coded. They're somewhere in the Grin. Get searching!
pln_ca1_173_03.loc_text: We need a code to open the armory. Three digits. Colour coded. They're somewhere in the Grin. Get searching!

pln_ca1_17_01.base_text: Got it! I'll do a background check on this guy. Hang on.
pln_ca1_17_01.loc_text: Got it! I'll do a background check on this guy. Hang on.

pln_ca1_17_02.base_text: That's it! Doing a background check now. Hold on.
pln_ca1_17_02.loc_text: That's it! Doing a background check now. Hold on.

pln_ca1_18_01.base_text: Looks like he's running dry. Bring him another with a little extra flavor in it. I'm sure you can find a bottle in one of the bars and spike it.
pln_ca1_18_01.loc_text: Looks like he's running dry. Bring him another with a little extra flavor in it. I'm sure you can find a bottle in one of the bars and spike it.

pln_ca1_18_02.base_text: Looks like his drink is getting low. Lets serve him another, with a little something added. Find the same bottle at one of the bars.
pln_ca1_18_02.loc_text: Looks like his drink is getting low. Lets serve him another, with a little something added. Find the same bottle at one of the bars.

pln_ca1_19_01.base_text: Find the scotch and spike it. Red bottle.
pln_ca1_19_01.loc_text: Find the scotch and spike it. Red bottle.

pln_ca1_19_02.base_text: Our guy likes Red Dragon scotch. Find it, spike it and serve it.
pln_ca1_19_02.loc_text: Our guy likes Red Dragon scotch. Find it, spike it and serve it.

pln_ca1_20_01.base_text: Find the Jaegerheister and spike it. Green bottle.
pln_ca1_20_01.loc_text: Find the Jaegerheister and spike it. Green bottle.

pln_ca1_20_02.base_text: Our guy has a taste for Jaegerheister. Find the green bottle, spike it and serve it.
pln_ca1_20_02.loc_text: Our guy has a taste for Jaegerheister. Find the green bottle, spike it and serve it.

pln_ca1_21_01.base_text: Find the pink schnapps bottle and spike it.
pln_ca1_21_01.loc_text: Find the pink schnapps bottle and spike it.

pln_ca1_21_02.base_text: Pinky Demon schnapps? Huh. Find it, spike it, serve it.
pln_ca1_21_02.loc_text: Pinky Demon schnapps? Huh. Find it, spike it, serve it.

pln_ca1_22_01.base_text: Find the blue bottle and spike it.
pln_ca1_22_01.loc_text: Find the blue bottle and spike it.

pln_ca1_22_02.base_text: Our guest loves Ocean's Ten vodka. Find another blue bottle and spike it.
pln_ca1_22_02.loc_text: Our guest loves Ocean's Ten vodka. Find another blue bottle and spike it.

pln_ca1_23_01.base_text: Now top up his glass. Soon as he swallows, well, let's say he's going to go loud. Follow him, and get the card for his room.
pln_ca1_23_01.loc_text: Now top up his glass. Soon as he swallows, well, let's say he's going to go loud. Follow him, and get the card for his room.

pln_ca1_23_02.base_text: Fill his glass. Once he downs that, well... he's going to lose interest in the slots. Follow him, and get his keycard.
pln_ca1_23_02.loc_text: Fill his glass. Once he downs that, well... he's going to lose interest in the slots. Follow him, and get his keycard.

pln_ca1_23_03.base_text: Pour him a drink. Once he takes a sip, the little something we added should... well, he's going to run for the nearest toilet. Follow him. Get his keycard.
pln_ca1_23_03.loc_text: Pour him a drink. Once he takes a sip, the little something we added should... well, he's going to run for the nearest toilet. Follow him. Get his keycard.

pln_ca1_24_02.base_text: Take a nice, long drink, pal.
pln_ca1_24_02.loc_text: Take a nice, long drink, pal.

pln_ca1_25_01.base_text: Pick up that keycard, and get to his room.
pln_ca1_25_01.loc_text: Pick up that keycard, and get to his room.

pln_ca1_26_01.base_text: Now look for a vent, and get the gas pumping. Send the security to Neverland.
pln_ca1_26_01.loc_text: Now look for a vent, and get the gas pumping. Send the security to Neverland.

pln_ca1_26_02.base_text: Find the vent, and start pumping the gas. We'll make their security center fuzzy and warm and... *yawns*
pln_ca1_26_02.loc_text: Find the vent, and start pumping the gas. We'll make their security center fuzzy and warm and... *yawns*

pln_ca1_27_01.base_text: Opening the vault needs a three digit code. Each digit is held by a manager, and each is in a computer briefcase. We need that code. Find them.
pln_ca1_27_01.loc_text: Opening the vault needs a three digit code. Each digit is held by a manager, and each is in a computer briefcase. We need that code. Find them.

pln_ca1_27_02.base_text: Vault needs a three digit code, and each digit is held by a manager. They hold them in computer briefcases. Gang, find that code.
pln_ca1_27_02.loc_text: Vault needs a three digit code, and each digit is held by a manager. They hold them in computer briefcases. Gang, find that code.

pln_ca1_28_01.base_text: We've all three digits we need for the vault. Get there and enter the code.
pln_ca1_28_01.loc_text: We've all three digits we need for the vault. Get there and enter the code.

pln_ca1_28_02.base_text: That's all three digits for the code. Head to the vault, let's see if they work.
pln_ca1_28_02.loc_text: That's all three digits for the code. Head to the vault, let's see if they work.

pln_ca1_28_03.base_text: Three digits. Outstanding! Now head to the vault and try them out.
pln_ca1_28_03.loc_text: Three digits. Outstanding! Now head to the vault and try them out.

pln_ca1_29_01.base_text: Great. Now you can mask up again.
pln_ca1_29_01.loc_text: Great. Now you can mask up again.

pln_ca1_29_02.base_text: Okay. Mask up when you're ready.
pln_ca1_29_02.loc_text: Okay. Mask up when you're ready.

pln_ca1_30_01.base_text: That's the alarm. OK, gang. Plan B. Force our way through.
pln_ca1_30_01.loc_text: That's the alarm. OK, gang. Plan B. Force our way through.

pln_ca1_30_02.base_text: There's the alarm. No problem. Plan B. Put on a show, gang.
pln_ca1_30_02.loc_text: There's the alarm. No problem. Plan B. Put on a show, gang.

pln_ca1_30_03.base_text: The alarm. All right. Time for Plan B. No mercy, crew.
pln_ca1_30_03.loc_text: The alarm. All right. Time for Plan B. No mercy, crew.

pln_ca1_31_01.base_text: Look for the armory. Intel says they're holding C4. For "extraordinary cases". Well, this is one of those extraordinary cases.
pln_ca1_31_01.loc_text: Look for the armory. Intel says they're holding C4. For "extraordinary cases". Well, this is one of those extraordinary cases.

pln_ca1_31_02.base_text: The Dentist's intel says they have C4. There's an armory near the guards' locker room. Get there.
pln_ca1_31_02.loc_text: The Dentist's intel says they have C4. There's an armory near the guards' locker room. Get there.

pln_ca1_31_03.base_text: Dentist tells me they have C4 in the armory there. Get there, and get it.
pln_ca1_31_03.loc_text: Dentist tells me they have C4 in the armory there. Get there, and get it.

pln_ca1_32_01.base_text: The armory. Looks like they've a bunch of C4 stacked there. Christ knows what a casino needs plastic explosive for...
pln_ca1_32_01.loc_text: The armory. Looks like they've a bunch of C4 stacked there. Christ knows what a casino needs plastic explosive for...

pln_ca1_32_02.base_text: The C4 is right in there. Why does The Grin need C4? God knows.
pln_ca1_32_02.loc_text: The C4 is right in there. Why does The Grin need C4? God knows.

pln_ca1_33_01.base_text: That's the first number. Need two more.
pln_ca1_33_01.loc_text: That's the first number. Need two more.

pln_ca1_33_02.base_text: First number. Get the other two.
pln_ca1_33_02.loc_text: First number. Get the other two.

pln_ca1_35_01.base_text: That's all the numbers needed for the armory. Go enter that code.
pln_ca1_35_01.loc_text: That's all the numbers needed for the armory. Go enter that code.

pln_ca1_35_02.base_text: Okay, that's the digits for the armory code. Enter it!
pln_ca1_35_02.loc_text: Okay, that's the digits for the armory code. Enter it!

pln_ca1_37_02.base_text: Now load up on C4. You'll need it.
pln_ca1_37_02.loc_text: Now load up on C4. You'll need it.

pln_ca1_37_03.base_text: Grab as much C4 as you can, gang.
pln_ca1_37_03.loc_text: Grab as much C4 as you can, gang.

pln_ca1_38_01.base_text: Now plant the C4 in the main hall. The vault is right below. Two possible spots to blow. Hope lady luck is with us!
pln_ca1_38_01.loc_text: Now plant the C4 in the main hall. The vault is right below. Two possible spots to blow. Hope lady luck is with us!

pln_ca1_38_02.base_text: Now detonate the C4 in the main hall. Place it right above the vault. Hard to say exactly where that is. Two possible spots. Pray for a bit of luck.
pln_ca1_38_02.loc_text: Now detonate the C4 in the main hall. Place it right above the vault. Hard to say exactly where that is. Two possible spots. Pray for a bit of luck.

pln_ca1_38_03.base_text: Put the C4 in the main hall, right above the vault. Two possible spots, so it's a bit of a lottery. If need be, we'll blow them both!
pln_ca1_38_03.loc_text: Put the C4 in the main hall, right above the vault. Two possible spots, so it's a bit of a lottery. If need be, we'll blow them both!

pln_ca1_39_01.base_text: Light a flare to signal Bile. We need a big damn drill to get down there, which first needs a winch. He'll bring the parts for it.
pln_ca1_39_01.loc_text: Light a flare to signal Bile. We need a big damn drill to get down there, which first needs a winch. He'll bring the parts for it.

pln_ca1_39_02.base_text: Now the vaults exposed, we're going to drill down. A big drill. Which needs a winch. Signal Bile with a flare when you're ready.
pln_ca1_39_02.loc_text: Now the vaults exposed, we're going to drill down. A big drill. Which needs a winch. Signal Bile with a flare when you're ready.

pln_ca1_40_01.base_text: Now just hold tight and wait for Bile to drop the winch.
pln_ca1_40_01.loc_text: Now just hold tight and wait for Bile to drop the winch.

pln_ca1_40_02.base_text: Hold the ground. Bile will have that winch to you any second.
pln_ca1_40_02.loc_text: Hold the ground. Bile will have that winch to you any second.

pln_ca1_41_02.base_text: All right, snatch up those winch parts.
pln_ca1_41_02.loc_text: All right, snatch up those winch parts.

pln_ca1_42_01.base_text: Now get that winch put together in the main hall.
pln_ca1_42_01.loc_text: Now get that winch put together in the main hall.

pln_ca1_42_02.base_text: Assemble the winch in the main hall, gang.
pln_ca1_42_02.loc_text: Assemble the winch in the main hall, gang.

pln_ca1_42_03.base_text: Put the winch together where I marked, crew.
pln_ca1_42_03.loc_text: Put the winch together where I marked, crew.

pln_ca1_43_01.base_text: Screw down the winch so that it'll be stable. Trust me, for what's coming, you need it secure.
pln_ca1_43_01.loc_text: Screw down the winch so that it'll be stable. Trust me, for what's coming, you need it secure.

pln_ca1_43_02.base_text: Screw the winch down good. Believe me, you need it stable for the next part.
pln_ca1_43_02.loc_text: Screw the winch down good. Believe me, you need it stable for the next part.

pln_ca1_44_01.base_text: All right! Signal the blimp. And do it Vegas style. Find some fireworks and light them up.
pln_ca1_44_01.loc_text: All right! Signal the blimp. And do it Vegas style. Find some fireworks and light them up.

pln_ca1_44_02.base_text: Nice! Next, we're going to signal the blimp, and for something like that we need a big signal. A fireworks display! Find them!
pln_ca1_44_02.loc_text: Nice! Next, we're going to signal the blimp, and for something like that we need a big signal. A fireworks display! Find them!

pln_ca1_44_03.base_text: We're going to bring the drill in with a blimp. For the pilot to see your signal, you need to set off a firework display. So look for them!
pln_ca1_44_03.loc_text: We're going to bring the drill in with a blimp. For the pilot to see your signal, you need to set off a firework display. So look for them!

pln_ca1_45_01.base_text: All right, get those fireworks onto the terrace.
pln_ca1_45_01.loc_text: All right, get those fireworks onto the terrace.

pln_ca1_45_02.base_text: Great! Now head to the terrace and place the fireworks.
pln_ca1_45_02.loc_text: Great! Now head to the terrace and place the fireworks.

pln_ca1_46_01.base_text: Light the fireworks, and stand back.
pln_ca1_46_01.loc_text: Light the fireworks, and stand back.

pln_ca1_46_02.base_text: Set off the fireworks. Stand back. Stay safe.
pln_ca1_46_02.loc_text: Set off the fireworks. Stand back. Stay safe.

pln_ca1_46_03.base_text: Nice. Now light the fusepaper and...
pln_ca1_46_03.loc_text: Nice. Now light the fusepaper and...

pln_ca1_47_01.base_text: The drill can't be dropped through that skylight barrier. Gotta open it from the security center.
pln_ca1_47_01.loc_text: The drill can't be dropped through that skylight barrier. Gotta open it from the security center.

pln_ca1_47_02.base_text: That damn barrier is preventing the drill from coming down. Get to security and open it.
pln_ca1_47_02.loc_text: That damn barrier is preventing the drill from coming down. Get to security and open it.

pln_ca1_48_01.base_text: Hack the skylight controls to open it. Whatever you do, don't let the fuzz disable it.
pln_ca1_48_01.loc_text: Hack the skylight controls to open it. Whatever you do, don't let the fuzz disable it.

pln_ca1_48_02.base_text: Okay. The controls. Hack 'em, and keep the cops off.
pln_ca1_48_02.loc_text: Okay. The controls. Hack 'em, and keep the cops off.

pln_ca1_48_03.base_text: Get hacking those skylight controls and keep the damn cops off.
pln_ca1_48_03.loc_text: Get hacking those skylight controls and keep the damn cops off.

pln_ca1_49_01.base_text: The hack was interrupted. Get it going again.
pln_ca1_49_01.loc_text: The hack was interrupted. Get it going again.

pln_ca1_49_02.base_text: Who the - damn cops messed with the hack. Restart it!
pln_ca1_49_02.loc_text: Who the - damn cops messed with the hack. Restart it!

pln_ca1_49_03.base_text: The cops pulled the hack. Get there and reboot it.
pln_ca1_49_03.loc_text: The cops pulled the hack. Get there and reboot it.

pln_ca1_50_01.base_text: Wait for the blimp to get here with the drill.
pln_ca1_50_01.loc_text: Wait for the blimp to get here with the drill.

pln_ca1_50_02.base_text: Okay, the blimp is on the way. Just give it time.
pln_ca1_50_02.loc_text: Okay, the blimp is on the way. Just give it time.

pln_ca1_50_03.base_text: Blimp is over the city and headed for you. Give it a moment.
pln_ca1_50_03.loc_text: Blimp is over the city and headed for you. Give it a moment.

pln_ca1_51_01.base_text: Here she comes. "BFD". Stands for "Big Goddamn Drill". Almost.
pln_ca1_51_01.loc_text: Here she comes. "BFD". Stands for "Big Goddamn Drill". Almost.

pln_ca1_51_02.base_text: Okay, blimp is lowering her to you. BFD. Look at that beauty.
pln_ca1_51_02.loc_text: Okay, blimp is lowering her to you. BFD. Look at that beauty.

pln_ca1_51_03.base_text: Hell, that's a sight! "BFD". Or "Big Funky Drill.".
pln_ca1_51_03.loc_text: Hell, that's a sight! "BFD". Or "Big Funky Drill.".

pln_ca1_52_01.base_text: You need to get BFD right above the vault. The winch will move her, so get them hooked up.
pln_ca1_52_01.loc_text: You need to get BFD right above the vault. The winch will move her, so get them hooked up.

pln_ca1_52_02.base_text: All right. Now this is why we brought the winch. Hook it to BFD, and it'll get the position right.
pln_ca1_52_02.loc_text: All right. Now this is why we brought the winch. Hook it to BFD, and it'll get the position right.

pln_ca1_53_01.base_text: Start the winch and it will move BFD into position. Don't let the cops stop it!
pln_ca1_53_01.loc_text: Start the winch and it will move BFD into position. Don't let the cops stop it!

pln_ca1_53_02.base_text: Now fire up the winch! Keep the cops off it.
pln_ca1_53_02.loc_text: Now fire up the winch! Keep the cops off it.

pln_ca1_54_01.base_text: Restart the winch. And keep the damn cops off it.
pln_ca1_54_01.loc_text: Restart the winch. And keep the damn cops off it.

pln_ca1_54_02.base_text: Gotta get that winch running again, gang.
pln_ca1_54_02.loc_text: Gotta get that winch running again, gang.

pln_ca1_54_03.base_text: Winch isn't working, crew. Fix it!
pln_ca1_54_03.loc_text: Winch isn't working, crew. Fix it!

pln_ca1_55_01.base_text: All right, now let the winch do its job.
pln_ca1_55_01.loc_text: All right, now let the winch do its job.

pln_ca1_55_02.base_text: There it goes. Let it do its thing.
pln_ca1_55_02.loc_text: There it goes. Let it do its thing.

pln_ca1_55_03.base_text: Okay. It's thing is moving BFD, your thing is keeping it safe.
pln_ca1_55_03.loc_text: Okay. It's thing is moving BFD, your thing is keeping it safe.

pln_ca1_56_01.base_text: BFD needs power - lots of it! Hook her up to a couple of sockets. They're located inside the casino. Don't let them get disconnected.
pln_ca1_56_01.loc_text: BFD needs power - lots of it! Hook her up to a couple of sockets. They're located inside the casino. Don't let them get disconnected.

pln_ca1_56_02.base_text: BFD is a greedy girl. Needs a lot of power. Hook her up to two sockets. You can find them inside the casino. And keep the cops off.
pln_ca1_56_02.loc_text: BFD is a greedy girl. Needs a lot of power. Hook her up to two sockets. You can find them inside the casino. And keep the cops off.

pln_ca1_57_01.base_text: BFD's without power. Reconnect the power sockets.
pln_ca1_57_01.loc_text: BFD's without power. Reconnect the power sockets.

pln_ca1_57_02.base_text: Power's down. Get BFD reconnected, gang!
pln_ca1_57_02.loc_text: Power's down. Get BFD reconnected, gang!

pln_ca1_57_03.base_text: Damn, BFD  lost power. Damn cops... reconnect the sockets.
pln_ca1_57_03.loc_text: Damn, BFD  lost power. Damn cops... reconnect the sockets.

pln_ca1_58_01.base_text: Throw the BFD's switch! Let the show begin!
pln_ca1_58_01.loc_text: Throw the BFD's switch! Let the show begin!

pln_ca1_58_02.base_text: All right. now throw that switch. Let's see what BFD can do!
pln_ca1_58_02.loc_text: All right. now throw that switch. Let's see what BFD can do!

pln_ca1_58_03.base_text: Now turn on BFD. They'll display her for years to come.
pln_ca1_58_03.loc_text: Now turn on BFD. They'll display her for years to come.

pln_ca1_59_01.base_text: Wait for BFD to crack through the vault. Even this monster will take time. Keep the cops away.
pln_ca1_59_01.loc_text: Wait for BFD to crack through the vault. Even this monster will take time. Keep the cops away.

pln_ca1_59_02.base_text: BFD does things in her own time. Let her deal with the vault, you deal with cops getting near her.
pln_ca1_59_02.loc_text: BFD does things in her own time. Let her deal with the vault, you deal with cops getting near her.

pln_ca1_59_03.base_text: Okay, she's drilling down into the vault. You keep her safe.
pln_ca1_59_03.loc_text: Okay, she's drilling down into the vault. You keep her safe.

pln_ca1_60_01.base_text: Damn, cops got to her! Clear the zone and reactivate BFD!
pln_ca1_60_01.loc_text: Damn, cops got to her! Clear the zone and reactivate BFD!

pln_ca1_60_02.base_text: The cops shut down BFD. Deal with them, and start her up again.
pln_ca1_60_02.loc_text: The cops shut down BFD. Deal with them, and start her up again.

pln_ca1_61_01.base_text: Water tanks are empty. Refill them in the bathrooms. Hey, I never promised you glamour.
pln_ca1_61_01.loc_text: Water tanks are empty. Refill them in the bathrooms. Hey, I never promised you glamour.

pln_ca1_61_02.base_text: BFD's tanks are drained. You can refill them in the bathroom. She's not fussy.
pln_ca1_61_02.loc_text: BFD's tanks are drained. You can refill them in the bathroom. She's not fussy.

pln_ca1_62_01.base_text: BFD broke down. Gonna need tools to repair it.
pln_ca1_62_01.loc_text: BFD broke down. Gonna need tools to repair it.

pln_ca1_62_02.base_text: Damn, BFD is bust. You need tools to fix her up.
pln_ca1_62_02.loc_text: Damn, BFD is bust. You need tools to fix her up.

pln_ca1_63_01.base_text: BFD's done. Now, down into the vault!
pln_ca1_63_01.loc_text: BFD's done. Now, down into the vault!

pln_ca1_63_02.base_text: She's all done! Quickly, down into the vault!
pln_ca1_63_02.loc_text: She's all done! Quickly, down into the vault!

pln_ca1_63_03.base_text: BFD did a great job. Down into the vault. gang.
pln_ca1_63_03.loc_text: BFD did a great job. Down into the vault. gang.

pln_ca1_64_01.base_text: We're here! Find The Dentist's loot, and let's get it out of here.
pln_ca1_64_01.loc_text: We're here! Find The Dentist's loot, and let's get it out of here.

pln_ca1_64_02.base_text: Grab Dentists' loot. That's what we came for.
pln_ca1_64_02.loc_text: Grab Dentists' loot. That's what we came for.

pln_ca1_64_03.base_text: Just grab that loot and let's get it out of here.
pln_ca1_64_03.loc_text: Just grab that loot and let's get it out of here.

pln_ca1_65_01.base_text: Outstanding! Now, get in the limo and end this. Or grab more loot. Your choice.
pln_ca1_65_01.loc_text: Outstanding! Now, get in the limo and end this. Or grab more loot. Your choice.

pln_ca1_65_02.base_text: Great job. Now get in the car and let's end this. Or hang around and really clean the joint.
pln_ca1_65_02.loc_text: Great job. Now get in the car and let's end this. Or hang around and really clean the joint.

pln_ca1_65_03.base_text: You can bounce now, or you can stay and give the Golden Grin a thorough cleaning.
pln_ca1_65_03.loc_text: You can bounce now, or you can stay and give the Golden Grin a thorough cleaning.

pln_ca1_66_01.base_text: Find the gear Micho planted somewhere. Look for a guitar case.
pln_ca1_66_01.loc_text: Find the gear Micho planted somewhere. Look for a guitar case.

pln_ca1_66_02.base_text: Maybe your gear is at the pool. See if Micho left the gear there. Look for a guitar case.
pln_ca1_66_02.loc_text: Maybe your gear is at the pool. See if Micho left the gear there. Look for a guitar case.

pln_ca1_66_03.base_text: The gear could be at the smoking area. Perhaps Micho left your gear there. Look for a guitar case.
pln_ca1_66_03.loc_text: The gear could be at the smoking area. Perhaps Micho left your gear there. Look for a guitar case.

pln_ca1_67_01.base_text: Over there. Your gear's in that guitar case.
pln_ca1_67_01.loc_text: Over there. Your gear's in that guitar case.

pln_can_brf_01.base_text: Straightforward job, this one. A bunch of thugs are running a little operation. Got a bunch of "elves" cutting coke that Vlad wants. Deal with the thugs, and then get the elves producing. Shouting at them should do it. Get as much coke as Vlad needs, and we're done.

pln_ch1_01_01.base_text: Remember, we can't sell damaged cars so no cops. Keep it quiet. I'll let you know when you can plant the C4 on the road.

pln_ch1_01_02.base_text: Keep it quiet til you get the cars. We can't afford to have cops shooting them up. I'll tell you when to plant the C4.
pln_ch1_01_02.loc_text: Keep it quiet til you get the cars. We can't afford to have cops shooting them up. I'll tell you when to plant the C4.

pln_ch1_01_03.loc_text: Collateral damage will screw us. So no cops. That means keep it quiet. I'll let you know when you need to plant the C4.

pln_chw_12_01.base_text: All right, the BCI tech is in safe hands now. You still have the opportunity to go back to the wagon and get more loot. It's all worth good cash.
pln_chw_12_01.loc_text: All right, the BCI tech is in safe hands now. You still have the opportunity to go back to the wagon and get more loot. It's all worth good cash.

pln_chw_12_02.base_text: Excellent! With the BCI tech in safe possession, you have time to get more of the loot if you want to make some good money.
pln_chw_12_02.loc_text: Excellent! With the BCI tech in safe possession, you have time to get more of the loot if you want to make some good money.

pln_chw_12_03.base_text: I would prefer it if you just left before anything goes wrong, but I understand if you wanna go back to get more of the loot.
pln_chw_12_03.loc_text: I would prefer it if you just left before anything goes wrong, but I understand if you wanna go back to get more of the loot.

pln_chw_13_01.base_text: That's all of it. We'll make some good money from all this fancy stuff. Head back to the chopper and get out of there now.
pln_chw_13_01.loc_text: That's all of it. We'll make some good money from all this fancy stuff. Head back to the chopper and get out of there now.

pln_chw_13_02.base_text: Good job. More cash is always welcome. Now, run back to the helicopter and get out of there.
pln_chw_13_02.loc_text: Good job. More cash is always welcome. Now, run back to the helicopter and get out of there.

pln_chw_13_03.base_text: You cleaned the place out. Good job. Time to get the hell out of there.
pln_chw_13_03.loc_text: You cleaned the place out. Good job. Time to get the hell out of there.

pln_chw_14_01.base_text: Gang! Get out of there! What the hell are you doing?
pln_chw_14_01.loc_text: Gang! Get out of there! What the hell are you doing?

pln_chw_14_03.base_text: I said it's time to go!
pln_chw_14_03.loc_text: I said it's time to go!

pln_chw_15_01.base_text: Damn! The cops have blocked the tracks up ahead, which means you need to be gone before you reach that point. Get the BCI tech and run back to the chopper!
pln_chw_15_01.loc_text: Damn! The cops have blocked the tracks up ahead, which means you need to be gone before you reach that point. Get the BCI tech and run back to the chopper!

pln_chw_15_02.base_text: Hey! The cops are gonna stop the train further down the tracks, so you need to get the BCI tech and get the hell out of there!
pln_chw_15_02.loc_text: Hey! The cops are gonna stop the train further down the tracks, so you need to get the BCI tech and get the hell out of there!

pln_chw_15_03.base_text: Listen up! The cops are bringing in a lot of people to block the tracks up ahead, so you really need to go. Bring the BCI tech and head back to Bile!
pln_chw_15_03.loc_text: Listen up! The cops are bringing in a lot of people to block the tracks up ahead, so you really need to go. Bring the BCI tech and head back to Bile!

pln_chw_16_01.base_text: The train is rapidly approaching the cop barricade. I give you a maximum of two minutes to secure the loot and get out.
pln_chw_16_01.loc_text: The train is rapidly approaching the cop barricade. I give you a maximum of two minutes to secure the loot and get out.

pln_chw_16_02.base_text: You have approximately two minutes before the train reaches the barricade. You hear me? Two minutes.
pln_chw_16_02.loc_text: You have approximately two minutes before the train reaches the barricade. You hear me? Two minutes.

pln_chw_16_03.base_text: With the speed this train is going, you'll have about two minutes before you reach the barricade. That means two minutes to secure everything and leave!
pln_chw_16_03.loc_text: With the speed this train is going, you'll have about two minutes before you reach the barricade. That means two minutes to secure everything and leave!

pln_chw_17_01.base_text: Damn it, gang! You have less than a minute now!
pln_chw_17_01.loc_text: Damn it, gang! You have less than a minute now!

pln_chw_18_01.base_text: Thirty seconds, gang! You're pushing it!
pln_chw_18_01.loc_text: Thirty seconds, gang! You're pushing it!

pln_chw_18_02.base_text: You got thirty seconds to make it out of there!
pln_chw_18_02.loc_text: You got thirty seconds to make it out of there!

pln_chw_18_03.base_text: Thirty sec, guys! Hurry the hell up!
pln_chw_18_03.loc_text: Thirty sec, guys! Hurry the hell up!

pln_chw_19_01.base_text: Those oil barrels are blocking your path. Find the straps and release them. We don't have time to find another way.
pln_chw_19_01.loc_text: Those oil barrels are blocking your path. Find the straps and release them. We don't have time to find another way.

pln_chw_19_02.base_text: Damn it! Those oil barrels are in the way. See if you can release the straps, and do it quickly.
pln_chw_19_02.loc_text: Damn it! Those oil barrels are in the way. See if you can release the straps, and do it quickly.

pln_chw_19_03.base_text: You'll need to remove those barrels, and you need to do it fast. Just release the straps or something.
pln_chw_19_03.loc_text: You'll need to remove those barrels, and you need to do it fast. Just release the straps or something.

pln_chw_20_01.base_text: You'll have to use the blowtorch to get through this gate. Make it quick.
pln_chw_20_01.loc_text: You'll have to use the blowtorch to get through this gate. Make it quick.

pln_chw_20_02.base_text: Use the blowtorch to get through the gate!
pln_chw_20_02.loc_text: Use the blowtorch to get through the gate!

pln_chw_20_03.base_text: You got a blowtorch, don't you? Use it on that gate.
pln_chw_20_03.loc_text: You got a blowtorch, don't you? Use it on that gate.

pln_chw_21_01.base_text: The door's locked. See if you can find another way out so we can keep going forward.
pln_chw_21_01.loc_text: The door's locked. See if you can find another way out so we can keep going forward.

pln_chw_21_02.base_text: Damn, the door must be locked from the outside. Maybe there's another way out.
pln_chw_21_02.loc_text: Damn, the door must be locked from the outside. Maybe there's another way out.

pln_chw_21_03.base_text: The door appears to be locked from the outside. Look around and see if you can find another way to get out.
pln_chw_21_03.loc_text: The door appears to be locked from the outside. Look around and see if you can find another way to get out.

pln_chw_22_01.base_text: Damn, they really saved their big guns for last. And it looks like she had a keycard.
pln_chw_22_01.loc_text: Damn, they really saved their big guns for last. And it looks like she had a keycard.

pln_chw_22_02.base_text: Holy! Was not expecting that. See if she had something for the gate.
pln_chw_22_02.loc_text: Holy! Was not expecting that. See if she had something for the gate.

pln_chw_22_03.base_text: Jesus, that bastard wasn't playing around, was she? Take the keycard she dropped.
pln_chw_22_03.loc_text: Jesus, that bastard wasn't playing around, was she? Take the keycard she dropped.

pln_cp1_01_01.base_text: All safely down? Great. Locate the crash site, and see if the pilot's still alive. If he is, you need to get him to a safe place. I'll get a chopper out to pick him up ASAP. A plane doesn't crash out here without causing attention, so you can expect company. Work fast.
pln_cp1_01_01.loc_text: All safely down? Great. Locate the crash site, and see if the pilot's still alive. If he is, you need to get him to a safe place. I'll get a chopper out to pick him up ASAP. A plane doesn't crash out here without causing attention, so you can expect company. Work fast.

pln_cp1_01_02.base_text: Everyone OK? Then move out! You gotta find the crash site and that drunken pilot - unless he's wrapped his neck around a tree. We'll sort out an evac once you get him someplace safe.
pln_cp1_01_02.loc_text: Everyone OK? Then move out! You gotta find the crash site and that drunken pilot - unless he's wrapped his neck around a tree. We'll sort out an evac once you get him someplace safe.

pln_cp1_01_03.base_text: No broken legs? Good. Head into the forest and find that plane. My guess is the pilot will be nearby. Get him someplace safe and we'll evac him by air. Move out!
pln_cp1_01_03.loc_text: No broken legs? Good. Head into the forest and find that plane. My guess is the pilot will be nearby. Get him someplace safe and we'll evac him by air. Move out!

pln_cp1_02_01.base_text: There he is! Wake him up and take him to a safe place. There's a lumber yard nearby.
pln_cp1_02_01.loc_text: There he is! Wake him up and take him to a safe place. There's a lumber yard nearby.

pln_cp1_02_02.base_text: There's our guy. He's shit faced! Get him away from there. There's a deserted lumber yard near your position.
pln_cp1_02_02.loc_text: There's our guy. He's shit faced! Get him away from there. There's a deserted lumber yard near your position.

pln_cp1_02_03.base_text: There's the pilot. Christ, that old soak can barely stand, let alone fly a plane. Escort him somewhere safe. I'll get the chopper on the way.
pln_cp1_02_03.loc_text: There's the pilot. Christ, that old soak can barely stand, let alone fly a plane. Escort him somewhere safe. I'll get the chopper on the way.

pln_cp1_03_01.base_text: Oh man, he's really drunk! Gonna be tricky to escort that guy.
pln_cp1_03_01.loc_text: Oh man, he's really drunk! Gonna be tricky to escort that guy.

pln_cp1_03_02.base_text: Jesus, he's wasted. Stay with him. He's in no shape to defend himself.
pln_cp1_03_02.loc_text: Jesus, he's wasted. Stay with him. He's in no shape to defend himself.

pln_cp1_03_03.base_text: His blood must be 80% proof. Stay with him, help him.
pln_cp1_03_03.loc_text: His blood must be 80% proof. Stay with him, help him.

pln_cp1_04_01.base_text: Great! Now that he's safe, I'm sending a helicopter to pick him up. Stay with him.
pln_cp1_04_01.loc_text: Great! Now that he's safe, I'm sending a helicopter to pick him up. Stay with him.

pln_cp1_04_02.base_text: No time to brew coffee for that pissed old fart. Keep him safe. I'm sending an extraction now.
pln_cp1_04_02.loc_text: No time to brew coffee for that pissed old fart. Keep him safe. I'm sending an extraction now.

pln_cp1_04_03.base_text: Good. I'm sending a chopper to collect him. Keep him safe. He's so wasted I doubt he'd feel the bullets.
pln_cp1_04_03.loc_text: Good. I'm sending a chopper to collect him. Keep him safe. He's so wasted I doubt he'd feel the bullets.

pln_cp1_05_01.base_text: Alright, chopper's here. Bring the pilot to it!
pln_cp1_05_01.loc_text: Alright, chopper's here. Bring the pilot to it!

pln_cp1_05_02.base_text: OK, that's the chopper you can hear. Get our guy out there.
pln_cp1_05_02.loc_text: OK, that's the chopper you can hear. Get our guy out there.

pln_cp1_05_03.base_text: Chopper's on the scene. Get him there. Just pray he doesn't reach for the controls.
pln_cp1_05_03.loc_text: Chopper's on the scene. Get him there. Just pray he doesn't reach for the controls.

pln_cp1_06_01.base_text: Good work! Chopper's gonna drop him off then come back for the rest of you. While you're waiting, look around the forest for any more packages.
pln_cp1_06_01.loc_text: Good work! Chopper's gonna drop him off then come back for the rest of you. While you're waiting, look around the forest for any more packages.

pln_cp1_06_02.base_text: Chopper will be back for the rest of you. Use the time well - look around for the product. Vlad said it's stashed in packages.
pln_cp1_06_02.loc_text: Chopper will be back for the rest of you. Use the time well - look around for the product. Vlad said it's stashed in packages.

pln_cp1_06_03.base_text: Chopper will come back for you, so while we're waiting, why not get looking for Vlad's packages. Could be a nice little bonus.
pln_cp1_06_03.loc_text: Chopper will come back for you, so while we're waiting, why not get looking for Vlad's packages. Could be a nice little bonus.

pln_cp1_07_01.base_text: OK, chopper's here. Secure any loot you found. You can bail when you feel like it, but I'm sure there's always more loot out there. Your call.
pln_cp1_07_01.loc_text: OK, chopper's here. Secure any loot you found. You can bail when you feel like it, but I'm sure there's always more loot out there. Your call.

pln_cp1_07_02.base_text: There's your chopper. Get the bags in it. Then you can bug out, or stay and find more loot. It's up to you.
pln_cp1_07_02.loc_text: There's your chopper. Get the bags in it. Then you can bug out, or stay and find more loot. It's up to you.

pln_cp1_07_03.base_text: Chopper is here. Stow any bags. You can ride out now, or you can stay and find more coke. Your decision.
pln_cp1_07_03.loc_text: Chopper is here. Stow any bags. You can ride out now, or you can stay and find more coke. Your decision.

pln_cp1_08_01.base_text: Chopper's headed out, but stay cool - it'll be back. Look for more loot in the forest. And stay safe.
pln_cp1_08_01.loc_text: Chopper's headed out, but stay cool - it'll be back. Look for more loot in the forest. And stay safe.

pln_cp1_08_02.base_text: OK, chopper's pulling out. Hope you stowed some loot. It'll be back though. Try and find more of Vlad's coke.
pln_cp1_08_02.loc_text: OK, chopper's pulling out. Hope you stowed some loot. It'll be back though. Try and find more of Vlad's coke.

pln_cp1_08_03.base_text: There goes the chopper, but don't worry - it'll be back. In the meantime, let's see if you can track down some more of those presents.
pln_cp1_08_03.loc_text: There goes the chopper, but don't worry - it'll be back. In the meantime, let's see if you can track down some more of those presents.

pln_cp1_09_01.base_text: Chopper's got to leave soon. Hustle if you want to be on it, but it'll be back soon!
pln_cp1_09_01.loc_text: Chopper's got to leave soon. Hustle if you want to be on it, but it'll be back soon!

pln_cp1_09_02.base_text: Chopper's almost ready to pull out. If you want to cash out now, better haul ass, or stay and track down more coke.
pln_cp1_09_02.loc_text: Chopper's almost ready to pull out. If you want to cash out now, better haul ass, or stay and track down more coke.

pln_cp1_09_03.base_text: Helicopter will have to bug out for a little while. If you're ready to go now, be on it.
pln_cp1_09_03.loc_text: Helicopter will have to bug out for a little while. If you're ready to go now, be on it.

pln_cp1_10_01.base_text: Did I just hear a present falling from a tree? Seems to be more of them stuck in there. Find 'em, crack 'em open.
pln_cp1_10_01.loc_text: Did I just hear a present falling from a tree? Seems to be more of them stuck in there. Find 'em, crack 'em open.

pln_cp1_10_02.base_text: Sounds like a present fell outta the tree, gang. Might be more of Vlad's coke. Find it.
pln_cp1_10_02.loc_text: Sounds like a present fell outta the tree, gang. Might be more of Vlad's coke. Find it.

pln_cp1_10_03.base_text: Was that a coke-filled present falling from a tree? Christmas really is the time of miracles.
pln_cp1_10_03.loc_text: Was that a coke-filled present falling from a tree? Christmas really is the time of miracles.

pln_cp1_11_01.base_text: Another package hit the ground, clowns. Try and find it.
pln_cp1_11_01.loc_text: Another package hit the ground, clowns. Try and find it.

pln_cp1_11_02.base_text: The night's not so silent. Think I heard another present hit the ground. Find it!
pln_cp1_11_02.loc_text: The night's not so silent. Think I heard another present hit the ground. Find it!

pln_cp1_11_03.base_text: Do my ears deceive me, or was that the sweet sound of another of Vlad's presents hitting the floor? Look for it!
pln_cp1_11_03.loc_text: Do my ears deceive me, or was that the sweet sound of another of Vlad's presents hitting the floor? Look for it!

pln_cp1_12_01.base_text: The pilot just fell down. Damn, is he sleeping? You need to wake him up!
pln_cp1_12_01.loc_text: The pilot just fell down. Damn, is he sleeping? You need to wake him up!

pln_cp1_12_02.base_text: Pilot's gone down. Don't let him pass out. Get him moving!
pln_cp1_12_02.loc_text: Pilot's gone down. Don't let him pass out. Get him moving!

pln_cp1_12_03.base_text: Pilot is down! Get him back on his feet.
pln_cp1_12_03.loc_text: Pilot is down! Get him back on his feet.

pln_cp1_13_01.base_text: Oh man, the pilot just went down again. Wake that old wino up!
pln_cp1_13_01.loc_text: Oh man, the pilot just went down again. Wake that old wino up!

pln_cp1_13_02.base_text: For crying out loud, the pilot has hit the deck again. Wake him up!
pln_cp1_13_02.loc_text: For crying out loud, the pilot has hit the deck again. Wake him up!

pln_cp1_13_03.base_text: The old drunk is on the ground again. Get him to his feet.
pln_cp1_13_03.loc_text: The old drunk is on the ground again. Get him to his feet.

pln_cp1_14_01.base_text: The chopper's coming to the lumber yard - be ready!
pln_cp1_14_01.loc_text: The chopper's coming to the lumber yard - be ready!

pln_cp1_14_02.base_text: Chopper's headed for the lumber yard - be there!
pln_cp1_14_02.loc_text: Chopper's headed for the lumber yard - be there!

pln_cp1_14_03.base_text: The helicopter is in bound for the lumber yard, gang.
pln_cp1_14_03.loc_text: The helicopter is in bound for the lumber yard, gang.

pln_cp1_15_01.base_text: Chopper's headed for the crash site. Get ready!
pln_cp1_15_01.loc_text: Chopper's headed for the crash site. Get ready!

pln_cp1_15_02.base_text: Chopper's is in-bound for the crash site. Stand by, gang!
pln_cp1_15_02.loc_text: Chopper's is in-bound for the crash site. Stand by, gang!

pln_cp1_15_03.base_text: Chopper will be over the wrecked plane any second.
pln_cp1_15_03.loc_text: Chopper will be over the wrecked plane any second.

pln_cp1_16_01.base_text: Our bird will be near the train yard any moment. Be ready!
pln_cp1_16_01.loc_text: Our bird will be near the train yard any moment. Be ready!

pln_cp1_16_02.base_text: Our helicopter will be at the train yard any second.
pln_cp1_16_02.loc_text: Our helicopter will be at the train yard any second.

pln_cp1_16_03.base_text: Our chopper will be over the train yard in a moment. Get ready!
pln_cp1_16_03.loc_text: Our chopper will be over the train yard in a moment. Get ready!

pln_cp1_17_01.base_text: The chopper is coming at the antenna!
pln_cp1_17_01.loc_text: The chopper is coming at the antenna!

pln_cp1_17_02.base_text: Chopper will be at the antenna. Wait for it!
pln_cp1_17_02.loc_text: Chopper will be at the antenna. Wait for it!

pln_cp1_17_03.base_text: The chopper is headed for the antenna. Stand by!
pln_cp1_17_03.loc_text: The chopper is headed for the antenna. Stand by!

pln_cp1_18_01.base_text: Great, the pilot's safe! Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Ignite it to signal the helicopter.
pln_cp1_18_01.loc_text: Great, the pilot's safe! Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Ignite it to signal the helicopter.

pln_cp1_18_02.base_text: Alright, he should be safe now. Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Set it off to bring in the chopper.
pln_cp1_18_02.loc_text: Alright, he should be safe now. Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Set it off to bring in the chopper.

pln_cp1_18_03.base_text: OK, he should be out of harm's way. Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Set it off to signal the evac.
pln_cp1_18_03.loc_text: OK, he should be out of harm's way. Place a flare on the table outside the yard. Set it off to signal the evac.

pln_cp1_19_01.base_text: You need to ignite a flare to signal the helicopter again.
pln_cp1_19_01.loc_text: You need to ignite a flare to signal the helicopter again.

pln_cp1_19_02.base_text: Remember to strike a flare to summon the evac.
pln_cp1_19_02.loc_text: Remember to strike a flare to summon the evac.

pln_cp1_19_03.base_text: Light another flare to bring the chopper back, gang.
pln_cp1_19_03.loc_text: Light another flare to bring the chopper back, gang.

pln_cp1_20_01.base_text: Alright, the chopper's on the way. He'll be there in a minute.
pln_cp1_20_01.loc_text: Alright, the chopper's on the way. He'll be there in a minute.

pln_cp1_20_02.base_text: Chopper sees the flare. He's on his way. One minute.
pln_cp1_20_02.loc_text: Chopper sees the flare. He's on his way. One minute.

pln_cp1_20_03.base_text: Flare is lit. Alright, he sees it. Chopper is in-bound.
pln_cp1_20_03.loc_text: Flare is lit. Alright, he sees it. Chopper is in-bound.

pln_cr2_01_01.base_text: There's the dockyard, right ahead. Get inside. Watch the security though.
pln_cr2_01_01.loc_text: There's the dockyard, right ahead. Get inside. Watch the security though.

pln_cr2_01_02.base_text: Into the dockyard, gang. Keep an eye out for security and cameras. Go.
pln_cr2_01_02.loc_text: Into the dockyard, gang. Keep an eye out for security and cameras. Go.

pln_cr2_01_03.base_text: Docks are right there. Head in. And watch for guards.
pln_cr2_01_03.loc_text: Docks are right there. Head in. And watch for guards.

pln_cr2_02_01.base_text: Great. That's keycard one. We need to find one more.
pln_cr2_02_01.loc_text: Great. That's keycard one. We need to find one more.

pln_cr2_02_02.base_text: Good work. Just need to find one more keycard.
pln_cr2_02_02.loc_text: Good work. Just need to find one more keycard.

pln_cr2_02_03.base_text: A keycard for the gate. Gonna need another, though.
pln_cr2_02_03.loc_text: A keycard for the gate. Gonna need another, though.

pln_cr2_03_01.base_text: That's keycard two. Good job, guys!
pln_cr2_03_01.loc_text: That's keycard two. Good job, guys!

pln_cr2_03_03.base_text: And that's the second keycard. Nice job!
pln_cr2_03_03.loc_text: And that's the second keycard. Nice job!

pln_cr2_04_01.base_text: Now use the other keycard in the other control room. Let's open the gate and get the Moretta out!
pln_cr2_04_01.loc_text: Now use the other keycard in the other control room. Let's open the gate and get the Moretta out!

pln_cr2_04_02.base_text: Good. Now use the other keycard on the panel in the other control room.
pln_cr2_04_02.loc_text: Good. Now use the other keycard on the panel in the other control room.

pln_cr2_04_03.base_text: Great. Now get that other keycard working on the opposite gate. Hurry!
pln_cr2_04_03.loc_text: Great. Now get that other keycard working on the opposite gate. Hurry!

pln_cr2_06_01.base_text: That's the left panel. Now search for the other keycard. Get the other panel activated.
pln_cr2_06_01.loc_text: That's the left panel. Now search for the other keycard. Get the other panel activated.

pln_cr2_06_02.base_text: Left panel's activated. Now get another keycard, and let's get the second panel done.
pln_cr2_06_02.loc_text: Left panel's activated. Now get another keycard, and let's get the second panel done.

pln_cr2_06_03.base_text: Left gate activated. Now find another keycard, and let's get the other gate open.
pln_cr2_06_03.loc_text: Left gate activated. Now find another keycard, and let's get the other gate open.

pln_cr2_07_01.base_text: That's the right panel. Now search for the other keycard. Get the other panel activated.
pln_cr2_07_01.loc_text: That's the right panel. Now search for the other keycard. Get the other panel activated.

pln_cr2_07_02.base_text: Right panel's activated. Now get the other keycard, and let's get the second panel done.
pln_cr2_07_02.loc_text: Right panel's activated. Now get the other keycard, and let's get the second panel done.

pln_cr2_07_03.base_text: Right gate activated. Now find another keycard, and let's get the other gate open.
pln_cr2_07_03.loc_text: Right gate activated. Now find another keycard, and let's get the other gate open.

pln_cr2_08_01.base_text: Well, the front door's closed.  No surprise. Look for another way in.
pln_cr2_08_01.loc_text: Well, the front door's closed.  No surprise. Look for another way in.

pln_cr2_08_02.base_text: You thought you were just going to stroll in through the main entrance? Look around for another way in.
pln_cr2_08_02.loc_text: You thought you were just going to stroll in through the main entrance? Look around for another way in.

pln_cr2_08_03.base_text: The front is shut tight. Take a walk around. Find another way in.
pln_cr2_08_03.loc_text: The front is shut tight. Take a walk around. Find another way in.

pln_cr2_09_01.base_text: Great. Alright. Next step is to find two keycards. Most likely indoors.
pln_cr2_09_01.loc_text: Great. Alright. Next step is to find two keycards. Most likely indoors.

pln_cr2_09_02.base_text: You're in. Now hunt down keycards - two of 'em. I'd guess offices are your best bet.
pln_cr2_09_02.loc_text: You're in. Now hunt down keycards - two of 'em. I'd guess offices are your best bet.

pln_cr2_09_03.base_text: We're inside. Good. Next, gonna need a couple of keycards. Smart money would be on them being indoors.
pln_cr2_09_03.loc_text: We're inside. Good. Next, gonna need a couple of keycards. Smart money would be on them being indoors.

pln_cr2_100_01.base_text: See guys, it's a bad idea to cook meth in a small, closed space like a container.
pln_cr2_100_01.loc_text: See guys, it's a bad idea to cook meth in a small, closed space like a container.

pln_cr2_100_02.base_text: Whose bright idea was it to set up a methlab in an unventilated tin box?
pln_cr2_100_02.loc_text: Whose bright idea was it to set up a methlab in an unventilated tin box?

pln_cr2_100_03.base_text: An off-shore methlab? Clever. A methlab in a metal box? Not so clever...
pln_cr2_100_03.loc_text: An off-shore methlab? Clever. A methlab in a metal box? Not so clever...

pln_cr2_101_01.base_text: The cops opened the entrance gate!
pln_cr2_101_01.loc_text: The cops opened the entrance gate!

pln_cr2_101_02.base_text: The enemy are at the gates, gang.
pln_cr2_101_02.loc_text: The enemy are at the gates, gang.

pln_cr2_101_03.base_text: Cops are through the front gate. Get ready.
pln_cr2_101_03.loc_text: Cops are through the front gate. Get ready.

pln_cr2_102_01.base_text: That's the guard down. Don't have to worry about the cameras anymore.
pln_cr2_102_01.loc_text: That's the guard down. Don't have to worry about the cameras anymore.

pln_cr2_102_02.base_text: Guard is down. That's the cameras out of action.
pln_cr2_102_02.loc_text: Guard is down. That's the cameras out of action.

pln_cr2_102_03.base_text: That's the guard dealt with. No need to worry about the cameras now.
pln_cr2_102_03.loc_text: That's the guard dealt with. No need to worry about the cameras now.

pln_cr2_103_01.base_text: You took care of both guards. Don't have to worry about the cameras anymore.
pln_cr2_103_01.loc_text: You took care of both guards. Don't have to worry about the cameras anymore.

pln_cr2_103_02.base_text: And that's the guards dealt with. Cameras are no longer a problem.
pln_cr2_103_02.loc_text: And that's the guards dealt with. Cameras are no longer a problem.

pln_cr2_103_03.base_text: Guards are down. Don't worry about the cameras now.
pln_cr2_103_03.loc_text: Guards are down. Don't worry about the cameras now.

pln_cr2_104_01.base_text: Guys, they're throwing everything they have at you. Better make it out, fast!
pln_cr2_104_01.loc_text: Guys, they're throwing everything they have at you. Better make it out, fast!

pln_cr2_104_02.base_text: This is it, gang. They're throwing everything they have in to this. Get out of there!
pln_cr2_104_02.loc_text: This is it, gang. They're throwing everything they have in to this. Get out of there!

pln_cr2_104_03.base_text: Better haul ass, gang. They're putting everything they have in to this assault.
pln_cr2_104_03.loc_text: Better haul ass, gang. They're putting everything they have in to this assault.

pln_cr2_105_01.base_text: Moretta will be moved to Dock 3B... Once you execute all the necessary steps.
pln_cr2_105_01.loc_text: Moretta will be moved to Dock 3B... Once you execute all the necessary steps.

pln_cr2_106_01.base_text: We gotta open this dock gate to get the Moretta to Dock 3B.
pln_cr2_106_01.loc_text: We gotta open this dock gate to get the Moretta to Dock 3B.

pln_cr2_107_01.base_text: This is the Right Control Room for the Dock Gate. Use the Keycard here.
pln_cr2_107_01.loc_text: This is the Right Control Room for the Dock Gate. Use the Keycard here.

pln_cr2_108_01.base_text: This is the Left Control Room for the Dock Gate. Use the Keycard here.
pln_cr2_108_01.loc_text: This is the Left Control Room for the Dock Gate. Use the Keycard here.

pln_cr2_109_01.base_text: This gate will open automatically once the ship moves to Dock 3B.

pln_cr2_10_03.base_text: What are you waiting for? Into the docks.

pln_cr2_110_01.loc_text: This is the workers' locker room. Check for a keycard here.

pln_cr2_111_01.base_text: General admin office. A terminal here might hold the Moretta's comm frequency. Good chance of a keycard or radio too.
pln_cr2_111_01.loc_text: General admin office. A terminal here might hold the Moretta's comm frequency. Good chance of a keycard or radio too.

pln_cr2_112_01.base_text: This is the Storage Room. Check for a keycard. Might be a radio here too.
pln_cr2_112_01.loc_text: This is the Storage Room. Check for a keycard. Might be a radio here too.

pln_cr2_113_01.base_text: This is one of the ship Control Rooms. Computers can be used for entering GPS targets, or you might find Moretta's comm frequency. There could also be a keycard or radio here.
pln_cr2_113_01.loc_text: This is one of the ship Control Rooms. Computers can be used for entering GPS targets, or you might find Moretta's comm frequency. There could also be a keycard or radio here.

pln_cr2_115_01.base_text: Ship's in position! Going to hit it like Blackbeard! Zip-line could be a shortcut.
pln_cr2_115_01.loc_text: Ship's in position! Going to hit it like Blackbeard! Zip-line could be a shortcut.

pln_cr2_115_02.base_text: Moretta's at the berth. Time for a hostile boarding. The zip-line could speed things up.
pln_cr2_115_02.loc_text: Moretta's at the berth. Time for a hostile boarding. The zip-line could speed things up.

pln_cr2_115_03.base_text: Ship's there. Get on it! Maybe deploy the zip-line - might speed things up.
pln_cr2_115_03.loc_text: Ship's there. Get on it! Maybe deploy the zip-line - might speed things up.

pln_cr2_116_01.base_text: Moretta. This is Port Washington radio. One zero one E. Over.
pln_cr2_116_01.loc_text: Moretta. This is Port Washington radio. One zero one E. Over.

pln_cr2_117_01.base_text: Moretta. This is Port Washington radio. Free to clear dock and berth at 3B. Stand by for GPS data. Over.
pln_cr2_117_01.loc_text: Moretta. This is Port Washington radio. Free to clear dock and berth at 3B. Stand by for GPS data. Over.

pln_cr2_118_02.loc_text: Fish in this town grow fat on corpses.

pln_cr2_119_03.base_text: Just food for the rats now.
pln_cr2_119_03.loc_text: Just food for the rats now.

pln_cr2_11_01.base_text: Hey! These terminals likely have the comm frequency for the Moretta. We're gonna need it before long.
pln_cr2_11_01.loc_text: Hey! These terminals likely have the comm frequency for the Moretta. We're gonna need it before long.

pln_cr2_11_02.base_text: I'm guessing these terminals contain the Moretta's comm frequency. Might be worth a look.
pln_cr2_11_02.loc_text: I'm guessing these terminals contain the Moretta's comm frequency. Might be worth a look.

pln_cr2_11_03.base_text: These terminals likely have info on the Moretta. You can search it if you want. Intel's always useful.
pln_cr2_11_03.loc_text: These terminals likely have info on the Moretta. You can search it if you want. Intel's always useful.

pln_cr2_120_01.base_text: They're opening the powerboxes. Make sure they don't cut the power!
pln_cr2_120_01.loc_text: They're opening the powerboxes. Make sure they don't cut the power!

pln_cr2_120_02.base_text: Cops are at the powerboxes. Don't let them cut the juice.
pln_cr2_120_02.loc_text: Cops are at the powerboxes. Don't let them cut the juice.

pln_cr2_120_03.base_text: Pigs are all over the powerboxes, gang. Keep the power on!
pln_cr2_120_03.loc_text: Pigs are all over the powerboxes, gang. Keep the power on!

pln_cr2_121_01.base_text: You've found the bomb. No need to keep checking the bomb cases!
pln_cr2_121_01.loc_text: You've found the bomb. No need to keep checking the bomb cases!

pln_cr2_121_02.base_text: You can quit searching those cases - you found the bomb!
pln_cr2_121_02.loc_text: You can quit searching those cases - you found the bomb!

pln_cr2_121_03.base_text: Searching the cases is pointless. You got the bomb, remember?
pln_cr2_121_03.loc_text: Searching the cases is pointless. You got the bomb, remember?

pln_cr2_122_01.base_text: You guys have the bomb. No need to keep opening the containers!
pln_cr2_122_01.loc_text: You guys have the bomb. No need to keep opening the containers!

pln_cr2_122_02.loc_text: Why're you still searching containers? You got the bomb!

pln_cr2_122_03.loc_text: You already found the bomb. You can leave the containers alone!

pln_cr2_123_01.loc_text: The comm frequency ain't here. Check the computer's in the control room across the dockyard.

pln_cr2_123_02.base_text: The frequency ain't here. The control room is across the dock - maybe check there.
pln_cr2_123_02.loc_text: The frequency ain't here. The control room is across the dock - maybe check there.

pln_cr2_123_03.loc_text: Damn, no sign of the comm frequency. My guess is it'll be at the control room across the dock.

pln_cr2_124_01.loc_text: The comm frequency ain't here. Alright, then check the terminals in the office across the dockyard.

pln_cr2_124_02.loc_text: No frequency here. Damn! Then the best bet is the office across the dock - check it out.

pln_cr2_124_03.base_text: Damn it, no comm frequency here. Alright, there's an office across the dock. Check there.

pln_cr2_125_01.loc_text: That's our ship. The Moretta. But we can't get on it from here. You gotta move it to dock 3B.

pln_cr2_125_02.base_text: There she is. The Moretta. No access here, though. Get it to dock 3B.
pln_cr2_125_02.loc_text: There she is. The Moretta. No access here, though. Get it to dock 3B.

pln_cr2_125_03.base_text: The Moretta - That's our girl. But we can't get on board here. You have to see her moved to dock 3B.
pln_cr2_125_03.loc_text: The Moretta - That's our girl. But we can't get on board here. You have to see her moved to dock 3B.

pln_cr2_12_01.loc_text: Remember, you're looking for keycards. Check the buildings.

pln_cr2_12_02.base_text: You're looking for keycards. The buildings are your best bet.
pln_cr2_12_02.loc_text: You're looking for keycards. The buildings are your best bet.

pln_cr2_12_03.base_text: You need to find keycards. My guess is that the buildings are your best chance.

pln_cr2_12_04.base_text: Maybe the buildings are your best chance for finding keycards.

pln_cr2_12_05.base_text: Find keycards, gang. Check the buildings.

pln_cr2_13_01.loc_text: We need the Moretta's comm frequency. It'll be on one of those terminals. Get checking.

pln_cr2_13_02.base_text: Moretta's comm frequency will be on one of the computers. Check them out.
pln_cr2_13_02.loc_text: Moretta's comm frequency will be on one of the computers. Check them out.

pln_cr2_13_03.base_text: We need the ship's comm frequency. Likely on one of these terminals. Search them!
pln_cr2_13_03.loc_text: We need the ship's comm frequency. Likely on one of these terminals. Search them!

pln_cr2_14_01.base_text: Moretta is moored at Dock 2B. Can't access it there.
pln_cr2_14_01.loc_text: Moretta is moored at Dock 2B. Can't access it there.

pln_cr2_15_01.base_text: Fuel receipts, insurance claims. Nothing useful here. Keep checking the terminals.

pln_cr2_15_02.base_text: Just maritime regulations and shipping forecasts. Keep looking.

pln_cr2_15_03.base_text: Personel contracts and expenses. Useless. Keep checking.
pln_cr2_15_03.loc_text: Personel contracts and expenses. Useless. Keep checking.

pln_cr2_16_01.base_text: OK, you heard the Captain. Find the computer. Enter the GPS coordinates. Let's get her moving.
pln_cr2_16_01.loc_text: OK, you heard the Captain. Find the computer. Enter the GPS coordinates. Let's get her moving.

pln_cr2_16_02.base_text: You heard the Cap'n. Get the GPS data to the Moretta. Find the computer to upload.
pln_cr2_16_02.loc_text: You heard the Cap'n. Get the GPS data to the Moretta. Find the computer to upload.

pln_cr2_16_03.base_text: Great. Now let's get her that GPS data. Find the computer to upload.
pln_cr2_16_03.loc_text: Great. Now let's get her that GPS data. Find the computer to upload.

pln_cr2_17_01.base_text: There it goes. Remember, this isn't a speed boat. Going to take a while. Keep a low profile. Be careful not to trigger the alarm. Or search for extra loot. Your choice, guys.
pln_cr2_17_01.loc_text: There it goes. Remember, this isn't a speed boat. Going to take a while. Keep a low profile. Be careful not to trigger the alarm. Or search for extra loot. Your choice, guys.

pln_cr2_17_02.base_text: She's moving. But not fast. This will take some time. Stay hidden, guys. Lie low. Or, if you want, look around for extra loot.
pln_cr2_17_02.loc_text: She's moving. But not fast. This will take some time. Stay hidden, guys. Lie low. Or, if you want, look around for extra loot.

pln_cr2_17_03.base_text: Moretta is on the move. Going to take a while before she is berthed, so you can stay low and quiet, or use the time to hunt down any extra loot. Up to you.
pln_cr2_17_03.loc_text: Moretta is on the move. Going to take a while before she is berthed, so you can stay low and quiet, or use the time to hunt down any extra loot. Up to you.

pln_cr2_18_01.base_text: She stopped! Get on deck and and search the containers!
pln_cr2_18_01.loc_text: She stopped! Get on deck and and search the containers!

pln_cr2_18_02.base_text: Alright, she's berthed! Get up on deck and start searching the containers.
pln_cr2_18_02.loc_text: Alright, she's berthed! Get up on deck and start searching the containers.

pln_cr2_18_03.base_text: Moretta is in position. Get on deck and look for the explosives. Move!
pln_cr2_18_03.loc_text: Moretta is in position. Get on deck and look for the explosives. Move!

pln_cr2_19_01.base_text: You already found the comm frequencies for the Moretta. No need to keep checking the computers.
pln_cr2_19_01.loc_text: You already found the comm frequencies for the Moretta. No need to keep checking the computers.

pln_cr2_19_02.base_text: What's wrong with you? You have the frequencies!
pln_cr2_19_02.loc_text: What's wrong with you? You have the frequencies!

pln_cr2_19_03.base_text: You got the frequency already. Stay focused!
pln_cr2_19_03.loc_text: You got the frequency already. Stay focused!

pln_cr2_20_01.base_text: No alarm was triggered, so you can simply walk into the containers. Outstanding!
pln_cr2_20_01.loc_text: No alarm was triggered, so you can simply walk into the containers. Outstanding!

pln_cr2_20_02.base_text: Great job keeping it quiet. They don't suspect you, so the containers are unlocked. Have at it!
pln_cr2_20_02.loc_text: Great job keeping it quiet. They don't suspect you, so the containers are unlocked. Have at it!

pln_cr2_20_03.base_text: Badasses on deck! Great job stealthing it. Containers are unlocked. Go for it!
pln_cr2_20_03.loc_text: Badasses on deck! Great job stealthing it. Containers are unlocked. Go for it!

pln_cr2_21_01.base_text: Nice! Comm frequencies for the Moretta. This will be useful later on, but stay focused.
pln_cr2_21_01.loc_text: Nice! Comm frequencies for the Moretta. This will be useful later on, but stay focused.

pln_cr2_21_02.base_text: These frequencies will be useful later on. For now, though, stay focused on the job.
pln_cr2_21_02.loc_text: These frequencies will be useful later on. For now, though, stay focused on the job.

pln_cr2_21_03.base_text: Aha! The Moretta comm frequencies. We can use these later, but stay focused.
pln_cr2_21_03.loc_text: Aha! The Moretta comm frequencies. We can use these later, but stay focused.

pln_cr2_22_01.base_text: He's en route now with C4. Just hang in there, gang.
pln_cr2_22_01.loc_text: He's en route now with C4. Just hang in there, gang.

pln_cr2_22_02.base_text: Plan B is en route, though. C4 can do the job loudly.
pln_cr2_22_02.loc_text: Plan B is en route, though. C4 can do the job loudly.

pln_cr2_22_03.base_text: Stand by - sending it in by chopper.
pln_cr2_22_03.loc_text: Stand by - sending it in by chopper.

pln_cr2_23_01.base_text: There, chopper dropped the bag. Go pick up the C4, guys.
pln_cr2_23_01.loc_text: There, chopper dropped the bag. Go pick up the C4, guys.

pln_cr2_23_02.base_text: C4 is on the ground. Grab it!
pln_cr2_23_02.loc_text: C4 is on the ground. Grab it!

pln_cr2_23_03.base_text: OK, there's the C4. Help yourself!
pln_cr2_23_03.loc_text: OK, there's the C4. Help yourself!

pln_cr2_24_01.base_text: OK, place the C4 on the gate.
pln_cr2_24_01.loc_text: OK, place the C4 on the gate.

pln_cr2_24_02.base_text: Now plant it on the dock gate.
pln_cr2_24_02.loc_text: Now plant it on the dock gate.

pln_cr2_24_03.base_text: Get that C4 on the dock gate.
pln_cr2_24_03.loc_text: Get that C4 on the dock gate.

pln_cr2_28_01.base_text: All C4 in place. Get off of the gate now!
pln_cr2_28_01.loc_text: All C4 in place. Get off of the gate now!

pln_cr2_28_02.base_text: That's the C4 done. Clear the gate!
pln_cr2_28_02.loc_text: That's the C4 done. Clear the gate!

pln_cr2_28_03.base_text: C4's all done. Now let's blow the gate.
pln_cr2_28_03.loc_text: C4's all done. Now let's blow the gate.

pln_cr2_30_01.base_text: Well, we're not getting the Captain's cooperation now, but we still need that ship moved. Just hack the ship control terminal and make sure it stays on.
pln_cr2_30_01.loc_text: Well, we're not getting the Captain's cooperation now, but we still need that ship moved. Just hack the ship control terminal and make sure it stays on.

pln_cr2_30_02.base_text: Sure the Captain heard that, so we can rule out him cooperating. No time to turn the screw on him either, so we bypass him. Hack the ship control terminal. Keep it running.
pln_cr2_30_02.loc_text: Sure the Captain heard that, so we can rule out him cooperating. No time to turn the screw on him either, so we bypass him. Hack the ship control terminal. Keep it running.

pln_cr2_30_03.base_text: We can scratch the Captain moving his ship for us now. Nevermind. We can move the ship without him. Hack into the ship control terminal. And don't let the cops interfere with it.
pln_cr2_30_03.loc_text: We can scratch the Captain moving his ship for us now. Nevermind. We can move the ship without him. Hack into the ship control terminal. And don't let the cops interfere with it.

pln_cr2_31_01.base_text: That's it, guys. This will take some time. Just make sure the power stays on.
pln_cr2_31_01.loc_text: That's it, guys. This will take some time. Just make sure the power stays on.

pln_cr2_31_02.base_text: We're in. Alright, keep the cops off it. Might take some time.
pln_cr2_31_02.loc_text: We're in. Alright, keep the cops off it. Might take some time.

pln_cr2_31_03.base_text: And... In! Great. Now keep the connection secure. Going as fast as can.
pln_cr2_31_03.loc_text: And... In! Great. Now keep the connection secure. Going as fast as can.

pln_cr2_32_01.loc_text: They cut the power. Get it back on.

pln_cr2_32_02.base_text: What the..? Power's out. Get it on!
pln_cr2_32_02.loc_text: What the..? Power's out. Get it on!

pln_cr2_32_03.base_text: Lost it! Get the power back, quick!
pln_cr2_32_03.loc_text: Lost it! Get the power back, quick!

pln_cr2_33_01.base_text: Good. I can get on with the work now.
pln_cr2_33_01.loc_text: Good. I can get on with the work now.

pln_cr2_33_03.base_text: Power's back. Now let's try this once more.
pln_cr2_33_03.loc_text: Power's back. Now let's try this once more.

pln_cr2_34_01.base_text: And... Done! Ship's moving. Sit tight guys, this will take some time! Try not to get killed.
pln_cr2_34_01.loc_text: And... Done! Ship's moving. Sit tight guys, this will take some time! Try not to get killed.

pln_cr2_34_02.base_text: It's done. The Moretta is on the move! Might take a while, so bunker down. Try not to die.
pln_cr2_34_02.loc_text: It's done. The Moretta is on the move! Might take a while, so bunker down. Try not to die.

pln_cr2_34_03.base_text: Moretta is powering up. Let it move to its berth. Weapons free.
pln_cr2_34_03.loc_text: Moretta is powering up. Let it move to its berth. Weapons free.
