pln_cr2_35_01.loc_text: Ship's in position! Going to hit it like Blackbeard!

pln_cr2_35_02.base_text: Moretta's at the berth. Time for a hostile boarding.
pln_cr2_35_02.loc_text: Moretta's at the berth. Time for a hostile boarding.

pln_cr2_36_01.base_text: Damn! The containers got locked when the alarm was triggered. Gonna have to drill them.
pln_cr2_36_01.loc_text: Damn! The containers got locked when the alarm was triggered. Gonna have to drill them.

pln_cr2_36_02.base_text: What the? Ah fuuu... Containers were locked when the alarm tripped. Drill them!
pln_cr2_36_02.loc_text: What the? Ah fuuu... Containers were locked when the alarm tripped. Drill them!

pln_cr2_36_03.base_text: I was afraid of this. The containers are shut and locked. Gonna have to drill them.
pln_cr2_36_03.loc_text: I was afraid of this. The containers are shut and locked. Gonna have to drill them.

pln_cr2_37_02.base_text: Let the drill do it's job. You do yours.
pln_cr2_37_02.loc_text: Let the drill do it's job. You do yours.

pln_cr2_37_03.base_text: Keep the cops busy and the drill will be through in no time.
pln_cr2_37_03.loc_text: Keep the cops busy and the drill will be through in no time.

pln_cr2_38_01.base_text: Aha! Ship database, including comm frequencies. Great! That's what we need. Now get on the horn to the Captain.
pln_cr2_38_01.loc_text: Aha! Ship database, including comm frequencies. Great! That's what we need. Now get on the horn to the Captain.

pln_cr2_38_02.base_text: Ship database. Should have... Got it! Comm frequency for the Moretta. This is it! Now find a radio. Let's call the Captain.
pln_cr2_38_02.loc_text: Ship database. Should have... Got it! Comm frequency for the Moretta. This is it! Now find a radio. Let's call the Captain.

pln_cr2_38_03.base_text: And... Jackpot! Moretta specs including comm frequencies. Great work! Now look for the nearest radio, and let's talk to the Captain.
pln_cr2_38_03.loc_text: And... Jackpot! Moretta specs including comm frequencies. Great work! Now look for the nearest radio, and let's talk to the Captain.

pln_cr2_39_01.base_text: You can use the crowbar to open up shipping crates.
pln_cr2_39_01.loc_text: You can use the crowbar to open up shipping crates.

pln_cr2_39_02.base_text: That crowbar will be useful with all these shipping crates.
pln_cr2_39_02.loc_text: That crowbar will be useful with all these shipping crates.

pln_cr2_39_03.base_text: A crowbar. Good find. Always useful.
pln_cr2_39_03.loc_text: A crowbar. Good find. Always useful.

pln_cr2_40_01.base_text: Get on those terminals, gang. We need the comm frequency.
pln_cr2_40_01.loc_text: Get on those terminals, gang. We need the comm frequency.

pln_cr2_40_02.base_text: Need the Moretta's frequency, guys. Get searching terminals.
pln_cr2_40_02.loc_text: Need the Moretta's frequency, guys. Get searching terminals.

pln_cr2_40_03.base_text: Gonna need to call the Moretta, and for that we need the comm frequencies. Search for it.
pln_cr2_40_03.loc_text: Gonna need to call the Moretta, and for that we need the comm frequencies. Search for it.

pln_cr2_41_01.base_text: The gate has two control rooms. One on each side. This is the first.
pln_cr2_41_01.loc_text: The gate has two control rooms. One on each side. This is the first.

pln_cr2_41_02.base_text: This is the first control room for the gate. Other one is over the way there, see?
pln_cr2_41_02.loc_text: This is the first control room for the gate. Other one is over the way there, see?

pln_cr2_41_03.base_text: First control room. The other is across the dock. You see it?
pln_cr2_41_03.loc_text: First control room. The other is across the dock. You see it?

pln_cr2_42_01.base_text: And here's the second control room for the gate.
pln_cr2_42_01.loc_text: And here's the second control room for the gate.

pln_cr2_42_02.base_text: Here's the second control room. Between the two, we can open the gate.
pln_cr2_42_02.loc_text: Here's the second control room. Between the two, we can open the gate.

pln_cr2_42_03.base_text: Second control room. Controls the gate here. Other one is over the way, see?
pln_cr2_42_03.loc_text: Second control room. Controls the gate here. Other one is over the way, see?

pln_cr2_43_01.base_text: The train's ready for the cargo. Check the wagons. Probably loaded. Might find something worthwhile.
pln_cr2_43_01.loc_text: The train's ready for the cargo. Check the wagons. Probably loaded. Might find something worthwhile.

pln_cr2_43_02.base_text: These wagons might have something valuable in them. Maybe check them out?
pln_cr2_43_02.loc_text: These wagons might have something valuable in them. Maybe check them out?

pln_cr2_43_03.base_text: The wagons on the train might be loaded. And might have loot. Check 'em out?
pln_cr2_43_03.loc_text: The wagons on the train might be loaded. And might have loot. Check 'em out?

pln_cr2_44_01.base_text: It's the keycard, for all the good it will do you now. Might have helped us avoid the alarm, but stay focused!
pln_cr2_44_01.loc_text: It's the keycard, for all the good it will do you now. Might have helped us avoid the alarm, but stay focused!

pln_cr2_44_02.base_text: A keycard, but no damn good right now. Alarm's been sounded. Stay focused on the task.
pln_cr2_44_02.loc_text: A keycard, but no damn good right now. Alarm's been sounded. Stay focused on the task.

pln_cr2_44_03.base_text: Well, it's a keycard, and pretty damn useless now. Maybe if you'd found it earlier...
pln_cr2_44_03.loc_text: Well, it's a keycard, and pretty damn useless now. Maybe if you'd found it earlier...

pln_cr2_45_01.base_text: Now use those keycards to open the gate. Doesn't matter which does which.
pln_cr2_45_01.loc_text: Now use those keycards to open the gate. Doesn't matter which does which.

pln_cr2_45_02.base_text: Back to the dock. Each keycard will open a gate. One for each control.
pln_cr2_45_02.loc_text: Back to the dock. Each keycard will open a gate. One for each control.

pln_cr2_45_03.base_text: Now use the keycards on the dock gates. Let the Moretta out.
pln_cr2_45_03.loc_text: Now use the keycards on the dock gates. Let the Moretta out.

pln_cr2_46_01.base_text: Good. Now use the keycard on the panel in the other control room.
pln_cr2_46_01.loc_text: Good. Now use the keycard on the panel in the other control room.

pln_cr2_46_02.base_text: Now swipe the card on the panel in the other control room. Get that gate open.
pln_cr2_46_02.loc_text: Now swipe the card on the panel in the other control room. Get that gate open.

pln_cr2_46_03.base_text: Great. Now the second card in the other panel, and the Moretta will be free.
pln_cr2_46_03.loc_text: Great. Now the second card in the other panel, and the Moretta will be free.

pln_cr2_47_01.base_text: Remember to check inside the buildings for the remaining keycard.
pln_cr2_47_01.loc_text: Remember to check inside the buildings for the remaining keycard.

pln_cr2_47_02.base_text: Just one more keycard. Gotta be around here somewhere.
pln_cr2_47_02.loc_text: Just one more keycard. Gotta be around here somewhere.

pln_cr2_47_03.base_text: Second keycard can't be far. Gotta be nearby. Keep looking.
pln_cr2_47_03.loc_text: Second keycard can't be far. Gotta be nearby. Keep looking.

pln_cr2_48_01.base_text: Guys! Use the keycard in the dock control room. Get the dock gate open.
pln_cr2_48_01.loc_text: Guys! Use the keycard in the dock control room. Get the dock gate open.

pln_cr2_48_02.base_text: You can use that keycard in the control room. Just swipe it, open the dock.
pln_cr2_48_02.loc_text: You can use that keycard in the control room. Just swipe it, open the dock.

pln_cr2_48_03.base_text: That keycard opens the dock gate. Use it in the control room.
pln_cr2_48_03.loc_text: That keycard opens the dock gate. Use it in the control room.

pln_cr2_49_01.base_text: Guys! Use the keycards in the dock control rooms. Get the dock gate open.
pln_cr2_49_01.loc_text: Guys! Use the keycards in the dock control rooms. Get the dock gate open.

pln_cr2_49_02.base_text: You can use those keycards in the control rooms. Just swipe 'em, open the dock.
pln_cr2_49_02.loc_text: You can use those keycards in the control rooms. Just swipe 'em, open the dock.

pln_cr2_49_03.base_text: Them keycards open the dock gates. Use one in each control room.
pln_cr2_49_03.loc_text: Them keycards open the dock gates. Use one in each control room.

pln_cr2_50_01.base_text: You have to get off the gate before it will open. Health and safety bullshit!
pln_cr2_50_01.loc_text: You have to get off the gate before it will open. Health and safety bullshit!

pln_cr2_50_02.base_text: Gate won't open with you standing on it, genius. Clear the area!
pln_cr2_50_02.loc_text: Gate won't open with you standing on it, genius. Clear the area!

pln_cr2_50_03.base_text: Those gates are rigged to stay locked if someone's on them. So get off!
pln_cr2_50_03.loc_text: Those gates are rigged to stay locked if someone's on them. So get off!

pln_cr2_51_01.base_text: Alright, dock's opened. Now we gotta call the Moretta. Get her moving. Comm frequencies should be on one of the computers in the offices. Find it. I'll patch in and do the talking.
pln_cr2_51_01.loc_text: Alright, dock's opened. Now we gotta call the Moretta. Get her moving. Comm frequencies should be on one of the computers in the offices. Find it. I'll patch in and do the talking.

pln_cr2_51_02.base_text: Nice! Dock is opening. Next step: get the Moretta moving to her berth. I need to talk to her directly. Find me the comm frequency - most likely on a computer in the offices there. Find it.
pln_cr2_51_02.loc_text: Nice! Dock is opening. Next step: get the Moretta moving to her berth. I need to talk to her directly. Find me the comm frequency - most likely on a computer in the offices there. Find it.

pln_cr2_51_03.base_text: OK, the Moretta is free to move but we gotta convince the Captain. Find the comm frequencies. I'm betting one of the computers there has it. I'll convince the good Captain to fire up the engines.
pln_cr2_51_03.loc_text: OK, the Moretta is free to move but we gotta convince the Captain. Find the comm frequencies. I'm betting one of the computers there has it. I'll convince the good Captain to fire up the engines.

pln_cr2_52_01.base_text: That's it. Dock gate's opened. Now let's get the ship moving. We have the comm frequency. Just find the radio and patch me in.
pln_cr2_52_01.loc_text: That's it. Dock gate's opened. Now let's get the ship moving. We have the comm frequency. Just find the radio and patch me in.

pln_cr2_52_02.base_text: That's it for the gate. Now we just got to get the ship moving. That frequency you found earlier will do it. Find a radio and let me talk to the Moretta
pln_cr2_52_02.loc_text: That's it for the gate. Now we just got to get the ship moving. That frequency you found earlier will do it. Find a radio and let me talk to the Moretta

pln_cr2_52_03.base_text: Gate's are open. Great. Time to move the ship. I knew that comm frequency you found earlier would come in useful. Now just find a radio, and let me do the rest.
pln_cr2_52_03.loc_text: Gate's are open. Great. Time to move the ship. I knew that comm frequency you found earlier would come in useful. Now just find a radio, and let me do the rest.

pln_cr2_53_01.loc_text: Come on, gang. Patch me into the radio.

pln_cr2_53_02.base_text: Guys, patch into the radio. Let me speak to the Moretta.

pln_cr2_54_02.base_text: Find the computer. Send Moretta the GPS data.

pln_cr2_55_01.base_text: There's goes the alarm. And our stealth plan. Don't sweat it. The ship is moving.
pln_cr2_55_01.loc_text: There's goes the alarm. And our stealth plan. Don't sweat it. The ship is moving.

pln_cr2_55_02.base_text: The alarm! Stealth is out of the window, gang. But the ship is moving, and she ain't gonna stop now.
pln_cr2_55_02.loc_text: The alarm! Stealth is out of the window, gang. But the ship is moving, and she ain't gonna stop now.

pln_cr2_55_03.base_text: That's the alarm. Alright, weapons hot! Don't worry about the Moretta. She's moving and is gonna keep moving.
pln_cr2_55_03.loc_text: That's the alarm. Alright, weapons hot! Don't worry about the Moretta. She's moving and is gonna keep moving.

pln_cr2_56_01.base_text: Get ready, guys. Moretta's almost at her berth.
pln_cr2_56_01.loc_text: Get ready, guys. Moretta's almost at her berth.

pln_cr2_56_02.base_text: Stand by, gang. Moretta's almost berthed.
pln_cr2_56_02.loc_text: Stand by, gang. Moretta's almost berthed.

pln_cr2_57_01.loc_text: What are you waiting for? Get on the ship!

pln_cr2_57_02.loc_text: I don't want to keep someone who calls herself the Butcher waiting. Get onto the ship!

pln_cr2_57_03.loc_text: Moretta is berthed and ready for you, clowns.

pln_cr2_58_03.loc_text: The Butcher's explosives are in one of these containers.

pln_cr2_59_01.loc_text: Damn. They locked the containers when the alarm went off. Break through!

pln_cr2_59_02.loc_text: God damn it! They locked the containers! Must've been the alarms. Alright, we break through.

pln_cr2_61_01.loc_text: A case. Could be our girl's explosives. Check what's inside, now!

pln_cr2_63_01.loc_text: Here it is! Take the bomb parts to the drop-off point!

pln_cr2_66_02.loc_text: Still don't know you're there. Look for the keycard.

pln_cr2_66_03.base_text: You're keeping it quiet. Great. Remember - you need the keycard.

pln_cr2_68_03.base_text: No-one's seen you. Keep it that way. Now, the gate.

pln_cr2_71_03.base_text: Still in whisper mode. Good, good. Now find the computer.

pln_cr2_72_01.base_text: Ha, they still suspect nothing. Just stay careful while the ship is moving.
pln_cr2_72_01.loc_text: Ha, they still suspect nothing. Just stay careful while the ship is moving.

pln_cr2_72_02.base_text: And they still don't know you're there. Keep it that way while the Moretta docks.
pln_cr2_72_02.loc_text: And they still don't know you're there. Keep it that way while the Moretta docks.

pln_cr2_72_03.base_text: All's quiet still. Good work. Stay hidden while the Moretta docks.

pln_cr2_73_01.base_text: Still no alarms. Now get on the ship.
pln_cr2_73_01.loc_text: Still no alarms. Now get on the ship.

pln_cr2_73_02.base_text: All's still quiet. Keep it that way. Now board the ship.
pln_cr2_73_02.loc_text: All's still quiet. Keep it that way. Now board the ship.

pln_cr2_73_03.base_text: They still don't know you're there. Get on the ship. Keep it quiet.

pln_cr2_74_03.base_text: And still no-one knows you're there. Keep it that way. Find those explosives.

pln_cr2_75_01.base_text: They have no clue you are there. Now get out of there.
pln_cr2_75_01.loc_text: They have no clue you are there. Now get out of there.

pln_cr2_75_02.base_text: Now get out of there without triggering the alarm, and this is a perfect stealth job.

pln_cr2_76_01.base_text: There's the alarm and... Damn! Everything shut down. OK, forget the keycards. We're blowing the gate. I told you I had a plan B. Bile will drop the C4 charges for you, just light a flare to signal him where you want the C4 bag to be dropped.
pln_cr2_76_01.loc_text: There's the alarm and... Damn! Everything shut down. OK, forget the keycards. We're blowing the gate. I told you I had a plan B. Bile will drop the C4 charges for you, just light a flare to signal him where you want the C4 bag to be dropped.

pln_cr2_76_02.base_text: That's the alarm. Screw the keycards - we're blowing the gate. Bile is close by. Drop a signal flare, and he'll drop the C4.
pln_cr2_76_02.loc_text: That's the alarm. Screw the keycards - we're blowing the gate. Bile is close by. Drop a signal flare, and he'll drop the C4.

pln_cr2_76_03.base_text: Damn! It's the alarm. Well, this just got more straightforward. Forget keycards. We're blowing our way through. Light a flare and drop it. Bile will drop you some C4.

pln_cr3_38_01.base_text: Got a plane en route to pick you up, but it can't land with trees blocking it's path. Find a saw, clear the trees and mark the landing with flares. Don't worry, CIA been doing this for years.
pln_cr3_38_01.loc_text: Got a plane en route to pick you up, but it can't land with trees blocking it's path. Find a saw, clear the trees and mark the landing with flares. Don't worry, CIA been doing this for years.

pln_cr3_38_02.base_text: Sending a small plane to pick you up. Pilot can't land with those trees though. You gotta find a saw, clear a few and then mark the strip for him.
pln_cr3_38_02.loc_text: Sending a small plane to pick you up. Pilot can't land with those trees though. You gotta find a saw, clear a few and then mark the strip for him.

pln_cr3_38_03.base_text: Bile's on his way to you, but he can't land with those trees in the way. Find a saw, and clear a way for him, then mark it with flares.
pln_cr3_38_03.loc_text: Bile's on his way to you, but he can't land with those trees in the way. Find a saw, and clear a way for him, then mark it with flares.

pln_cr3_39_01.base_text: Find that saw! It has to be around here somewhere. Try looking around timber logs.
pln_cr3_39_01.loc_text: Find that saw! It has to be around here somewhere. Try looking around timber logs.

pln_cr3_39_02.base_text: Got to be a saw here somewhere. Check the timber logs.
pln_cr3_39_02.loc_text: Got to be a saw here somewhere. Check the timber logs.

pln_cr3_39_03.base_text: Look at all this timber. There's got to be a saw somewhere - keep looking.
pln_cr3_39_03.loc_text: Look at all this timber. There's got to be a saw somewhere - keep looking.

pln_cr3_40_01.base_text: You found it! Time to bring some trees down!
pln_cr3_40_01.loc_text: You found it! Time to bring some trees down!

pln_cr3_40_02.base_text: Great! Now get it working on those trees!
pln_cr3_40_02.loc_text: Great! Now get it working on those trees!

pln_cr3_40_03.base_text: Fantastic! No time to lose, though. Fire it up and get felling those trees.
pln_cr3_40_03.loc_text: Fantastic! No time to lose, though. Fire it up and get felling those trees.

pln_cr3_41_02.base_text: Clear the path. Clear the trees!
pln_cr3_41_02.loc_text: Clear the path. Clear the trees!

pln_cr3_42_01.base_text: The plane is close. Mark the landing strip with flares.
pln_cr3_42_01.loc_text: The plane is close. Mark the landing strip with flares.

pln_cr3_42_02.base_text: Plane's nearly there. Pop the flares and mark the strip.
pln_cr3_42_02.loc_text: Plane's nearly there. Pop the flares and mark the strip.

pln_cr3_43_02.base_text: Good. Your ride is coming down now.
pln_cr3_43_02.loc_text: Good. Your ride is coming down now.

pln_cr3_44_01.base_text: Touch down! Now load the plane with loot!
pln_cr3_44_01.loc_text: Touch down! Now load the plane with loot!

pln_cr3_44_02.base_text: Plane is on the ground. Now get the loot into it.
pln_cr3_44_02.loc_text: Plane is on the ground. Now get the loot into it.

pln_cr3_45_01.base_text: The chopper is en-route. Hold on, guys.
pln_cr3_45_01.loc_text: The chopper is en-route. Hold on, guys.

pln_cr3_45_02.base_text: Chopper's nearly there. Just hold on!
pln_cr3_45_02.loc_text: Chopper's nearly there. Just hold on!

pln_cr3_46_01.base_text: Almost there. You should be able to hear it.
pln_cr3_46_01.loc_text: Almost there. You should be able to hear it.

pln_cr3_46_02.base_text: Chopper's right on top of you. Can you see it?
pln_cr3_46_02.loc_text: Chopper's right on top of you. Can you see it?

pln_cr3_47_01.base_text: Chopper is down. Get the loot in, and get out!
pln_cr3_47_01.loc_text: Chopper is down. Get the loot in, and get out!

pln_cr3_47_02.base_text: The chopper's there, guys. Stow the loot and bug out!
pln_cr3_47_02.loc_text: The chopper's there, guys. Stow the loot and bug out!

pln_cr3_48_01.base_text: One of 'em contains the vault. Find it.
pln_cr3_48_01.loc_text: One of 'em contains the vault. Find it.

pln_cr3_49_01.base_text: Briefcase with high-temperature thermite paste will be waiting for you here.
pln_cr3_49_01.loc_text: Briefcase with high-temperature thermite paste will be waiting for you here.

pln_cr3_50_01.base_text: Industrial, high-pressure water pump used by nearby timber mill. If we're lucky, and the right wagon lands near it, we can use it to fill the vault.
pln_cr3_50_01.loc_text: Industrial, high-pressure water pump used by nearby timber mill. If we're lucky, and the right wagon lands near it, we can use it to fill the vault.

pln_cr3_51_01.base_text: Now dip that charge in and stand back!
pln_cr3_51_01.loc_text: Now dip that charge in and stand back!

pln_cr3_51_02.base_text: Get the C4 in there, and get ready!
pln_cr3_51_02.loc_text: Get the C4 in there, and get ready!

pln_cr3_52_01.base_text: We're almost there, gang. It's filling up nicely! Just keep things going a little more. Once it's full, we rig it and enjoy the show!
pln_cr3_52_01.loc_text: We're almost there, gang. It's filling up nicely! Just keep things going a little more. Once it's full, we rig it and enjoy the show!

pln_cr3_52_02.base_text: It's filling up fast, crew. Just keep it going. When it's full, plant the charge and enjoy the show.
pln_cr3_52_02.loc_text: It's filling up fast, crew. Just keep it going. When it's full, plant the charge and enjoy the show.

pln_cr3_52_03.base_text: Keep the water flowing, gang. Just a little more. Then just rig it, and let hydrodynamics do its job.
pln_cr3_52_03.loc_text: Keep the water flowing, gang. Just a little more. Then just rig it, and let hydrodynamics do its job.

pln_cr3_53_01.base_text: What's the hold-up?! Get that hose re-attached already!
pln_cr3_53_01.loc_text: What's the hold-up?! Get that hose re-attached already!

pln_cr3_53_02.base_text: The hose won't fix itself. One of you clowns get it done!
pln_cr3_53_02.loc_text: The hose won't fix itself. One of you clowns get it done!

pln_cr3_53_03.base_text: You need to get that hose reconnected, guys. Come on!
pln_cr3_53_03.loc_text: You need to get that hose reconnected, guys. Come on!

pln_cr3_54_01.base_text: Pump's done! Vault is full and ready for blasting!
pln_cr3_54_01.loc_text: Pump's done! Vault is full and ready for blasting!

pln_cr3_54_02.base_text: That's the pump done. Great work!.
pln_cr3_54_02.loc_text: That's the pump done. Great work!.

pln_cr3_54_03.base_text: Pump's finished. That wagon is bloated and ready! Nicely done.
pln_cr3_54_03.loc_text: Pump's finished. That wagon is bloated and ready! Nicely done.

pln_cr3_55_01.base_text: Wagon's not gonna crack itself open. Dip that C4 in!
pln_cr3_55_01.loc_text: Wagon's not gonna crack itself open. Dip that C4 in!

pln_cr3_55_02.base_text: Come on, we watched the show and you know how to do it. Set the C4!
pln_cr3_55_02.loc_text: Come on, we watched the show and you know how to do it. Set the C4!

pln_cr3_55_03.base_text: All that wagon is waiting for is a nice bit of C4. Get to it!
pln_cr3_55_03.loc_text: All that wagon is waiting for is a nice bit of C4. Get to it!

pln_cr3_intro_01_01.base_text: Oh... Wow. Hope those wagons survived.
pln_cr3_intro_01_01.loc_text: Oh... Wow. Hope those wagons survived.

pln_cs1_01_01.base_text: There'll be a couple of keycards out there, maybe in the trunks of cars. They'll help you get silent access to the vault. Or you can forget that Mission Impossible crap and unleash Ragnarok. Up to you.
pln_cs1_01_01.loc_text: There'll be a couple of keycards out there, maybe in the trunks of cars. They'll help you get silent access to the vault. Or you can forget that Mission Impossible crap and unleash Ragnarok. Up to you.

pln_cs1_01_02.base_text: Two ways to go about this, gentlemen. Go loud - you know how to do that. But if you're hoping to raise your game, look for two keycards and unlock the vault. Car trunks are a good place to look.
pln_cs1_01_02.loc_text: Two ways to go about this, gentlemen. Go loud - you know how to do that. But if you're hoping to raise your game, look for two keycards and unlock the vault. Car trunks are a good place to look.

pln_cs1_01_03.base_text: You can try finding vault keycards, two of them, if you want to sneak this place. Maybe in the trunks. Or go loud - it's your choice.
pln_cs1_01_03.loc_text: You can try finding vault keycards, two of them, if you want to sneak this place. Maybe in the trunks. Or go loud - it's your choice.

pln_cs1_02_01.base_text: That's one of the keycards for the vault, but you need another. Keep looking.
pln_cs1_02_01.loc_text: That's one of the keycards for the vault, but you need another. Keep looking.

pln_cs1_02_02.base_text: You got one of the keycards, now find the other one.
pln_cs1_02_02.loc_text: You got one of the keycards, now find the other one.

pln_cs1_02_03.base_text: Thats one keycard, we need two - keep looking.
pln_cs1_02_03.loc_text: Thats one keycard, we need two - keep looking.

pln_cs1_03_01.base_text: That's both of the keycards. Alright, get to the vault and get them to work.
pln_cs1_03_01.loc_text: That's both of the keycards. Alright, get to the vault and get them to work.

pln_cs1_03_02.base_text: Alright, thats both keycards. Let's open that vault up.
pln_cs1_03_02.loc_text: Alright, thats both keycards. Let's open that vault up.

pln_cs1_03_03.base_text: Great, two keycards. That's what we need. Get to work and open that vault.
pln_cs1_03_03.loc_text: Great, two keycards. That's what we need. Get to work and open that vault.

pln_cs1_04_01.base_text: Green lights. Now let the time lock run down, and it'll open like a summer flower, and you bees can get busy with the honey.
pln_cs1_04_01.loc_text: Green lights. Now let the time lock run down, and it'll open like a summer flower, and you bees can get busy with the honey.

pln_cs1_04_02.base_text: There we go - green lights. Let the time lock do it's thing. I'd love to see the managers face when those doors swing wide open.
pln_cs1_04_02.loc_text: There we go - green lights. Let the time lock do it's thing. I'd love to see the managers face when those doors swing wide open.

pln_cs1_04_03.base_text: Great. Now just wait for that time lock to run down. So far this is textbook stuff. Be ready to bag the cash when it opens.
pln_cs1_04_03.loc_text: Great. Now just wait for that time lock to run down. So far this is textbook stuff. Be ready to bag the cash when it opens.

pln_cs1_05_01.base_text: There it goes. The vault is open. It's all yours, gang.
pln_cs1_05_01.loc_text: There it goes. The vault is open. It's all yours, gang.

pln_cs1_05_02.base_text: There we go! Vault is open. Get to work on bagging that cash!
pln_cs1_05_02.loc_text: There we go! Vault is open. Get to work on bagging that cash!

pln_cs1_05_03.base_text: Vault's opening. Get in there! Bag that cash!
pln_cs1_05_03.loc_text: Vault's opening. Get in there! Bag that cash!

pln_cs1_06_01.base_text: OK, great! Get that sack of cash to the van.
pln_cs1_06_01.loc_text: OK, great! Get that sack of cash to the van.

pln_cs1_06_02.base_text: Piles of green! Thats why we're in this business, gang.
pln_cs1_06_02.loc_text: Piles of green! Thats why we're in this business, gang.

pln_cs1_06_03.base_text: Beautiful stacks of unmarked Benjamins. Just reward for an honest heister.
pln_cs1_06_03.loc_text: Beautiful stacks of unmarked Benjamins. Just reward for an honest heister.

pln_cs1_07_01.base_text: Bag of cash, great. But let's pay off that asshole first. Yellow wall by the auto-repair shop. Don't worry, we'll find and deal with him later.
pln_cs1_07_01.loc_text: Bag of cash, great. But let's pay off that asshole first. Yellow wall by the auto-repair shop. Don't worry, we'll find and deal with him later.

pln_cs1_07_02.base_text: Don't make plans for that cash just yet. Remember we need to get it to the blackmailing asshole first. Don't worry, we'll find him.
pln_cs1_07_02.loc_text: Don't make plans for that cash just yet. Remember we need to get it to the blackmailing asshole first. Don't worry, we'll find him.

pln_cs1_07_03.base_text: That's the cash. Remember, unless you want the cops there, get a bag over the yellow wall. Don't worry - that blackmailing asswipe will get what's coming to him.
pln_cs1_07_03.loc_text: That's the cash. Remember, unless you want the cops there, get a bag over the yellow wall. Don't worry - that blackmailing asswipe will get what's coming to him.

pln_cs1_08_01.base_text: Alright, that's our blackmailer dealt with. Let's hustle those other bags, before he gets greedy.
pln_cs1_08_01.loc_text: Alright, that's our blackmailer dealt with. Let's hustle those other bags, before he gets greedy.

pln_cs1_08_02.base_text: That's that sneaky bastard dealt with. Let's finish up fast. He may want more.
pln_cs1_08_02.loc_text: That's that sneaky bastard dealt with. Let's finish up fast. He may want more.

pln_cs1_08_03.base_text: Well, easy money for him. Put it out of your mind. Keep going, gang.
pln_cs1_08_03.loc_text: Well, easy money for him. Put it out of your mind. Keep going, gang.

pln_cs1_09_01.base_text: That's enough bags to make this worthwhile. Great work.
pln_cs1_09_01.loc_text: That's enough bags to make this worthwhile. Great work.

pln_cs1_09_02.base_text: A great haul, gang. Another top job.
pln_cs1_09_02.loc_text: A great haul, gang. Another top job.

pln_cs1_09_03.base_text: Good job boys. That's enough to call this one a success.
pln_cs1_09_03.loc_text: Good job boys. That's enough to call this one a success.

pln_cs1_100_01.base_text: The sewer entrance is near Jimbos, that auto chop shop. Keep your heads down.
pln_cs1_100_01.loc_text: The sewer entrance is near Jimbos, that auto chop shop. Keep your heads down.

pln_cs1_101_01.base_text: Hold them off while I find the best way out for you guys.
pln_cs1_101_01.loc_text: Hold them off while I find the best way out for you guys.

pln_cs1_101_02.base_text: Just hold them off a little longer, gang. I'm finding you a way out.
pln_cs1_101_02.loc_text: Just hold them off a little longer, gang. I'm finding you a way out.

pln_cs1_101_03.base_text: Stand by, gang. Organizing an exit. Hold the line!
pln_cs1_101_03.loc_text: Stand by, gang. Organizing an exit. Hold the line!

pln_cs1_102_01.base_text: You have a small army on the - no, wait, you have the Army on its way. The van can't wait. Hustle!
pln_cs1_102_01.loc_text: You have a small army on the - no, wait, you have the Army on its way. The van can't wait. Hustle!

pln_cs1_102_02.base_text: They've really opened the valve. The van can't wait forever. You need to book it, now!
pln_cs1_102_02.loc_text: They've really opened the valve. The van can't wait forever. You need to book it, now!

pln_cs1_102_03.base_text: Uh, gang, we have a LOT of firepower rolling your way. You need to get to the van right now!
pln_cs1_102_03.loc_text: Uh, gang, we have a LOT of firepower rolling your way. You need to get to the van right now!

pln_cs1_103_01.base_text: Keep it cool. Keep it under control, gang.
pln_cs1_103_01.loc_text: Keep it cool. Keep it under control, gang.

pln_cs1_103_02.base_text: Watch for cameras. Don't let them see you.
pln_cs1_103_02.loc_text: Watch for cameras. Don't let them see you.

pln_cs1_103_03.base_text: There must be keycards around the place. They can help you get in quiet.
pln_cs1_103_03.loc_text: There must be keycards around the place. They can help you get in quiet.

pln_cs1_103_04.base_text: Control the crowd, guys. Keep the people down.
pln_cs1_103_04.loc_text: Control the crowd, guys. Keep the people down.

pln_cs1_103_05.base_text: This place will have cameras. Be careful.
pln_cs1_103_05.loc_text: This place will have cameras. Be careful.

pln_cs1_103_06.base_text: Keep the people down. Keep them quiet.
pln_cs1_103_06.loc_text: Keep the people down. Keep them quiet.

pln_cs1_103_07.base_text: You're doing great. Keep everything nice and quiet.
pln_cs1_103_07.loc_text: You're doing great. Keep everything nice and quiet.

pln_cs1_104_01.base_text: We need that vault open. Quiet with keycards, or bust it open with a drill.
pln_cs1_104_01.loc_text: We need that vault open. Quiet with keycards, or bust it open with a drill.

pln_cs1_104_02.base_text: The vault, gang. It has the deposit boxes, and they have the money.
pln_cs1_104_02.loc_text: The vault, gang. It has the deposit boxes, and they have the money.

pln_cs1_105_01.base_text: You need to get that cage set up.
pln_cs1_105_01.loc_text: You need to get that cage set up.

pln_cs1_105_02.base_text: The cage is how we get the money out, gang. Get it built.
pln_cs1_105_02.loc_text: The cage is how we get the money out, gang. Get it built.

pln_cs1_106_01.base_text: The cage is ready. When you're ready for the plane, send up that balloon.
pln_cs1_106_01.loc_text: The cage is ready. When you're ready for the plane, send up that balloon.

pln_cs1_106_02.base_text: The balloon needs to be sent up. Do it when you're ready to get the money out.
pln_cs1_106_02.loc_text: The balloon needs to be sent up. Do it when you're ready to get the money out.

pln_cs1_107_01.base_text: That's one of the cards for the vault. Remember, once you have used it, you'll need to find another.
pln_cs1_107_01.loc_text: That's one of the cards for the vault. Remember, once you have used it, you'll need to find another.

pln_cs1_107_02.base_text: Vault keycard. It gets half the job done. Swipe it in the reader, and then track down the second card.
pln_cs1_107_02.loc_text: Vault keycard. It gets half the job done. Swipe it in the reader, and then track down the second card.

pln_cs1_107_03.base_text: Keycard. Great. You need to use it on the vault, but that's only half of it. Swipe it, and then hunt down the second card.
pln_cs1_107_03.loc_text: Keycard. Great. You need to use it on the vault, but that's only half of it. Swipe it, and then hunt down the second card.

pln_cs1_108_01.base_text: Halfway there. Find the other card, and swipe it.
pln_cs1_108_01.loc_text: Halfway there. Find the other card, and swipe it.

pln_cs1_108_02.base_text: That's one card entered, but the vault needs two. Keep looking.
pln_cs1_108_02.loc_text: That's one card entered, but the vault needs two. Keep looking.

pln_cs1_108_03.base_text: Job's half done. Find the second keycard and you can walk into the vault.
pln_cs1_108_03.loc_text: Job's half done. Find the second keycard and you can walk into the vault.

pln_cs1_109_01.base_text: You need to keep an eye on that cage. The cops can lift the bags right out of there.
pln_cs1_109_01.loc_text: You need to keep an eye on that cage. The cops can lift the bags right out of there.

pln_cs1_109_02.base_text: Protect the cage. These cops have no respect for your honest work and can take the bags.
pln_cs1_109_02.loc_text: Protect the cage. These cops have no respect for your honest work and can take the bags.

pln_cs1_109_03.base_text: Don't let the cops near the cage. Those sneaky bastards can walk off with your hard-earned cash.
pln_cs1_109_03.loc_text: Don't let the cops near the cage. Those sneaky bastards can walk off with your hard-earned cash.

pln_cs1_10_01.base_text: There's a thermal drill nearby. Go get it.
pln_cs1_10_01.loc_text: There's a thermal drill nearby. Go get it.

pln_cs1_10_02.base_text: Remember to go grab the thermal drill.
pln_cs1_10_02.loc_text: Remember to go grab the thermal drill.

pln_cs1_10_03.base_text: There's a thermal drill at the gas station. Fetch it.
pln_cs1_10_03.loc_text: There's a thermal drill at the gas station. Fetch it.

pln_cs1_110_01.base_text: The van's got to bug out, but the driver dropped a thermal drill. That's the only way into the vault now.
pln_cs1_110_01.loc_text: The van's got to bug out, but the driver dropped a thermal drill. That's the only way into the vault now.

pln_cs1_110_02.base_text: Your driver had to bail. He left behind a drill. Get it, and use it on the vault.
pln_cs1_110_02.loc_text: Your driver had to bail. He left behind a drill. Get it, and use it on the vault.

pln_cs1_110_03.base_text: There goes your driver. He's left a drill behind. Get it, and keep working!
pln_cs1_110_03.loc_text: There goes your driver. He's left a drill behind. Get it, and keep working!

pln_cs1_111_01.base_text: Dammit! The plane snagged the cage but there was no goddamn cash. You guys need to pick it up and haul it out.
pln_cs1_111_01.loc_text: Dammit! The plane snagged the cage but there was no goddamn cash. You guys need to pick it up and haul it out.

pln_cs1_111_02.base_text: Ah! The cage was empty. Did you let the cops snag it back? Nevermind. You guys are just gonna have to mule it out the old-fashioned way.
pln_cs1_111_02.loc_text: Ah! The cage was empty. Did you let the cops snag it back? Nevermind. You guys are just gonna have to mule it out the old-fashioned way.

pln_cs1_111_03.base_text: Plane got the cage, but it was empty. Damn! Alright, no matter. Carry the bags out instead.
pln_cs1_111_03.loc_text: Plane got the cage, but it was empty. Damn! Alright, no matter. Carry the bags out instead.

pln_cs1_112_03.base_text: You need to haul those bags out of there.
pln_cs1_112_03.loc_text: You need to haul those bags out of there.

pln_cs1_113_01.base_text: You guys got lucky. The vault's already open!
pln_cs1_113_01.loc_text: You guys got lucky. The vault's already open!

pln_cs1_113_02.base_text: Oh man, the vault is already open. Thank you, Mr Manager, for being so accommodating.
pln_cs1_113_02.loc_text: Oh man, the vault is already open. Thank you, Mr Manager, for being so accommodating.

pln_cs1_113_03.base_text: Vault is open. New plan. Just stroll in and get to work. Easy money!
pln_cs1_113_03.loc_text: Vault is open. New plan. Just stroll in and get to work. Easy money!

pln_cs1_114_01.base_text: Uh... Yeah... Their radios aren't working. Sunspot activity.
pln_cs1_114_01.loc_text: Uh... Yeah... Their radios aren't working. Sunspot activity.

pln_cs1_115_01.base_text: Come on, guys, hustle it. You need to move fast to pull this off.
pln_cs1_115_01.loc_text: Come on, guys, hustle it. You need to move fast to pull this off.

pln_cs1_116_01.base_text: You got one minute til that Captain raises the alarm.
pln_cs1_116_01.loc_text: You got one minute til that Captain raises the alarm.

pln_cs1_117_01.base_text: Guys, hurry up! He's gonna sound the alarm in thirty seconds.
pln_cs1_117_01.loc_text: Guys, hurry up! He's gonna sound the alarm in thirty seconds.

pln_cs1_118_01.base_text: The vault is protected by a laser gate, but no matter. You know what to do. Watch its sequence and time your run through.
pln_cs1_118_01.loc_text: The vault is protected by a laser gate, but no matter. You know what to do. Watch its sequence and time your run through.

pln_cs1_118_02.base_text: A laser gate! That was unexpected. Touching that will set off their alarm. Watch the cycle, wait for it to blink off, and then run through.
pln_cs1_118_02.loc_text: A laser gate! That was unexpected. Touching that will set off their alarm. Watch the cycle, wait for it to blink off, and then run through.

pln_cs1_118_03.base_text: Goddammit, a laser gate. We've dealt with these before. Just wait for it to flicker off, and then dash through.
pln_cs1_118_03.loc_text: Goddammit, a laser gate. We've dealt with these before. Just wait for it to flicker off, and then dash through.

pln_cs1_119_01.base_text: Thank you for your call. Roberts appreciates the chance to talk to you.

pln_cs1_31_02.loc_text: You found the exit, but it's not ready yet. You need to go back and secure the cash.

pln_cs1_33_02.loc_text: That's the alarm. No more tip-toeing, gang. It's all about speed and violence now.

pln_cs1_33_03.loc_text: Crap, that's the alarm. Alright, gang - time to go loud.

pln_cs1_34_01.loc_text: Well, so much for stealth. But the job's half done. Just get that money out of there.

pln_cs1_38_01.loc_text: Goddamn it! We want that cage on the roof. It's the most defensible spot around.

pln_cs1_38_02.base_text: Do as you're told, goddamn it! I can shut down every airport for a thousand miles and have you ditched in the ocean, you spineless turd. Over.
pln_cs1_38_02.loc_text: Do as you're told, goddamn it! I can shut down every airport for a thousand miles and have you ditched in the ocean, you spineless turd. Over.

pln_cs1_42_02.loc_text: This is Mortimer. At the bank. Your money is safe. Now, how can I help you?

pln_cs1_42_03.base_text: Uh, everything is fine. This is the bank. What do you want?
pln_cs1_42_03.loc_text: Uh, everything is fine. This is the bank. What do you want?

pln_cs1_43_02.loc_text: I'm putting you through to our CEO. Please hold.

pln_cs1_44_01.base_text: Uh, Barney's not available right now. Can I take a message?
pln_cs1_44_01.loc_text: Uh, Barney's not available right now. Can I take a message?

pln_cs1_45_01.base_text: Yeah, tell him his ass is on the line if he isn't available for the regular time-lock check in.
pln_cs1_45_01.loc_text: Yeah, tell him his ass is on the line if he isn't available for the regular time-lock check in.

pln_cs1_46_01.base_text: Right. He got called in to a meeting with a big account. He's doing a great job.
pln_cs1_46_01.loc_text: Right. He got called in to a meeting with a big account. He's doing a great job.

pln_cs1_47_01.loc_text: Uh, sorry, this is my first day, what do you need?

pln_cs1_48_01.base_text: No. Uh, just give me a second...

pln_cs1_49_01.base_text: Gang. Gensec need the time lock codes. I'll stall them as long as I can. Can you see them?
pln_cs1_49_01.loc_text: Gang. Gensec need the time lock codes. I'll stall them as long as I can. Can you see them?

pln_cs1_49_02.base_text: Can any of you see the time lock codes. I can't stall them for long.
pln_cs1_49_02.loc_text: Can any of you see the time lock codes. I can't stall them for long.

pln_cs1_49_03.base_text: Look around. The codes must be written somewhere. I can't stall them forever!
pln_cs1_49_03.loc_text: Look around. The codes must be written somewhere. I can't stall them forever!

pln_cs1_50_01.base_text: Today's code is 559732. Sorry it took so long.
pln_cs1_50_01.loc_text: Today's code is 559732. Sorry it took so long.

pln_cs1_50_02.base_text: Ah, here we are. Right in front of me. 674523.
pln_cs1_50_02.loc_text: Ah, here we are. Right in front of me. 674523.

pln_cs1_51_01.base_text: They must be around here somewhere. One minute...
pln_cs1_51_01.loc_text: They must be around here somewhere. One minute...

pln_cs1_51_02.base_text: I got it! Oh, wait... No, you said time lock code? For the vault? One second...
pln_cs1_51_02.loc_text: I got it! Oh, wait... No, you said time lock code? For the vault? One second...

pln_cs1_51_03.base_text: It's got to be among these papers. Let's see. This is a B7040, that's not it. A FU5000. No, let me keep looking...
pln_cs1_51_03.loc_text: It's got to be among these papers. Let's see. This is a B7040, that's not it. A FU5000. No, let me keep looking...

pln_cs1_52_01.base_text: Boring conversation anyway. Gang, we're going to have company!
pln_cs1_52_01.loc_text: Boring conversation anyway. Gang, we're going to have company!

pln_cs1_52_02.base_text: Damn. Should have told him the code was kiss your own ass. Get ready.
pln_cs1_52_02.loc_text: Damn. Should have told him the code was kiss your own ass. Get ready.

pln_cs1_53_01.base_text: I guess we better do what the little hood rat bastard says. It's tough to be a criminal in a town as rotten as this.
pln_cs1_53_01.loc_text: I guess we better do what the little hood rat bastard says. It's tough to be a criminal in a town as rotten as this.

pln_cs1_53_02.base_text: What sort of world do we live in where a rat bastard like that makes demands on honest, upstanding badasses like you. But better do as he asks.
pln_cs1_53_02.loc_text: What sort of world do we live in where a rat bastard like that makes demands on honest, upstanding badasses like you. But better do as he asks.

pln_cs1_53_03.base_text: I hate blackmailers. Do as he says. We'll find that asshole soon enough.
pln_cs1_53_03.loc_text: I hate blackmailers. Do as he says. We'll find that asshole soon enough.

pln_cs1_54_01.base_text: Time lock has started. Should be about four minutes.
pln_cs1_54_01.loc_text: Time lock has started. Should be about four minutes.

pln_cs1_56_01.base_text: Alright, one more minute til the time lock opens the vault.
pln_cs1_56_01.loc_text: Alright, one more minute til the time lock opens the vault.

pln_cs1_57_01.base_text: Almost there, gang. Any second now.
pln_cs1_57_01.loc_text: Almost there, gang. Any second now.

pln_cs1_58_01.base_text: And there goes the escape driver. Keep going. I'll figure something out.
pln_cs1_58_01.loc_text: And there goes the escape driver. Keep going. I'll figure something out.

pln_cs1_59_01.base_text: Remember to keep an eye on any bags in the cage. Cops can still snatch them.
pln_cs1_59_01.loc_text: Remember to keep an eye on any bags in the cage. Cops can still snatch them.

pln_cs1_60_01.base_text: One of you guys answer the phone and patch me through.
pln_cs1_60_01.loc_text: One of you guys answer the phone and patch me through.

pln_cs1_60_03.base_text: One of you guys pick up the phone!
pln_cs1_60_03.loc_text: One of you guys pick up the phone!

pln_cs1_61_01.base_text: Shooters on the roof. Watch out!
pln_cs1_61_01.loc_text: Shooters on the roof. Watch out!

pln_cs1_62_01.base_text: We got hostiles scaling the wall by the gas station.
pln_cs1_62_01.loc_text: We got hostiles scaling the wall by the gas station.

pln_cs1_63_01.base_text: Multiple hostiles entering by the street.
pln_cs1_63_01.loc_text: Multiple hostiles entering by the street.

pln_cs1_64_01.base_text: They're trying to flank you at the parking lot.
pln_cs1_64_01.loc_text: They're trying to flank you at the parking lot.

pln_cs1_65_01.base_text: Thought it would take longer for them to react, but we got cops on the scene.
pln_cs1_65_01.loc_text: Thought it would take longer for them to react, but we got cops on the scene.

pln_cs1_65_02.base_text: You're going to have DC's finest crawling up your ass. Cops on the scene.
pln_cs1_65_02.loc_text: You're going to have DC's finest crawling up your ass. Cops on the scene.

pln_cs1_66_01.base_text: Crap. That's Gensec. Get ready to deal with them.
pln_cs1_66_01.loc_text: Crap. That's Gensec. Get ready to deal with them.

pln_cs1_66_02.base_text: Gensec on the scene. You've bloodied their noses before, prepare to do it again.
pln_cs1_66_02.loc_text: Gensec on the scene. You've bloodied their noses before, prepare to do it again.

pln_cs1_67_01.base_text: What are you guys doing down there? Look for the light.
pln_cs1_67_01.loc_text: What are you guys doing down there? Look for the light.

pln_cs1_67_02.base_text: You guys are seriously in the wrong place if you're looking for extra loot. Get out of there.
pln_cs1_67_02.loc_text: You guys are seriously in the wrong place if you're looking for extra loot. Get out of there.

pln_cs1_68_01.base_text: It's the Feds! What the hell! They were waiting for us!
pln_cs1_68_01.loc_text: It's the Feds! What the hell! They were waiting for us!

pln_cs1_68_02.base_text: It's a trap! They were just waiting for us.
pln_cs1_68_02.loc_text: It's a trap! They were just waiting for us.

pln_cs1_69_01.base_text: Just saw another civilian stroll into the street. Deal with them.
pln_cs1_69_01.loc_text: Just saw another civilian stroll into the street. Deal with them.

pln_cs1_69_02.base_text: Another civvie on the scene. Make sure they don't call the cops.
pln_cs1_69_02.loc_text: Another civvie on the scene. Make sure they don't call the cops.

pln_cs1_70_01.base_text: Great job, gang. The escape van is ready for you.
pln_cs1_70_01.loc_text: Great job, gang. The escape van is ready for you.

pln_cs1_71_01.base_text: Good job, gang. Get up the ladder and get out of there.
pln_cs1_71_01.loc_text: Good job, gang. Get up the ladder and get out of there.

pln_cs1_72_01.base_text: Looks like we caught Gensec. Hopefully they're dropping off. They might have a keycard. Get at them.
pln_cs1_72_01.loc_text: Looks like we caught Gensec. Hopefully they're dropping off. They might have a keycard. Get at them.

pln_cs1_72_02.base_text: Gang, Gensec truck. Hey, it might be carrying a keycard. You know what to do. Get at them.
pln_cs1_72_02.loc_text: Gang, Gensec truck. Hey, it might be carrying a keycard. You know what to do. Get at them.

pln_cs1_72_03.base_text: The Gensec truck's a bonus. A keycard in it would be a sweeter bonus.
pln_cs1_72_03.loc_text: The Gensec truck's a bonus. A keycard in it would be a sweeter bonus.

pln_cs1_73_01.base_text: What the hell. They're deploying tripmines in the parking lot! Deal with it before they close it off.
pln_cs1_73_01.loc_text: What the hell. They're deploying tripmines in the parking lot! Deal with it before they close it off.

pln_cs1_73_02.base_text: This is a new tactic. I'm seeing cops placing tripmines in the parking lot. Don't let them get that shit set up.
pln_cs1_73_02.loc_text: This is a new tactic. I'm seeing cops placing tripmines in the parking lot. Don't let them get that shit set up.

pln_cs1_73_03.base_text: They're mining the goddamn parking lot, guys! Be careful out there.
pln_cs1_73_03.loc_text: They're mining the goddamn parking lot, guys! Be careful out there.

pln_cs1_74_01.base_text: They're dropping off guys on the roof. Get up there and deal with 'em.
pln_cs1_74_01.loc_text: They're dropping off guys on the roof. Get up there and deal with 'em.

pln_cs1_74_02.base_text: The chopper is deplying to the roof. Be careful!
pln_cs1_74_02.loc_text: The chopper is deplying to the roof. Be careful!

pln_cs1_74_03.base_text: Guys rappelling from that chopper to the roof. Get at them!
pln_cs1_74_03.loc_text: Guys rappelling from that chopper to the roof. Get at them!

pln_cs1_75_01.base_text: Gang, that's a heavy SWAT van that just rocked up. Be ready.
pln_cs1_75_01.loc_text: Gang, that's a heavy SWAT van that just rocked up. Be ready.

pln_cs1_75_02.base_text: SWAT have sent a heavy truck. They're taking this seriously. Knuckle down.
pln_cs1_75_02.loc_text: SWAT have sent a heavy truck. They're taking this seriously. Knuckle down.

pln_cs1_75_03.base_text: That's the heaviest truck the cops have got, so expect their best shot.
pln_cs1_75_03.loc_text: That's the heaviest truck the cops have got, so expect their best shot.

pln_cs1_76_01.base_text: SWAT's have deployed to the adjacent roofs, so watch the crossfire.
pln_cs1_76_01.loc_text: SWAT's have deployed to the adjacent roofs, so watch the crossfire.

pln_cs1_76_02.base_text: SWAT's on the roofs, guys. Don't let them get dug in.
pln_cs1_76_02.loc_text: SWAT's on the roofs, guys. Don't let them get dug in.

pln_cs1_76_03.base_text: We have SWAT on the adjacent roofs. Dig them out.
pln_cs1_76_03.loc_text: We have SWAT on the adjacent roofs. Dig them out.

pln_cs1_77_01.base_text: Alright. The cage is put together. But it's empty. Get it filled!
pln_cs1_77_01.loc_text: Alright. The cage is put together. But it's empty. Get it filled!

pln_cs1_77_02.base_text: Good job assembling the cage. Can you do as good filling it?
pln_cs1_77_02.loc_text: Good job assembling the cage. Can you do as good filling it?

pln_cs1_77_03.base_text: The cage is assembled. Great! Now start filling it with bags of Benjamins.
pln_cs1_77_03.loc_text: The cage is assembled. Great! Now start filling it with bags of Benjamins.

pln_cs1_78_01.base_text: Don't stand around. Start working on those deposit boxes.
pln_cs1_78_01.loc_text: Don't stand around. Start working on those deposit boxes.

pln_cs1_78_02.base_text: You'll stand a good chance if some guys provide cover, while others work on those boxes.
pln_cs1_78_02.loc_text: You'll stand a good chance if some guys provide cover, while others work on those boxes.

pln_cs1_78_03.base_text: The deposit boxes are a bit of a lottery, but I know there is a lot of cash here. Find it, and bag it.
pln_cs1_78_03.loc_text: The deposit boxes are a bit of a lottery, but I know there is a lot of cash here. Find it, and bag it.

pln_cs1_79_01.base_text: This goddamn place is a maze.
pln_cs1_79_01.loc_text: This goddamn place is a maze.

pln_cs1_79_02.base_text: They say crap rolls downhill but here it's flows everywhere. This is a goddamn maze.
pln_cs1_79_02.loc_text: They say crap rolls downhill but here it's flows everywhere. This is a goddamn maze.

pln_cs1_79_03.base_text: Those old sewers are a maze. Keep looking for the light, guys. Ignore the stench.
pln_cs1_79_03.loc_text: Those old sewers are a maze. Keep looking for the light, guys. Ignore the stench.

pln_cs1_80_02.base_text: There's the ladder, guys. Get up there!
pln_cs1_80_02.loc_text: There's the ladder, guys. Get up there!

pln_cs1_80_03.base_text: Just a few more steps, gang. The ladder is right ahead.
pln_cs1_80_03.loc_text: Just a few more steps, gang. The ladder is right ahead.

pln_cs1_81_01.base_text: Watch your heads, guys. Ass bombs aren't the only thing dropping into here.
pln_cs1_81_01.loc_text: Watch your heads, guys. Ass bombs aren't the only thing dropping into here.

pln_cs1_81_02.base_text: Those crafty fuckers are dropping grenades into the sewers.
pln_cs1_81_02.loc_text: Those crafty fuckers are dropping grenades into the sewers.

pln_cs1_81_03.base_text: It's about to get hot down there, gang. They're dropping grenades.
pln_cs1_81_03.loc_text: It's about to get hot down there, gang. They're dropping grenades.

pln_cs1_82_01.base_text: Remember where that ladder is, gang. You can access the roof there.
pln_cs1_82_01.loc_text: Remember where that ladder is, gang. You can access the roof there.

pln_cs1_82_02.base_text: That red ladder will let you get onto the roof.
pln_cs1_82_02.loc_text: That red ladder will let you get onto the roof.

pln_cs1_82_03.base_text: An access ladder, with the hatch unlocked. These sloppy assholes deserve to be robbed.
pln_cs1_82_03.loc_text: An access ladder, with the hatch unlocked. These sloppy assholes deserve to be robbed.

pln_cs1_83_01.base_text: Start cracking those boxes. We need one bag, but let's try and take them for everything!
pln_cs1_83_01.loc_text: Start cracking those boxes. We need one bag, but let's try and take them for everything!

pln_cs1_83_02.base_text: Deposit boxes! Start breaking them, gang. One bag is minimum, but take as much as you can.
pln_cs1_83_02.loc_text: Deposit boxes! Start breaking them, gang. One bag is minimum, but take as much as you can.

pln_cs1_83_03.base_text: Open the boxes. Our client demands one bag, but your professional honor demands you take as much as you can.
pln_cs1_83_03.loc_text: Open the boxes. Our client demands one bag, but your professional honor demands you take as much as you can.

pln_cs1_84_01.base_text: That's the first bag. That's what we need, but keep going.
pln_cs1_84_01.loc_text: That's the first bag. That's what we need, but keep going.

pln_cs1_85_01.base_text: Two bags. It's all gravy from here. Don't stop.
pln_cs1_85_01.loc_text: Two bags. It's all gravy from here. Don't stop.

pln_cs1_86_01.base_text: Thats three. You're going strong. Keep going.
pln_cs1_86_01.loc_text: Thats three. You're going strong. Keep going.

pln_cs1_88_01.base_text: That's one for our client, and one each for you ultimate badasses. But don't stop.
pln_cs1_88_01.loc_text: That's one for our client, and one each for you ultimate badasses. But don't stop.

pln_cs1_89_01.base_text: Six bags. I'm getting buttery thinking of all that extra loot.
pln_cs1_89_01.loc_text: Six bags. I'm getting buttery thinking of all that extra loot.

pln_cs1_90_01.base_text: Seven bags. You guys are fucking Olympic champions.
pln_cs1_90_01.loc_text: Seven bags. You guys are fucking Olympic champions.

pln_cs1_92_01.base_text: Nine bags! You guys are legendary.
pln_cs1_92_01.loc_text: Nine bags! You guys are legendary.

pln_cs1_93_01.base_text: You guys are Godlike. Keep it coming.
pln_cs1_93_01.loc_text: You guys are Godlike. Keep it coming.

pln_cs1_93_02.base_text: The ghosts of a thousand years of heisters are watching you, and wishing they were here. Keep it flowing.
pln_cs1_93_02.loc_text: The ghosts of a thousand years of heisters are watching you, and wishing they were here. Keep it flowing.

pln_cs1_93_03.base_text: This heist will go down in legend. I'm already writing the wiki entry. It starts with 'Holy crap!'
pln_cs1_93_03.loc_text: This heist will go down in legend. I'm already writing the wiki entry. It starts with 'Holy crap!'

pln_cs1_94_01.base_text: The cops are using the ladders. Watch them!
pln_cs1_94_01.loc_text: The cops are using the ladders. Watch them!

pln_cs1_94_02.base_text: Keep an eye on all entry points, especially the ladders.
pln_cs1_94_02.loc_text: Keep an eye on all entry points, especially the ladders.

pln_cs1_94_03.base_text: The ladders are a weakpoint. Don't let the cops get up them.
pln_cs1_94_03.loc_text: The ladders are a weakpoint. Don't let the cops get up them.

pln_cs1_96_01.base_text: Units converging on your position from all directions. Cops, SWAT, Feds and - hell! Even the National Guard are on they way. We need to find another way out.
pln_cs1_96_01.loc_text: Units converging on your position from all directions. Cops, SWAT, Feds and - hell! Even the National Guard are on they way. We need to find another way out.

pln_cs1_96_02.base_text: We got roadblocks on the perimeter, and cops closing the net. No way out by the road. Time for a new plan.
pln_cs1_96_02.loc_text: We got roadblocks on the perimeter, and cops closing the net. No way out by the road. Time for a new plan.

pln_cs1_96_03.base_text: They've got every road out of there blocked. Time to go Vietcong on them. You'll see what I mean.
pln_cs1_96_03.loc_text: They've got every road out of there blocked. Time to go Vietcong on them. You'll see what I mean.

pln_cs1_97_01.base_text: Find the manhole out in the parking lot. You're going subterranean.
pln_cs1_97_01.loc_text: Find the manhole out in the parking lot. You're going subterranean.

pln_cs1_98_01.base_text: There's an access hatch to the sewers over by the gas station. Go there, and get down.
pln_cs1_98_01.loc_text: There's an access hatch to the sewers over by the gas station. Go there, and get down.

pln_cs1_99_01.base_text: See that drive thru window at the side of the bank? There's a manhole there to the sewers. Get down there.
pln_cs1_99_01.loc_text: See that drive thru window at the side of the bank? There's a manhole there to the sewers. Get down there.

pln_cs1_brf_01.base_text: We got a bank here. Not a big branch but I've learned the vault is temporarily holding stacks of cash in transit. Foreign exchange notes. Anyway, you know how to do it - your way. Sneak in silent, or unleash hell. Either way, I got a little idea for how to lift the money out of there. You'll see what I mean. I think you'll like it.
pln_cs1_brf_01.loc_text: We got a bank here. Not a big branch but I've learned the vault is temporarily holding stacks of cash in transit. Foreign exchange notes. Anyway, you know how to do it - your way. Sneak in silent, or unleash hell. Either way, I got a little idea for how to lift the money out of there. You'll see what I mean. I think you'll like it.

pln_cs1_cbf_01_01.base_text: Got a line on a recent drop of hard currency. It's tucked away in the vault of a branch of Roberts bank. It's a quiet area. Nothing happens here, so they won't be expecting a hit. Let's punish that complacency.
pln_cs1_cbf_01_01.loc_text: Got a line on a recent drop of hard currency. It's tucked away in the vault of a branch of Roberts bank. It's a quiet area. Nothing happens here, so they won't be expecting a hit. Let's punish that complacency.

pln_cs1_cbf_01_02.base_text: This is Roberts bank. It's a small DC company, almost as old as the city itself. And while I have a lot of respect for the fine institutions of this nation, I have greater respect for what they hold in their vault. My intel says this branch has the lowest hit-rate in the country. Time to change that.
pln_cs1_cbf_01_02.loc_text: This is Roberts bank. It's a small DC company, almost as old as the city itself. And while I have a lot of respect for the fine institutions of this nation, I have greater respect for what they hold in their vault. My intel says this branch has the lowest hit-rate in the country. Time to change that.

pln_cs1_intro_01_01.base_text: There's the bank. Pull over. Keep it cool.
pln_cs1_intro_01_01.loc_text: There's the bank. Pull over. Keep it cool.

pln_cs1_intro_01_02.base_text: Orientation guys; Get off point gas station, banks straight ahead, garage right, grocery store left. Go get rich.
pln_cs1_intro_01_02.loc_text: Orientation guys; Get off point gas station, banks straight ahead, garage right, grocery store left. Go get rich.

pln_cs1_intro_01_03.base_text: Remember the plan. Get the keycards, keep the civilians in check and set off no alarms.
pln_cs1_intro_01_03.loc_text: Remember the plan. Get the keycards, keep the civilians in check and set off no alarms.

pln_dah_01_01.base_text: Remember, stay low, stay dark. And stay quiet. Here we go.
pln_dah_01_01.loc_text: Remember, stay low, stay dark. And stay quiet. Here we go.

pln_dah_01_02.base_text: You're cats hiding from dogs. Stupid, rich ones.
pln_dah_01_02.loc_text: You're cats hiding from dogs. Stupid, rich ones.

pln_dah_01_03.base_text: Let's keep this one under the radar.
pln_dah_01_03.loc_text: Let's keep this one under the radar.

pln_dah_02_01.base_text: To bypass the security system and get into the vault, patch the devices you have directly into the two control boxes, they should be around there somewhere. Then I'll hack in remotely and do the rest.
pln_dah_02_01.loc_text: To bypass the security system and get into the vault, patch the devices you have directly into the two control boxes, they should be around there somewhere. Then I'll hack in remotely and do the rest.

pln_dah_02_02.base_text: The vault has two security routers protecting it and you need to shut them both down. Easily done if you patch me into them directly. Look for them mounted on the walls.
pln_dah_02_02.loc_text: The vault has two security routers protecting it and you need to shut them both down. Easily done if you patch me into them directly. Look for them mounted on the walls.

pln_dah_02_03.base_text: Two wall-mounted router boxes control the vault security system and each one needs to be hacked separately. Once you're in, I can do the rest and shut down the system from here.
pln_dah_02_03.loc_text: Two wall-mounted router boxes control the vault security system and each one needs to be hacked separately. Once you're in, I can do the rest and shut down the system from here.

pln_dah_03_01.base_text: Look on the walls for the router boxes.
pln_dah_03_01.loc_text: Look on the walls for the router boxes.

pln_dah_03_02.base_text: C'mon guys, find me those security boxes. Check the walls.
pln_dah_03_02.loc_text: C'mon guys, find me those security boxes. Check the walls.

pln_dah_03_03.base_text: Hey, you're supposed to be hacking those routers, remember?
pln_dah_03_03.loc_text: Hey, you're supposed to be hacking those routers, remember?

pln_dah_03_04.base_text: Walls and router boxes. They go together like trouble and badges.
pln_dah_03_04.loc_text: Walls and router boxes. They go together like trouble and badges.

pln_dah_03_05.base_text: I really need you to hack me into those security boxes ASAP.
pln_dah_03_05.loc_text: I really need you to hack me into those security boxes ASAP.

pln_dah_04_01.base_text: One of the routers is probably real close.
pln_dah_04_01.loc_text: One of the routers is probably real close.

pln_dah_04_02.base_text: Security box up head. Keep your eyes peeled.
pln_dah_04_02.loc_text: Security box up head. Keep your eyes peeled.

pln_dah_04_03.base_text: There's a router box right near you.
pln_dah_04_03.loc_text: There's a router box right near you.

pln_dah_05_01.base_text: Great, now you just need to find the second one.
pln_dah_05_01.loc_text: Great, now you just need to find the second one.

pln_dah_05_02.base_text: That's one box down, one to go.
pln_dah_05_02.loc_text: That's one box down, one to go.

pln_dah_05_03.base_text: OK, good. Now take care of the other router.
pln_dah_05_03.loc_text: OK, good. Now take care of the other router.

pln_dah_06_01.base_text: All right, give me some time to hack the system.
pln_dah_06_01.loc_text: All right, give me some time to hack the system.

pln_dah_06_02.base_text: It's going to take me a while to shut this down.
pln_dah_06_02.loc_text: It's going to take me a while to shut this down.

pln_dah_06_03.base_text: I'll have the system down in a bit.
pln_dah_06_03.loc_text: I'll have the system down in a bit.

pln_dah_07_01.base_text: In the meantime, see about finding those three laptops with the code snippets.
pln_dah_07_01.loc_text: In the meantime, see about finding those three laptops with the code snippets.

pln_dah_07_02.base_text: While I'm hacking the system, you should go ahead and find those code parts. Remember, one per laptop.
pln_dah_07_02.loc_text: While I'm hacking the system, you should go ahead and find those code parts. Remember, one per laptop.

pln_dah_07_03.base_text: While I'm doing this, you should go ahead and find those three laptops with the code fragments.
pln_dah_07_03.loc_text: While I'm doing this, you should go ahead and find those three laptops with the code fragments.

pln_dah_09_02.base_text: That's one security box taken care of.
pln_dah_09_02.loc_text: That's one security box taken care of.

pln_dah_09_03.base_text: I'm done with the first box.
pln_dah_09_03.loc_text: I'm done with the first box.

pln_dah_100_01.base_text: Bag those stones and get them to the garden. Get them out with ziplines.
pln_dah_100_01.loc_text: Bag those stones and get them to the garden. Get them out with ziplines.

pln_dah_cbf_01.base_text: On the 22nd floor of the Garnet Group Building, owned by Nathan Garnet, there's a safe with millions worth of diamonds. The building has high-tech security and trigger-happy guards but luckily for us there's a birthday party going on to keep them distracted.

pln_dn1_31_03.base_text: We'll have this melted down and on the market before the Murkies pay out their early retirements on this job.

pln_dn1_39_01.loc_text: The van's stuck up there! Plant the C4 on the bottom, blow it open.

pln_dn1_intro_01_01.base_text: ...and also on the 45 going south, there's been a major accident that's clogging the entire freeway.  It's like a war zone out there this morning so you better take a scenic route.
pln_dn1_intro_01_01.loc_text: ...and also on the 45 going south, there's been a major accident that's clogging the entire freeway.  It's like a war zone out there this morning so you better take a scenic route.

pln_dn1_intro_01_02.base_text: Traffic is backed all the way along the southbound I45. If you were planning on getting through that area, forget it.
pln_dn1_intro_01_02.loc_text: Traffic is backed all the way along the southbound I45. If you were planning on getting through that area, forget it.

pln_drk_01_01.base_text: Okay, gang. The train yard is right in front of you. There should be several ways you can infiltrate the place, so make your choices wisely.
pln_drk_01_01.loc_text: Okay, gang. The train yard is right in front of you. There should be several ways you can infiltrate the place, so make your choices wisely.

pln_drk_01_01a.base_text: Remember, we are doing this silent. If the alarm goes off we're screwed.
pln_drk_01_01a.loc_text: Remember, we are doing this silent. If the alarm goes off we're screwed.

pln_drk_01_02.base_text: Okay, guys, this is a good spot. You almost have a clear view of the train yard. Keep track of the patrolling guards and cameras.
pln_drk_01_02.loc_text: Okay, guys, this is a good spot. You almost have a clear view of the train yard. Keep track of the patrolling guards and cameras.

pln_drk_01_02a.base_text: This is your chance to plan your course of action.
pln_drk_01_02a.loc_text: This is your chance to plan your course of action.

pln_drk_01_03.base_text: That's it, the hidden train yard. Use this opportunity to scout the area. The place is heavily guarded by Murkies and cameras, so we can't afford to make any mistakes.
pln_drk_01_03.loc_text: That's it, the hidden train yard. Use this opportunity to scout the area. The place is heavily guarded by Murkies and cameras, so we can't afford to make any mistakes.

pln_drk_02_01.base_text: Find your way inside and locate the Murkywater trains. The EMP parts will most likely be in different wagons.
pln_drk_02_01.loc_text: Find your way inside and locate the Murkywater trains. The EMP parts will most likely be in different wagons.

pln_drk_02_02.base_text: Get in and look for the Murkywater trains. You should be able to spot them fairly easy.
pln_drk_02_02.loc_text: Get in and look for the Murkywater trains. You should be able to spot them fairly easy.

pln_drk_02_02a.base_text: Remember that the EMP bomb is two parts and I don't have to remind you we need both.
pln_drk_02_02a.loc_text: Remember that the EMP bomb is two parts and I don't have to remind you we need both.

pln_drk_02_03.base_text: Focus on finding the trains containing the EMP bomb parts. That's our main priority.
pln_drk_02_03.loc_text: Focus on finding the trains containing the EMP bomb parts. That's our main priority.

pln_drk_03_02.base_text: The trains belonging to Murkywater should be easy to spot. Find them.
pln_drk_03_02.loc_text: The trains belonging to Murkywater should be easy to spot. Find them.

pln_drk_03_03.base_text: If you don't find the Murkywater trains, we're not getting the EMP bomb.
pln_drk_03_03.loc_text: If you don't find the Murkywater trains, we're not getting the EMP bomb.

pln_drk_04_01.base_text: Okay, now you need to look for the actual Murkywater trains.
pln_drk_04_01.loc_text: Okay, now you need to look for the actual Murkywater trains.

pln_drk_04_01a.base_text: They should have some kind of panels on the side.
pln_drk_04_01a.loc_text: They should have some kind of panels on the side.

pln_drk_04_02.base_text: The Murkywater trains will be locked by some kind of security panel. We'll most likely have to hack them to get the doors open.
pln_drk_04_02.loc_text: The Murkywater trains will be locked by some kind of security panel. We'll most likely have to hack them to get the doors open.

pln_drk_04_03.base_text: The Murkywater trains will have a security panel on the side, so we'll have to hack them open.
pln_drk_04_03.loc_text: The Murkywater trains will have a security panel on the side, so we'll have to hack them open.

pln_drk_05_01.base_text: Look for the security panel, gang. That's the only way in.
pln_drk_05_01.loc_text: Look for the security panel, gang. That's the only way in.

pln_drk_05_02.base_text: Only way to get the doors open is by hacking the panel. Find it.
pln_drk_05_02.loc_text: Only way to get the doors open is by hacking the panel. Find it.

pln_drk_05_03.base_text: Find the security panel so we can get that door open.
pln_drk_05_03.loc_text: Find the security panel so we can get that door open.

pln_drk_06_01.base_text: Excellent, you got in. The EMP parts should be there somewhere. Find it.
pln_drk_06_01.loc_text: Excellent, you got in. The EMP parts should be there somewhere. Find it.

pln_drk_06_02.base_text: We're in. Now look for the EMP parts.
pln_drk_06_02.loc_text: We're in. Now look for the EMP parts.

pln_drk_06_03.base_text: Good job. Look around and see if you can find the EMP parts.
pln_drk_06_03.loc_text: Good job. Look around and see if you can find the EMP parts.

pln_drk_07_01.base_text: Open your eyes and find the EMP. Come on.
pln_drk_07_01.loc_text: Open your eyes and find the EMP. Come on.

pln_drk_07_02.base_text: Look for the EMP parts. That's top priority.
pln_drk_07_02.loc_text: Look for the EMP parts. That's top priority.

pln_drk_07_03.loc_text: Gang, are you looking for the EMP parts?

pln_drk_08_01.loc_text: Damn! They have set up an additional security door...

pln_drk_08_02.base_text: What the hell? Elephant's sources didn't mention an additional security door...
pln_drk_08_02.loc_text: What the hell? Elephant's sources didn't mention an additional security door...

pln_drk_08_03.base_text: Damn, where did this door come from? Sorry, gang. I had no information this would be here...
pln_drk_08_03.loc_text: Damn, where did this door come from? Sorry, gang. I had no information this would be here...

pln_drk_09_01.base_text: ... looks like we're going to need a keycard to get past this...
pln_drk_09_01.loc_text: ... looks like we're going to need a keycard to get past this...

pln_drk_11_01.base_text: Gang, without a keycard we're not getting past that door. Look for it.

pln_drk_11_02.base_text: Guys, we still need a keycard.
pln_drk_11_02.loc_text: Guys, we still need a keycard.

pln_drk_brf_01_01.base_text: I'm not gonna lie; we are taking a huge risk by double-crossing Akan, but I believe this is the right choice. First thing is getting the EMP bomb that is being transported by Murkywater. They will be making a scheduled stop. That will be our chance. Get in quietly, find the EMP, then get out of there. You need to do this by stealth, so dress the part.

pln_ed1_brf_01.base_text: The Elephant doesn't like losing elections. He wants us to tamper with the voting machines headed to his district. We're going to the docks to put a GPS tracker on the truck carrying the machines. This will allow us to intercept the truck and deal with the machines before the election.
pln_ed1_brf_01.loc_text: The Elephant doesn't like losing elections. He wants us to tamper with the voting machines headed to his district. We're going to the docks to put a GPS tracker on the truck carrying the machines. This will allow us to intercept the truck and deal with the machines before the election.

pln_ed1_brf_02.base_text: The Elephant's PR will claim he came to power through depth, leadership and integrity, but that's bullshit. That oily bastard's going to cheat his way to the Senate, and this is where you come in. There are trucks at Pier 39. One of them has voting machines. Find the truck and attach a GPS-tracker to it. We'll deal with it down the line. Naturally, The Elephant wants this done with as little chance of bad press coming back to him as possible. So he's ear-marked some of his considerable campaign funds for a special black-ops bonus. You guys do this quietly, and the good politician will see you well rewarded.
