pln_ed2_17_03.base_text: Don't forget: we're looking for voting machines. My money is on them being in shipping crates scattered about.
pln_ed2_17_03.loc_text: Don't forget: we're looking for voting machines. My money is on them being in shipping crates scattered about.

pln_ed2_18_01.base_text: Hold them off until we get that footage.
pln_ed2_18_01.loc_text: Hold them off until we get that footage.

pln_ed2_18_02.base_text: Keep the feds off that footage, guys. We're nearly done here.
pln_ed2_18_02.loc_text: Keep the feds off that footage, guys. We're nearly done here.

pln_ed2_19_01.base_text: Just got a message from The Elephant. Your bonus for keeping things clandestine has been dropped off. It's near the escape van.
pln_ed2_19_01.loc_text: Just got a message from The Elephant. Your bonus for keeping things clandestine has been dropped off. It's near the escape van.

pln_ed2_20_01.base_text: There's your bonus. Get it to the van. You guys deserve it.
pln_ed2_20_01.loc_text: There's your bonus. Get it to the van. You guys deserve it.

pln_ed2_99_01.base_text: C'mon guys, lets change the change!
pln_ed2_99_01.loc_text: C'mon guys, lets change the change!

pln_ed2_brf_01.base_text: I've traced the truck to a warehouse out by Goose Island. It's a distribution depot, contracted to ship the voting machines to their final destination. With a little technical wizardry, we're going to make those machines a bit more sympathetic to The Elephant's mayoral candidate - that slimy ballbag McKendrick. Get in there, get them hacked, get out - simple. Once again, The Elephant is extending his stealth bonus if you can keep it quiet.
pln_ed2_brf_01.loc_text: I've traced the truck to a warehouse out by Goose Island. It's a distribution depot, contracted to ship the voting machines to their final destination. With a little technical wizardry, we're going to make those machines a bit more sympathetic to The Elephant's mayoral candidate - that slimy ballbag McKendrick. Get in there, get them hacked, get out - simple. Once again, The Elephant is extending his stealth bonus if you can keep it quiet.

pln_ed2_end_a_01.base_text: That was a superb display of stealth. You guys are made of shadows. The machines are hacked, the votes are flooding in and it is a landslide for The Elephant's man. God bless democracy!
pln_ed2_end_a_01.loc_text: That was a superb display of stealth. You guys are made of shadows. The machines are hacked, the votes are flooding in and it is a landslide for The Elephant's man. God bless democracy!

pln_ed2_end_a_02.base_text: Outstanding work. Tonight, you clowns made yourself a friend in high places. You'll never pay another parking ticket in this town.
pln_ed2_end_a_02.loc_text: Outstanding work. Tonight, you clowns made yourself a friend in high places. You'll never pay another parking ticket in this town.

pln_ed2_end_b_01.base_text: Things got messy, but you got through in the end. The hacks worked. It looks like the good lady Mayor's people was behind this. The press are already sharpening the knives for Schwartz. Needless to say, The Elephant is ecstatic. You have served your city well tonight, my friends.
pln_ed2_end_b_01.loc_text: Things got messy, but you got through in the end. The hacks worked. It looks like the good lady Mayor's people was behind this. The press are already sharpening the knives for Schwartz. Needless to say, The Elephant is ecstatic. You have served your city well tonight, my friends.

pln_ed2_end_b_02.base_text: Great work! The hacked machines have made it look like the Mayor's people were behind this. Even if an enquiry exonerates her, the papers are hurling so many buckets of shit at the Mayor that she's finished. And The Elephant? Well, his man is picking out new furniture for City Hall. Great work, gang!
pln_ed2_end_b_02.loc_text: Great work! The hacked machines have made it look like the Mayor's people were behind this. Even if an enquiry exonerates her, the papers are hurling so many buckets of shit at the Mayor that she's finished. And The Elephant? Well, his man is picking out new furniture for City Hall. Great work, gang!

pln_ed2_intro_a_01.base_text: Pull over here. There's the warehouse up ahead. Let's do this.
pln_ed2_intro_a_01.loc_text: Pull over here. There's the warehouse up ahead. Let's do this.

pln_ed2_intro_a_02.base_text: That's the depot where the machines are kept. Move out, you clowns.
pln_ed2_intro_a_02.loc_text: That's the depot where the machines are kept. Move out, you clowns.

pln_ed2_intro_a_03.base_text: That's the warehouse where the voting machines are kept. Time for a little political engineering.
pln_ed2_intro_a_03.loc_text: That's the warehouse where the voting machines are kept. Time for a little political engineering.

pln_ed3_01_01.base_text: Remember, we're here to make it look like a bank robbery. If some election equipment gets destroyed in the process, that's too bad. And it would be a real shame if the voting results became unusable somehow...
pln_ed3_01_01.loc_text: Remember, we're here to make it look like a bank robbery. If some election equipment gets destroyed in the process, that's too bad. And it would be a real shame if the voting results became unusable somehow...

pln_ed3_01_02.base_text: Now remember - we're here to rob a bank. But if, by some accident, you shoot up a ballot machine or three, well... That's just tough titty. Understand?
pln_ed3_01_02.loc_text: Now remember - we're here to rob a bank. But if, by some accident, you shoot up a ballot machine or three, well... That's just tough titty. Understand?

pln_ed3_02_01.base_text: Case the place, guys. Find the bank, and find the polling place. Then get them both.
pln_ed3_02_01.loc_text: Case the place, guys. Find the bank, and find the polling place. Then get them both.

pln_ed3_02_02.base_text: Case the place before lighting things up. Maybe there's a better way.
pln_ed3_02_02.loc_text: Case the place before lighting things up. Maybe there's a better way.

pln_ed3_02_03.base_text: It might be a good idea to look around before you go loud. Find your best approach.
pln_ed3_02_03.loc_text: It might be a good idea to look around before you go loud. Find your best approach.

pln_ed3_03_01.base_text: The server with the results should be around here somewhere. Find it and make those votes unusable.
pln_ed3_03_01.loc_text: The server with the results should be around here somewhere. Find it and make those votes unusable.

pln_ed3_03_02.base_text: There's going to be a server nearby. The votes are on there. Find it, and wipe it out.
pln_ed3_03_02.loc_text: There's going to be a server nearby. The votes are on there. Find it, and wipe it out.

pln_ed3_03_03.base_text: The voting results are stored on a nearby server. Find it and scramble that data.
pln_ed3_03_03.loc_text: The voting results are stored on a nearby server. Find it and scramble that data.

pln_ed3_04_01.base_text: OK, that's the server. Get the scrambler on there.
pln_ed3_04_01.loc_text: OK, that's the server. Get the scrambler on there.

pln_ed3_04_02.base_text: That looks like the server we're after. Get that scrambler going.
pln_ed3_04_02.loc_text: That looks like the server we're after. Get that scrambler going.

pln_ed3_05_01.base_text: Damn, that cheap piece of shitty Russian crap scrambler crashed. Get it going again.
pln_ed3_05_01.loc_text: Damn, that cheap piece of shitty Russian crap scrambler crashed. Get it going again.

pln_ed3_05_02.base_text: Looks like the scrambler software just crashed. Some shitty code. Start it back up!
pln_ed3_05_02.loc_text: Looks like the scrambler software just crashed. Some shitty code. Start it back up!

pln_ed3_05_03.base_text: I got those scramblers from Vlad. (mimicking Vlad) Very best Russian tech. That lying fuck.
pln_ed3_05_03.loc_text: I got those scramblers from Vlad. (mimicking Vlad) Very best Russian tech. That lying fuck.

pln_ed3_06_01.base_text: The damn scrambler just went down again. Get it fixed!
pln_ed3_06_01.loc_text: The damn scrambler just went down again. Get it fixed!

pln_ed3_06_02.base_text: The piece of shit just crashed again. Reboot the scrambler!
pln_ed3_06_02.loc_text: The piece of shit just crashed again. Reboot the scrambler!

pln_ed3_07_01.base_text: Think it's almost there... Hang on... Wait... fuck! It crashed again. Get it rebooted.
pln_ed3_07_01.loc_text: Think it's almost there... Hang on... Wait... fuck! It crashed again. Get it rebooted.

pln_ed3_08_01.base_text: Alright, the data scrambling is done. It'll just look like a regular hard drive failure.
pln_ed3_08_01.loc_text: Alright, the data scrambling is done. It'll just look like a regular hard drive failure.

pln_ed3_08_02.base_text: OK, the data is scrambled! It'll seem like just a normal data failure.
pln_ed3_08_02.loc_text: OK, the data is scrambled! It'll seem like just a normal data failure.

pln_ed3_08_03.base_text: Data's scrambled. Well done. Even if they figure it was deliberate, the results are unusable. Great job.
pln_ed3_08_03.loc_text: Data's scrambled. Well done. Even if they figure it was deliberate, the results are unusable. Great job.

pln_ed3_09_01.base_text: Now, blast that wall open! The explosion will trash the voting machines.
pln_ed3_09_01.loc_text: Now, blast that wall open! The explosion will trash the voting machines.

pln_ed3_09_02.base_text: Blowing the walling will wreck the ballot machines. Accident, right? We're just doing an honest bank heist.
pln_ed3_09_02.loc_text: Blowing the walling will wreck the ballot machines. Accident, right? We're just doing an honest bank heist.

pln_ed3_09_03.base_text: It's time to breach the bank! The explosion will take care of the voting machines.
pln_ed3_09_03.loc_text: It's time to breach the bank! The explosion will take care of the voting machines.

pln_ed3_10_01.base_text: Boom! The wall is history. Should have taken a few machines down with it too.
pln_ed3_10_01.loc_text: Boom! The wall is history. Should have taken a few machines down with it too.

pln_ed3_10_02.base_text: That's the wall gone. Looks like a few voting machines ate it too. Now move!
pln_ed3_10_02.loc_text: That's the wall gone. Looks like a few voting machines ate it too. Now move!

pln_ed3_10_03.base_text: There goes the wall. Now go on in.
pln_ed3_10_03.loc_text: There goes the wall. Now go on in.

pln_ed3_11_01.base_text: OK. Second act in our little drama - get the vault open.
pln_ed3_11_01.loc_text: OK. Second act in our little drama - get the vault open.

pln_ed3_11_02.base_text: Time's wasting. Start getting that vault open now!
pln_ed3_11_02.loc_text: Time's wasting. Start getting that vault open now!

pln_ed3_12_01.base_text: Come on, get that vault open.
pln_ed3_12_01.loc_text: Come on, get that vault open.

pln_ed3_13_01.base_text: Come on, guys - time to grab the cash.
pln_ed3_13_01.loc_text: Come on, guys - time to grab the cash.

pln_ed3_13_02.base_text: The vault is open. This charade is almost done. Bag some money!
pln_ed3_13_02.loc_text: The vault is open. This charade is almost done. Bag some money!

pln_ed3_14_01.base_text: Get inside the vault, gang. See what's inside!
pln_ed3_14_01.loc_text: Get inside the vault, gang. See what's inside!

pln_ed3_14_02.base_text: The vault's open. Time to see what's inside.
pln_ed3_14_02.loc_text: The vault's open. Time to see what's inside.

pln_ed3_14_03.base_text: Open fucking sesame. Let's see what we have there.
pln_ed3_14_03.loc_text: Open fucking sesame. Let's see what we have there.

pln_ed3_15_01.base_text: What do you see? This place is bone dry. Nevermind, we did what we came for, so just get out of there.
pln_ed3_15_01.loc_text: What do you see? This place is bone dry. Nevermind, we did what we came for, so just get out of there.

pln_ed3_15_02.base_text: Looks like we got the shitty end of the stick. The vault's empty! Get out of there, now!
pln_ed3_15_02.loc_text: Looks like we got the shitty end of the stick. The vault's empty! Get out of there, now!

pln_ed3_16_01.base_text: What do you think guys? It looks pretty good in there. Grab what you can handle!
pln_ed3_16_01.loc_text: What do you think guys? It looks pretty good in there. Grab what you can handle!

pln_ed3_16_02.base_text: Vault looks packed with cash. It's your call on how much you can get away with.
pln_ed3_16_02.loc_text: Vault looks packed with cash. It's your call on how much you can get away with.

pln_ed3_17_01.base_text: Come on, clowns - haul ass out of there!
pln_ed3_17_01.loc_text: Come on, clowns - haul ass out of there!

pln_ed3_18_01.base_text: I got you an escape van, just outside the main entrance!
pln_ed3_18_01.loc_text: I got you an escape van, just outside the main entrance!

pln_ed3_18_02.base_text: Time to eject! The escape van is parked near the main entrance!
pln_ed3_18_02.loc_text: Time to eject! The escape van is parked near the main entrance!

pln_ed3_19_01.base_text: Now if the cameras are giving you a hard time, there's a surveillance operator around. He's in the security office.
pln_ed3_19_01.loc_text: Now if the cameras are giving you a hard time, there's a surveillance operator around. He's in the security office.

pln_ed3_19_02.base_text: There's a security office close by. Just in case you want to get rid of any surveillance.
pln_ed3_19_02.loc_text: There's a security office close by. Just in case you want to get rid of any surveillance.

pln_ed3_20_01.base_text: Those cameras won't be a problem anymore!
pln_ed3_20_01.loc_text: Those cameras won't be a problem anymore!

pln_ed3_20_02.base_text: That'll keep nosy bastards from spying on our business. Good.
pln_ed3_20_02.loc_text: That'll keep nosy bastards from spying on our business. Good.

pln_ed3_20_03.base_text: The surveillance operator is down. Those cameras shouldn't bother you anymore!
pln_ed3_20_03.loc_text: The surveillance operator is down. Those cameras shouldn't bother you anymore!

pln_ed3_21_01.base_text: The bank shutters can be closed from the security office. They should help you keep the police at bay!
pln_ed3_21_01.loc_text: The bank shutters can be closed from the security office. They should help you keep the police at bay!

pln_ed3_21_02.base_text: There are bandit barriers in the bank. Shut 'em from the security office. They'll help keep cops out of your way.
pln_ed3_21_02.loc_text: There are bandit barriers in the bank. Shut 'em from the security office. They'll help keep cops out of your way.

pln_ed3_21_03.base_text: There's an override switch in the security office. It closes the bank's shutters. That's gonna help you keep the feds out of the bank.
pln_ed3_21_03.loc_text: There's an override switch in the security office. It closes the bank's shutters. That's gonna help you keep the feds out of the bank.

pln_ed3_22_01.base_text: Looks like they're setting up snipers on nearby rooftops. Keep your eyes open!
pln_ed3_22_01.loc_text: Looks like they're setting up snipers on nearby rooftops. Keep your eyes open!

pln_ed3_22_02.base_text: Watch out. Snipers are setting up in the area!
pln_ed3_22_02.loc_text: Watch out. Snipers are setting up in the area!

pln_ed3_22_03.base_text: Yeah, I'm reading sniper teams on the rooftops. Watch yourself.
pln_ed3_22_03.loc_text: Yeah, I'm reading sniper teams on the rooftops. Watch yourself.

pln_ed3_23_02.base_text: Playing it cool. They haven't made you yet.
pln_ed3_23_02.loc_text: Playing it cool. They haven't made you yet.

pln_ed3_23_04.base_text: You just keep it up. This is text book stuff.
pln_ed3_23_04.loc_text: You just keep it up. This is text book stuff.

pln_ed3_23_05.base_text: They haven't spotted you yet. Still good.
pln_ed3_23_05.loc_text: They haven't spotted you yet. Still good.

pln_ed3_24_01.base_text: Something's up with the elevator... Wait... Give me a moment.
pln_ed3_24_01.loc_text: Something's up with the elevator... Wait... Give me a moment.

pln_ed3_25_01.base_text: What the hell? That's the wrong elevator. Hold on.
pln_ed3_25_01.loc_text: What the hell? That's the wrong elevator. Hold on.

pln_ed3_26_01.base_text: Alright, got it. Here we go
pln_ed3_26_01.loc_text: Alright, got it. Here we go

pln_ed3_27_01.base_text: Sending you the lance in the elevator. Get ready for it, guys.
pln_ed3_27_01.loc_text: Sending you the lance in the elevator. Get ready for it, guys.

pln_ed3_99_01.base_text: C'mon guys, lets change the change!
pln_ed3_99_01.loc_text: C'mon guys, lets change the change!

pln_ed3_brf_b_01.base_text: That truck you assholes tagged wasn't the right one, so we can forget about intercepting those voting machines. We're going to try something else to keep the Elephant sweet. We can trigger a re-election by scrambling the server at the polling place. To avoid suspicion on our sponsor, we'll make it look like collateral damage by robbing the bank next door.
pln_ed3_brf_b_01.loc_text: That truck you assholes tagged wasn't the right one, so we can forget about intercepting those voting machines. We're going to try something else to keep the Elephant sweet. We can trigger a re-election by scrambling the server at the polling place. To avoid suspicion on our sponsor, we'll make it look like collateral damage by robbing the bank next door.

pln_ed3_brf_c_01.base_text: I couldn't locate the right truck through the shipping data you uploaded, so we won't be able to intercept those voting machines. However, we can still keep the Elephant sweet. There's a bank next to the polling place. We're going to hit it. Except we're not, not really, 'cos you're real goal is hitting the server with the polling results next door. Hit the bank, open the vault, all that stuff, but remember that the real objective is fucking up that polling place.

pln_ed3_end_a_01.base_text: Great work! Time to dust off your tuxedos, gang - your invitations to the inaugural ball are in the post.
pln_ed3_end_a_01.loc_text: Great work! Time to dust off your tuxedos, gang - your invitations to the inaugural ball are in the post.

pln_ed3_end_a_02.base_text: They should teach this little bit of political engineering for years to come. Outstanding, gang. Outstanding!
pln_ed3_end_a_02.loc_text: They should teach this little bit of political engineering for years to come. Outstanding, gang. Outstanding!

pln_ed3_end_a_03.base_text: You clowns just wrote the most exciting chapter in the story of Washington politics, and probably the most honest. Great work!
pln_ed3_end_a_03.loc_text: You clowns just wrote the most exciting chapter in the story of Washington politics, and probably the most honest. Great work!

pln_ed3_intro_a_01.base_text: Politics can be a bastard but the beauty of it is you always get a second chance. Get in there and do your thing.
pln_ed3_intro_a_01.loc_text: Politics can be a bastard but the beauty of it is you always get a second chance. Get in there and do your thing.

pln_ed3_intro_a_02.base_text: We've got a chance to make this the greatest political comeback this town has seen since Nixon. Get in there, clowns.
pln_ed3_intro_a_02.loc_text: We've got a chance to make this the greatest political comeback this town has seen since Nixon. Get in there, clowns.

pln_ed3_intro_a_03.base_text: This is our last chance to help The Elephant get his man to office. So get to work, gang.
pln_ed3_intro_a_03.loc_text: This is our last chance to help The Elephant get his man to office. So get to work, gang.

pln_esc_cafe_01_to_departure_01.base_text: You've only got one more minute. Get the loot to the subway entrance and get the hell out of there!

pln_esc_cafe_02_to_departure_01.base_text: Step it up, you've got two minutes to get out of there!
pln_esc_cafe_02_to_departure_01.loc_text: Step it up, you've got two minutes to get out of there!

pln_esc_cafe_03_to_departure_01.base_text: Alright guys, we've got a three minute window here. Get moving!
pln_esc_cafe_03_to_departure_01.loc_text: Alright guys, we've got a three minute window here. Get moving!

pln_esc_cafe_30secs_to_arrival_subway_01.base_text: The subway entrance will be open in 30 seconds, just hold on.
pln_esc_cafe_30secs_to_arrival_subway_01.loc_text: The subway entrance will be open in 30 seconds, just hold on.

pln_esc_cafe_arrival_subway_01.base_text: OK, the gate is open, get to that subway entrance.
pln_esc_cafe_arrival_subway_01.loc_text: OK, the gate is open, get to that subway entrance.

pln_esc_cafe_fixed_subway_01.base_text: OK, listen up, a contact will get you out through a nearby subway station.
pln_esc_cafe_fixed_subway_01.loc_text: OK, listen up, a contact will get you out through a nearby subway station.

pln_esc_cafe_warn_timelimit_subway_01.base_text: You won't have much time to escape, so be ready to move towards the subway station.
pln_esc_cafe_warn_timelimit_subway_01.loc_text: You won't have much time to escape, so be ready to move towards the subway station.

pln_esc_fixed_heli.base_text: Guys, I've secured a chopper to get you out. Stay put!
pln_esc_fixed_heli.loc_text: Guys, I've secured a chopper to get you out. Stay put!

pln_esc_fixed_van.base_text: Alright, guys! A van is coming in to get you out!
pln_esc_fixed_van.loc_text: Alright, guys! A van is coming in to get you out!

pln_esc_garage_01_any_01.base_text: That was one hell of a crash. The cops aren't gonna give you a break though, so get on your feet!
pln_esc_garage_01_any_01.loc_text: That was one hell of a crash. The cops aren't gonna give you a break though, so get on your feet!

pln_esc_garage_01_any_02.base_text: What the hell just happened?! Just grab the loot and look alive! The cops are moving in.
pln_esc_garage_01_any_02.loc_text: What the hell just happened?! Just grab the loot and look alive! The cops are moving in.

pln_esc_garage_02_any_01.base_text: Move up through the garage, a van is ready to get you out of there!
pln_esc_garage_02_any_01.loc_text: Move up through the garage, a van is ready to get you out of there!

pln_esc_garage_02_any_02.base_text: Work your way up to street level, I have a van ready to get you guys out of there!
pln_esc_garage_02_any_02.loc_text: Work your way up to street level, I have a van ready to get you guys out of there!

pln_esc_garage_03_any_01.base_text: OK look around - find the escape van!
pln_esc_garage_03_any_01.loc_text: OK look around - find the escape van!

pln_esc_overpass_more_snipers_01.base_text: Police chatter has confirmed the presence of snipers. Keep your eyes on those rooftops!
pln_esc_overpass_more_snipers_01.loc_text: Police chatter has confirmed the presence of snipers. Keep your eyes on those rooftops!

pln_esc_overpass_more_snipers_02.base_text: The cops are deploying snipers in the area, don't walk into their sights.
pln_esc_overpass_more_snipers_02.loc_text: The cops are deploying snipers in the area, don't walk into their sights.

pln_esc_overpass_sniper_on_rooftop_01.base_text: A sniper is moving in to deploy on a rooftop on the other side of the highway. Don't let him stop you.
pln_esc_overpass_sniper_on_rooftop_01.loc_text: A sniper is moving in to deploy on a rooftop on the other side of the highway. Don't let him stop you.

pln_esc_overpass_sniper_on_rooftop_02.base_text: A sniper is about to set up a position on the opposite side of the highway. Be ready...
pln_esc_overpass_sniper_on_rooftop_02.loc_text: A sniper is about to set up a position on the opposite side of the highway. Be ready...

pln_esc_overpass_swat_heli_incoming_01.base_text: The cops have sent in a chopper carrying heavy SWATs. You better be ready when it arrives.
pln_esc_overpass_swat_heli_incoming_01.loc_text: The cops have sent in a chopper carrying heavy SWATs. You better be ready when it arrives.

pln_esc_overpass_swat_heli_incoming_02.base_text: SWAT helicopter incoming. Get ready to face some heavy firepower.
pln_esc_overpass_swat_heli_incoming_02.loc_text: SWAT helicopter incoming. Get ready to face some heavy firepower.

pln_esc_park_escape_location_01.base_text: The van should arrive on a street near the park.
pln_esc_park_escape_location_01.loc_text: The van should arrive on a street near the park.

pln_esc_park_escape_location_02.base_text: The van will be coming in near the park.
pln_esc_park_escape_location_02.loc_text: The van will be coming in near the park.

pln_esc_park_marksmen_building_01.base_text: Watch out, they are deploying SWATs inside a nearby building.
pln_esc_park_marksmen_building_01.loc_text: Watch out, they are deploying SWATs inside a nearby building.

pln_esc_park_marksmen_building_02.base_text: They're taking up positions in a nearby building... Keep your eyes open.
pln_esc_park_marksmen_building_02.loc_text: They're taking up positions in a nearby building... Keep your eyes open.

pln_esc_park_marksmen_rooftop_01.base_text: SWATs are assuming positions on a nearby rooftop, watch out!
pln_esc_park_marksmen_rooftop_01.loc_text: SWATs are assuming positions on a nearby rooftop, watch out!

pln_esc_park_marksmen_rooftop_02.base_text: Heads up, the cops are deploying on a nearby rooftop!
pln_esc_park_marksmen_rooftop_02.loc_text: Heads up, the cops are deploying on a nearby rooftop!

pln_esc_park_suggest_park_01.base_text: There's a park nearby that should offer some cover...
pln_esc_park_suggest_park_01.loc_text: There's a park nearby that should offer some cover...

pln_esc_park_suggest_park_02.base_text: You should be able to hold your ground inside the park.
pln_esc_park_suggest_park_02.loc_text: You should be able to hold your ground inside the park.

pln_esc_park_suggest_park_03.base_text: The park should offer a good defensive position.
pln_esc_park_suggest_park_03.loc_text: The park should offer a good defensive position.

pln_esc_pep.base_text: Keep it together! You can't fall apart now!
pln_esc_pep.loc_text: Keep it together! You can't fall apart now!

pln_esc_plan_b.base_text: I'll get you out of there. Just keep the loot safe!
pln_esc_plan_b.loc_text: I'll get you out of there. Just keep the loot safe!

pln_esc_requirement_01_bags.base_text: Remember guys, we need at least one bag to escape.
pln_esc_requirement_01_bags.loc_text: Remember guys, we need at least one bag to escape.

pln_esc_requirement_02_bags.base_text: Remember guys, we need at least two bags to escape.
pln_esc_requirement_02_bags.loc_text: Remember guys, we need at least two bags to escape.

pln_esc_requirement_03_bags.base_text: Remember guys, we need three bags to escape.
pln_esc_requirement_03_bags.loc_text: Remember guys, we need three bags to escape.

pln_esc_requirement_04_bags.base_text: Remember guys, we need four bags to escape.
pln_esc_requirement_04_bags.loc_text: Remember guys, we need four bags to escape.

pln_esc_requirement_05_bags.base_text: Remember guys, we need five bags to escape.
pln_esc_requirement_05_bags.loc_text: Remember guys, we need five bags to escape.

pln_esc_requirement_06_bags.base_text: Remember guys, we need six bags to escape.
pln_esc_requirement_06_bags.loc_text: Remember guys, we need six bags to escape.

pln_esc_requirement_07_bags.base_text: Remember guys, we need seven bags to escape.
pln_esc_requirement_07_bags.loc_text: Remember guys, we need seven bags to escape.

pln_esc_requirement_08_bags.base_text: Remember guys, we need eight bags to escape.
pln_esc_requirement_08_bags.loc_text: Remember guys, we need eight bags to escape.

pln_esc_requirement_09_bags.base_text: Remember guys, we need nine bags to escape.
pln_esc_requirement_09_bags.loc_text: Remember guys, we need nine bags to escape.

pln_esc_requirement_10_bags.base_text: Remember guys, we need ten bags to escape.
pln_esc_requirement_10_bags.loc_text: Remember guys, we need ten bags to escape.

pln_esc_start.base_text: Watch out, guys! The cops are surrounding you!
pln_esc_start.loc_text: Watch out, guys! The cops are surrounding you!

pln_esc_street_chopper_arrived_01.base_text: The chopper's here! Watch out for snipers when you're moving the loot!
pln_esc_street_chopper_arrived_01.loc_text: The chopper's here! Watch out for snipers when you're moving the loot!

pln_esc_street_chopper_arrived_02.base_text: The chopper's ready. Watch out! Those snipers dont want you to leave.
pln_esc_street_chopper_arrived_02.loc_text: The chopper's ready. Watch out! Those snipers dont want you to leave.

pln_esc_street_full_force_01.base_text: Those snipers couldn't stop you, so the cops are prapairing to move in with force. Get ready!
pln_esc_street_full_force_01.loc_text: Those snipers couldn't stop you, so the cops are prapairing to move in with force. Get ready!

pln_esc_street_full_force_02.base_text: The cops are pissed that you just bagged their snipers. They're getting ready to send in the cavalry!
pln_esc_street_full_force_02.loc_text: The cops are pissed that you just bagged their snipers. They're getting ready to send in the cavalry!

pln_esc_street_lookout_sniper_01.base_text: One of you should keep an eye out for those snipers at all times!
pln_esc_street_lookout_sniper_01.loc_text: One of you should keep an eye out for those snipers at all times!

pln_esc_street_lookout_sniper_02.base_text: Those snipers wont leave you alone anytime soon. One of you should keep an eye on those roofs at all times!
pln_esc_street_lookout_sniper_02.loc_text: Those snipers wont leave you alone anytime soon. One of you should keep an eye on those roofs at all times!

pln_esc_street_more_snipers_deployed_03.base_text: A sniper team is moving in!
pln_esc_street_more_snipers_deployed_03.loc_text: A sniper team is moving in!

pln_esc_street_more_snipers_deployed_04.base_text: The cops are deploying more snipers!
pln_esc_street_more_snipers_deployed_04.loc_text: The cops are deploying more snipers!

pln_esc_street_more_snipers_deployed_05.base_text: Additional snipers are entering the area!
pln_esc_street_more_snipers_deployed_05.loc_text: Additional snipers are entering the area!

pln_esc_street_snipers_deployed_01.base_text: A police chopper is coming in to drop of sniper on a nearby building.
pln_esc_street_snipers_deployed_01.loc_text: A police chopper is coming in to drop of sniper on a nearby building.

pln_esc_street_snipers_deployed_02.base_text: Watch out! They are bringing in a sniper team by chopper!
pln_esc_street_snipers_deployed_02.loc_text: Watch out! They are bringing in a sniper team by chopper!

pln_esc_street_snipers_nearby_01.base_text: Stay low! Snipers took out your driver! They must be deployed near by.
pln_esc_street_snipers_nearby_01.loc_text: Stay low! Snipers took out your driver! They must be deployed near by.

pln_esc_street_snipers_nearby_02.base_text: Keep your heads down! They've got snipers in the area!
pln_esc_street_snipers_nearby_02.loc_text: Keep your heads down! They've got snipers in the area!

pln_esc_street_snipers_nearby_03.base_text: Stay low! Snipers have got you pinned!
pln_esc_street_snipers_nearby_03.loc_text: Stay low! Snipers have got you pinned!

pln_esc_street_swats_deployed_01.base_text: The cops are realizing those snipers wont be enough to take you down. They're prepairing to send in SWATs. Get ready!
pln_esc_street_swats_deployed_01.loc_text: The cops are realizing those snipers wont be enough to take you down. They're prepairing to send in SWATs. Get ready!

pln_esc_street_swats_deployed_02.base_text: The cops know the snipers wont be able to finsh this. They're prepairing to send in the troops!
pln_esc_street_swats_deployed_02.loc_text: The cops know the snipers wont be able to finsh this. They're prepairing to send in the troops!

pln_esc_street_swats_deployed_03.base_text: Heads up, SWATs are moving in to try to finish this.
pln_esc_street_swats_deployed_03.loc_text: Heads up, SWATs are moving in to try to finish this.

pln_esc_warn_timelimit_heli.base_text: You'll have to move fast when the chopper arrives. It can't stay long with this amount of heat.
pln_esc_warn_timelimit_heli.loc_text: You'll have to move fast when the chopper arrives. It can't stay long with this amount of heat.

pln_esc_warn_timelimit_van.base_text: The van won't be able to stay long. You gotta move fast when it arrives!
pln_esc_warn_timelimit_van.loc_text: The van won't be able to stay long. You gotta move fast when it arrives!

pln_ff3_03_any_01.base_text: OK, OK, we gotta change this up!
pln_ff3_03_any_01.loc_text: OK, OK, we gotta change this up!

pln_ff3_04_any_01.base_text: The arms deal guys... We got to get that deal exposed in the media and fast. It will create a framing effect for sure.
pln_ff3_04_any_01.loc_text: The arms deal guys... We got to get that deal exposed in the media and fast. It will create a framing effect for sure.

pln_ff3_05_any_01.base_text: Find me his server room. I will scan his stuff for info on the arms deal.
pln_ff3_05_any_01.loc_text: Find me his server room. I will scan his stuff for info on the arms deal.

pln_ff3_07_any_01.base_text: Ah, OK! I'm getting some juicy stuff here!
pln_ff3_07_any_01.loc_text: Ah, OK! I'm getting some juicy stuff here!

pln_ff3_07_any_02.base_text: Seems like the deal was a gold arms transaction. Made here in DC.
pln_ff3_07_any_02.loc_text: Seems like the deal was a gold arms transaction. Made here in DC.

pln_ff3_07_any_03.base_text: I get why the Elephant wants this. It is tons of gold in this deal!
pln_ff3_07_any_03.loc_text: I get why the Elephant wants this. It is tons of gold in this deal!

pln_ff3_07_any_04.base_text: Ah, we should have sneaked this. Tons of gold in this deal.
pln_ff3_07_any_04.loc_text: Ah, we should have sneaked this. Tons of gold in this deal.

pln_ff3_07_any_05.base_text: Alright, I found video of him doing the deal... It is insane. He sure is a show-off.
pln_ff3_07_any_05.loc_text: Alright, I found video of him doing the deal... It is insane. He sure is a show-off.

pln_ff3_07_any_06.base_text: Oh, my! Seems like the good senator did the deal and partied at the same time - looks like a arms-gold-coke deal.
pln_ff3_07_any_06.loc_text: Oh, my! Seems like the good senator did the deal and partied at the same time - looks like a arms-gold-coke deal.

pln_ff3_07_any_07.base_text: OK! We got some real scandal stuff here. He sold government arms to a rogue state - got paid in gold. The Democrats aint gonna like this.
pln_ff3_07_any_07.loc_text: OK! We got some real scandal stuff here. He sold government arms to a rogue state - got paid in gold. The Democrats aint gonna like this.

pln_ff3_07_any_08.base_text: Press are going to party on this poor guy. Seems the deal went down in public office too!
pln_ff3_07_any_08.loc_text: Press are going to party on this poor guy. Seems the deal went down in public office too!

pln_ff3_07_any_09.base_text: I'll pack this into files and get ready to stream it up to the press.
pln_ff3_07_any_09.loc_text: I'll pack this into files and get ready to stream it up to the press.

pln_ff3_07_any_10.base_text: Keep that news feed alive and I'll start getting you a way out of there.
pln_ff3_07_any_10.loc_text: Keep that news feed alive and I'll start getting you a way out of there.

pln_ff3_08_any_01.base_text: This will work as a frame - won't be fantastic, but we will get paid. Let's get you out!
pln_ff3_08_any_01.loc_text: This will work as a frame - won't be fantastic, but we will get paid. Let's get you out!

pln_ff3_09_any_01.base_text: What a flat! These arms deals sure are a nice addition to his senator pay.
pln_ff3_09_any_01.loc_text: What a flat! These arms deals sure are a nice addition to his senator pay.

pln_ff3_10_any_01.base_text: Man... This place... Find that gold and we can buy one of our own.
pln_ff3_10_any_01.loc_text: Man... This place... Find that gold and we can buy one of our own.

pln_ff3_11_any_01.base_text: OK, be careful! It will be worth sneaking all the way through, boys. No alarms and this framing will be perfect!
pln_ff3_11_any_01.loc_text: OK, be careful! It will be worth sneaking all the way through, boys. No alarms and this framing will be perfect!

pln_ff3_12_any_01.base_text: Look at all these nice things. Must have done a lot of public service in his career.
pln_ff3_12_any_01.loc_text: Look at all these nice things. Must have done a lot of public service in his career.

pln_ff3_13_any_01.base_text: Public office. Wow, we are in the wrong line of work gentlemen.
pln_ff3_13_any_01.loc_text: Public office. Wow, we are in the wrong line of work gentlemen.

pln_ff3_15_any_01.base_text: Yes, that is the epicenter - right there. I wonder what kind of treasure that house can hold. OK, on with our heist here.
pln_ff3_15_any_01.loc_text: Yes, that is the epicenter - right there. I wonder what kind of treasure that house can hold. OK, on with our heist here.

pln_ff3_16_any_01.base_text: 1600 Penn, maybe we go there for our next big score.
pln_ff3_16_any_01.loc_text: 1600 Penn, maybe we go there for our next big score.

pln_ff3_17_any_01.base_text: Ah, that is the vault guys. That door, we can't get through it this time. But the gold... The gold on the other side! Well, we got to leave it.
pln_ff3_17_any_01.loc_text: Ah, that is the vault guys. That door, we can't get through it this time. But the gold... The gold on the other side! Well, we got to leave it.

pln_ff3_18_any_01.base_text: It feels bad to leave the gold, but we will get paid. Maybe we can return.
pln_ff3_18_any_01.loc_text: It feels bad to leave the gold, but we will get paid. Maybe we can return.

pln_firestarter_stage1_brief_01.base_text: A little bird told me the Mendozas are flying in more weapons in preparation for the war with Hector. We go to their airport, find the weapons and take them all or destroy them.
pln_firestarter_stage1_brief_01.loc_text: A little bird told me the Mendozas are flying in more weapons in preparation for the war with Hector. We go to their airport, find the weapons and take them all or destroy them.

pln_firestarter_stage1_brief_01b.base_text: Preferably take them as the money will be great that way.
pln_firestarter_stage1_brief_01b.loc_text: Preferably take them as the money will be great that way.

pln_firestarter_stage1_brief_02.base_text: Hector wants to send a message in, quote en quote, blood and fire to the Mendoza cartel as they roll into their private airport. Might be tricky... But I think we can.
pln_firestarter_stage1_brief_02.loc_text: Hector wants to send a message in, quote en quote, blood and fire to the Mendoza cartel as they roll into their private airport. Might be tricky... But I think we can.

pln_firestarter_stage1_brief_02b.base_text: A little bird told me the Mendozas are flying in more weapons in preparation for the war with Hector.
pln_firestarter_stage1_brief_02b.loc_text: A little bird told me the Mendozas are flying in more weapons in preparation for the war with Hector.

pln_firestarter_stage1_brief_02c.base_text: We go to their little private airport, find the weapons and take them all or destroy them... But it's more profitable if we take them.
pln_firestarter_stage1_brief_02c.loc_text: We go to their little private airport, find the weapons and take them all or destroy them... But it's more profitable if we take them.

pln_firestarter_stage1_end_a_01.base_text: And now Mendoza and his goons are down a lot of firepower. Hector's people will face a lot less resistance thanks to you. He might even appreciate us. Well done.
pln_firestarter_stage1_end_a_01.loc_text: And now Mendoza and his goons are down a lot of firepower. Hector's people will face a lot less resistance thanks to you. He might even appreciate us. Well done.

pln_firestarter_stage1_end_a_01b.base_text: OK we're good to go. I'll get you guys cleared to the safe house. Their arsenal is gone. Their soldiers toothless.
pln_firestarter_stage1_end_a_01b.loc_text: OK we're good to go. I'll get you guys cleared to the safe house. Their arsenal is gone. Their soldiers toothless.

pln_firestarter_stage1_end_a_02.base_text: We pulled Mendoza's teeth on that job - destroying those weapons is gonna leave him with a lot more bark than bite. I bet Hector bumps us up the food chain for sure.
pln_firestarter_stage1_end_a_02.loc_text: We pulled Mendoza's teeth on that job - destroying those weapons is gonna leave him with a lot more bark than bite. I bet Hector bumps us up the food chain for sure.

pln_firestarter_stage1_end_a_02b.base_text: Well executed. Guns destroyed and Hector is informed. Let's cash in.
pln_firestarter_stage1_end_a_02b.loc_text: Well executed. Guns destroyed and Hector is informed. Let's cash in.

pln_firestarter_stage1_end_a_03.base_text: That was close. Good work disposing of those guns. Hector will move in his army now and we will have a very fine payday indeed.
pln_firestarter_stage1_end_a_03.loc_text: That was close. Good work disposing of those guns. Hector will move in his army now and we will have a very fine payday indeed.

pln_firestarter_stage1_end_b_01.base_text: You dont let me down. Hector will be proud of this work. We are in business for real.
pln_firestarter_stage1_end_b_01.loc_text: You dont let me down. Hector will be proud of this work. We are in business for real.

pln_firestarter_stage1_end_b_01b.base_text: Good work people. This could have gone poorly but you managed to keep us in the black. Arms trading, anyone?
pln_firestarter_stage1_end_b_01b.loc_text: Good work people. This could have gone poorly but you managed to keep us in the black. Arms trading, anyone?

pln_firestarter_stage1_end_b_02.base_text: Look like you are heavily loaded - that was all the guns right? I'll have to make it harder next time. Maybe wear a blindfold or something. Well done.
pln_firestarter_stage1_end_b_02.loc_text: Look like you are heavily loaded - that was all the guns right? I'll have to make it harder next time. Maybe wear a blindfold or something. Well done.

pln_firestarter_stage1_end_b_03.base_text: That worked like a charm. Well fought and well carried out if you know what I mean. Payday is coming our way, well deserved.
pln_firestarter_stage1_end_b_03.loc_text: That worked like a charm. Well fought and well carried out if you know what I mean. Payday is coming our way, well deserved.

pln_firestarter_stage1_end_b_04.base_text: More guns, more money. Great work. Hector is waiting for us.
pln_firestarter_stage1_end_b_04.loc_text: More guns, more money. Great work. Hector is waiting for us.

pln_firestarter_stage1_intro_a_01.base_text: OK, the airport is just down the hill. Cut through the fence and find the hangar where the truck holding the cases is. The Mendozas will probably be there. Go get those weapons or make sure they don't.
pln_firestarter_stage1_intro_a_01.loc_text: OK, the airport is just down the hill. Cut through the fence and find the hangar where the truck holding the cases is. The Mendozas will probably be there. Go get those weapons or make sure they don't.

pln_firestarter_stage1_intro_a_01b.base_text: You're gonna go in through the fence, find the guns and bring 'em back here. They're not going down without a fight. If it hits the fan out there - destroy the guns.
pln_firestarter_stage1_intro_a_01b.loc_text: You're gonna go in through the fence, find the guns and bring 'em back here. They're not going down without a fight. If it hits the fan out there - destroy the guns.

pln_firestarter_stage1_intro_a_02.base_text: The Mendozas are going to be busy loading their guns in the warehouse. Go in and hit 'em fast before they go all Lord of War on you. Get those weapons or destroy 'em.
pln_firestarter_stage1_intro_a_02.loc_text: The Mendozas are going to be busy loading their guns in the warehouse. Go in and hit 'em fast before they go all Lord of War on you. Get those weapons or destroy 'em.

pln_firestarter_stage1_intro_a_02b.base_text: Once you're in, find the crates and destroy them or bring them back. You want to do more, be my guest.
pln_firestarter_stage1_intro_a_02b.loc_text: Once you're in, find the crates and destroy them or bring them back. You want to do more, be my guest.

pln_firestarter_stage2_01_any_01.base_text: OK, find a way inside, stay low, and keep an eye out for guards and cameras.
pln_firestarter_stage2_01_any_01.loc_text: OK, find a way inside, stay low, and keep an eye out for guards and cameras.

pln_firestarter_stage2_03_any_01.base_text: Good, you are inside, now, locate the server room.
pln_firestarter_stage2_03_any_01.loc_text: Good, you are inside, now, locate the server room.

pln_firestarter_stage2_04_any_01.base_text: We're looking for a Gensec security door - the security room is in there.
pln_firestarter_stage2_04_any_01.loc_text: We're looking for a Gensec security door - the security room is in there.

pln_firestarter_stage2_05_any_01.base_text: Should be a higher security type of door, look for a Gensec logo.
pln_firestarter_stage2_05_any_01.loc_text: Should be a higher security type of door, look for a Gensec logo.

pln_firestarter_stage2_06_any_01.base_text: Alright, locate the server room, and get inside, there's no point in disabling the alarms now.
pln_firestarter_stage2_06_any_01.loc_text: Alright, locate the server room, and get inside, there's no point in disabling the alarms now.

pln_firestarter_stage2_07_any_01.base_text: Alright, that's the door to the server room.
pln_firestarter_stage2_07_any_01.loc_text: Alright, that's the door to the server room.

pln_firestarter_stage2_08_any_01.base_text: It's alarmed, so don't open it yet. we need to disable the alarm first.
pln_firestarter_stage2_08_any_01.loc_text: It's alarmed, so don't open it yet. we need to disable the alarm first.

pln_firestarter_stage2_11_any_01.base_text: Use that terminal - I want access to their systems.
pln_firestarter_stage2_11_any_01.loc_text: Use that terminal - I want access to their systems.

pln_firestarter_stage2_14_any_01.base_text: ...There's 3 Gensec security boxes we need to disable.
pln_firestarter_stage2_14_any_01.loc_text: ...There's 3 Gensec security boxes we need to disable.

pln_firestarter_stage2_15_any_01.base_text: ...There's 2 Gensec security boxes we need to disable.
pln_firestarter_stage2_15_any_01.loc_text: ...There's 2 Gensec security boxes we need to disable.

pln_firestarter_stage2_16_any_01.base_text: ...There's 1 Gensec security box we need to disable.
pln_firestarter_stage2_16_any_01.loc_text: ...There's 1 Gensec security box we need to disable.

pln_firestarter_stage2_17_any_01.base_text: I've marked them for you - get to them, and cut the wire.
pln_firestarter_stage2_17_any_01.loc_text: I've marked them for you - get to them, and cut the wire.

pln_firestarter_stage2_22_any_01.base_text: Great, that's it. Now you can open the door.
pln_firestarter_stage2_22_any_01.loc_text: Great, that's it. Now you can open the door.

pln_firestarter_stage2_23_any_01.base_text: Ah, I see you already took care of the security boxes. Planning ahead, I like this.
pln_firestarter_stage2_23_any_01.loc_text: Ah, I see you already took care of the security boxes. Planning ahead, I like this.

pln_firestarter_stage2_24_any_01.base_text: What are you doing? Wait for me to mark them out. We need to cut the right wire.
pln_firestarter_stage2_24_any_01.loc_text: What are you doing? Wait for me to mark them out. We need to cut the right wire.

pln_firestarter_stage2_26_any_01.base_text: Now there's only one more door between you and the server.
pln_firestarter_stage2_26_any_01.loc_text: Now there's only one more door between you and the server.

pln_firestarter_stage2_27_any_01.base_text: Open up that last door and get to the server.
pln_firestarter_stage2_27_any_01.loc_text: Open up that last door and get to the server.

pln_firestarter_stage2_28_any_01.base_text: Awesome job gang! Last step - you need to dismantle the server and bring it to the car.
pln_firestarter_stage2_28_any_01.loc_text: Awesome job gang! Last step - you need to dismantle the server and bring it to the car.

pln_firestarter_stage2_29_any_01.base_text: Alright, you got it. Let's get out of here!
pln_firestarter_stage2_29_any_01.loc_text: Alright, you got it. Let's get out of here!

pln_firestarter_stage2_30_any_01.base_text: Don't mess up or get seen now. Almost there...
pln_firestarter_stage2_30_any_01.loc_text: Don't mess up or get seen now. Almost there...

pln_firestarter_stage2_31_any_01.base_text: There's a car waiting for you, just across the road.
pln_firestarter_stage2_31_any_01.loc_text: There's a car waiting for you, just across the road.

pln_firestarter_stage2_32_any_01.base_text: They didn't even see us coming. Great work! See you at the safe house.
pln_firestarter_stage2_32_any_01.loc_text: They didn't even see us coming. Great work! See you at the safe house.

pln_firestarter_stage2_33_any_01.base_text: Oh no, that's the alarm! Lets go to plan B.
pln_firestarter_stage2_33_any_01.loc_text: Oh no, that's the alarm! Lets go to plan B.

pln_firestarter_stage2_34_any_01.base_text: Get that server anyway you can!
pln_firestarter_stage2_34_any_01.loc_text: Get that server anyway you can!

pln_firestarter_stage2_36_any_01.base_text: What are you doing!? You didnt even make it inside, Let's go to plan B, and next time, stay low.
pln_firestarter_stage2_36_any_01.loc_text: What are you doing!? You didnt even make it inside, Let's go to plan B, and next time, stay low.

pln_firestarter_stage2_37_any_01.base_text: There are SWATs rappelling in to the office!
pln_firestarter_stage2_37_any_01.loc_text: There are SWATs rappelling in to the office!

pln_firestarter_stage2_brief_01.base_text: Now Hector tells me we need to hit the Mendozas themselves for information. Where they keep their money, in fact.
pln_firestarter_stage2_brief_01.loc_text: Now Hector tells me we need to hit the Mendozas themselves for information. Where they keep their money, in fact.

pln_firestarter_stage2_brief_01b.base_text: Lucky for us, someone in the Mendoza cartel gave up info that they're being investigated by the FBI. So all we need to do is hit the local FBI office handling the cartel to get the data.
pln_firestarter_stage2_brief_01b.loc_text: Lucky for us, someone in the Mendoza cartel gave up info that they're being investigated by the FBI. So all we need to do is hit the local FBI office handling the cartel to get the data.

pln_firestarter_stage2_brief_01c.base_text: And yes I know. Out of the frying pan, into the fire...
pln_firestarter_stage2_brief_01c.loc_text: And yes I know. Out of the frying pan, into the fire...

pln_firestarter_stage2_end_a_01.base_text: Wow. This would make a great tv movie. For someone who isn't you. Anyway now we know where the Mendoza bank is located.
pln_firestarter_stage2_end_a_01.loc_text: Wow. This would make a great tv movie. For someone who isn't you. Anyway now we know where the Mendoza bank is located.

pln_firestarter_stage2_end_a_02.base_text: Terrific. Because of you we know where all the Mendoza cash is stashed. It's one of the Trustee branch banks. I guess you know what comes next, huh?
pln_firestarter_stage2_end_a_02.loc_text: Terrific. Because of you we know where all the Mendoza cash is stashed. It's one of the Trustee branch banks. I guess you know what comes next, huh?

pln_firestarter_stage2_end_a_03.base_text: Good work, crew. Now if Hector knew we just hit the FBI for the info he might worry a bit. But what Hector doesn't know won't hurt him. Let's go banking, shall we?
pln_firestarter_stage2_end_a_03.loc_text: Good work, crew. Now if Hector knew we just hit the FBI for the info he might worry a bit. But what Hector doesn't know won't hurt him. Let's go banking, shall we?

pln_firestarter_stage2_end_b_01.base_text: Well I guess the whole keep a low profile is now out of the question. On the other hand, even bad publicity is good publicity, and we got what we came for. Well done.
pln_firestarter_stage2_end_b_01.loc_text: Well I guess the whole keep a low profile is now out of the question. On the other hand, even bad publicity is good publicity, and we got what we came for. Well done.

pln_firestarter_stage2_end_b_02.base_text: It's pretty hot out there. In fact I would bet you are more wanted than Mendoza now. Hector will probably think we're behind it, not being stupid.
pln_firestarter_stage2_end_b_02.loc_text: It's pretty hot out there. In fact I would bet you are more wanted than Mendoza now. Hector will probably think we're behind it, not being stupid.

pln_firestarter_stage2_end_b_02b.base_text: Let's just fix this bank and burn the Mendoza money ASAP. We can find you new identities after.
pln_firestarter_stage2_end_b_02b.loc_text: Let's just fix this bank and burn the Mendoza money ASAP. We can find you new identities after.

pln_firestarter_stage2_intro_a_01.base_text: The FBI temp office is across the street. Sneak inside, get me access to their server room and see what other Mendoza info is lying around.
pln_firestarter_stage2_intro_a_01.loc_text: The FBI temp office is across the street. Sneak inside, get me access to their server room and see what other Mendoza info is lying around.

pln_firestarter_stage2_intro_a_01b.base_text: I don't think I need to mention what happens if you get found out.
pln_firestarter_stage2_intro_a_01b.loc_text: I don't think I need to mention what happens if you get found out.

pln_firestarter_stage2_intro_a_02.base_text: You're going into the hornet's nest. So don't kick the damn thing, huh.
pln_firestarter_stage2_intro_a_02.loc_text: You're going into the hornet's nest. So don't kick the damn thing, huh.

pln_firestarter_stage2_intro_a_02b.base_text: Sneak in, check the cameras to see the Feds working those thankless hours. Get the Mendoza info on the FBI server and get out. Go easy.
pln_firestarter_stage2_intro_a_02b.loc_text: Sneak in, check the cameras to see the Feds working those thankless hours. Get the Mendoza info on the FBI server and get out. Go easy.

pln_firestarter_stage2_intro_a_03.base_text: OK folks. Going straight to the source. Inside that place is the info we need - and way more law than we want to be close to. Find their server room and get the info on the bank. I'll do the rest.
pln_firestarter_stage2_intro_a_03.loc_text: OK folks. Going straight to the source. Inside that place is the info we need - and way more law than we want to be close to. Find their server room and get the info on the bank. I'll do the rest.

pln_firestarter_stage3_01_any_01.base_text: OK guys, get into the bank and find the vault and drill it open. Make sure no one triggers the alarm or escapes.
pln_firestarter_stage3_01_any_01.loc_text: OK guys, get into the bank and find the vault and drill it open. Make sure no one triggers the alarm or escapes.

pln_firestarter_stage3_02_any_01.base_text: Holy shit! Looks like they've electrified the vault!
pln_firestarter_stage3_02_any_01.loc_text: Holy shit! Looks like they've electrified the vault!

pln_firestarter_stage3_03_any_01.base_text: Get to the generator on the roof and shut it down.
pln_firestarter_stage3_03_any_01.loc_text: Get to the generator on the roof and shut it down.

pln_firestarter_stage3_04_any_01.base_text: That should do it, you can place the drill now.
pln_firestarter_stage3_04_any_01.loc_text: That should do it, you can place the drill now.

pln_firestarter_stage3_06_any_01.base_text: OK, Hector wants us to record this so first set up the camera.
pln_firestarter_stage3_06_any_01.loc_text: OK, Hector wants us to record this so first set up the camera.

pln_firestarter_stage3_08_any_01.base_text: OK, while we wait for the money to burn you can open up some of those deposit boxes, what ever we find in there is ours.
pln_firestarter_stage3_08_any_01.loc_text: OK, while we wait for the money to burn you can open up some of those deposit boxes, what ever we find in there is ours.

pln_firestarter_stage3_09_any_01.base_text: OK, that's enough, get the recording and lets get out of here.
pln_firestarter_stage3_09_any_01.loc_text: OK, that's enough, get the recording and lets get out of here.

pln_firestarter_stage3_10_any_01.base_text: The car will pick you up around the corner.
pln_firestarter_stage3_10_any_01.loc_text: The car will pick you up around the corner.

pln_firestarter_stage3_11_any_01.base_text: A civilian escaped, must have called the cops!
pln_firestarter_stage3_11_any_01.loc_text: A civilian escaped, must have called the cops!

pln_firestarter_stage3_13_any_01.base_text: The surveillance guard triggered the alarm.
pln_firestarter_stage3_13_any_01.loc_text: The surveillance guard triggered the alarm.

pln_firestarter_stage3_16_any_01.base_text: There's a SWAT helicopter on the roof.
pln_firestarter_stage3_16_any_01.loc_text: There's a SWAT helicopter on the roof.

pln_firestarter_stage3_17_any_01.base_text: There are snipers on the surrounding buildings.
pln_firestarter_stage3_17_any_01.loc_text: There are snipers on the surrounding buildings.

pln_firestarter_stage3_brief_01.base_text: This is the place, people... This bank here holds all the Mendoza capital north of the border.
pln_firestarter_stage3_brief_01.loc_text: This is the place, people... This bank here holds all the Mendoza capital north of the border.

pln_firestarter_stage3_brief_01b.base_text: Little old grandmothers walk right by their blood money every day. Hidden in plain sight, Hector says. At least $100 million in black cash.
pln_firestarter_stage3_brief_01b.loc_text: Little old grandmothers walk right by their blood money every day. Hidden in plain sight, Hector says. At least $100 million in black cash.

pln_firestarter_stage3_brief_01c.base_text: What you're gonna do is go in, control the crowd, get into the vault without the alarms going off. Then set a fire, and film yourself doing it. Hector wants it that way.
pln_firestarter_stage3_brief_01c.loc_text: What you're gonna do is go in, control the crowd, get into the vault without the alarms going off. Then set a fire, and film yourself doing it. Hector wants it that way.

pln_firestarter_stage3_end_a_01.base_text: Hector got the footage. I'm told he laughed long and hard. And now the FBI looks impossibly incompetent, which takes a lot of heat off of us. Great work.
pln_firestarter_stage3_end_a_01.loc_text: Hector got the footage. I'm told he laughed long and hard. And now the FBI looks impossibly incompetent, which takes a lot of heat off of us. Great work.

pln_firestarter_stage3_end_a_02.base_text: I know that was a lot of money to send up in smoke and I apologize, I know it goes against your nature, but hopefully you find the compensation competitive.
pln_firestarter_stage3_end_a_02.loc_text: I know that was a lot of money to send up in smoke and I apologize, I know it goes against your nature, but hopefully you find the compensation competitive.

pln_firestarter_stage3_end_a_02b.base_text: And it was the right thing not to mess with Hector here - playing with fire would have gotten us burned.
pln_firestarter_stage3_end_a_02b.loc_text: And it was the right thing not to mess with Hector here - playing with fire would have gotten us burned.

pln_firestarter_stage3_end_a_03.base_text: FBI in disarray. A lot of people about to get called into their bosses' office. Mendoza crippled and we're about to get paid. Nice burn, folks.
pln_firestarter_stage3_end_a_03.loc_text: FBI in disarray. A lot of people about to get called into their bosses' office. Mendoza crippled and we're about to get paid. Nice burn, folks.

pln_firestarter_stage3_end_a_04.base_text: Mendoza's not going to like that outcome. But we should. Well done. Go get paid.
pln_firestarter_stage3_end_a_04.loc_text: Mendoza's not going to like that outcome. But we should. Well done. Go get paid.

pln_firestarter_stage3_end_b_01.base_text: The Mendoza cartel just got knocked on its ass. Nothing hurts like taking a financial beating and they just took a big one. Hector will rise and that's good fortune for us down the line.
pln_firestarter_stage3_end_b_01.loc_text: The Mendoza cartel just got knocked on its ass. Nothing hurts like taking a financial beating and they just took a big one. Hector will rise and that's good fortune for us down the line.

pln_firestarter_stage3_end_b_02.base_text: Burning 100 million dollars is a hell of a thing. It makes me feel like a real banker. All in a day's work. See you at the safe house.
pln_firestarter_stage3_end_b_02.loc_text: Burning 100 million dollars is a hell of a thing. It makes me feel like a real banker. All in a day's work. See you at the safe house.

pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_01.base_text: One more time: sneak in, watch for cameras, guards and any other alarms. Go in fast but careful. Don't get sloppy.
pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_01.loc_text: One more time: sneak in, watch for cameras, guards and any other alarms. Go in fast but careful. Don't get sloppy.

pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_01b.base_text: Then find that money, torch it, and for god's sake record it with the camera I gave you.
pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_01b.loc_text: Then find that money, torch it, and for god's sake record it with the camera I gave you.

pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_01c.base_text: Hector wants proof we didn't just swipe the cash.
pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_01c.loc_text: Hector wants proof we didn't just swipe the cash.

pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_02.base_text: OK folks: you go in, breach the vault with the thermal lance, burn the money and remember to film it.
pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_02.loc_text: OK folks: you go in, breach the vault with the thermal lance, burn the money and remember to film it.

pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_02b.base_text: Hector needs footage to show the world and, well, for our own safety.
pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_02b.loc_text: Hector needs footage to show the world and, well, for our own safety.

pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_02c.base_text: I'd rather not piss off the cartel.
pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_02c.loc_text: I'd rather not piss off the cartel.

pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_03.base_text: Trustee bank is up ahead. Go in, find the vault, blaze the money, video the whole thing and get out. FBI is on the highest alert so make it quick and clean. Let's do it.
pln_firestarter_stage3_intro_a_03.loc_text: Trustee bank is up ahead. Go in, find the vault, blaze the money, video the whole thing and get out. FBI is on the highest alert so make it quick and clean. Let's do it.

pln_fish_01a_01.loc_text: Wow, this boat is expensive. This Powell guy's got money.

pln_fish_01a_02.base_text: Heh, I wonder if this boat is worth more than what's hidden on it.
pln_fish_01a_02.loc_text: Heh, I wonder if this boat is worth more than what's hidden on it.

pln_fish_01a_03.base_text: This friend of McKendrick's sure has the bling, by the looks of it.
pln_fish_01a_03.loc_text: This friend of McKendrick's sure has the bling, by the looks of it.

pln_fish_01b_01.base_text: Now search the boat, but be careful.
pln_fish_01b_01.loc_text: Now search the boat, but be careful.

pln_fish_01b_02.base_text: Go quiet and keep your eyes open.
pln_fish_01b_02.loc_text: Go quiet and keep your eyes open.

pln_fish_01b_03.base_text: Careful now. I hope you didn't bring your squeaky shoes.
pln_fish_01b_03.loc_text: Careful now. I hope you didn't bring your squeaky shoes.

pln_hb1_15_02.base_text: Reboot the hack. And keep the cops off it!

pln_hb1_15_03.base_text: Cops screwed the hack. Reboot it!

pln_hb1_16_03.base_text: Alright, look's like it's working again. Great.
pln_hb1_16_03.loc_text: Alright, look's like it's working again. Great.

pln_hb1_17_01.base_text: It's done. Now hit the button, and lower the bollards.
pln_hb1_17_01.loc_text: It's done. Now hit the button, and lower the bollards.

pln_hb1_17_02.base_text: Into the system. Now just press the button and drop those bollards!
pln_hb1_17_02.loc_text: Into the system. Now just press the button and drop those bollards!

pln_hb1_17_03.base_text: Great! Now, hit that button, drop the bollards and get out of there!
pln_hb1_17_03.loc_text: Great! Now, hit that button, drop the bollards and get out of there!

pln_hb1_18_01.base_text: Just put the ticket back in the gate and we're home free!
pln_hb1_18_01.loc_text: Just put the ticket back in the gate and we're home free!

pln_hb1_18_02.base_text: Who had that ticket? Get it to the gate.
pln_hb1_18_02.loc_text: Who had that ticket? Get it to the gate.

pln_hb1_18_03.base_text: Put the ticket in the gate. Let's finish this.
pln_hb1_18_03.loc_text: Put the ticket in the gate. Let's finish this.

pln_hb1_19_01.base_text: Seven bucks!? We were hardly here!
pln_hb1_19_01.loc_text: Seven bucks!? We were hardly here!

pln_hb1_19_02.base_text: How much for parking? That's a robbery!
pln_hb1_19_02.loc_text: How much for parking? That's a robbery!

pln_hb1_20b_01.base_text: Gonna speed things up. Get that plating off the truck!
pln_hb1_20b_01.loc_text: Gonna speed things up. Get that plating off the truck!

pln_hb1_20b_02.base_text: Time to move fast, guys. Yank that armor off the truck.
pln_hb1_20b_02.loc_text: Time to move fast, guys. Yank that armor off the truck.

pln_hb1_20b_03.base_text: Feel the need for speed, gang. Strip the armor off the truck.
pln_hb1_20b_03.loc_text: Feel the need for speed, gang. Strip the armor off the truck.

pln_hb1_22_01.base_text: Move that car so we can get the hell out of here.
pln_hb1_22_01.loc_text: Move that car so we can get the hell out of here.

pln_hb1_22_02.base_text: Get that car out of the way.
pln_hb1_22_02.loc_text: Get that car out of the way.

pln_hb1_22_03.base_text: You need to clear that car.
pln_hb1_22_03.loc_text: You need to clear that car.

pln_hb1_23_01.base_text: Alright. Let the driver know you're ready to move.
pln_hb1_23_01.loc_text: Alright. Let the driver know you're ready to move.

pln_hb1_23_02.base_text: Great! Signal the driver that it's clear.
pln_hb1_23_02.loc_text: Great! Signal the driver that it's clear.

pln_hb1_23_03.base_text: Now let the driver know it's clear!
pln_hb1_23_03.loc_text: Now let the driver know it's clear!

pln_hb1_24_01.base_text: Gang, the cops have the city locked down. Fighting through is the only option, so we need you on the ground. That means the truck is going to stay with you.
pln_hb1_24_01.loc_text: Gang, the cops have the city locked down. Fighting through is the only option, so we need you on the ground. That means the truck is going to stay with you.

pln_hb1_24_02.base_text: Gang, cops have set up a three block perimeter. The hard way through is the only way, so you're boots on the ground. Stay with the truck, and the truck will stay with you.
pln_hb1_24_02.loc_text: Gang, cops have set up a three block perimeter. The hard way through is the only way, so you're boots on the ground. Stay with the truck, and the truck will stay with you.

pln_hb1_24_03.base_text: Guys, the city is locked down! Cops are defending in depth, and you need to drive through. Loud is the only way. Driver's taking it easy, so stay with the truck!
pln_hb1_24_03.loc_text: Guys, the city is locked down! Cops are defending in depth, and you need to drive through. Loud is the only way. Driver's taking it easy, so stay with the truck!

pln_hb1_25_01.base_text: Get Hoxton up to the street. Get him to the safe house!
pln_hb1_25_01.loc_text: Get Hoxton up to the street. Get him to the safe house!

pln_hb1_25_02.base_text: Get Hox outta there! Up to the street! Move it!
pln_hb1_25_02.loc_text: Get Hox outta there! Up to the street! Move it!

pln_hb1_25_03.base_text: Driver is waiting on the street. Get Hox up there.
pln_hb1_25_03.loc_text: Driver is waiting on the street. Get Hox up there.

pln_hb1_brf_01_01.base_text: The Dentist got Hoxton a re-trial. Uh, not you, Hox - I mean Old... Look, we'll sort out names later. The trial will be quick. With his record, he ain't gonna walk, but that's not the point. The point is he's moving, and we can hit him in transit. We're going to grab him right after the hearing. A nice little 'screw you' to the US justice system.$NL;$NL;The plan is as loud as it gets: we blast a wall in the courthouse, grab Hox and get him the hell out.$NL;$NL;Area's locked down for blocks around. They'll be expecting trouble. Have your guns ready and pack a lot of ammo.
