pln_hb1_intro_01.base_text: Houston, come here. Shh, keep quiet.
pln_hb1_intro_01.loc_text: Houston, come here. Shh, keep quiet.

pln_hb2_01_01.base_text: Now bring the encryption keys back to Hoxton so he can get to work on the next server.
pln_hb2_01_01.loc_text: Now bring the encryption keys back to Hoxton so he can get to work on the next server.

pln_hb2_01_02.base_text: Good. Now get those keys back to Hox.
pln_hb2_01_02.loc_text: Good. Now get those keys back to Hox.

pln_hb2_01_03.base_text: Great. Now get the keys to Hox. Decrypting the servers will help pinpoint the traitor.
pln_hb2_01_03.loc_text: Great. Now get the keys to Hox. Decrypting the servers will help pinpoint the traitor.

pln_hb2_02_01.base_text: The testimonies are somewhere in the Archives. Search through their records and see if you can't find them.
pln_hb2_02_01.loc_text: The testimonies are somewhere in the Archives. Search through their records and see if you can't find them.

pln_hb2_02_02.base_text: The testimonies Hox needs are down here somewhere. Search the records.
pln_hb2_02_02.loc_text: The testimonies Hox needs are down here somewhere. Search the records.

pln_hb2_02_03.base_text: Get looking through the records. Find those testimonies.
pln_hb2_02_03.loc_text: Get looking through the records. Find those testimonies.

pln_hb2_03_01.base_text: Right, that's the files. Get them back to Hoxton!
pln_hb2_03_01.loc_text: Right, that's the files. Get them back to Hoxton!

pln_hb2_03_02.base_text: That's them! Now, get them back to Hoxton.
pln_hb2_03_02.loc_text: That's them! Now, get them back to Hoxton.

pln_hb2_03_03.base_text: You got 'em! Now get back to Operations!
pln_hb2_03_03.loc_text: You got 'em! Now get back to Operations!

pln_hb2_04_01.base_text: OK, the server is in one of the offices in the IT Department. Figure out where it is and grab it!
pln_hb2_04_01.loc_text: OK, the server is in one of the offices in the IT Department. Figure out where it is and grab it!

pln_hb2_04_02.base_text: The missing server is probably lying on the desk of some IT monkey. Get down there and find it.
pln_hb2_04_02.loc_text: The missing server is probably lying on the desk of some IT monkey. Get down there and find it.

pln_hb2_04_03.base_text: IT are nearby. Get over there, find the server and haul it back.
pln_hb2_04_03.loc_text: IT are nearby. Get over there, find the server and haul it back.

pln_hb2_05_01.base_text: Good, now get it back to Hoxton!
pln_hb2_05_01.loc_text: Good, now get it back to Hoxton!

pln_hb2_05_02.base_text: Great. Now haul it back up to the Operations Room.
pln_hb2_05_02.loc_text: Great. Now haul it back up to the Operations Room.

pln_hb2_05_03.base_text: That's it. Great! Now return it to Hoxton.
pln_hb2_05_03.loc_text: That's it. Great! Now return it to Hoxton.

pln_hb2_06_01.base_text: Escort whoever is carrying that server. It's gonna be heavy, and I think the cops will try to liberate it from you.
pln_hb2_06_01.loc_text: Escort whoever is carrying that server. It's gonna be heavy, and I think the cops will try to liberate it from you.

pln_hb2_06_02.base_text: Keep an eye on whichever of you is carrying the server. Make sure they get back safe.
pln_hb2_06_02.loc_text: Keep an eye on whichever of you is carrying the server. Make sure they get back safe.

pln_hb2_06_03.base_text: Stay with whoever is carrying the server. It's heavy. Don't leave them behind!
pln_hb2_06_03.loc_text: Stay with whoever is carrying the server. It's heavy. Don't leave them behind!

pln_hb2_07_01.base_text: Get inside the evidence room and find evidence related to Hoxton's case.
pln_hb2_07_01.loc_text: Get inside the evidence room and find evidence related to Hoxton's case.

pln_hb2_07_02.base_text: The evidence that Hoxton spoke of will be in that lock-up. Look for it. It should be marked out.
pln_hb2_07_02.loc_text: The evidence that Hoxton spoke of will be in that lock-up. Look for it. It should be marked out.

pln_hb2_07_03.base_text: You should find evidence related to Hoxton's case in the Evidence Room. Get searching.
pln_hb2_07_03.loc_text: You should find evidence related to Hoxton's case in the Evidence Room. Get searching.

pln_hb2_08_01.base_text: You are looking for evidence related to the Hoxton's case. Take a look around. It will be stored throughout the room. Could be marked out.
pln_hb2_08_01.loc_text: You are looking for evidence related to the Hoxton's case. Take a look around. It will be stored throughout the room. Could be marked out.

pln_hb2_08_02.base_text: The evidence will be here somewhere. Search for it.
pln_hb2_08_02.loc_text: The evidence will be here somewhere. Search for it.

pln_hb2_08_03.base_text: Christ, don't they organise this stuff. Search through it. Find that evidence. You're looking for evidence that's related to Hoxton.
pln_hb2_08_03.loc_text: Christ, don't they organise this stuff. Search through it. Find that evidence. You're looking for evidence that's related to Hoxton.

pln_hb2_09_01.base_text: Great, you found some evidence! Analyze it in the lab. Let's see if there's any trace of the traitor's DNA on it.
pln_hb2_09_01.loc_text: Great, you found some evidence! Analyze it in the lab. Let's see if there's any trace of the traitor's DNA on it.

pln_hb2_09_02.base_text: Now take the evidence to the lab. If we can find some DNA that belongs to the traitor, we might be able to pinpoint who he is.
pln_hb2_09_02.loc_text: Now take the evidence to the lab. If we can find some DNA that belongs to the traitor, we might be able to pinpoint who he is.

pln_hb2_09_03.base_text: Nice. Now get that evidence to the lab. Any DNA might help us finger this rat.
pln_hb2_09_03.loc_text: Nice. Now get that evidence to the lab. Any DNA might help us finger this rat.

pln_hb2_10_01.base_text: OK, the traitor's identity is classified. Not a complete waste though - we got a sample of his DNA! Good work. Now, get back to Hoxton.
pln_hb2_10_01.loc_text: OK, the traitor's identity is classified. Not a complete waste though - we got a sample of his DNA! Good work. Now, get back to Hoxton.

pln_hb2_10_02.base_text: Damn, their system didn't allow us to see who the DNA belongs to. Still, we have a sample of the traitor's DNA, I'm sure we can put it to good use. Now get back to Hoxton.
pln_hb2_10_02.loc_text: Damn, their system didn't allow us to see who the DNA belongs to. Still, we have a sample of the traitor's DNA, I'm sure we can put it to good use. Now get back to Hoxton.

pln_hb2_10_03.base_text: Couldn't get a positive ID on who the DNA belongs to, but we got a sample, so that will help. Now, get back to Hoxton.
pln_hb2_10_03.loc_text: Couldn't get a positive ID on who the DNA belongs to, but we got a sample, so that will help. Now, get back to Hoxton.

pln_hb2_11_01.base_text: No luck! No DNA match found on the evidence. Keep looking and scanning!
pln_hb2_11_01.loc_text: No luck! No DNA match found on the evidence. Keep looking and scanning!

pln_hb2_11_03.base_text: Ah crap... Came up blank. Keep searching and keep scanning.
pln_hb2_11_03.loc_text: Ah crap... Came up blank. Keep searching and keep scanning.

pln_hb2_12_01.base_text: Keep defending Hoxton! If things are getting hairy, use cards to override the security barriers.
pln_hb2_12_01.loc_text: Keep defending Hoxton! If things are getting hairy, use cards to override the security barriers.

pln_hb2_12_02.base_text: Defend Hoxton. If you have cards, you can seal off the entrances.
pln_hb2_12_02.loc_text: Defend Hoxton. If you have cards, you can seal off the entrances.

pln_hb2_12_03.base_text: If you have cards, you can close the barriers. That oughta hold 'em off Hoxton for a while.
pln_hb2_12_03.loc_text: If you have cards, you can close the barriers. That oughta hold 'em off Hoxton for a while.

pln_hb2_13_01.base_text: This place is locked down tight, but you can use keycards to gain access to different areas. Choose wisely - you probably won't find a lot of 'em.
pln_hb2_13_01.loc_text: This place is locked down tight, but you can use keycards to gain access to different areas. Choose wisely - you probably won't find a lot of 'em.

pln_hb2_13_02.base_text: Keycards are gold here. You can use 'em to open up areas, close areas down. Use them carefully!
pln_hb2_13_02.loc_text: Keycards are gold here. You can use 'em to open up areas, close areas down. Use them carefully!

pln_hb2_13_03.base_text: Keycards can be a great asset. Find 'em, but use 'em carefully.
pln_hb2_13_03.loc_text: Keycards can be a great asset. Find 'em, but use 'em carefully.

pln_hb2_15_01.base_text: If you're low on Doctor Bags, you should consider getting that Infirmary open.
pln_hb2_15_01.loc_text: If you're low on Doctor Bags, you should consider getting that Infirmary open.

pln_hb2_15_02.base_text: If you're feeling rough, maybe spend a keycard and crack the Infirmary open.
pln_hb2_15_02.loc_text: If you're feeling rough, maybe spend a keycard and crack the Infirmary open.

pln_hb2_15_03.base_text: Spend a keycard to access the Infirmary, if you feel like you need a pick-me-up.
pln_hb2_15_03.loc_text: Spend a keycard to access the Infirmary, if you feel like you need a pick-me-up.

pln_hb2_16_01.base_text: Bam! That's one less flank to worry about.
pln_hb2_16_01.loc_text: Bam! That's one less flank to worry about.

pln_hb2_16_02.base_text: They're not getting in that way!
pln_hb2_16_02.loc_text: They're not getting in that way!

pln_hb2_16_03.base_text: And boom! They're not using that skywalk.
pln_hb2_16_03.loc_text: And boom! They're not using that skywalk.

pln_hb2_17_01.base_text: Good job. You sealed off one of the entrances. That should make it easier to defend.
pln_hb2_17_01.loc_text: Good job. You sealed off one of the entrances. That should make it easier to defend.

pln_hb2_17_02.base_text: Nice. That cuts their options. Exploit that.
pln_hb2_17_02.loc_text: Nice. That cuts their options. Exploit that.

pln_hb2_17_03.base_text: They ain't getting through this way!
pln_hb2_17_03.loc_text: They ain't getting through this way!

pln_hb2_18_01.base_text: Gas, watch out! Wait for it to dissipate!
pln_hb2_18_01.loc_text: Gas, watch out! Wait for it to dissipate!

pln_hb2_18_02.base_text: They're deploying gas! Get out of the room and wait for it clear.
pln_hb2_18_02.loc_text: They're deploying gas! Get out of the room and wait for it clear.

pln_hb2_18_03.base_text: Tear gas incoming! Stay clear and wait for it to die down.
pln_hb2_18_03.loc_text: Tear gas incoming! Stay clear and wait for it to die down.

pln_hb2_19_01.base_text: Guys, they're throwing everything they have at you. Better make it out, fast!
pln_hb2_19_01.loc_text: Guys, they're throwing everything they have at you. Better make it out, fast!

pln_hb2_19_02.base_text: The feds'll do everything they can to stop you from leaving. Get out of there - hurry!
pln_hb2_19_02.loc_text: The feds'll do everything they can to stop you from leaving. Get out of there - hurry!

pln_hb2_19_03.base_text: Cops are getting desperate, they're launching a final assault! Don't let them stop you.
pln_hb2_19_03.loc_text: Cops are getting desperate, they're launching a final assault! Don't let them stop you.

pln_hb3_01_02.base_text: We're here. Nice night for a murder.
pln_hb3_01_02.loc_text: We're here. Nice night for a murder.

pln_hb3_01_03.base_text: It's a dirty job, but if it means we stay in a job...
pln_hb3_01_03.loc_text: It's a dirty job, but if it means we stay in a job...

pln_hb3_02_01.base_text: There's the house. And, somewhere in there, the rat.
pln_hb3_02_01.loc_text: There's the house. And, somewhere in there, the rat.

pln_hb3_02_02.base_text: That's the FBI safe house. Let's see how safe it really is.
pln_hb3_02_02.loc_text: That's the FBI safe house. Let's see how safe it really is.

pln_hb3_02_03.base_text: The safe house. Let's put that to the test.
pln_hb3_02_03.loc_text: The safe house. Let's put that to the test.

pln_hb3_03_01.base_text: First things first; get past the outer fence.
pln_hb3_03_01.loc_text: First things first; get past the outer fence.

pln_hb3_03_02.base_text: Alright. First task: get on the other side of that fence.
pln_hb3_03_02.loc_text: Alright. First task: get on the other side of that fence.

pln_hb3_03_03.base_text: Your first job is getting beyond the perimeter.
pln_hb3_03_03.loc_text: Your first job is getting beyond the perimeter.

pln_hb3_04_01.base_text: Look out for ways to get in. Has to be some weak point in the security. Get a close look at that fence.
pln_hb3_04_01.loc_text: Look out for ways to get in. Has to be some weak point in the security. Get a close look at that fence.

pln_hb3_04_02.base_text: Check the fence. Always got to be a way over, through or under.
pln_hb3_04_02.loc_text: Check the fence. Always got to be a way over, through or under.

pln_hb3_04_03.base_text: There must a way to get beyond the fence. Check it out.
pln_hb3_04_03.loc_text: There must a way to get beyond the fence. Check it out.

pln_hb3_05_01.base_text: You're in. Next step is to get inside the mansion. But watch out - all the doors and windows are tied to an alarm.
pln_hb3_05_01.loc_text: You're in. Next step is to get inside the mansion. But watch out - all the doors and windows are tied to an alarm.

pln_hb3_05_02.base_text: Alright. Now for the mansion. It's a safe house for a reason, and expect alarms on all the doors and windows.
pln_hb3_05_02.loc_text: Alright. Now for the mansion. It's a safe house for a reason, and expect alarms on all the doors and windows.

pln_hb3_05_03.base_text: Now we gotta get into the mansion. Won't be easy. Expect doors and windows to be alarmed. Need to figure that out.
pln_hb3_05_03.loc_text: Now we gotta get into the mansion. Won't be easy. Expect doors and windows to be alarmed. Need to figure that out.

pln_hb3_06_01.base_text: When a door or window opens, the alarm timer will start. You'll have a limited time to disable it before it goes off.
pln_hb3_06_01.loc_text: When a door or window opens, the alarm timer will start. You'll have a limited time to disable it before it goes off.

pln_hb3_06_02.base_text: Open a door or window and the alarm timer will kick in. You'll only have a few seconds to disable it, before it goes to hell.
pln_hb3_06_02.loc_text: Open a door or window and the alarm timer will kick in. You'll only have a few seconds to disable it, before it goes to hell.

pln_hb3_06_03.base_text: The alarm timer will start as soon as you open a door or window. That'll give you a few seconds to disable the alarm.
pln_hb3_06_03.loc_text: The alarm timer will start as soon as you open a door or window. That'll give you a few seconds to disable the alarm.

pln_hb3_07_01.base_text: Look in through the windows and try to find the alarm box. You'll have a limited time to disable it once you're inside, so it's best to be prepared.
pln_hb3_07_01.loc_text: Look in through the windows and try to find the alarm box. You'll have a limited time to disable it once you're inside, so it's best to be prepared.

pln_hb3_07_02.base_text: Check through windows. See if you can find the alarm box. Once you go in, it's gonna go off pretty quick, so be ready.
pln_hb3_07_02.loc_text: Check through windows. See if you can find the alarm box. Once you go in, it's gonna go off pretty quick, so be ready.

pln_hb3_07_03.base_text: Look inside before going in. Find the alarm box. When you open a door or window, it'll start, so you need to disable it fast.
pln_hb3_07_03.loc_text: Look inside before going in. Find the alarm box. When you open a door or window, it'll start, so you need to disable it fast.

pln_hb3_08_01.base_text: You just triggered the countdown! Find and disable the alarm before it's timer runs out!
pln_hb3_08_01.loc_text: You just triggered the countdown! Find and disable the alarm before it's timer runs out!

pln_hb3_08_02.base_text: The countdown started. Disable the alarm before the timer runs out!
pln_hb3_08_02.loc_text: The countdown started. Disable the alarm before the timer runs out!

pln_hb3_08_03.base_text: And there's the countdown. Now, find the alarm! Disable it before it kicks in.
pln_hb3_08_03.loc_text: And there's the countdown. Now, find the alarm! Disable it before it kicks in.

pln_hb3_09_01.base_text: Phew, the alarm is disabled. No need to worry about opening doors or windows now!
pln_hb3_09_01.loc_text: Phew, the alarm is disabled. No need to worry about opening doors or windows now!

pln_hb3_09_02.base_text: Alright, the alarm is dead. Good job. You can come and go as you like.
pln_hb3_09_02.loc_text: Alright, the alarm is dead. Good job. You can come and go as you like.

pln_hb3_09_03.base_text: That's the alarm dealt with. Great. Don't worry about doors or windows now.
pln_hb3_09_03.loc_text: That's the alarm dealt with. Great. Don't worry about doors or windows now.

pln_hb3_10_03.base_text: Gang, get into the house. Come on, move it!
pln_hb3_10_03.loc_text: Gang, get into the house. Come on, move it!

pln_hb3_11_01.base_text: The FBI have installed a panic room in the mansion. You can bet the traitor is hiding in it. Find it. Then we can figure out how to get inside!
pln_hb3_11_01.loc_text: The FBI have installed a panic room in the mansion. You can bet the traitor is hiding in it. Find it. Then we can figure out how to get inside!

pln_hb3_53_01.base_text: I will personally offer you a reward for all the evidence you bring out. This is about the safety of crime.net.

pln_hd1_01_01.base_text: Alright. First goal - get inside. Front door's right ahead, but maybe show a little guile and look for other ways in.

pln_hd1_02_01.base_text: OK. If we're going to do this quietly, we need to disable some of these alarm systems. Look around. Search the museum. Find the circuit boxes that power security. If we can hack them, we can shut the place down without setting off the alarms.

pln_hd1_02_02.base_text: Right, let's try and get this security shut down. You need to find the circuit boxes that power the system. Get hooked in to them. I can hack them to power down the system without tripping their wires.

pln_hd1_04_01.base_text: Next step... Two time locks. You need keycards to get past each. Guards won't have 'em - but the civvie researchers probably will. Find and, y'know, persuade them. They'll give up their keycards soon enough.

pln_hd1_26_02.base_text: Civilians will have the keycards. Get one, and swipe it at the timelocks.
pln_hd1_26_02.loc_text: Civilians will have the keycards. Get one, and swipe it at the timelocks.

pln_hd1_26_03.base_text: Time locks can be taken down with keycards. Civilians have the keycards. You see where this is leading?
pln_hd1_26_03.loc_text: Time locks can be taken down with keycards. Civilians have the keycards. You see where this is leading?

pln_hd1_27_01.base_text: You did it! The Diamond! And the goddamn Payday Gang. You just wrote yourselves into history, gentlemen.
pln_hd1_27_01.loc_text: You did it! The Diamond! And the goddamn Payday Gang. You just wrote yourselves into history, gentlemen.

pln_hd1_27_02.base_text: You've just etched your names into history, gang. Heisters will tell this story for generations.
pln_hd1_27_02.loc_text: You've just etched your names into history, gang. Heisters will tell this story for generations.

pln_hd1_27_03.base_text: The gang that stole the Diamond. Outstanding, gang!
pln_hd1_27_03.loc_text: The gang that stole the Diamond. Outstanding, gang!

pln_hd1_28_01.base_text: Look at this place. Makes me wish we could heist a whole building.
pln_hd1_28_01.loc_text: Look at this place. Makes me wish we could heist a whole building.

pln_hd1_28_02.base_text: It's a beautiful building. Serene. Try and keep it that way.
pln_hd1_28_02.loc_text: It's a beautiful building. Serene. Try and keep it that way.

pln_hd1_28_03.base_text: Always thought being a night-guard at a museum would be a great job. But, you know, the whole stealing thing...
pln_hd1_28_03.loc_text: Always thought being a night-guard at a museum would be a great job. But, you know, the whole stealing thing...

pln_hd1_29_01.base_text: We came, we saw... We robbed a whole bunch of old Roman shit.
pln_hd1_29_01.loc_text: We came, we saw... We robbed a whole bunch of old Roman shit.

pln_hd1_29_02.base_text: Crazy to think this stuff came from the time of the Caesar's.
pln_hd1_29_02.loc_text: Crazy to think this stuff came from the time of the Caesar's.

pln_hd1_29_03.base_text: Don't get distracted, guys. Keep an eye out for... Oooh wait, is that from the First Triumvirate?!
pln_hd1_29_03.loc_text: Don't get distracted, guys. Keep an eye out for... Oooh wait, is that from the First Triumvirate?!

pln_hd1_30_01.base_text: Genghis Khan. Carved an Empire from Korea to Bulgaria. Great warrior. Would have loved him on the crew.
pln_hd1_30_01.loc_text: Genghis Khan. Carved an Empire from Korea to Bulgaria. Great warrior. Would have loved him on the crew.

pln_hd1_30_02.base_text: The Mongol's were great warriors. Would love to see them in action.
pln_hd1_30_02.loc_text: The Mongol's were great warriors. Would love to see them in action.

pln_hd1_30_03.base_text: Supposedly, it was Genghis that found the Diamond. He did pretty well out of it.
pln_hd1_30_03.loc_text: Supposedly, it was Genghis that found the Diamond. He did pretty well out of it.

pln_hd1_31_01.base_text: Woah, look at this stuff. It can't be real... Can it?
pln_hd1_31_01.loc_text: Woah, look at this stuff. It can't be real... Can it?

pln_hd1_31_02.base_text: This place gives me the heebie-jeebies.
pln_hd1_31_02.loc_text: This place gives me the heebie-jeebies.

pln_hd1_31_03.base_text: I loved this room as a kid, but now... Makes me uneasy.
pln_hd1_31_03.loc_text: I loved this room as a kid, but now... Makes me uneasy.

pln_hd1_32_01.base_text: This place looks like it hasn't been decorated since the 60's.
pln_hd1_32_01.loc_text: This place looks like it hasn't been decorated since the 60's.

pln_hd1_32_02.base_text: Doubt any of these books have much value. To us, at least.
pln_hd1_32_02.loc_text: Doubt any of these books have much value. To us, at least.

pln_hd1_32_03.base_text: Looks like the curator's basement office.
pln_hd1_32_03.loc_text: Looks like the curator's basement office.

pln_hd1_33_01.base_text: There's a lot of pricey stuff around here. But check the cases for alarms - they'll be the ones with the genuine stuff.
pln_hd1_33_01.loc_text: There's a lot of pricey stuff around here. But check the cases for alarms - they'll be the ones with the genuine stuff.

pln_hd1_33_02.base_text: Some nice loot in these displays. But some cheap counterfeit crap too. Look for alarms. That'll mark the good stuff.
pln_hd1_33_02.loc_text: Some nice loot in these displays. But some cheap counterfeit crap too. Look for alarms. That'll mark the good stuff.

pln_hd1_33_03.base_text: Some nice stuff in those cases. Some knock-offs too. If you're going to snatch it, snatch the real stuff - look for cases with alarms. I'm sure a clever crew like you can figure it out.
pln_hd1_33_03.loc_text: Some nice stuff in those cases. Some knock-offs too. If you're going to snatch it, snatch the real stuff - look for cases with alarms. I'm sure a clever crew like you can figure it out.

pln_hd1_34_01.base_text: The streets are crawling with cops! Not getting out that way. Light a flare and I'll bring in a chopper.
pln_hd1_34_01.loc_text: The streets are crawling with cops! Not getting out that way. Light a flare and I'll bring in a chopper.

pln_hd1_34_02.base_text: Looks like every cop is headed your way! You're not driving out. Light a flare, and we'll get you an air extraction.
pln_hd1_34_02.loc_text: Looks like every cop is headed your way! You're not driving out. Light a flare, and we'll get you an air extraction.

pln_hd1_34_03.base_text: Damn! The cops have the mall locked down. So we're getting you out by air. Light a flare for the chopper.
pln_hd1_34_03.loc_text: Damn! The cops have the mall locked down. So we're getting you out by air. Light a flare for the chopper.

pln_hd1_35_01.base_text: Chopper's on its way! Get ready!
pln_hd1_35_01.loc_text: Chopper's on its way! Get ready!

pln_hd1_35_02.base_text: OK, Bile is racing your way now!
pln_hd1_35_02.loc_text: OK, Bile is racing your way now!

pln_hd1_35_03.base_text: Bile is in-bound. Be ready for him!
pln_hd1_35_03.loc_text: Bile is in-bound. Be ready for him!

pln_hd1_36_01.base_text: The chopper is fully loaded. Wait for it to come back.
pln_hd1_36_01.loc_text: The chopper is fully loaded. Wait for it to come back.

pln_hd1_36_02.base_text: That's a full load. Hang tight. The chopper will be back.
pln_hd1_36_02.loc_text: That's a full load. Hang tight. The chopper will be back.

pln_hd1_36_03.base_text: That's a nice, full load. Sit tight, gang - Bile will be back.
pln_hd1_36_03.loc_text: That's a nice, full load. Sit tight, gang - Bile will be back.

pln_hd1_37_02.base_text: What? That must've been the wrong tile!
pln_hd1_37_02.loc_text: What? That must've been the wrong tile!

pln_hd1_37_03.base_text: Damn, that was the wrong tile!
pln_hd1_37_03.loc_text: Damn, that was the wrong tile!

pln_hd1_38_01.base_text: Box hacked. Seeing fluctuations in their grid. Keep going.
pln_hd1_38_01.loc_text: Box hacked. Seeing fluctuations in their grid. Keep going.

pln_hd1_38_03.base_text: And... Great. Their grid is weakening. Do another.
pln_hd1_38_03.loc_text: And... Great. Their grid is weakening. Do another.

pln_hd1_39_03.base_text: They don't suspect a thing. This is great.
pln_hd1_39_03.loc_text: They don't suspect a thing. This is great.

pln_hd1_40_01.base_text: The cops messed up the time lock! Get it going again!
pln_hd1_40_01.loc_text: The cops messed up the time lock! Get it going again!

pln_hd1_40_02.base_text: Cops have messed with the time lock. Restart it.
pln_hd1_40_02.loc_text: Cops have messed with the time lock. Restart it.

pln_hd1_41_01.base_text: Come on! Get the time lock going again!
pln_hd1_41_01.loc_text: Come on! Get the time lock going again!

pln_hd1_41_02.base_text: This whole enterprise will be for nothing if you dont get that time lock tick-tocking again.
pln_hd1_41_02.loc_text: This whole enterprise will be for nothing if you dont get that time lock tick-tocking again.

pln_hd1_42_01.base_text: Good. Now keep the cops off of it.
pln_hd1_42_01.loc_text: Good. Now keep the cops off of it.

pln_hd1_42_02.base_text: Great. Now, please, keep the cops away from the time lock.
pln_hd1_42_02.loc_text: Great. Now, please, keep the cops away from the time lock.

pln_hd1_43_01.base_text: They cut the power! Get it back up!
pln_hd1_43_01.loc_text: They cut the power! Get it back up!

pln_hd1_44_01.base_text: Alright. Now hook me up to that terminal again.
pln_hd1_44_01.loc_text: Alright. Now hook me up to that terminal again.

pln_hd1_intro_01_01.base_text: A night at the museum, gang. It's just you, a crew of security guards and a priceless diamond.
pln_hd1_intro_01_01.loc_text: A night at the museum, gang. It's just you, a crew of security guards and a priceless diamond.

pln_hd1_intro_01_02.base_text: Here it is. McKendrick museum. Home of a priceless diamond. Let's do this.
pln_hd1_intro_01_02.loc_text: Here it is. McKendrick museum. Home of a priceless diamond. Let's do this.

pln_hd1_intro_01_03.base_text: There it is. The McKendrick museum. Somewhere in there is a priceless diamond. Let's get it.
pln_hd1_intro_01_03.loc_text: There it is. The McKendrick museum. Somewhere in there is a priceless diamond. Let's get it.

pln_hlp_01_02.base_text: A prison? Not my favourite thing...
pln_hlp_01_02.loc_text: A prison? Not my favourite thing...

pln_hlp_01_03.base_text: I... don't know where we are...
pln_hlp_01_03.loc_text: I... don't know where we are...

pln_hlp_02_01.base_text: Let's find a way into the prison.
pln_hlp_02_01.loc_text: Let's find a way into the prison.

pln_hlp_02_02.base_text: We probably need to enter the prison...
pln_hlp_02_02.loc_text: We probably need to enter the prison...

pln_hlp_02_03.base_text: I think we need to get into the prison.
pln_hlp_02_03.loc_text: I think we need to get into the prison.

pln_hlp_03_01.base_text: We need a keycard to get into the prison. But where can we get one?
pln_hlp_03_01.loc_text: We need a keycard to get into the prison. But where can we get one?

pln_hlp_03_02.base_text: We can't get in without a keycard. We need to find one.
pln_hlp_03_02.loc_text: We can't get in without a keycard. We need to find one.

pln_hlp_03_03.base_text: Looks like this gate requires a keycard. Find one guys!
pln_hlp_03_03.loc_text: Looks like this gate requires a keycard. Find one guys!

pln_hlp_04_01.base_text: I don't think we have a choice. We have to spin that wheel!
pln_hlp_04_01.loc_text: I don't think we have a choice. We have to spin that wheel!

pln_hlp_04_02.base_text: I don't like the look of the prizes on that wheel, but I think we have to spin it anyway.
pln_hlp_04_02.loc_text: I don't like the look of the prizes on that wheel, but I think we have to spin it anyway.

pln_hlp_04_03.base_text: Spin it, let's see what happens.
pln_hlp_04_03.loc_text: Spin it, let's see what happens.

pln_hlp_05_02.base_text: The wheel stopped on sniper. I'm not sure what that means...
pln_hlp_05_02.loc_text: The wheel stopped on sniper. I'm not sure what that means...

pln_hlp_05_03.base_text: Soooo the wheel stopped on sniper...
pln_hlp_05_03.loc_text: Soooo the wheel stopped on sniper...

pln_hlp_06_01.base_text: It landed on sniper again. Get ready guys
pln_hlp_06_01.loc_text: It landed on sniper again. Get ready guys

pln_hlp_06_03.base_text: The wheel has decided, looks like we have some more snipers incoming.
pln_hlp_06_03.loc_text: The wheel has decided, looks like we have some more snipers incoming.

pln_hlp_07_02.base_text: It landed on flames... That can't be good.
pln_hlp_07_02.loc_text: It landed on flames... That can't be good.

pln_hlp_07_03.base_text: The wheel stopped on flames, I don't think that is a good thing.
pln_hlp_07_03.loc_text: The wheel stopped on flames, I don't think that is a good thing.

pln_hlp_08_01.base_text: The wheel stopped on flames. Things are about to burn!
pln_hlp_08_01.loc_text: The wheel stopped on flames. Things are about to burn!

pln_hlp_08_02.base_text: Ok the wheel landed on flames again, watch out!
pln_hlp_08_02.loc_text: Ok the wheel landed on flames again, watch out!

pln_hlp_08_03.base_text: Flames, that means the flamethrower again!
pln_hlp_08_03.loc_text: Flames, that means the flamethrower again!

pln_hlp_09_02.base_text: The wheel stopped on smoke, no idea what that means.
pln_hlp_09_02.loc_text: The wheel stopped on smoke, no idea what that means.

pln_hlp_09_03.base_text: Smoke? The wheel stopped on smoke?
pln_hlp_09_03.loc_text: Smoke? The wheel stopped on smoke?

pln_hlp_11_01.base_text: Drills? Not sure what that is...
pln_hlp_11_01.loc_text: Drills? Not sure what that is...

pln_hlp_11_02.base_text: The wheel stopped on drills. Do you guys know what that means?
pln_hlp_11_02.loc_text: The wheel stopped on drills. Do you guys know what that means?

pln_hlp_11_03.base_text: The wheel has stopped. It says drills. I got no clue.
pln_hlp_11_03.loc_text: The wheel has stopped. It says drills. I got no clue.

pln_hlp_12_01.base_text: It stopped on drills. Move away!
pln_hlp_12_01.loc_text: It stopped on drills. Move away!

pln_hlp_12_02.base_text: Watch out! It stopped on drills again!
pln_hlp_12_02.loc_text: Watch out! It stopped on drills again!

pln_hlp_13_01.base_text: Hmm.. I wonder what the question mark means.
pln_hlp_13_01.loc_text: Hmm.. I wonder what the question mark means.

pln_hlp_13_02.base_text: Question marks? What could that be?
pln_hlp_13_02.loc_text: Question marks? What could that be?

pln_hlp_13_03.base_text: What? It stopped on the question marks. That could mean anything.
pln_hlp_13_03.loc_text: What? It stopped on the question marks. That could mean anything.

pln_hlp_14_01.base_text: Careful guys! The wheel stopped on the question marks.
pln_hlp_14_01.loc_text: Careful guys! The wheel stopped on the question marks.

pln_hlp_14_02.base_text: Question marks again. Be ready for anything.
pln_hlp_14_02.loc_text: Question marks again. Be ready for anything.

pln_hlp_14_03.base_text: It stopped on the question marks again.
pln_hlp_14_03.loc_text: It stopped on the question marks again.

pln_hlp_15_02.base_text: The wheel stopped on... dozer? Be careful guys Im not sure what that means.
pln_hlp_15_02.loc_text: The wheel stopped on... dozer? Be careful guys Im not sure what that means.

pln_hlp_16_01.base_text: The wheel stopped on the dozer again. Watch out guys!
pln_hlp_16_01.loc_text: The wheel stopped on the dozer again. Watch out guys!

pln_hlp_16_02.base_text: The wheel stopped. Get ready for another bulldozer guys!
pln_hlp_16_02.loc_text: The wheel stopped. Get ready for another bulldozer guys!

pln_hlp_17_01.base_text: Protect the timer, the swats will interrupt it if you don't!
pln_hlp_17_01.loc_text: Protect the timer, the swats will interrupt it if you don't!

pln_hlp_17_02.base_text: Don't let the cops stop the timer!
pln_hlp_17_02.loc_text: Don't let the cops stop the timer!

pln_hlp_17_03.base_text: Don't let the swats interrupt that timer!
pln_hlp_17_03.loc_text: Don't let the swats interrupt that timer!

pln_hlp_18_01.base_text: They interrupted the timer! Restart it!
pln_hlp_18_01.loc_text: They interrupted the timer! Restart it!

pln_hlp_18_03.base_text: Damn, they stopped it. Get it going again!
pln_hlp_18_03.loc_text: Damn, they stopped it. Get it going again!

pln_hlp_18_06.base_text: Restart the timer! They stopped it.
pln_hlp_18_06.loc_text: Restart the timer! They stopped it.

pln_hlp_18_07.base_text: The timer is standing still. Get it going again!
pln_hlp_18_07.loc_text: The timer is standing still. Get it going again!

pln_hlp_19_01.base_text: Once the reboot is over we should be back on track!
pln_hlp_19_01.loc_text: Once the reboot is over we should be back on track!

pln_hlp_19_02.base_text: When the reboot has ticked down it should restart.
pln_hlp_19_02.loc_text: When the reboot has ticked down it should restart.

pln_hlp_19_03.base_text: When the reboot has reached zero it should start the normal timer again.
pln_hlp_19_03.loc_text: When the reboot has reached zero it should start the normal timer again.

pln_hlp_20_01.base_text: Great the timer is done! Grab the keycard!
pln_hlp_20_01.loc_text: Great the timer is done! Grab the keycard!

pln_hlp_20_02.base_text: Timer has finished. Get the keycard.
pln_hlp_20_02.loc_text: Timer has finished. Get the keycard.

pln_hlp_20_03.base_text: Great it is done. Get the keycard.
pln_hlp_20_03.loc_text: Great it is done. Get the keycard.

pln_hlp_21_01.base_text: Good job. Now lets get moving.
pln_hlp_21_01.loc_text: Good job. Now lets get moving.

pln_hlp_21_03.base_text: Now that you got the keycard lets move on.
pln_hlp_21_03.loc_text: Now that you got the keycard lets move on.

pln_hlp_22_01.base_text: The keycard you got should get us access to the prison, use it on the card reader by the door.
pln_hlp_22_01.loc_text: The keycard you got should get us access to the prison, use it on the card reader by the door.

pln_hlp_22_02.base_text: The keycard grants us access. Use it to open the door.
pln_hlp_22_02.loc_text: The keycard grants us access. Use it to open the door.

pln_hlp_22_03.base_text: Now let's enter the prison. Use the keycard to open the door.
pln_hlp_22_03.loc_text: Now let's enter the prison. Use the keycard to open the door.

pln_hlp_23_01.base_text: Time to see what the prison has in store for us.
pln_hlp_23_01.loc_text: Time to see what the prison has in store for us.

pln_hlp_24_01.base_text: I think we might need to spin another wheel. Find it.
pln_hlp_24_01.loc_text: I think we might need to spin another wheel. Find it.

pln_hlp_24_02.base_text: There should be another wheel around here somewhere.
pln_hlp_24_02.loc_text: There should be another wheel around here somewhere.

pln_hlp_24_03.base_text: Keep spinning those wheels, find the next one.
pln_hlp_24_03.loc_text: Keep spinning those wheels, find the next one.

pln_hlp_25_01.base_text: Get that keycard into the panel and pull that switch. Let's see what happens.
pln_hlp_25_01.loc_text: Get that keycard into the panel and pull that switch. Let's see what happens.

pln_hlp_25_02.base_text: Let's see... Place the keycard in the panel and activate that switch. Hope we're not in for a big suprise...
pln_hlp_25_02.loc_text: Let's see... Place the keycard in the panel and activate that switch. Hope we're not in for a big suprise...

pln_hlp_25_03.base_text: There's a slot for the keycard. My guess is just put it in and see what happens...
pln_hlp_25_03.loc_text: There's a slot for the keycard. My guess is just put it in and see what happens...

pln_hlp_26_02.base_text: You guys got a keycard, right?
pln_hlp_26_02.loc_text: You guys got a keycard, right?

pln_hlp_26_03.base_text: Get that keycard in the panel, quick
pln_hlp_26_03.loc_text: Get that keycard in the panel, quick

pln_hlp_26_04.base_text: What are you waiting for? Get that keycard into the panel.
pln_hlp_26_04.loc_text: What are you waiting for? Get that keycard into the panel.

pln_hlp_26_05.base_text: You guys sure take an awfully long time.
pln_hlp_26_05.loc_text: You guys sure take an awfully long time.

pln_hlp_27_01.base_text: Pull the switch and see what happens
pln_hlp_27_01.loc_text: Pull the switch and see what happens

pln_hlp_27_03.base_text: What's taking so long? Just activate that switch
pln_hlp_27_03.loc_text: What's taking so long? Just activate that switch

pln_hlp_27_04.base_text: Go by the panel and pull that goddamn switch
pln_hlp_27_04.loc_text: Go by the panel and pull that goddamn switch

pln_hlp_27_05.base_text: What are you waiting for? That switch isn't gonna pull itself.
pln_hlp_27_05.loc_text: What are you waiting for? That switch isn't gonna pull itself.

pln_hlp_28_01.base_text: If you wanna leave, there's an escape panel on the top floor. Check it out if you wanna call it quits.
pln_hlp_28_01.loc_text: If you wanna leave, there's an escape panel on the top floor. Check it out if you wanna call it quits.

pln_hlp_28_02.base_text: My sensors are picking up another panel on the top floor - get to it if you've had enough and want to leave.
pln_hlp_28_02.loc_text: My sensors are picking up another panel on the top floor - get to it if you've had enough and want to leave.

pln_hlp_28_03.base_text: Make sure to check the top floor if you wanna leave this place. But there are so many bags...
pln_hlp_28_03.loc_text: Make sure to check the top floor if you wanna leave this place. But there are so many bags...

pln_hlp_29_01.base_text: Same procedure as last time - grab the loot or leave this prison on the top floor.
pln_hlp_29_01.loc_text: Same procedure as last time - grab the loot or leave this prison on the top floor.

pln_hlp_29_02.base_text: Okay, same as before: secure as many bags as you can or leave this place. Make up your mind!
pln_hlp_29_02.loc_text: Okay, same as before: secure as many bags as you can or leave this place. Make up your mind!

pln_hlp_29_03.base_text: You know the deal, grab the loot or escape.
pln_hlp_29_03.loc_text: You know the deal, grab the loot or escape.

pln_hlp_30_01.base_text: I'm sure I don't have to explain what you need to do.
pln_hlp_30_01.loc_text: I'm sure I don't have to explain what you need to do.

pln_hlp_30_02.base_text: You know your way around this prison, you know what to do.
pln_hlp_30_02.loc_text: You know your way around this prison, you know what to do.

pln_hlp_31_01.base_text: See that timer over there? Hurry up if you wanna secure the loot!
pln_hlp_31_01.loc_text: See that timer over there? Hurry up if you wanna secure the loot!

pln_hlp_31_02.base_text: That timer on the wall's ticking fast! Get the loot into the vent!
pln_hlp_31_02.loc_text: That timer on the wall's ticking fast! Get the loot into the vent!

pln_hlp_31_03.base_text: The clock on the wall's running down fast. Grab the loot and toss it into the vent!
pln_hlp_31_03.loc_text: The clock on the wall's running down fast. Grab the loot and toss it into the vent!

pln_hlp_32_01.base_text: Careful guys, time's running out! 10 seconds!
pln_hlp_32_01.loc_text: Careful guys, time's running out! 10 seconds!

pln_hlp_33_01.base_text: Careful, looks like the bags are gonna explode!
pln_hlp_33_01.loc_text: Careful, looks like the bags are gonna explode!

pln_hlp_33_02.base_text: Watch out, the bags are getting hot!
pln_hlp_33_02.loc_text: Watch out, the bags are getting hot!

pln_hlp_33_03.base_text: Watch out for those bags now!
pln_hlp_33_03.loc_text: Watch out for those bags now!

pln_hlp_34_01.base_text: Get together in a group, guys!
pln_hlp_34_01.loc_text: Get together in a group, guys!

pln_hlp_35_01.base_text: The place is starting to fall apart, get out!
pln_hlp_35_01.loc_text: The place is starting to fall apart, get out!

pln_hlp_35_02.base_text: There's no turning back - get out of this goddamn place!
pln_hlp_35_02.loc_text: There's no turning back - get out of this goddamn place!

pln_hlp_35_03.base_text: Point of no return - this place is getting hot! Get out!
pln_hlp_35_03.loc_text: Point of no return - this place is getting hot! Get out!

pln_hlp_36_01.base_text: We're taking the train - grab the zipline up to the bridge!
pln_hlp_36_01.loc_text: We're taking the train - grab the zipline up to the bridge!

pln_hlp_36_02.base_text: There's a zipline leading to a train up on the bridge. Zip through the sky!
pln_hlp_36_02.loc_text: There's a zipline leading to a train up on the bridge. Zip through the sky!

pln_hlp_36_03.base_text: Use the zipline up to the bridge! The train is the only way out!
pln_hlp_36_03.loc_text: Use the zipline up to the bridge! The train is the only way out!

pln_hlp_37_01.base_text: Hold on guys, I'll send some C4...
pln_hlp_37_01.loc_text: Hold on guys, I'll send some C4...

pln_hlp_38_01.base_text: Are you guys insane? Leave that bag!
pln_hlp_38_01.loc_text: Are you guys insane? Leave that bag!

pln_hlp_38_02.base_text: What's that, extra loot? You sure you wanna do that?
pln_hlp_38_02.loc_text: What's that, extra loot? You sure you wanna do that?

pln_hlp_38_03.base_text: You sure you wanna be greedy now?
pln_hlp_38_03.loc_text: You sure you wanna be greedy now?

pln_hm1_01_01.base_text: Busting up this motel is our first step to getting Hoxton free. Head in there.
pln_hm1_01_01.loc_text: Busting up this motel is our first step to getting Hoxton free. Head in there.

pln_hm1_01_02.base_text: If we wanna get Hoxton back, we gotta follow the Dentist's plan. Step one: bust up the motel.
pln_hm1_01_02.loc_text: If we wanna get Hoxton back, we gotta follow the Dentist's plan. Step one: bust up the motel.

pln_hm1_02_01.base_text: Looks like the mobsters are digging in in the rooms. Get in there and wipe every crew member you see. Safeties off.
pln_hm1_02_01.loc_text: Looks like the mobsters are digging in in the rooms. Get in there and wipe every crew member you see. Safeties off.

pln_hm1_02_02.base_text: Commissar's boys are crawling over this place like roaches. Exterminate them before they burrow into the rooms.
pln_hm1_02_02.loc_text: Commissar's boys are crawling over this place like roaches. Exterminate them before they burrow into the rooms.

pln_hm1_02_03.base_text: It's a roach motel - only the roaches are Russian mobsters. No matter. Get in there and put them down.
pln_hm1_02_03.loc_text: It's a roach motel - only the roaches are Russian mobsters. No matter. Get in there and put them down.

pln_hm1_07_01.base_text: That should be all of them. Nice work!
pln_hm1_07_01.loc_text: That should be all of them. Nice work!

pln_hm1_08_01.base_text: Great job, gang. The mobsters are dead or running. That's how we do it!
pln_hm1_08_01.loc_text: Great job, gang. The mobsters are dead or running. That's how we do it!

pln_hm1_08_02.base_text: That's it for the mobsters, gang. If they're not all dead, they're running. Either serves our purpose.
pln_hm1_08_02.loc_text: That's it for the mobsters, gang. If they're not all dead, they're running. Either serves our purpose.

pln_hm1_09_01.base_text: Those motel rooms look like good candidates for a little wrecking. Get in there and get your rockstar on. Smash the TV's, lamps - anything you can find.
pln_hm1_09_01.loc_text: Those motel rooms look like good candidates for a little wrecking. Get in there and get your rockstar on. Smash the TV's, lamps - anything you can find.

pln_hm1_09_02.base_text: Looks like the Commissar has spent a few roubles on those rooms. Smash 'em up! Don't forget to grab any valuables there too.
pln_hm1_09_02.loc_text: Looks like the Commissar has spent a few roubles on those rooms. Smash 'em up! Don't forget to grab any valuables there too.

pln_hm1_10_01.base_text: The Commissars' guys've got some hot wheels. How about we make them a little hotter? Look around the gas station, there's gotta be something to burn.
pln_hm1_10_01.loc_text: The Commissars' guys've got some hot wheels. How about we make them a little hotter? Look around the gas station, there's gotta be something to burn.

pln_hm1_10_02.base_text: We'll send these Russians to hell. And their cars. There's a gas station nearby. See if you can find something to help the fire.
pln_hm1_10_02.loc_text: We'll send these Russians to hell. And their cars. There's a gas station nearby. See if you can find something to help the fire.

pln_hm1_11_01.base_text: According to the Dentist, the Russian's shift a fair bit of meth out of this flea pit. Probably have a home brew operation up in one of those rooms. Smashing that up would really piss off the Commissar.
pln_hm1_11_01.loc_text: According to the Dentist, the Russian's shift a fair bit of meth out of this flea pit. Probably have a home brew operation up in one of those rooms. Smashing that up would really piss off the Commissar.

pln_hm1_11_02.base_text: The Dentist tells me the Russkie's move a lot of meth out of this dump. I'm guessing they're brewing it up in one of those upper floor rooms. Wrecking that would get the Commissars attention.
pln_hm1_11_02.loc_text: The Dentist tells me the Russkie's move a lot of meth out of this dump. I'm guessing they're brewing it up in one of those upper floor rooms. Wrecking that would get the Commissars attention.

pln_hm1_12_01.base_text: A fully functional methlab! Get cooking, if you see a formula, or scorch the place. I'm sure you've burned a few methlabs in your time.
pln_hm1_12_01.loc_text: A fully functional methlab! Get cooking, if you see a formula, or scorch the place. I'm sure you've burned a few methlabs in your time.

pln_hm1_12_02.base_text: A meth factory! Burn that place up. Or, if you can find a formula, get cooking. Can always move a little extra product.
pln_hm1_12_02.loc_text: A meth factory! Burn that place up. Or, if you can find a formula, get cooking. Can always move a little extra product.

pln_hm1_12_03.base_text: The Commissar has a methlab! I know you guys have torched a few labs in the past. Or brew a little magic, if you think got the time and can find a formula.
pln_hm1_12_03.loc_text: The Commissar has a methlab! I know you guys have torched a few labs in the past. Or brew a little magic, if you think got the time and can find a formula.

pln_hm1_13_01.base_text: Hey, I think that gas station is on our friend's books. There's C4 in the DeLorean. Fetch it. Time to go big.
pln_hm1_13_01.loc_text: Hey, I think that gas station is on our friend's books. There's C4 in the DeLorean. Fetch it. Time to go big.

pln_hm1_13_02.base_text: I've stowed some plastic explosive in the DeLorean. You can use it to make that gas station go up like the Tsar Bomba!
pln_hm1_13_02.loc_text: I've stowed some plastic explosive in the DeLorean. You can use it to make that gas station go up like the Tsar Bomba!

pln_hm1_13_03.base_text: There's plastic explosive in the DeLorean. Set it on the Commissar's gas station, and make it go up like Sputnik!
pln_hm1_13_03.loc_text: There's plastic explosive in the DeLorean. Set it on the Commissar's gas station, and make it go up like Sputnik!

pln_hm1_14_01.base_text: Now plant that C4 on the gas pumps. We'll light a fire they'll see in Moscow...
pln_hm1_14_01.loc_text: Now plant that C4 on the gas pumps. We'll light a fire they'll see in Moscow...

pln_hm1_14_02.base_text: Get that C4 on the pumps at the station. Then stand back. Way back.
pln_hm1_14_02.loc_text: Get that C4 on the pumps at the station. Then stand back. Way back.

pln_hm1_15_01.base_text: Yeah! Treat it like it's Keith Moon's birthday.
pln_hm1_15_01.loc_text: Yeah! Treat it like it's Keith Moon's birthday.

pln_hm1_15_05.base_text: Like a bull in a china shop!
pln_hm1_15_05.loc_text: Like a bull in a china shop!

pln_hm1_15_06.base_text: Smash it all up. TV's. Lamps. Anything that'll break!
pln_hm1_15_06.loc_text: Smash it all up. TV's. Lamps. Anything that'll break!

pln_hm1_16_01.base_text: Some men just want to watch the wheels burn.
pln_hm1_16_01.loc_text: Some men just want to watch the wheels burn.

pln_hm1_16_02.base_text: Nothing I like seeing more than cheap foreign cars going up in smoke.
pln_hm1_16_02.loc_text: Nothing I like seeing more than cheap foreign cars going up in smoke.

pln_hm1_16_03.base_text: Commissar's men don't look like the kind of guys to have fire insurance.
pln_hm1_16_03.loc_text: Commissar's men don't look like the kind of guys to have fire insurance.

pln_hm1_16_04.base_text: Keep burning those cars, gang. The Commissar will be pissed.
pln_hm1_16_04.loc_text: Keep burning those cars, gang. The Commissar will be pissed.

pln_hm1_16_05.base_text: Shame to see such fine wheels go up in smoke. But if it gets the Commissar's attention...
pln_hm1_16_05.loc_text: Shame to see such fine wheels go up in smoke. But if it gets the Commissar's attention...

pln_hm1_16_06.base_text: That's a beautiful car. Shame. But it's part of the job.
pln_hm1_16_06.loc_text: That's a beautiful car. Shame. But it's part of the job.

pln_hm1_17_01.base_text: You need to cause damage to get the Commissar to call us. Smash rooms, burn cars, kill his thugs - that should get his attention.
pln_hm1_17_01.loc_text: You need to cause damage to get the Commissar to call us. Smash rooms, burn cars, kill his thugs - that should get his attention.

pln_hm1_17_02.base_text: Get in there, and just mess the place up. Trash the rooms, light up the cars - whatever you can do. Go crazy. The Commissar is bound to give us a call.
pln_hm1_17_02.loc_text: Get in there, and just mess the place up. Trash the rooms, light up the cars - whatever you can do. Go crazy. The Commissar is bound to give us a call.

pln_hm1_17_03.base_text: I'm sure the Commissar doesn't have fire and damage insurance on this dump. So go nuts. Trash the rooms, scorch the cars - anything you can do to rile that guy and get him on the line.
pln_hm1_17_03.loc_text: I'm sure the Commissar doesn't have fire and damage insurance on this dump. So go nuts. Trash the rooms, scorch the cars - anything you can do to rile that guy and get him on the line.

pln_hm1_18_01.base_text: You got his attention. But I need longer to establish the trace. Somewhere in DC. Narrowing it down. Keep working.
pln_hm1_18_01.loc_text: You got his attention. But I need longer to establish the trace. Somewhere in DC. Narrowing it down. Keep working.

pln_hm1_18_02.base_text: Damn, he hung up. Somewhere in the city. Keep breaking.
pln_hm1_18_02.loc_text: Damn, he hung up. Somewhere in the city. Keep breaking.

pln_hm1_18_03.base_text: The trace is working but I need more time. Get him back on the line. Keep trashing.
pln_hm1_18_03.loc_text: The trace is working but I need more time. Get him back on the line. Keep trashing.

pln_hm1_19_01.base_text: I'm almost there, gang. He's gotta be close to the centre. Could be... Damn, still too vague. Keep going.
pln_hm1_19_01.loc_text: I'm almost there, gang. He's gotta be close to the centre. Could be... Damn, still too vague. Keep going.

pln_hm1_19_02.base_text: Damn, I almost had his location. Definitely near the centre. Keep at it.
pln_hm1_19_02.loc_text: Damn, I almost had his location. Definitely near the centre. Keep at it.

pln_hm1_19_03.base_text: So close to nailing his location. Keep going. Just get him back for a little longer.
pln_hm1_19_03.loc_text: So close to nailing his location. Keep going. Just get him back for a little longer.

pln_hm1_20_01.base_text: Gotcha! Our guy is somewhere in, hang on...
pln_hm1_20_01.loc_text: Gotcha! Our guy is somewhere in, hang on...

pln_hm1_20_02.base_text: And... Got it! Well, looks like our Russian friend is somewhere in, hold on...
pln_hm1_20_02.loc_text: And... Got it! Well, looks like our Russian friend is somewhere in, hold on...

pln_hm1_26_01.base_text: That's as far as I can take it. Look around for something that might narrow down his location.
pln_hm1_26_01.loc_text: That's as far as I can take it. Look around for something that might narrow down his location.

pln_hm1_26_02.base_text: Look for something connected to that place.
pln_hm1_26_02.loc_text: Look for something connected to that place.

pln_hm1_27_01.base_text: Gang, there's got to be something in the motelrooms that can pinpoint the Commissar's location. Keep looking.
pln_hm1_27_01.loc_text: Gang, there's got to be something in the motelrooms that can pinpoint the Commissar's location. Keep looking.

pln_hm1_27_02.base_text: Keep searching the motel, guys. There has to be some clue to where the Commissar is.
pln_hm1_27_02.loc_text: Keep searching the motel, guys. There has to be some clue to where the Commissar is.

pln_hm1_27_03.base_text: Keep looking around the place, gang. Somewhere there's something that can help nail the Commissars exact location.
pln_hm1_27_03.loc_text: Keep looking around the place, gang. Somewhere there's something that can help nail the Commissars exact location.

pln_hm1_29_01.base_text: That's a second hatch, guys. The Commissar must have something sweet.
pln_hm1_29_01.loc_text: That's a second hatch, guys. The Commissar must have something sweet.

pln_hm1_29_02.base_text: A second hatch. What's the Commissar hiding in there?
pln_hm1_29_02.loc_text: A second hatch. What's the Commissar hiding in there?

pln_hm1_30_01.base_text: You remember that metal hatch you discovered? Secrets worth knowing are often well protected. I've been thinking about how we can get through. Bile is en-route. He'll drop something for you.
pln_hm1_30_01.loc_text: You remember that metal hatch you discovered? Secrets worth knowing are often well protected. I've been thinking about how we can get through. Bile is en-route. He'll drop something for you.

pln_hm1_30_02.base_text: I've an idea to pop that hatch you saw earlier. Bile's on his way with a little something for you. Hopefully something down there will lead us to the Commissar.
pln_hm1_30_02.loc_text: I've an idea to pop that hatch you saw earlier. Bile's on his way with a little something for you. Hopefully something down there will lead us to the Commissar.

pln_hm1_30_03.base_text: Hey, maybe that hatch hides something that can help us locate the Commissar. I got an idea how we can crack it. Bile is bringing you something.
pln_hm1_30_03.loc_text: Hey, maybe that hatch hides something that can help us locate the Commissar. I got an idea how we can crack it. Bile is bringing you something.

pln_hm1_31_01.base_text: There's gotta be more to this dump. The Dentist says the Commissar keeps his best loot in a fortified basement. I'm sure you wanna know what's in there. Search the ground floor rooms. See if you can find anything suspicious.
pln_hm1_31_01.loc_text: There's gotta be more to this dump. The Dentist says the Commissar keeps his best loot in a fortified basement. I'm sure you wanna know what's in there. Search the ground floor rooms. See if you can find anything suspicious.

pln_hm1_31_02.base_text: The Dentist just clued me in - the Commissar likes to keep his best loot in the basement. Look around the ground floor rooms for something that might be an entrance.
pln_hm1_31_02.loc_text: The Dentist just clued me in - the Commissar likes to keep his best loot in the basement. Look around the ground floor rooms for something that might be an entrance.

pln_hm1_31_03.base_text: A little free intel from the Dentist - Commissar has a basement safe room. That's where his prize stash will be. And our best chance of tracking that rat. Find it!
pln_hm1_31_03.loc_text: A little free intel from the Dentist - Commissar has a basement safe room. That's where his prize stash will be. And our best chance of tracking that rat. Find it!

pln_hm1_32_01.base_text: Jackpot! I've got a plan to pry that baby open. I'll contact Bile right away. He's going to drop something sweet.
pln_hm1_32_01.loc_text: Jackpot! I've got a plan to pry that baby open. I'll contact Bile right away. He's going to drop something sweet.

pln_hm1_32_02.base_text: Bingo! Steel reinforced hatch. I've got an idea. Bile will close on your position. Get ready to fetch your present.
pln_hm1_32_02.loc_text: Bingo! Steel reinforced hatch. I've got an idea. Bile will close on your position. Get ready to fetch your present.

pln_hm1_32_03.base_text: That's the hatch! I've got an idea for it. Bile is going to be Santa, and since you're such good boys and girls...
pln_hm1_32_03.loc_text: That's the hatch! I've got an idea for it. Bile is going to be Santa, and since you're such good boys and girls...

pln_hm1_33_01.base_text: Happy birthday, clowns. Here's your present.
pln_hm1_33_01.loc_text: Happy birthday, clowns. Here's your present.

pln_hm1_33_02.base_text: Watch your heads guys. Presents from heaven.
pln_hm1_33_02.loc_text: Watch your heads guys. Presents from heaven.

pln_hm1_34_01.base_text: Connect that cable to hatch and the pick-up. Then start the engine. 400 horsepower and one industrial cable should be enough to tear that hatch right off.
pln_hm1_34_01.loc_text: Connect that cable to hatch and the pick-up. Then start the engine. 400 horsepower and one industrial cable should be enough to tear that hatch right off.

pln_hm1_34_02.base_text: That bag's holding a heavy cable. Use it to connect the hatch to the pick-up. Start it up and let's crack open that basement.
pln_hm1_34_02.loc_text: That bag's holding a heavy cable. Use it to connect the hatch to the pick-up. Start it up and let's crack open that basement.

pln_hm1_35_01.base_text: All connected? Good. Only need to get that pick-up working.
pln_hm1_35_01.loc_text: All connected? Good. Only need to get that pick-up working.

pln_hm1_35_02.base_text: Good, now do your little magic on that baby. Get the pick-up running!
pln_hm1_35_02.loc_text: Good, now do your little magic on that baby. Get the pick-up running!

pln_hm1_35_03.base_text: You sure remember how to hotwire an engine. Start it up!
pln_hm1_35_03.loc_text: You sure remember how to hotwire an engine. Start it up!

pln_hm1_36_01.base_text: Is it working? Nice. But damn, that hatch is strong.
pln_hm1_36_01.loc_text: Is it working? Nice. But damn, that hatch is strong.

pln_hm1_36_02.base_text: I've seen that equipment pull a two-ton Roadwarrior out of a bog in ten seconds, but that hatch is holding tight.
pln_hm1_36_02.loc_text: I've seen that equipment pull a two-ton Roadwarrior out of a bog in ten seconds, but that hatch is holding tight.

pln_hm1_36_03.base_text: Credit to the Commissar. He hasn't been cheap with the hatch. The pick-up is pulling strong.
pln_hm1_36_03.loc_text: Credit to the Commissar. He hasn't been cheap with the hatch. The pick-up is pulling strong.

pln_hm1_43_01.base_text: The cops killed the engine! Restart it!
pln_hm1_43_01.loc_text: The cops killed the engine! Restart it!

pln_hm1_43_02.base_text: Damn cops stalled the engine. Better get the pick-up moving again - quick!
pln_hm1_43_02.loc_text: Damn cops stalled the engine. Better get the pick-up moving again - quick!

pln_hm1_43_03.base_text: Sounds like the SWAT killed the engine. Get her moving again.
pln_hm1_43_03.loc_text: Sounds like the SWAT killed the engine. Get her moving again.

pln_hm1_44_01.base_text: Purring like a kitten. A 400 brake horsepower kitten. Good job!
pln_hm1_44_01.loc_text: Purring like a kitten. A 400 brake horsepower kitten. Good job!

pln_hm1_44_02.base_text: Make sure the cops don't do that again. Keep it running!
pln_hm1_44_02.loc_text: Make sure the cops don't do that again. Keep it running!

pln_hm1_44_03.base_text: Good job, clowns. Keep the wheels burning.
pln_hm1_44_03.loc_text: Good job, clowns. Keep the wheels burning.

pln_hm1_45_01.base_text: Hell yeah, it's open! Get down there!
pln_hm1_45_01.loc_text: Hell yeah, it's open! Get down there!

pln_hm1_45_02.base_text: Prying that open felt really good. Now check what's underground!
pln_hm1_45_02.loc_text: Prying that open felt really good. Now check what's underground!

pln_hm1_45_03.base_text: Yeah! Thats the sweet sound of success. Get yourselves in the basement and check what's in there.
pln_hm1_45_03.loc_text: Yeah! Thats the sweet sound of success. Get yourselves in the basement and check what's in there.

pln_hm1_46_01.base_text: Georgetown. Search through the files, the maps on the wall - anything that can pinpoint his exact location. Remember: it's Georgetown.
pln_hm1_46_01.loc_text: Georgetown. Search through the files, the maps on the wall - anything that can pinpoint his exact location. Remember: it's Georgetown.

pln_hm1_46_02.base_text: The Commissar is holed up somewhere around Georgetown. Find a clue. Something to do with Georgetown.
pln_hm1_46_02.loc_text: The Commissar is holed up somewhere around Georgetown. Find a clue. Something to do with Georgetown.

pln_hm1_46_03.base_text: We know the Commissar called us from Georgetown. Look for something related to that place. Georgetown.
pln_hm1_46_03.loc_text: We know the Commissar called us from Georgetown. Look for something related to that place. Georgetown.

pln_hm1_47_01.base_text: We know he is in West End somewhere. Look around for anything related to it. Files, maps. Remember: West End.
pln_hm1_47_01.loc_text: We know he is in West End somewhere. Look around for anything related to it. Files, maps. Remember: West End.

pln_hm1_47_02.base_text: The trace indicates West End. So look for a clue for that - West End.
pln_hm1_47_02.loc_text: The trace indicates West End. So look for a clue for that - West End.

pln_hm1_47_03.base_text: We know the call originated in West End. Look for something to give us a precise address. West End.
pln_hm1_47_03.loc_text: We know the call originated in West End. Look for something to give us a precise address. West End.

pln_hm1_48_01.base_text: We know the Commissar is around Foggy Bottom. There must be something there that can narrow it down. Maps, files - anything.
pln_hm1_48_01.loc_text: We know the Commissar is around Foggy Bottom. There must be something there that can narrow it down. Maps, files - anything.

pln_hm1_48_02.base_text: The Commissar is bunkered down somewhere around Foggy Bottom. Find a clue for that place.
pln_hm1_48_02.loc_text: The Commissar is bunkered down somewhere around Foggy Bottom. Find a clue for that place.

pln_hm1_48_03.base_text: The call came from Foggy Bottom. Find something that will pinpoint the Commissar. Remember - Foggy Bottom.
pln_hm1_48_03.loc_text: The call came from Foggy Bottom. Find something that will pinpoint the Commissar. Remember - Foggy Bottom.

pln_hm1_49_01.base_text: Shaw! That's where he is. But we need to narrow it down to a precise address. Look for maps or files related to Shaw.
pln_hm1_49_01.loc_text: Shaw! That's where he is. But we need to narrow it down to a precise address. Look for maps or files related to Shaw.

pln_hm1_49_02.base_text: The call came from Shaw, which means the Commissar is somewhere there. Look for a clue for Shaw.
pln_hm1_49_02.loc_text: The call came from Shaw, which means the Commissar is somewhere there. Look for a clue for Shaw.

pln_hm1_49_03.base_text: Our Russian friend is somewhere in Shaw, so find a clue for that. Remember, he's in Shaw.
pln_hm1_49_03.loc_text: Our Russian friend is somewhere in Shaw, so find a clue for that. Remember, he's in Shaw.

pln_hm1_50_01.base_text: Those crates are headed out to the Commissar's other dirty dens. Get those labels and check them at that code reader.
pln_hm1_50_01.loc_text: Those crates are headed out to the Commissar's other dirty dens. Get those labels and check them at that code reader.

pln_hm1_50_02.base_text: Those stacked crates are due to be shipped out to the Commissar. Check the labels. Get the right one to the code reader, and that should lead us straight to the Commissar.
pln_hm1_50_02.loc_text: Those stacked crates are due to be shipped out to the Commissar. Check the labels. Get the right one to the code reader, and that should lead us straight to the Commissar.

pln_hm1_50_03.base_text: You see all those crates? They're about to get shipped out directly to the Commissar's location. Grab the labels and check them at the reader over there. That should give us Commissar's precise location.
pln_hm1_50_03.loc_text: You see all those crates? They're about to get shipped out directly to the Commissar's location. Grab the labels and check them at the reader over there. That should give us Commissar's precise location.

pln_hm1_51_01.base_text: That can't be the right adress, try again with another one.
pln_hm1_51_01.loc_text: That can't be the right adress, try again with another one.

pln_hm1_51_02.base_text: No no no, that can't be correct. Get another barcode.
pln_hm1_51_02.loc_text: No no no, that can't be correct. Get another barcode.

pln_hm1_51_03.base_text: The adress is in the wrong district - try another code.

pln_hm1_52_01.base_text: That's it! We got the Commissar's location. Time to haul ass. Those crates gave me an idea...
pln_hm1_52_01.loc_text: That's it! We got the Commissar's location. Time to haul ass. Those crates gave me an idea...

pln_hm1_52_02.base_text: So that's where that Russian rat is holed up. Get yourselves and any loot back to the car. Hmm, those crates got me thinking...
pln_hm1_52_02.loc_text: So that's where that Russian rat is holed up. Get yourselves and any loot back to the car. Hmm, those crates got me thinking...

pln_hm1_52_03.base_text: Excellent job! We know where he is. Now hustle back to the car. Grab any loot before the Fed's get it. You know... Those crates gave me an idea...
pln_hm1_52_03.loc_text: Excellent job! We know where he is. Now hustle back to the car. Grab any loot before the Fed's get it. You know... Those crates gave me an idea...

pln_hm1_53_01.base_text: I'm sure a lot of nefarious shit goes down at that motel. Take a look around. See what you can find.
pln_hm1_53_01.loc_text: I'm sure a lot of nefarious shit goes down at that motel. Take a look around. See what you can find.

pln_hm1_53_02.base_text: Sure there must be loot all over this place. Search the rooms if you fancy a few extra Benjamins.
pln_hm1_53_02.loc_text: Sure there must be loot all over this place. Search the rooms if you fancy a few extra Benjamins.

pln_hm1_53_03.base_text: Dentist said they ship meth outta here. So there must be manufacturing. And meth means money.
pln_hm1_53_03.loc_text: Dentist said they ship meth outta here. So there must be manufacturing. And meth means money.

pln_hm1_53_04.base_text: I hear they make a lot of meth here. I don't want to put ideas in your head, but if you want to make a little extra money...
pln_hm1_53_04.loc_text: I hear they make a lot of meth here. I don't want to put ideas in your head, but if you want to make a little extra money...

pln_hm1_54_01.base_text: What's that? Russian loot? Get it to the DeLorean. Hurry!
pln_hm1_54_01.loc_text: What's that? Russian loot? Get it to the DeLorean. Hurry!

pln_hm1_54_02.base_text: The Russians stash their loot here? Nice bonus! Toss it in the DeLorean.
pln_hm1_54_02.loc_text: The Russians stash their loot here? Nice bonus! Toss it in the DeLorean.

pln_hm1_54_03.base_text: Russian's got a bit of loot stashed around the place. Not going to make us rich, but every little helps.
pln_hm1_54_03.loc_text: Russian's got a bit of loot stashed around the place. Not going to make us rich, but every little helps.

pln_hm1_55_01.base_text: Great work. Now, let's see if the big fish will bite...
pln_hm1_55_01.loc_text: Great work. Now, let's see if the big fish will bite...

pln_hm1_55_02.base_text: Alright. Great. Lets see if he takes the bait...
pln_hm1_55_02.loc_text: Alright. Great. Lets see if he takes the bait...

pln_hm1_55_03.base_text: That should be it! Great stuff! Come on, Commissar...  Call...
pln_hm1_55_03.loc_text: That should be it! Great stuff! Come on, Commissar...  Call...

pln_hm1_56_01.base_text: Drill's done its work. Get in that basement!
pln_hm1_56_01.loc_text: Drill's done its work. Get in that basement!

pln_hm1_56_02.base_text: OK, drill's done. Get into the basement.
pln_hm1_56_02.loc_text: OK, drill's done. Get into the basement.

pln_hm1_56_03.base_text: Think the drill is finished, guys. Time to get into that basement.

pln_hm1_57_01.base_text: Running the barcode now. Shouldn't take long to get an address.
pln_hm1_57_01.loc_text: Running the barcode now. Shouldn't take long to get an address.

pln_hm1_57_02.base_text: Gimme a couple of minutes to confirm the barcode. Hold on.
pln_hm1_57_02.loc_text: Gimme a couple of minutes to confirm the barcode. Hold on.

pln_hm1_57_03.base_text: Checking the barcode now. Keep the cops off it.
pln_hm1_57_03.loc_text: Checking the barcode now. Keep the cops off it.

pln_hm1_58_01.loc_text: Connect that cable to both the hatch and the truck.

pln_hm1_58_03.loc_text: Now get the cable on both the pick-up and the hatch.

pln_hm1_59_01.base_text: SWAT raining down from street level. Watch your heads!
pln_hm1_59_01.loc_text: SWAT raining down from street level. Watch your heads!

pln_hm1_59_02.loc_text: Police breaching their way down. Heads up!

pln_hm1_59_03.loc_text: SWAT are blasting down from the parking lot. Watch it!

pln_hm1_60_02.loc_text: Chopper on the scene, but it ain't the feds!

pln_hm1_60_03.base_text: Who's flying that chopper. Not the cops.
pln_hm1_60_03.loc_text: Who's flying that chopper. Not the cops.

pln_hm1_61_02.loc_text: Chopper's retreating! Wonder if Gage can get us SAM's.

pln_hm1_61_03.base_text: That pilot's had enough. Yeah, back to base, asshole.
pln_hm1_61_03.loc_text: That pilot's had enough. Yeah, back to base, asshole.

pln_hm1_62_01.loc_text: Chopper's back on the scene! Watch out.

pln_hm1_62_02.loc_text: Uh-oh, looks like Commissar's chopper is back for another bite.

pln_hm1_62_03.base_text: Chopper's back in the area. Watch for it.
pln_hm1_62_03.loc_text: Chopper's back in the area. Watch for it.

pln_hm1_62_04.base_text: What the hell! That crazy chopper is back.
pln_hm1_62_04.loc_text: What the hell! That crazy chopper is back.

pln_hm1_62_06.base_text: The gunship is back. Keep your heads down, gang.
pln_hm1_62_06.loc_text: The gunship is back. Keep your heads down, gang.

pln_hm1_63_03.loc_text: It's firing! Get outta the way... Now!

pln_hm1_64_01.base_text: Remember - track down the mobsters. Track them down, and put them down.
pln_hm1_64_01.loc_text: Remember - track down the mobsters. Track them down, and put them down.

pln_hm1_64_02.base_text: Don't forget to wipe out any Russian mobsters you find.
pln_hm1_64_02.loc_text: Don't forget to wipe out any Russian mobsters you find.

pln_hm1_64_03.base_text: Let me remind you - you need to be wiping out the mobsters. Search the motel.
pln_hm1_64_03.loc_text: Let me remind you - you need to be wiping out the mobsters. Search the motel.

pln_hm1_65_01.base_text: More mobsters on the way! Watch out for the vans.

pln_hm1_65_02.base_text: More Russians on the way. Vans coming around the corner!
pln_hm1_65_02.loc_text: More Russians on the way. Vans coming around the corner!

pln_hm1_65_03.base_text: The Commissar sent his little chickens. Give 'em a warm welcome.
pln_hm1_65_03.loc_text: The Commissar sent his little chickens. Give 'em a warm welcome.

pln_hm1_66_01.base_text: Neighbors must've heard gunshots. Police signals just went nuts.
pln_hm1_66_01.loc_text: Neighbors must've heard gunshots. Police signals just went nuts.

pln_hm1_66_02.loc_text: Hearing police signals. Someone must've called 'em. Stay alert.

pln_hm1_66_03.base_text: Cop switchboard just lit up. Expect company, gang.
pln_hm1_66_03.loc_text: Cop switchboard just lit up. Expect company, gang.

pln_hm1_67_01.loc_text: It's ugly business, but it's gotta be done.

pln_hm1_67_02.base_text: Mobster down. That should get Commissar's attention.
pln_hm1_67_02.loc_text: Mobster down. That should get Commissar's attention.

pln_hm1_67_04.base_text: Another mobster taken care of. Keep at it.
pln_hm1_67_04.loc_text: Another mobster taken care of. Keep at it.

pln_hm1_68_01.base_text: Now get that gasoline on a car and torch it!
pln_hm1_68_01.loc_text: Now get that gasoline on a car and torch it!

pln_hm1_68_02.base_text: Haul that gas back to the cars. Light 'em up!
pln_hm1_68_02.loc_text: Haul that gas back to the cars. Light 'em up!

pln_hm1_68_03.base_text: Good! Get back to the lot, and start some fires!
pln_hm1_68_03.loc_text: Good! Get back to the lot, and start some fires!

pln_hm1_69_01.base_text: There's a good amount of tasty loot down here. Hustle out as much as you can.
pln_hm1_69_01.loc_text: There's a good amount of tasty loot down here. Hustle out as much as you can.

pln_hm1_70_01.loc_text: What the hell was that? Did they just blow up another entrance?

pln_hm1_70_02.base_text: Guys, I think the cops just shape charged another entrance!
pln_hm1_70_02.loc_text: Guys, I think the cops just shape charged another entrance!

pln_hm1_70_03.base_text: What the hell! Cops just breached another way in.
pln_hm1_70_03.loc_text: What the hell! Cops just breached another way in.

pln_hm1_71_01.base_text: Remember: you're looking for a clue about Downtown Washington. A file, hint - anything. See where he is at.
pln_hm1_71_01.loc_text: Remember: you're looking for a clue about Downtown Washington. A file, hint - anything. See where he is at.

pln_hm1_71_02.base_text: We know that Russian rat is somewhere Downtown. Search for a clue - remember, Downtown.
pln_hm1_71_02.loc_text: We know that Russian rat is somewhere Downtown. Search for a clue - remember, Downtown.

pln_hm1_71_03.base_text: Commissar's hiding at Downtown. Look for a clue for that. He's Downtown.
pln_hm1_71_03.loc_text: Commissar's hiding at Downtown. Look for a clue for that. He's Downtown.

pln_hm1_72_01.base_text: Guys, don't forget: douse those cars with gasoline. Light 'em up.
pln_hm1_72_01.loc_text: Guys, don't forget: douse those cars with gasoline. Light 'em up.

pln_hm1_72_02.base_text: You got to fetch some gas and torch those cars.

pln_hm1_73_01.loc_text: That explosion will have it raining crystals for weeks.

pln_hm1_73_02.base_text: The scab-faced meth zombies will rue this day.
pln_hm1_73_02.loc_text: The scab-faced meth zombies will rue this day.

pln_hm1_73_03.base_text: I loved chemistry in high school. By that, I mean I love stuff being blown up. Good work!
pln_hm1_73_03.loc_text: I loved chemistry in high school. By that, I mean I love stuff being blown up. Good work!

pln_hm1_74_01.base_text: Some C4 on that gas station should send a message. Get to it.
pln_hm1_74_01.loc_text: Some C4 on that gas station should send a message. Get to it.

pln_hm1_74_02.base_text: Don't forget to send that gas station to hell, gang. C4, pumps... You know.
pln_hm1_74_02.loc_text: Don't forget to send that gas station to hell, gang. C4, pumps... You know.

pln_hm1_74_03.base_text: The gas station is a nice little earner in this economy. So blast it. C4 on the pumps.
pln_hm1_74_03.loc_text: The gas station is a nice little earner in this economy. So blast it. C4 on the pumps.

pln_hm1_75_01.base_text: Woah! Wherever Commissar is, he heard that!
pln_hm1_75_01.loc_text: Woah! Wherever Commissar is, he heard that!

pln_hm1_75_02.base_text: Damn! I felt that all the way over here.
pln_hm1_75_02.loc_text: Damn! I felt that all the way over here.

pln_hm1_75_03.base_text: Haha, you guys give new meaning to going loud.
pln_hm1_75_03.loc_text: Haha, you guys give new meaning to going loud.

pln_hm1_76_01.loc_text: That rug looks wrong. My guess is it's covering a hatch. Well, we'll worry about that later.

pln_hm1_76_02.base_text: I think that rug was quickly thrown down, probably hiding a hatch. We'll check it out later.
pln_hm1_76_02.loc_text: I think that rug was quickly thrown down, probably hiding a hatch. We'll check it out later.

pln_hm1_76_03.base_text: Don't think that rug should be there. Likely hiding a hatch. Remember the room - we'll come back here.
pln_hm1_76_03.loc_text: Don't think that rug should be there. Likely hiding a hatch. Remember the room - we'll come back here.

pln_hm1_77_01.base_text: Now just connect it to the hatch.
pln_hm1_77_01.loc_text: Now just connect it to the hatch.

pln_hm1_77_02.loc_text: Now head to the hatch and hook up the cable.
