pln_hm1_78_01.loc_text: With all of these crates, there has to be a crowbar around here somewhere.

pln_hm1_78_02.base_text: Surely there has to be a way to open the crates. A crowbar or something.
pln_hm1_78_02.loc_text: Surely there has to be a way to open the crates. A crowbar or something.

pln_hm1_78_03.base_text: There's probably a crowbar around here somewhere.
pln_hm1_78_03.loc_text: There's probably a crowbar around here somewhere.

pln_hm1_79_01.base_text: Hmmm... He can't be in here... Neither there...
pln_hm1_79_01.loc_text: Hmmm... He can't be in here... Neither there...

pln_hm1_79_02.base_text: Yes! I got the - no, wait. Can't be. Damn. Almost had it.
pln_hm1_79_02.loc_text: Yes! I got the - no, wait. Can't be. Damn. Almost had it.

pln_hm1_79_03.base_text: This district matches with... Hmmm, give me some more time...
pln_hm1_79_03.loc_text: This district matches with... Hmmm, give me some more time...

pln_hm1_79_04.base_text: Come on, come on... Piece of Russian crap...
pln_hm1_79_04.loc_text: Come on, come on... Piece of Russian crap...

pln_hm1_79_05.base_text: Think the Commissar got this thing from Vlad. Slow Russian junk...
pln_hm1_79_05.loc_text: Think the Commissar got this thing from Vlad. Slow Russian junk...

pln_hm1_79_06.base_text: This piece of junk is from the 70's. Hurry up...
pln_hm1_79_06.loc_text: This piece of junk is from the 70's. Hurry up...

pln_hm1_79_07.base_text: Soviet era machinery. Slow. So slow.
pln_hm1_79_07.loc_text: Soviet era machinery. Slow. So slow.

pln_hm1_79_08.base_text: Damn, did the Commissar bring this piece of crap from the Motherland?
pln_hm1_79_08.loc_text: Damn, did the Commissar bring this piece of crap from the Motherland?

pln_hm1_intro_01_01.base_text: The Commissar is dug in tight as a tick. This is one of his operations. Wreak havoc. If you can smash this dump up enough, he should give us a call. Then I can trace him.
pln_hm1_intro_01_01.loc_text: The Commissar is dug in tight as a tick. This is one of his operations. Wreak havoc. If you can smash this dump up enough, he should give us a call. Then I can trace him.

pln_hm1_intro_01_02.base_text: To get to the Commissar, we have to find the Commissar. This motel is one of his operations. Cause as much damage as you can. If he calls, I can track him.
pln_hm1_intro_01_02.loc_text: To get to the Commissar, we have to find the Commissar. This motel is one of his operations. Cause as much damage as you can. If he calls, I can track him.

pln_hm2_01_02.base_text: Jump out like a jack-in-the-box. Masks on!
pln_hm2_01_02.loc_text: Jump out like a jack-in-the-box. Masks on!

pln_hm2_02_01.base_text: Get your mask on, and out of the damn crate.
pln_hm2_02_01.loc_text: Get your mask on, and out of the damn crate.

pln_hm2_02_02.base_text: Get out of the crates. Hit 'em with surprise.
pln_hm2_02_02.loc_text: Get out of the crates. Hit 'em with surprise.

pln_hm2_02_03.base_text: Hoxton's rottin' in a cell, and you're scratching your ass in there. Out of the crate!
pln_hm2_02_03.loc_text: Hoxton's rottin' in a cell, and you're scratching your ass in there. Out of the crate!

pln_hm2_02_04.base_text: We need to put the Commissar in a wooden box. Not stay in one ourselves. Move!
pln_hm2_02_04.loc_text: We need to put the Commissar in a wooden box. Not stay in one ourselves. Move!

pln_hm2_02_05.base_text: I give you these toys and all you want to do is stay in the box. Move it!
pln_hm2_02_05.loc_text: I give you these toys and all you want to do is stay in the box. Move it!

pln_hm2_03_03.base_text: Thats him! Dont let him escape!
pln_hm2_03_03.loc_text: Thats him! Dont let him escape!

pln_hm2_04_01.base_text: Damn, the fat rat's riding the elevator. After him! Catch him before he gets away!
pln_hm2_04_01.loc_text: Damn, the fat rat's riding the elevator. After him! Catch him before he gets away!

pln_hm2_04_02.base_text: He's taken the elevator! Get up there after him. Do not let him escape.
pln_hm2_04_02.loc_text: He's taken the elevator! Get up there after him. Do not let him escape.

pln_hm2_04_03.base_text: He's headed up in the elevator! Chase him! He escapes, the Dentist will be pissed.
pln_hm2_04_03.loc_text: He's headed up in the elevator! Chase him! He escapes, the Dentist will be pissed.

pln_hm2_05_01.base_text: SWAT coming in! They were nearby. Wonder if they were already ready to hit him.
pln_hm2_05_01.loc_text: SWAT coming in! They were nearby. Wonder if they were already ready to hit him.

pln_hm2_05_02.base_text: SWAT on their way. Guess they wanted to talk to Commissar about the battle at the motel.
pln_hm2_05_02.loc_text: SWAT on their way. Guess they wanted to talk to Commissar about the battle at the motel.

pln_hm2_05_03.base_text: Woah, didn't take long for the SWAT's to show up. Must've been en route.
pln_hm2_05_03.loc_text: Woah, didn't take long for the SWAT's to show up. Must've been en route.

pln_hm2_06_01.base_text: Keep going, guys. He gotta be around here.
pln_hm2_06_01.loc_text: Keep going, guys. He gotta be around here.

pln_hm2_06_02.base_text: Go, guys. Dont lose the scent!
pln_hm2_06_02.loc_text: Go, guys. Dont lose the scent!

pln_hm2_06_03.base_text: He's headed up. Look for the stairways up.
pln_hm2_06_03.loc_text: He's headed up. Look for the stairways up.

pln_hm2_06_04.base_text: His penthouse is on the top floor. My guess is he's headed there.
pln_hm2_06_04.loc_text: His penthouse is on the top floor. My guess is he's headed there.

pln_hm2_06_05.base_text: Try to get up to the next floor.
pln_hm2_06_05.loc_text: Try to get up to the next floor.

pln_hm2_07_02.base_text: This maniacs' lair must be up ahead.
pln_hm2_07_02.loc_text: This maniacs' lair must be up ahead.

pln_hm2_07_03.base_text: This is the penthouse level. Commissar has to be here.
pln_hm2_07_03.loc_text: This is the penthouse level. Commissar has to be here.

pln_hm2_08_01.base_text: He's inside this apartment. Get it open.
pln_hm2_08_01.loc_text: He's inside this apartment. Get it open.

pln_hm2_08_02.base_text: This is it. Commissar's apartment. Get through.
pln_hm2_08_02.loc_text: This is it. Commissar's apartment. Get through.

pln_hm2_08_03.base_text: This is it. Bust your way in. Don't care how you do it, just do it!
pln_hm2_08_03.loc_text: This is it. Bust your way in. Don't care how you do it, just do it!

pln_hm2_09_02.base_text: Did the rat jump off...? No. Can't be.
pln_hm2_09_02.loc_text: Did the rat jump off...? No. Can't be.

pln_hm2_10_01.base_text: That crafty bastard! He's using his vault as a panic room. Let me drop you a thermal drill.
pln_hm2_10_01.loc_text: That crafty bastard! He's using his vault as a panic room. Let me drop you a thermal drill.

pln_hm2_10_02.base_text: A vault! The Commissar is pulling every string to keep his ass alive. I'm sending over a thermal drill.
pln_hm2_10_02.loc_text: A vault! The Commissar is pulling every string to keep his ass alive. I'm sending over a thermal drill.

pln_hm2_10_03.base_text: He's locked himself in his vault, the crazy Ivan! Break it open. I'm sending you a thermal drill.
pln_hm2_10_03.loc_text: He's locked himself in his vault, the crazy Ivan! Break it open. I'm sending you a thermal drill.

pln_hm2_11_01.base_text: Drill is dropped. Get it. Get that vault open.
pln_hm2_11_01.loc_text: Drill is dropped. Get it. Get that vault open.

pln_hm2_11_02.base_text: The drill is in the area. Pilot said "through a skylight". Find it!
pln_hm2_11_02.loc_text: The drill is in the area. Pilot said "through a skylight". Find it!

pln_hm2_11_03.base_text: Your drill is there. Get it started on that vault.
pln_hm2_11_03.loc_text: Your drill is there. Get it started on that vault.

pln_hm2_12_01.base_text: They're making a last effort. Make sure to stay away from that helicopter!
pln_hm2_12_01.loc_text: They're making a last effort. Make sure to stay away from that helicopter!

pln_hm2_12_02.base_text: Commissar is throwing everything he has left! Even his damned gunship! Keep your distance!
pln_hm2_12_02.loc_text: Commissar is throwing everything he has left! Even his damned gunship! Keep your distance!

pln_hm2_12_03.base_text: Commissar has called in the big guns. The very big guns. Stay away from that chopper!
pln_hm2_12_03.loc_text: Commissar has called in the big guns. The very big guns. Stay away from that chopper!

pln_hm2_13_01.base_text: Put out those fires with the sprinkler system.
pln_hm2_13_01.loc_text: Put out those fires with the sprinkler system.

pln_hm2_13_02.base_text: Is the Commissar up to something? Get those fires out!
pln_hm2_13_02.loc_text: Is the Commissar up to something? Get those fires out!

pln_hm2_13_03.base_text: You need to deal with those fires. Use the sprinklers.
pln_hm2_13_03.loc_text: You need to deal with those fires. Use the sprinklers.

pln_hm2_13_04.base_text: Gang, put those fires out. Don't want to risk him escaping in the chaos.
pln_hm2_13_04.loc_text: Gang, put those fires out. Don't want to risk him escaping in the chaos.

pln_hm2_13_06.base_text: Activate the sprinklers. You got to put out the fires.
pln_hm2_13_06.loc_text: Activate the sprinklers. You got to put out the fires.

pln_hm2_14_01.base_text: A little hot in there, but you did good.
pln_hm2_14_01.loc_text: A little hot in there, but you did good.

pln_hm2_14_02.base_text: Hope you didn't get too toasty. Great job.
pln_hm2_14_02.loc_text: Hope you didn't get too toasty. Great job.

pln_hm2_14_04.base_text: Fires' out. You did well, gang.
pln_hm2_14_04.loc_text: Fires' out. You did well, gang.

pln_hm2_14_06.base_text: Fires' are under control. Now, back to the job.
pln_hm2_14_06.loc_text: Fires' are under control. Now, back to the job.

pln_hm2_15_01.base_text: The door is open! Now, time to put this caper to bed. Deal with him.
pln_hm2_15_01.loc_text: The door is open! Now, time to put this caper to bed. Deal with him.

pln_hm2_15_02.base_text: The vault is open. Get in there. Finish him. The Dentist is watching.
pln_hm2_15_02.loc_text: The vault is open. Get in there. Finish him. The Dentist is watching.

pln_hm2_15_03.base_text: Drill is done. Time for the Commissar to be done, too.
pln_hm2_15_03.loc_text: Drill is done. Time for the Commissar to be done, too.

pln_hm2_16_01.base_text: That's it. The Commissar is dead. We're one step closer to getting Hoxton back. I'm sending in a helicopter, so stay put. Good work up there.
pln_hm2_16_01.loc_text: That's it. The Commissar is dead. We're one step closer to getting Hoxton back. I'm sending in a helicopter, so stay put. Good work up there.

pln_hm2_16_02.base_text: He's dead. Good riddance. Chopper's on the way, guys. Dentist sent a few bottles of champagne with it. Sure Hoxton will be grateful too. Good work.
pln_hm2_16_02.loc_text: He's dead. Good riddance. Chopper's on the way, guys. Dentist sent a few bottles of champagne with it. Sure Hoxton will be grateful too. Good work.

pln_hm2_16_03.base_text: And that is the end. Comrade Asshole is dead. Chopper is in-bound. Great work today. The Dentist, and Hoxton, will thank you.
pln_hm2_16_03.loc_text: And that is the end. Comrade Asshole is dead. Chopper is in-bound. Great work today. The Dentist, and Hoxton, will thank you.

pln_hm2_17_01.base_text: That surprised 'em. Now find the Commissar.
pln_hm2_17_01.loc_text: That surprised 'em. Now find the Commissar.

pln_hm2_17_02.base_text: They weren't expecting that! Now, time to find that Russian rat.
pln_hm2_17_02.loc_text: They weren't expecting that! Now, time to find that Russian rat.

pln_hm2_17_03.base_text: Caught 'em! Now, Commissar is around here somewhere.
pln_hm2_17_03.loc_text: Caught 'em! Now, Commissar is around here somewhere.

pln_hm2_18_01.base_text: That rat must be on the other side of that reinforced door. Our inside man left a batch of C4. Grab it.
pln_hm2_18_01.loc_text: That rat must be on the other side of that reinforced door. Our inside man left a batch of C4. Grab it.

pln_hm2_18_02.base_text: Our inside man provided you a handful explosives. Grab it and knock on that door.
pln_hm2_18_02.loc_text: Our inside man provided you a handful explosives. Grab it and knock on that door.

pln_hm2_18_03.base_text: I guess they know we're not selling Girl Scout cookies. Grab the C4 and blast your way in.
pln_hm2_18_03.loc_text: I guess they know we're not selling Girl Scout cookies. Grab the C4 and blast your way in.

pln_hm2_19_01.base_text: The good news: Commissar has a HUGE stash of coke up in his penthouse. The bad news: he's flushing it as fast as he can. That's a lot of money swirling down the crapper - the faster you get there, the bigger the bonus!
pln_hm2_19_01.loc_text: The good news: Commissar has a HUGE stash of coke up in his penthouse. The bad news: he's flushing it as fast as he can. That's a lot of money swirling down the crapper - the faster you get there, the bigger the bonus!

pln_hm2_19_02.base_text: Gang, the Commissar - that grudging bastard - is dumping a fortune in cocaine just in spite! Get up there and save it. The faster you move, the more you can save!
pln_hm2_19_02.loc_text: Gang, the Commissar - that grudging bastard - is dumping a fortune in cocaine just in spite! Get up there and save it. The faster you move, the more you can save!

pln_hm2_19_03.base_text: Woah, the Commissar has a lot of coke here, but he's employing scorched earth tactics like a true Russian. In other words: He's flushing the product and if you don't get there fast, you miss out on a whole lot of extra income!
pln_hm2_19_03.loc_text: Woah, the Commissar has a lot of coke here, but he's employing scorched earth tactics like a true Russian. In other words: He's flushing the product and if you don't get there fast, you miss out on a whole lot of extra income!

pln_hm2_19_04.base_text: The Commissar is apparently all "if I can't have it, neither can anyone else". He's cornered, so he has his men flush a mountain of coke down the toilets! Hurry up and stop them, and the coke is yours!
pln_hm2_19_04.loc_text: The Commissar is apparently all "if I can't have it, neither can anyone else". He's cornered, so he has his men flush a mountain of coke down the toilets! Hurry up and stop them, and the coke is yours!

pln_hm2_20_01.base_text: Guys, remember! The sooner you get up there, the more cocaine we can grab.
pln_hm2_20_01.loc_text: Guys, remember! The sooner you get up there, the more cocaine we can grab.

pln_hm2_20_02.base_text: They flushed more coke. Guys, you got to hurry if you want to make a big score.
pln_hm2_20_02.loc_text: They flushed more coke. Guys, you got to hurry if you want to make a big score.

pln_hm2_20_03.base_text: Damn! They just flushed another bag of cocaine! Hurry, gang! Get up to the last floor!
pln_hm2_20_03.loc_text: Damn! They just flushed another bag of cocaine! Hurry, gang! Get up to the last floor!

pln_hm2_20_04.base_text: Hell, Commissar just sent more coke straight down the pan. Hurry before it's all gone!
pln_hm2_20_04.loc_text: Hell, Commissar just sent more coke straight down the pan. Hurry before it's all gone!

pln_hm2_20_05.base_text: More coke just got flushed. That stuff is uncut - it's worth a fortune. Get up there!
pln_hm2_20_05.loc_text: More coke just got flushed. That stuff is uncut - it's worth a fortune. Get up there!

pln_hm2_20_06.base_text: I can't believe that Russian asshole is destroying that product. Get at it before it's all gone!
pln_hm2_20_06.loc_text: I can't believe that Russian asshole is destroying that product. Get at it before it's all gone!

pln_hm2_20_07.base_text: Damn, more coke flushed. Thousands of dollars swirling away with the turds. Hurry!
pln_hm2_20_07.loc_text: Damn, more coke flushed. Thousands of dollars swirling away with the turds. Hurry!

pln_hm2_20_08.base_text: They're flushing that coke away. Gang, get up there before it's all gone!
pln_hm2_20_08.loc_text: They're flushing that coke away. Gang, get up there before it's all gone!

pln_hm2_20_09.base_text: They're wasting cocaine like Hollywood producers with fresh checks in there! Step on it!
pln_hm2_20_09.loc_text: They're wasting cocaine like Hollywood producers with fresh checks in there! Step on it!

pln_hm2_20_10.base_text: Powder's flying like it's a goddamn bakery in there - if you want in, you'd better book it!
pln_hm2_20_10.loc_text: Powder's flying like it's a goddamn bakery in there - if you want in, you'd better book it!

pln_hm2_20_11.base_text: Hurry up, they're wasting thousands of dollars worth of coke every damn second!
pln_hm2_20_11.loc_text: Hurry up, they're wasting thousands of dollars worth of coke every damn second!

pln_hm2_20_12.base_text: They're flushing that coke down like their lives depended on it! Hurry up!
pln_hm2_20_12.loc_text: They're flushing that coke down like their lives depended on it! Hurry up!

pln_hm2_20_13.base_text: They're dumping that coke like the mean it! Get up there and stop them!
pln_hm2_20_13.loc_text: They're dumping that coke like the mean it! Get up there and stop them!

pln_hm2_20_14.base_text: Every second counts, gang! Get to that coke while there's still some left!
pln_hm2_20_14.loc_text: Every second counts, gang! Get to that coke while there's still some left!

pln_hm2_20_15.base_text: Don't get stuck anywhere, keep moving up! It'll be worth it, but it's wasting away quickly!
pln_hm2_20_15.loc_text: Don't get stuck anywhere, keep moving up! It'll be worth it, but it's wasting away quickly!

pln_hm2_20_16.base_text: Stay focused! Keep moving up! They're wasting coke like they were trained for this!
pln_hm2_20_16.loc_text: Stay focused! Keep moving up! They're wasting coke like they were trained for this!

pln_hm2_20_17.base_text: Hurry! They're flushing down bag after bag of coke and it looks like they're enjoying it!
pln_hm2_20_17.loc_text: Hurry! They're flushing down bag after bag of coke and it looks like they're enjoying it!

pln_hm2_20_18.base_text: Keep pushing forward! This is a time limited offer if there ever was one!
pln_hm2_20_18.loc_text: Keep pushing forward! This is a time limited offer if there ever was one!

pln_hm2_20_19.base_text: Throw in another gear, will ya? That pile of coke is getting smaller at an alarming pace!
pln_hm2_20_19.loc_text: Throw in another gear, will ya? That pile of coke is getting smaller at an alarming pace!

pln_hm2_20_20.base_text: Run like you mean it! Just kill whoever's in you way, don't waste time and bullets on anyone else!
pln_hm2_20_20.loc_text: Run like you mean it! Just kill whoever's in you way, don't waste time and bullets on anyone else!

pln_hm2_20_21.base_text: If you get up there fast enough, we'll make a fortune. Come on! Make an effort!
pln_hm2_20_21.loc_text: If you get up there fast enough, we'll make a fortune. Come on! Make an effort!

pln_hm2_21_01.base_text: Aw, this is gonna give me an ulcer, seeing all this coke being flushed and you guys straggling!
pln_hm2_21_01.loc_text: Aw, this is gonna give me an ulcer, seeing all this coke being flushed and you guys straggling!

pln_hm2_21_02.base_text: About half of it is gone already! Push forward, push upward, you gotta get to that coke!
pln_hm2_21_02.loc_text: About half of it is gone already! Push forward, push upward, you gotta get to that coke!

pln_hm2_21_03.base_text: Don't get caught up, get to the coke! They're not fooling around! Oh, my poor heart...
pln_hm2_21_03.loc_text: Don't get caught up, get to the coke! They're not fooling around! Oh, my poor heart...

pln_hm2_21_04.base_text: Pick up the pace, guys! Every second wasted is money lost! I'm going insane here!
pln_hm2_21_04.loc_text: Pick up the pace, guys! Every second wasted is money lost! I'm going insane here!

pln_hm2_21_05.base_text: Do I need to remind you? Cocaine, worth a fortune, is being destroyed as we speak!
pln_hm2_21_05.loc_text: Do I need to remind you? Cocaine, worth a fortune, is being destroyed as we speak!

pln_hm2_21_06.base_text: Get up there and stop them, for crying out loud! This is a tragedy!
pln_hm2_21_06.loc_text: Get up there and stop them, for crying out loud! This is a tragedy!

pln_hm2_21_07.base_text: I don't know what's taking you guys so long, but that coke is NOT waiting around for you.
pln_hm2_21_07.loc_text: I don't know what's taking you guys so long, but that coke is NOT waiting around for you.

pln_hm2_21_09.base_text: You know that coke is worth a lot, right? Right!? Hurry hurry hurry!
pln_hm2_21_09.loc_text: You know that coke is worth a lot, right? Right!? Hurry hurry hurry!

pln_hm2_22_01.base_text: Aw man, it's almost all gone. All gone! Please, try to get a least a little!
pln_hm2_22_01.loc_text: Aw man, it's almost all gone. All gone! Please, try to get a least a little!

pln_hm2_22_02.base_text: I've never SEEN so much money go to waste! Get the last of it, come on!
pln_hm2_22_02.loc_text: I've never SEEN so much money go to waste! Get the last of it, come on!

pln_hm2_22_03.base_text: There's not much left now... If you just hurry up you might make a few extra grand.
pln_hm2_22_03.loc_text: There's not much left now... If you just hurry up you might make a few extra grand.

pln_hm2_22_04.base_text: There's just scraps left now! Even if it's less than I hoped for, it's still extra money, so go for it!
pln_hm2_22_04.loc_text: There's just scraps left now! Even if it's less than I hoped for, it's still extra money, so go for it!

pln_hm2_22_05.base_text: Will you hurry up! All this coke going to waste, it's breaking my heart!
pln_hm2_22_05.loc_text: Will you hurry up! All this coke going to waste, it's breaking my heart!

pln_hm2_22_06.base_text: There's a little coke left! Step on it and you might just earn a little extra! Just might!
pln_hm2_22_06.loc_text: There's a little coke left! Step on it and you might just earn a little extra! Just might!

pln_hm2_23_01.base_text: Well! That's the last bag down the pan. Sorry, gang - no extra income this time around.
pln_hm2_23_01.loc_text: Well! That's the last bag down the pan. Sorry, gang - no extra income this time around.

pln_hm2_23_02.base_text: That's it! They just flushed the final bag down the shitter. Give me a minute, I gotta mentally process what just happened...
pln_hm2_23_02.loc_text: That's it! They just flushed the final bag down the shitter. Give me a minute, I gotta mentally process what just happened...

pln_hm2_23_03.base_text: They just finished flushing ALL the coke. God damn it, gang! We missed out big time!
pln_hm2_23_03.loc_text: They just finished flushing ALL the coke. God damn it, gang! We missed out big time!

pln_hm2_24_01.base_text: Alright, anyway... Let's find the Commissar in his penthouse and kill him. That bastard's gonna pay.
pln_hm2_24_01.loc_text: Alright, anyway... Let's find the Commissar in his penthouse and kill him. That bastard's gonna pay.

pln_hm2_24_02.base_text: OK, whatever... There's still another way to win: Find and kill the Commissar! I bet you're motivated now!
pln_hm2_24_02.loc_text: OK, whatever... There's still another way to win: Find and kill the Commissar! I bet you're motivated now!

pln_hm2_24_03.base_text: Hm... That's sad, but we have not time to lose! Focus on the Commissar now - track him and whack him!
pln_hm2_24_03.loc_text: Hm... That's sad, but we have not time to lose! Focus on the Commissar now - track him and whack him!

pln_hm2_25_01.base_text: Guys, you're not on a date. Quit strolling and get hustling. Move it!
pln_hm2_25_01.loc_text: Guys, you're not on a date. Quit strolling and get hustling. Move it!

pln_hm2_25_02.base_text: Gang, this isn't a place to do sightseeing. Get up there, come on, shift it!
pln_hm2_25_02.loc_text: Gang, this isn't a place to do sightseeing. Get up there, come on, shift it!

pln_hm2_25_03.base_text: You guys waiting for a pizza? Come on, get a move on.
pln_hm2_25_03.loc_text: You guys waiting for a pizza? Come on, get a move on.

pln_hm2_25_04.base_text: Come on, you need to hustle it!
pln_hm2_25_04.loc_text: Come on, you need to hustle it!

pln_hm2_25_05.base_text: Guys, if the Commissar gets away, Hoxton will rot. So move it!
pln_hm2_25_05.loc_text: Guys, if the Commissar gets away, Hoxton will rot. So move it!

pln_hm2_25_06.base_text: You're doing this for Hox, so let's get a move on!
pln_hm2_25_06.loc_text: You're doing this for Hox, so let's get a move on!

pln_hm2_26_01.base_text: What the hell is Commissar working in this room?
pln_hm2_26_01.loc_text: What the hell is Commissar working in this room?

pln_hm2_26_02.base_text: Hot damn! Commissar, you dirty old Bertie.
pln_hm2_26_02.loc_text: Hot damn! Commissar, you dirty old Bertie.

pln_hm2_26_03.base_text: Uh... Not exactly Wonderland, is it.
pln_hm2_26_03.loc_text: Uh... Not exactly Wonderland, is it.

pln_hm2_26_04.base_text: Commissar gets his hands dirty with some nasty stuff, including kidnapping.
pln_hm2_26_04.loc_text: Commissar gets his hands dirty with some nasty stuff, including kidnapping.

pln_hm2_26_05.base_text: Kidnapping? That dirty Russki has no boundaries.
pln_hm2_26_05.loc_text: Kidnapping? That dirty Russki has no boundaries.

pln_hm2_26_06.base_text: Dunno what that guy did to piss off the Commissar, but it must have been bad.
pln_hm2_26_06.loc_text: Dunno what that guy did to piss off the Commissar, but it must have been bad.

pln_hm2_26_07.base_text: Well, this dump is the perfect place for a rat like the Commissar to hide out.
pln_hm2_26_07.loc_text: Well, this dump is the perfect place for a rat like the Commissar to hide out.

pln_hm2_26_08.base_text: You wouldn't believe such a dump could exist in the heart of our nation.
pln_hm2_26_08.loc_text: You wouldn't believe such a dump could exist in the heart of our nation.

pln_hm2_27_01.base_text: Mount a drill on that gate and get it open!
pln_hm2_27_01.loc_text: Mount a drill on that gate and get it open!

pln_hm2_27_02.base_text: That should be a quick fix! Get a drill on that gate, gang.
pln_hm2_27_02.loc_text: That should be a quick fix! Get a drill on that gate, gang.

pln_hm2_28_01.base_text: This door's locked with some kinda magnatic mechanism. Find a way to open it!
pln_hm2_28_01.loc_text: This door's locked with some kinda magnatic mechanism. Find a way to open it!

pln_hm2_28_02.base_text: Looks like they haven't had time to get the wiring behind the wall. Find the switch.
pln_hm2_28_02.loc_text: Looks like they haven't had time to get the wiring behind the wall. Find the switch.

pln_hm2_28_03.base_text: You should be able to track the wires and find a way to open this door.
pln_hm2_28_03.loc_text: You should be able to track the wires and find a way to open this door.

pln_hm2_29_01.base_text: The staircase is blocked off! There must be a way up nearby!
pln_hm2_29_01.loc_text: The staircase is blocked off! There must be a way up nearby!

pln_hm2_29_02.base_text: Staircase's blocked. Gotta be another way up.
pln_hm2_29_02.loc_text: Staircase's blocked. Gotta be another way up.

pln_hm2_29_03.base_text: Not going up this way. Look around. Has to be another path.
pln_hm2_29_03.loc_text: Not going up this way. Look around. Has to be another path.

pln_hm2_30_01.base_text: And now we wait. The Commissar can't hold up in there forever.
pln_hm2_30_01.loc_text: And now we wait. The Commissar can't hold up in there forever.

pln_hm2_30_02.base_text: Great. Now wait. That rat will be ours soon.
pln_hm2_30_02.loc_text: Great. Now wait. That rat will be ours soon.

pln_hm2_30_03.base_text: Let the drill do it's job. We'll have the Commissar soon enough.
pln_hm2_30_03.loc_text: Let the drill do it's job. We'll have the Commissar soon enough.

pln_hm2_31_01.base_text: Don't forget to plunder that vault. Haul the loot to the chopper. Always nice to make a little extra money, gentlemen.
pln_hm2_31_01.loc_text: Don't forget to plunder that vault. Haul the loot to the chopper. Always nice to make a little extra money, gentlemen.

pln_hm2_31_02.base_text: I'm sure you've seen all the tasty loot in the vault. Stash it in the chopper if you can stay a little longer.
pln_hm2_31_02.loc_text: I'm sure you've seen all the tasty loot in the vault. Stash it in the chopper if you can stay a little longer.

pln_hm2_31_03.base_text: Check out all of Commissar's blood money. Ah well, someone has to enjoy it. Get it to the chopper, if you can.
pln_hm2_31_03.loc_text: Check out all of Commissar's blood money. Ah well, someone has to enjoy it. Get it to the chopper, if you can.

pln_hm2_34_01.base_text: There's the coke. Outstanding, guys! Bag as much as you can.
pln_hm2_34_01.loc_text: There's the coke. Outstanding, guys! Bag as much as you can.

pln_hm2_34_02.base_text: That's the coke, gang. I knew you would do it! Now bag it.
pln_hm2_34_02.loc_text: That's the coke, gang. I knew you would do it! Now bag it.

pln_hm2_34_03.base_text: Outstanding! That coke will be a nice bonus. Bag it, gang!
pln_hm2_34_03.loc_text: Outstanding! That coke will be a nice bonus. Bag it, gang!

pln_hm2_intro_01_01.base_text: Commissar's gonna be antsy after the motel attack, but he won't be expecting this. Masks on and give the rat what he deserves. Good luck.
pln_hm2_intro_01_01.loc_text: Commissar's gonna be antsy after the motel attack, but he won't be expecting this. Masks on and give the rat what he deserves. Good luck.

pln_hm2_intro_01_02.base_text: Commissar's men will be on edge after what you did at the motel. Still, this should come as a surprise. Get your masks on, and put that rat down.
pln_hm2_intro_01_02.loc_text: Commissar's men will be on edge after what you did at the motel. Still, this should come as a surprise. Get your masks on, and put that rat down.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_brief_a_01.base_text: This town is a great place to fence jewelry.  Easy to move. Diplomats and trophy wives buying it, no questions asked. This is going to be cake. Let's get going.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_brief_a_01.loc_text: This town is a great place to fence jewelry.  Easy to move. Diplomats and trophy wives buying it, no questions asked. This is going to be cake. Let's get going.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_brief_b_01.base_text: Alright team, this jewelry store has a number of display cases flaunting some medium range gems and gold.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_brief_b_01.loc_text: Alright team, this jewelry store has a number of display cases flaunting some medium range gems and gold.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_brief_b_02.base_text: OK crew, this place has a ton of display cases. Smash and grab style, fill those loot bags to the brim.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_brief_b_02.loc_text: OK crew, this place has a ton of display cases. Smash and grab style, fill those loot bags to the brim.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_brief_b_03.base_text: Alright people, this is a pretty sweet opportunity, All sorts of mid-ranged diamonds and the like in the display cases. Do your worst, make your bones, get on out. A classic knockover.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_brief_b_03.loc_text: Alright people, this is a pretty sweet opportunity, All sorts of mid-ranged diamonds and the like in the display cases. Do your worst, make your bones, get on out. A classic knockover.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_cnc_01.base_text: I've got a line on a jewelry store that's just begging to be hit. Call me back.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_cnc_01.loc_text: I've got a line on a jewelry store that's just begging to be hit. Call me back.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_cnc_02.base_text: Looks like we've got a jewelry store that could use a little lightening. Call me.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_cnc_02.loc_text: Looks like we've got a jewelry store that could use a little lightening. Call me.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_cnc_03.base_text: Juicy score in the diamond district, people. Ice for everyone.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_cnc_03.loc_text: Juicy score in the diamond district, people. Ice for everyone.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_01.base_text: The owner of this store will have a month of insurance paperwork to do. Nice take boys, back to the house.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_01.loc_text: The owner of this store will have a month of insurance paperwork to do. Nice take boys, back to the house.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_02.base_text: Some pretty sweet snatch and grab back there. I bet they're going to invest in better security measures, or close. Not our problem.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_02.loc_text: Some pretty sweet snatch and grab back there. I bet they're going to invest in better security measures, or close. Not our problem.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_03.base_text: Nice job snatching all those gems guys. I'll called ahead to my diplomatic contacts - they are hungry for this. Let's feed 'em.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_03.loc_text: Nice job snatching all those gems guys. I'll called ahead to my diplomatic contacts - they are hungry for this. Let's feed 'em.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_04.base_text: That was a real pleasure, makes me think of the old days. Starting out small, the simple things, right? Good work.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_04.loc_text: That was a real pleasure, makes me think of the old days. Starting out small, the simple things, right? Good work.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_05.base_text: Crime.net is buzzing - you guys pulled off a nice little upset here.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_05.loc_text: Crime.net is buzzing - you guys pulled off a nice little upset here.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_06.base_text: DC now has a jewelry shortage - this is where we come in. Well done team!
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_06.loc_text: DC now has a jewelry shortage - this is where we come in. Well done team!

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_07.base_text: OK, I'll get right on fencing this. It won't be hard - this is the perfect kind of merchandise. Nice work!
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_end_07.loc_text: OK, I'll get right on fencing this. It won't be hard - this is the perfect kind of merchandise. Nice work!

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_01.base_text: OK, time for the hit. You might see some Garnet things in there too - I like seeing they're still in business after all we've done to them. I need at least two bags to make this worth our while.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_01.loc_text: OK, time for the hit. You might see some Garnet things in there too - I like seeing they're still in business after all we've done to them. I need at least two bags to make this worth our while.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_02.base_text: Looks like this store is pretty packed with jewels. Everyone getting ready for the holidays I guess. Anyway, I'm looking for at least four bags of jewels.That ought to cover us nicely.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_02.loc_text: Looks like this store is pretty packed with jewels. Everyone getting ready for the holidays I guess. Anyway, I'm looking for at least four bags of jewels.That ought to cover us nicely.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_03.base_text: OK, we need to clean the joint out. Eight bags ought to do it. Don't go easy on them!
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_03.loc_text: OK, we need to clean the joint out. Eight bags ought to do it. Don't go easy on them!

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_04.base_text: OK, time for a jewelry hit. We need at least three bags. That should be fairly easy.
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_04.loc_text: OK, time for a jewelry hit. We need at least three bags. That should be fairly easy.

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_05.base_text: OK, time for a jewelry hit. We need at least six bags. That could prove a challenge - but you guys can do it!
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_05.loc_text: OK, time for a jewelry hit. We need at least six bags. That could prove a challenge - but you guys can do it!

pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_06.base_text: OK, time for a jewelry hit. We need at least ten bags. That's kinda crazy - but you guys are good at crazy!
pln_jewelrystore_stage1_intro_06.loc_text: OK, time for a jewelry hit. We need at least ten bags. That's kinda crazy - but you guys are good at crazy!

pln_jr1_02_01.base_text: Find Locke's crates, gang. Look for the ones with the strobe on.
pln_jr1_02_01.loc_text: Find Locke's crates, gang. Look for the ones with the strobe on.

pln_jr1_02_02.base_text: Hey guys, remember to find the crates Locke has left. They got a strobe on.
pln_jr1_02_02.loc_text: Hey guys, remember to find the crates Locke has left. They got a strobe on.

pln_jr1_02_03.base_text: Come on, crew. Locke needs us to find those crates. Show him how we do it.
pln_jr1_02_03.loc_text: Come on, crew. Locke needs us to find those crates. Show him how we do it.

pln_jr1_03_01.base_text: Ditch the charges at the door, guys.
pln_jr1_03_01.loc_text: Ditch the charges at the door, guys.

pln_jr1_03_02.base_text: Locke wants us to blow that door. Better drop the charges off there.
pln_jr1_03_02.loc_text: Locke wants us to blow that door. Better drop the charges off there.

pln_jr1_03_03.base_text: We better follow Locke's directions on this one. Take the charges to the door.
pln_jr1_03_03.loc_text: We better follow Locke's directions on this one. Take the charges to the door.

pln_jr1_04_02.base_text: Sounds a little unhinged. Best do it.
pln_jr1_04_02.loc_text: Sounds a little unhinged. Best do it.

pln_jr1_04_03.base_text: Locke sounds a bit...mad. We'd better do what he says.
pln_jr1_04_03.loc_text: Locke sounds a bit...mad. We'd better do what he says.

pln_jr1_05_01.base_text: There should be a security room close by. Use the arc welder to cut through and green llight the airlock.
pln_jr1_05_01.loc_text: There should be a security room close by. Use the arc welder to cut through and green llight the airlock.

pln_jr1_05_02.base_text: Locke wants us to cut through to the security room. Find it, gang, then approve the sequence
pln_jr1_05_02.loc_text: Locke wants us to cut through to the security room. Find it, gang, then approve the sequence

pln_jr1_05_03.base_text: Guys, look for a security room around there. Use the arc welder to cut through, and approve the sequence.
pln_jr1_05_03.loc_text: Guys, look for a security room around there. Use the arc welder to cut through, and approve the sequence.

pln_jr1_06_01.base_text: Get the bags up to Locke as soon as you can, crew. Look for the large vertical shaft around there.
pln_jr1_06_01.loc_text: Get the bags up to Locke as soon as you can, crew. Look for the large vertical shaft around there.

pln_jr1_06_02.base_text: Find the shaft and zipline those bags up to Locke ASAP.
pln_jr1_06_02.loc_text: Find the shaft and zipline those bags up to Locke ASAP.

pln_jr1_06_03.base_text: You heard him. Get the bags onto the ziplines in the shaft. Get them up to Locke.
pln_jr1_06_03.loc_text: You heard him. Get the bags onto the ziplines in the shaft. Get them up to Locke.

pln_jr1_08_01.base_text: Locke's escape plan depends on blasting the radars, gang. See to it.
pln_jr1_08_01.loc_text: Locke's escape plan depends on blasting the radars, gang. See to it.

pln_jr1_08_02.base_text: Locke wants us to sabotage the radars. Better get to it.
pln_jr1_08_02.loc_text: Locke wants us to sabotage the radars. Better get to it.

pln_jr1_08_03.base_text: Putting those radars out of action is our next job, gang. Do it.
pln_jr1_08_03.loc_text: Putting those radars out of action is our next job, gang. Do it.

pln_jr1_09_01.base_text: Great job, crew. Locke's already wired our cut. Still not sure about this guy, but maybe we can trust him.
pln_jr1_09_01.loc_text: Great job, crew. Locke's already wired our cut. Still not sure about this guy, but maybe we can trust him.

pln_jr1_09_02.base_text: That was intense, gang. Locke already sent over our share. Still uneasy about him, but let's see where things go with this guy.
pln_jr1_09_02.loc_text: That was intense, gang. Locke already sent over our share. Still uneasy about him, but let's see where things go with this guy.

pln_jr1_09_03.base_text: Nicely done, guys. Locke transferred our cut. I don't know about this guy, yet, but let's see how things pan out with him.
pln_jr1_09_03.loc_text: Nicely done, guys. Locke transferred our cut. I don't know about this guy, yet, but let's see how things pan out with him.

pln_jr2_01_02.base_text: Come on, gang. Out of that hidey-hole!
pln_jr2_01_02.loc_text: Come on, gang. Out of that hidey-hole!

pln_jr2_01_03.base_text: You heard Locke, crew - into the cargo hold!
pln_jr2_01_03.loc_text: You heard Locke, crew - into the cargo hold!

pln_jr2_02_01.base_text: You're going to have to fight your way to the end of the plane, get up the stairs and then fight back along. Only way to reach the cargo controls.
pln_jr2_02_01.loc_text: You're going to have to fight your way to the end of the plane, get up the stairs and then fight back along. Only way to reach the cargo controls.

pln_jr2_02_02.base_text: Just fight to the front of the plane, up the stairs and then all the way back. It's the only way to reach those controls.
pln_jr2_02_02.loc_text: Just fight to the front of the plane, up the stairs and then all the way back. It's the only way to reach those controls.

pln_jr2_02_03.base_text: You need to make your way to the front of the plane, gang. Then up the stairs, and all the way back. Only way to get to the controls.
pln_jr2_02_03.loc_text: You need to make your way to the front of the plane, gang. Then up the stairs, and all the way back. Only way to get to the controls.

pln_jr2_03_01.base_text: Hustle it, guys. You need to get on the ground near the money.
pln_jr2_03_01.loc_text: Hustle it, guys. You need to get on the ground near the money.

pln_jr2_03_02.base_text: Gang, hurry with the parachutes. Don't get off course.
pln_jr2_03_02.loc_text: Gang, hurry with the parachutes. Don't get off course.

pln_jr2_03_03.base_text: Guys, get the parachutes, quickly! Don't get too far from the money!
pln_jr2_03_03.loc_text: Guys, get the parachutes, quickly! Don't get too far from the money!

pln_jr2_04_01.base_text: Light that flare for Locke, crew.
pln_jr2_04_01.loc_text: Light that flare for Locke, crew.

pln_jr2_04_02.base_text: Gang, don't forget - you need to light a flare before Locke will come in.
pln_jr2_04_02.loc_text: Gang, don't forget - you need to light a flare before Locke will come in.

pln_jr2_04_03.base_text: Crew, remember - Locke needs you to light that flare.
pln_jr2_04_03.loc_text: Crew, remember - Locke needs you to light that flare.

pln_jr2_05_01.base_text: That money needs to be tightly secured by the straps before Locke can take off.
pln_jr2_05_01.loc_text: That money needs to be tightly secured by the straps before Locke can take off.

pln_jr2_05_02.base_text: Make sure those straps are nicely fastened. Don't want Locke dropping the loot too early now.
pln_jr2_05_02.loc_text: Make sure those straps are nicely fastened. Don't want Locke dropping the loot too early now.

pln_jr2_05_03.base_text: Ensure all of the straps are secure. Don't give Locke an excuse to accidentally drop the money.
pln_jr2_05_03.loc_text: Ensure all of the straps are secure. Don't give Locke an excuse to accidentally drop the money.

pln_jr2_06_01.base_text: The hell he have in mind?
pln_jr2_06_01.loc_text: The hell he have in mind?

pln_jr2_06_03.base_text: How's he going to get you out of this?
pln_jr2_06_03.loc_text: How's he going to get you out of this?

pln_jr2_07_01.base_text: Get into the boat, gang! We're almost done here!
pln_jr2_07_01.loc_text: Get into the boat, gang! We're almost done here!

pln_jr2_07_02.base_text: Don't hang around, crew. Everyone - into the boat!
pln_jr2_07_02.loc_text: Don't hang around, crew. Everyone - into the boat!

pln_jr2_07_03.base_text: You heard what Locke said, guys. Into the boat and let's get out of here.
pln_jr2_07_03.loc_text: You heard what Locke said, guys. Into the boat and let's get out of here.

pln_jr2_intro_01_01.base_text: Okay gang...patching Locke through to you.
pln_jr2_intro_01_01.loc_text: Okay gang...patching Locke through to you.

pln_jr2_intro_01_02.base_text: Hope you're okay up there, crew. Here's Locke.
pln_jr2_intro_01_02.loc_text: Hope you're okay up there, crew. Here's Locke.

pln_jr2_intro_01_03.base_text: All right, guys. Here's Locke... Be careful up there.
pln_jr2_intro_01_03.loc_text: All right, guys. Here's Locke... Be careful up there.

pln_jwl_01_any_01.base_text: OK, time for a smash and grab.
pln_jwl_01_any_01.loc_text: OK, time for a smash and grab.

pln_jwl_02_any_01.base_text: You're looking for four bags of jewels minimum from this place. Easy.
pln_jwl_02_any_01.loc_text: You're looking for four bags of jewels minimum from this place. Easy.

pln_jwl_03_any_01.base_text: We want at least two bags of jewels from this store. Understand?
pln_jwl_03_any_01.loc_text: We want at least two bags of jewels from this store. Understand?

pln_jwl_04_any_01.base_text: We're looking for the agreed amount of jewels from the store... If you want more, go back and get 'em.
pln_jwl_04_any_01.loc_text: We're looking for the agreed amount of jewels from the store... If you want more, go back and get 'em.

pln_jwl_05_any_01.base_text: Greed is your guide. If you want it, go get it.
pln_jwl_05_any_01.loc_text: Greed is your guide. If you want it, go get it.

pln_jwl_06_any_01.base_text: This is your standard jewelry store knockover. If there is such a thing.
pln_jwl_06_any_01.loc_text: This is your standard jewelry store knockover. If there is such a thing.

pln_jwl_09_any_01.base_text: Get those bags to the car.
pln_jwl_09_any_01.loc_text: Get those bags to the car.

pln_jwl_11_any_02.base_text: That's enough for Vlad, but get more if you feel brave.
pln_jwl_11_any_02.loc_text: That's enough for Vlad, but get more if you feel brave.

pln_jwl_11_any_03.base_text: Plenty for Vlad - is it enough for us? Your call.
pln_jwl_11_any_03.loc_text: Plenty for Vlad - is it enough for us? Your call.

pln_jwl_12_any_01.base_text: Come on come on, we can do better!
pln_jwl_12_any_01.loc_text: Come on come on, we can do better!

pln_knk_jwl_a_00_003_01.base_text: Get him the tiara and take everything else in the place if you have time... Lot of incidental income you don't want to waste. Just once you decide to make your move, make it fast.
pln_knk_jwl_a_00_003_01.loc_text: Get him the tiara and take everything else in the place if you have time... Lot of incidental income you don't want to waste. Just once you decide to make your move, make it fast.

pln_knk_jwl_a_01_any_01.base_text: OK, this is it. Quick in, get Vlad's tiara. You want more, it's your call.
pln_knk_jwl_a_01_any_01.loc_text: OK, this is it. Quick in, get Vlad's tiara. You want more, it's your call.

pln_knk_jwl_a_02_any_01.base_text: I'm starting the clock. Look for a safe. If it's not in the safe - don't panic - it's in the building.
pln_knk_jwl_a_02_any_01.loc_text: I'm starting the clock. Look for a safe. If it's not in the safe - don't panic - it's in the building.

pln_knk_jwl_a_03_any_02.base_text: Halfway mark, people. Hurry it up!
pln_knk_jwl_a_03_any_02.loc_text: Halfway mark, people. Hurry it up!

pln_knk_jwl_a_04_any_01.base_text: One minute till the van leaves.
pln_knk_jwl_a_04_any_01.loc_text: One minute till the van leaves.

pln_knk_jwl_a_04_any_02.base_text: Got a minute till the van leaves - with or without you.
pln_knk_jwl_a_04_any_02.loc_text: Got a minute till the van leaves - with or without you.

pln_knk_jwl_a_05_any_02.base_text: That's 30 seconds till the van leaves.
pln_knk_jwl_a_05_any_02.loc_text: That's 30 seconds till the van leaves.

pln_knk_jwl_a_06_any_01.base_text: You have ten seconds to get to the van.
pln_knk_jwl_a_06_any_01.loc_text: You have ten seconds to get to the van.

pln_knk_jwl_a_06_any_02.base_text: There's ten seconds to get to the van so get to the van now.
pln_knk_jwl_a_06_any_02.loc_text: There's ten seconds to get to the van so get to the van now.

pln_knk_jwl_a_07_any_01.base_text: I just saw someone escape. Get ready for trouble.
pln_knk_jwl_a_07_any_01.loc_text: I just saw someone escape. Get ready for trouble.

pln_knk_jwl_a_08_any_01.base_text: There's a good chance there's a security camera in there. Keep an eye out.
pln_knk_jwl_a_08_any_01.loc_text: There's a good chance there's a security camera in there. Keep an eye out.

pln_knk_jwl_a_09_any_01.base_text: Loot van is on the way. ETA: One minute.
pln_knk_jwl_a_09_any_01.loc_text: Loot van is on the way. ETA: One minute.

pln_knk_jwl_a_09_any_02.base_text: The wheelman's going to be there in one minute with the escape van.
pln_knk_jwl_a_09_any_02.loc_text: The wheelman's going to be there in one minute with the escape van.

pln_knk_jwl_a_09_any_03.base_text: Wheelman is moving. ETA: One minute.
pln_knk_jwl_a_09_any_03.loc_text: Wheelman is moving. ETA: One minute.

pln_knk_jwl_a_10_any_01.base_text: The wheelman had to run, too hot. He's relocating.
pln_knk_jwl_a_10_any_01.loc_text: The wheelman had to run, too hot. He's relocating.

pln_knk_jwl_a_10_any_02.base_text: Hang tight, too many cops for a pick-up.
pln_knk_jwl_a_10_any_02.loc_text: Hang tight, too many cops for a pick-up.

pln_knk_jwl_a_10_any_03.base_text: Hang on - too much heat for a pick-up.
pln_knk_jwl_a_10_any_03.loc_text: Hang on - too much heat for a pick-up.

pln_knk_jwl_a_11_any_01.base_text: OK, maybe tiara is somewhere nearby. Gotta be in the building.
pln_knk_jwl_a_11_any_01.loc_text: OK, maybe tiara is somewhere nearby. Gotta be in the building.

pln_knk_jwl_a_11_any_02.base_text: Take a look around - Vlad's tiara has to be in there somewhere.
pln_knk_jwl_a_11_any_02.loc_text: Take a look around - Vlad's tiara has to be in there somewhere.

pln_knk_jwl_a_11_any_03.base_text: Tiara is in that building, I'm sure.
pln_knk_jwl_a_11_any_03.loc_text: Tiara is in that building, I'm sure.

pln_knk_jwl_a_11_any_04.base_text: It has to be there, the tiara is there somewhere.
pln_knk_jwl_a_11_any_04.loc_text: It has to be there, the tiara is there somewhere.

pln_knk_jwl_a_12_any_01.base_text: Goddammit - they locked you out! Find a way around!
pln_knk_jwl_a_12_any_01.loc_text: Goddammit - they locked you out! Find a way around!

pln_knk_jwl_a_12_any_02.base_text: They locked the door. Use your head.
pln_knk_jwl_a_12_any_02.loc_text: They locked the door. Use your head.

pln_knk_jwl_a_13_any_01.base_text: OK, that's it. Get it to the escape van... Vlad will be pleased.
pln_knk_jwl_a_13_any_01.loc_text: OK, that's it. Get it to the escape van... Vlad will be pleased.

pln_knk_jwl_a_13_any_02.base_text: There we go. Get that thing to the van!
pln_knk_jwl_a_13_any_02.loc_text: There we go. Get that thing to the van!

pln_knk_jwl_a_13_any_03.base_text: Vlad's wife will be thrilled - now get that thing outta there.
pln_knk_jwl_a_13_any_03.loc_text: Vlad's wife will be thrilled - now get that thing outta there.

pln_knk_jwl_a_13_any_04.base_text: Jackpot! Let's get it out. But if you wanna be greedy and stick around, I won't judge you.
pln_knk_jwl_a_13_any_04.loc_text: Jackpot! Let's get it out. But if you wanna be greedy and stick around, I won't judge you.

pln_knk_jwl_a_13_any_05.base_text: Score! I can hear Vlad smiling from here.
pln_knk_jwl_a_13_any_05.loc_text: Score! I can hear Vlad smiling from here.

pln_knk_jwl_a_14_any_03.base_text: Clock's ticking - just move it along, we don't have all day.
pln_knk_jwl_a_14_any_03.loc_text: Clock's ticking - just move it along, we don't have all day.

pln_knk_jwl_a_14_any_05.base_text: Don't screw around in there - get it done!
pln_knk_jwl_a_14_any_05.loc_text: Don't screw around in there - get it done!

pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_01.base_text: Too slow guys, the getaway left...
pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_01.loc_text: Too slow guys, the getaway left...

pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_02.base_text: The escape van just left. I'll get him to come round for another pass but be ready this time.
pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_02.loc_text: The escape van just left. I'll get him to come round for another pass but be ready this time.

pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_04.base_text: Goddammit, you just missed the getaway.
pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_04.loc_text: Goddammit, you just missed the getaway.

pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_05.base_text: The getaway just left without you.
pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_05.loc_text: The getaway just left without you.

pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_06.base_text: Gotta be faster, boys. Getaway is gone.
pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_06.loc_text: Gotta be faster, boys. Getaway is gone.

pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_07.base_text: We weren't fast enough here, the getaway just left.
pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_07.loc_text: We weren't fast enough here, the getaway just left.

pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_08.base_text: The getaway just left without you. Sorry guys, you're gonna be spending some time behind bars.
pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_08.loc_text: The getaway just left without you. Sorry guys, you're gonna be spending some time behind bars.

pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_09.base_text: Sorry fellas, too slow - the getaway just left along with your freedom, look me up when you get out.
pln_knk_jwl_a_15_any_09.loc_text: Sorry fellas, too slow - the getaway just left along with your freedom, look me up when you get out.

pln_knk_jwl_a_16_any_01.base_text: You guys are looking for a necklace, remember?
pln_knk_jwl_a_16_any_01.loc_text: You guys are looking for a necklace, remember?

pln_knk_jwl_a_16_any_02.base_text: Guys we're looking for a tiara, might be in a safe, gotta be inside though.
pln_knk_jwl_a_16_any_02.loc_text: Guys we're looking for a tiara, might be in a safe, gotta be inside though.

pln_knk_jwl_a_16_any_03.base_text: Guys find that tiara and find it quick.
pln_knk_jwl_a_16_any_03.loc_text: Guys find that tiara and find it quick.

pln_knk_jwl_a_16_any_05.base_text: Guys the tiara is probably in a safe or on display somewhere...
pln_knk_jwl_a_16_any_05.loc_text: Guys the tiara is probably in a safe or on display somewhere...

pln_ko1_01_01.base_text: There it is. Do your thing, guys, but Gage prefers you do it quietly. Front gate is dead ahead, but maybe you can find alternative routes.
pln_ko1_01_01.loc_text: There it is. Do your thing, guys, but Gage prefers you do it quietly. Front gate is dead ahead, but maybe you can find alternative routes.

pln_ko1_01_02.base_text: There it is, right ahead. Do your thing, guys, but do it quietly. It goes loud, and I'll have to pull you out fast.
pln_ko1_01_02.loc_text: There it is, right ahead. Do your thing, guys, but do it quietly. It goes loud, and I'll have to pull you out fast.

pln_ko1_01_03.base_text: That's the depot. You know what you need to do, but keep it quiet. If the alarm goes, I'll have to pull you out.
pln_ko1_01_03.loc_text: That's the depot. You know what you need to do, but keep it quiet. If the alarm goes, I'll have to pull you out.

pln_ko1_02_01.base_text: Look around. Search the Murkywater containers. Just grab any valuables you can.
pln_ko1_02_01.loc_text: Look around. Search the Murkywater containers. Just grab any valuables you can.

pln_ko1_02_02.base_text: There's a lot of stuff coming home. Weapons, ammo and anything that murkier elements can liberate. Check Murkywater's containers.
pln_ko1_02_02.loc_text: There's a lot of stuff coming home. Weapons, ammo and anything that murkier elements can liberate. Check Murkywater's containers.

pln_ko1_02_03.base_text: Keep an eye out for anything you can hustle out of there. The Murkywater containers are your best bet - get them open.
pln_ko1_02_03.loc_text: Keep an eye out for anything you can hustle out of there. The Murkywater containers are your best bet - get them open.

pln_ko1_03_01.base_text: Keep sharp, gentleman. The warehouse will be tougher, but the rewards worth it.
pln_ko1_03_01.loc_text: Keep sharp, gentleman. The warehouse will be tougher, but the rewards worth it.

pln_ko1_03_02.base_text: This is the warehouse. You can bet the better loot is right here.
pln_ko1_03_02.loc_text: This is the warehouse. You can bet the better loot is right here.

pln_ko1_03_03.base_text: You're in the lair of the beast now, gang. Better loot, but bigger risk.
pln_ko1_03_03.loc_text: You're in the lair of the beast now, gang. Better loot, but bigger risk.

pln_ko1_04_01.base_text: Used dinars. Hard to trace. Perfect.
pln_ko1_04_01.loc_text: Used dinars. Hard to trace. Perfect.

pln_ko1_04_02.base_text: That's used bank notes from our 'allies' overseas.
pln_ko1_04_02.loc_text: That's used bank notes from our 'allies' overseas.

pln_ko1_04_03.base_text: A nice stash of used dinars. Good find.
pln_ko1_04_03.loc_text: A nice stash of used dinars. Good find.

pln_ko1_05_01.base_text: I hope they weren't giving this marching powder to our boys.
pln_ko1_05_01.loc_text: I hope they weren't giving this marching powder to our boys.

pln_ko1_05_02.base_text: This coke won't be funding any more terrorism. Just good old American crime.
pln_ko1_05_02.loc_text: This coke won't be funding any more terrorism. Just good old American crime.

pln_ko1_05_03.base_text: Columbian. Bolivian. Mexican. Wherever it's from, it's ours now.
pln_ko1_05_03.loc_text: Columbian. Bolivian. Mexican. Wherever it's from, it's ours now.

pln_ko1_06_01.base_text: Damn, this gold was likely boosted from Saddam's palace!
pln_ko1_06_01.loc_text: Damn, this gold was likely boosted from Saddam's palace!

pln_ko1_06_02.base_text: Gold bullion. Probably taken from the enemies of freedom.
pln_ko1_06_02.loc_text: Gold bullion. Probably taken from the enemies of freedom.

pln_ko1_06_03.base_text: Never get tired of seeing gold bullion getting bagged.
pln_ko1_06_03.loc_text: Never get tired of seeing gold bullion getting bagged.

pln_ko1_07_01.base_text: Great work. There's always a market for untraceable guns.
pln_ko1_07_01.loc_text: Great work. There's always a market for untraceable guns.

pln_ko1_07_02.base_text: Rifles, pistols and bullets. This will make Gage happy.
pln_ko1_07_02.loc_text: Rifles, pistols and bullets. This will make Gage happy.

pln_ko1_07_03.base_text: Illegal untraceable weapons. This is what Gage is all about.
pln_ko1_07_03.loc_text: Illegal untraceable weapons. This is what Gage is all about.

pln_ko1_08_02.base_text: Why the hell did some Iraqi dictactor have seventeenth century Swedish masterpieces?
pln_ko1_08_02.loc_text: Why the hell did some Iraqi dictactor have seventeenth century Swedish masterpieces?

pln_ko1_08_03.base_text: That was last seen in the Iraqi National Gallery. These guys are shameless.
pln_ko1_08_03.loc_text: That was last seen in the Iraqi National Gallery. These guys are shameless.

pln_ko1_09_01.base_text: Who knows what's on that server. Blueprints, records - maybe the password for Area 51.
pln_ko1_09_01.loc_text: Who knows what's on that server. Blueprints, records - maybe the password for Area 51.

pln_ko1_09_02.base_text: Anything could be on that server. Maybe the President's email address.
pln_ko1_09_02.loc_text: Anything could be on that server. Maybe the President's email address.

pln_ko1_09_03.base_text: I can't wait to see what these shady assholes were hiding on that server.
pln_ko1_09_03.loc_text: I can't wait to see what these shady assholes were hiding on that server.

pln_ko1_10_01.base_text: Oh, shiny! Whoever looted this liked the finer stuff.
pln_ko1_10_01.loc_text: Oh, shiny! Whoever looted this liked the finer stuff.

pln_ko1_10_02.base_text: These jewels will be easy to shift.
pln_ko1_10_02.loc_text: These jewels will be easy to shift.

pln_ko1_11_01.base_text: I think I saw a documentary about that on National Geographic.
pln_ko1_11_01.loc_text: I think I saw a documentary about that on National Geographic.

pln_ko1_11_02.base_text: People will pay fortunes for this ancient Babylonian shit.
pln_ko1_11_02.loc_text: People will pay fortunes for this ancient Babylonian shit.

pln_ko1_11_03.base_text: There's only one place I can sell that. Marrakech.
pln_ko1_11_03.loc_text: There's only one place I can sell that. Marrakech.

pln_ko1_12_01.base_text: I bet the mad dictator ate off those silver plates.
pln_ko1_12_01.loc_text: I bet the mad dictator ate off those silver plates.

pln_ko1_12_02.base_text: Saddam had his enemies heads served on that platter.
pln_ko1_12_02.loc_text: Saddam had his enemies heads served on that platter.

pln_ko1_13_01.base_text: Vault with simultaneous two card reader. Probably 10 second time lock. They must be hiding something tasty.
pln_ko1_13_01.loc_text: Vault with simultaneous two card reader. Probably 10 second time lock. They must be hiding something tasty.

pln_ko1_13_02.base_text: Two card reader with a 10 second time lock? You can bet they're holding some serious hardware in that vault.
pln_ko1_13_02.loc_text: Two card reader with a 10 second time lock? You can bet they're holding some serious hardware in that vault.

pln_ko1_13_03.base_text: The vault needs two cards, entered almost simultaneously. You can bet there's something particularly tasty in there.
pln_ko1_13_03.loc_text: The vault needs two cards, entered almost simultaneously. You can bet there's something particularly tasty in there.

pln_ko1_14_01.base_text: Alright, that'll keep Gage sweet. You guys can cash this out now, or stay for more.
pln_ko1_14_01.loc_text: Alright, that'll keep Gage sweet. You guys can cash this out now, or stay for more.

pln_ko1_14_02.base_text: That'll do for Gage, but you can stay for more.
pln_ko1_14_02.loc_text: That'll do for Gage, but you can stay for more.

pln_ko1_14_03.base_text: Gage has what he wants. Great work. You can bug out now, or hang around a little.
pln_ko1_14_03.loc_text: Gage has what he wants. Great work. You can bug out now, or hang around a little.

pln_ko1_15_01.base_text: There's the main gate. Could be watched. Maybe find another way in?
pln_ko1_15_01.loc_text: There's the main gate. Could be watched. Maybe find another way in?

pln_ko1_15_02.base_text: The main gate. Direct route, but might be watched. Maybe there're other ways in.
pln_ko1_15_02.loc_text: The main gate. Direct route, but might be watched. Maybe there're other ways in.

pln_ko1_15_03.base_text: The main gate is the quickest way in, but probably watched. Maybe other ways in?
pln_ko1_15_03.loc_text: The main gate is the quickest way in, but probably watched. Maybe other ways in?

pln_ko1_16_01.base_text: Those Murkywater containers are brought direct from the world's hotspots. Crack them open. They'll be your best bet for loot.
pln_ko1_16_01.loc_text: Those Murkywater containers are brought direct from the world's hotspots. Crack them open. They'll be your best bet for loot.

pln_ko1_16_02.base_text: Open those Murkywater containers. If anything has illegal loot, it will be them.
pln_ko1_16_02.loc_text: Open those Murkywater containers. If anything has illegal loot, it will be them.

pln_ko1_17_01.base_text: The driver's gonna bail! Make sure you're with him.
pln_ko1_17_01.loc_text: The driver's gonna bail! Make sure you're with him.

pln_ko1_17_02.base_text: I'm shutting this down. Make sure you're with the driver when he bails, or it's a long walk home.
pln_ko1_17_02.loc_text: I'm shutting this down. Make sure you're with the driver when he bails, or it's a long walk home.

pln_ko1_17_03.base_text: The van will leave in one minute. Make sure you're in it.
pln_ko1_17_03.loc_text: The van will leave in one minute. Make sure you're in it.

pln_ko1_18_02.base_text: Why isn't that chopper on any flight plans?
pln_ko1_18_02.loc_text: Why isn't that chopper on any flight plans?

pln_ko1_18_03.base_text: Uh, hold on...no flight plans submitted. Who are these guys?
pln_ko1_18_03.loc_text: Uh, hold on...no flight plans submitted. Who are these guys?

pln_ko1_19_01.base_text: He saw you! Deal with it!
pln_ko1_19_01.loc_text: He saw you! Deal with it!

pln_ko1_19_03.base_text: They made you! Do something - quick!
pln_ko1_19_03.loc_text: They made you! Do something - quick!

pln_ko1_20_01.base_text: That's the first one, guys. Keep working.
pln_ko1_20_01.loc_text: That's the first one, guys. Keep working.

pln_ko1_20_03.base_text: That's bag one. Keep bagging, gang.
pln_ko1_20_03.loc_text: That's bag one. Keep bagging, gang.

pln_ko1_21_02.base_text: You're nearly done. Only one bag to go.
pln_ko1_21_02.loc_text: You're nearly done. Only one bag to go.

pln_ko1_21_03.base_text: Just the last bag to go, guys. Don't mess up now.
pln_ko1_21_03.loc_text: Just the last bag to go, guys. Don't mess up now.

pln_ko1_22_01.base_text: That's the armor of Oda Nabunaga. Bag the pieces. If that's genuine...
pln_ko1_22_01.loc_text: That's the armor of Oda Nabunaga. Bag the pieces. If that's genuine...

pln_ko1_22_02.base_text: Armor of a Shogun. Nabunaga. Thought lost for centuries, but... here it is. Get the pieces bagged.
pln_ko1_22_02.loc_text: Armor of a Shogun. Nabunaga. Thought lost for centuries, but... here it is. Get the pieces bagged.

pln_ko1_22_03.base_text: I think that is the armor of Oda Nabunaga. This is serious loot, gang. Load up!
pln_ko1_22_03.loc_text: I think that is the armor of Oda Nabunaga. This is serious loot, gang. Load up!

pln_ko1_23_01.base_text: I can't believe we scored Oda's armor. Outstanding work!
pln_ko1_23_01.loc_text: I can't believe we scored Oda's armor. Outstanding work!

pln_ko1_23_02.base_text: People would pay a fortune just to look upon that armor. And it's yours.
pln_ko1_23_02.loc_text: People would pay a fortune just to look upon that armor. And it's yours.

pln_ko1_23_03.base_text: That's all four pieces of the Shogun's armor. This is an outstanding night's work.
pln_ko1_23_03.loc_text: That's all four pieces of the Shogun's armor. This is an outstanding night's work.

pln_ko1_24_01.base_text: Gage has arranged for one of the dumpsters to be used to stash some loot.
pln_ko1_24_01.loc_text: Gage has arranged for one of the dumpsters to be used to stash some loot.

pln_ko1_24_02.base_text: There's a dumpster down there. Gage says you can use it to stash some loot.
pln_ko1_24_02.loc_text: There's a dumpster down there. Gage says you can use it to stash some loot.

pln_ko1_24_03.base_text: Gage sorted a dumpster to stash a bit of loot in. His people will collect it in the morning.
pln_ko1_24_03.loc_text: Gage sorted a dumpster to stash a bit of loot in. His people will collect it in the morning.

pln_ko1_25_01.base_text: One of Gage's guys is in a nearby parking lot. You can toss loot over the wall to him.
pln_ko1_25_01.loc_text: One of Gage's guys is in a nearby parking lot. You can toss loot over the wall to him.

pln_ko1_25_02.base_text: An associate of Gage's will help getting some of the loot out. Just toss it to him.
pln_ko1_25_02.loc_text: An associate of Gage's will help getting some of the loot out. Just toss it to him.

pln_ko1_25_03.base_text: Gage's guy is in a nearby parking lot. Throw the loot over the wall to him.
pln_ko1_25_03.loc_text: Gage's guy is in a nearby parking lot. Throw the loot over the wall to him.

pln_ko1_26_01.base_text: Move quick. Guards will notice that open door.
pln_ko1_26_01.loc_text: Move quick. Guards will notice that open door.

pln_ko1_26_02.base_text: Be quick, gang. The guards will notice an open vault door.
pln_ko1_26_02.loc_text: Be quick, gang. The guards will notice an open vault door.

pln_ko1_26_03.base_text: Hustle! The murkies will notice that open vault!
pln_ko1_26_03.loc_text: Hustle! The murkies will notice that open vault!

pln_ko1_end_01_01.base_text: Expertly done, gang. You guys are like shadows.
pln_ko1_end_01_01.loc_text: Expertly done, gang. You guys are like shadows.

pln_ko1_end_01_02.base_text: That was text-book whisper mode, guys. Great work.
pln_ko1_end_01_02.loc_text: That was text-book whisper mode, guys. Great work.

pln_ko1_end_01_03.base_text: Ninja's in socks tiptoeing on thick carpet make more noise than you. Expertly done!
pln_ko1_end_01_03.loc_text: Ninja's in socks tiptoeing on thick carpet make more noise than you. Expertly done!

pln_ko1_end_02_01.base_text: Not pretty. Not a great achievement. But any day you walk away from is a payday.
pln_ko1_end_02_01.loc_text: Not pretty. Not a great achievement. But any day you walk away from is a payday.

pln_ko1_end_02_02.base_text: Shame you guys couldn't keep it stealthy. Not a day for achievements.
pln_ko1_end_02_02.loc_text: Shame you guys couldn't keep it stealthy. Not a day for achievements.

pln_ko1_end_02_03.base_text: You did the job, but with none of the finesse I hoped for. Roll home, gang.
pln_ko1_end_02_03.loc_text: You did the job, but with none of the finesse I hoped for. Roll home, gang.

pln_ko1_intro_01_01.base_text: OK, pull over here, and get your masks on.
pln_ko1_intro_01_01.loc_text: OK, pull over here, and get your masks on.

pln_ko1_intro_01_02.base_text: Almost there, gang. Get those clown masks on.
pln_ko1_intro_01_02.loc_text: Almost there, gang. Get those clown masks on.

pln_ko1_intro_01_03.base_text: It's quiet out there tonight. Keep it that way.
pln_ko1_intro_01_03.loc_text: It's quiet out there tonight. Keep it that way.

pln_ko1b_01_01.base_text: All right. Safeties off. Get down there!
pln_ko1b_01_01.loc_text: All right. Safeties off. Get down there!

pln_ko1b_01_02.base_text: Okay, there it is. Kick the door down!
pln_ko1b_01_02.loc_text: Okay, there it is. Kick the door down!

pln_ko1b_01_03.base_text: That's the Murky warehouse. All right, get at 'em!
pln_ko1b_01_03.loc_text: That's the Murky warehouse. All right, get at 'em!

pln_ko1b_02_01.base_text: The vault is going to be in one of these Murkywater shipping containers. Check them!
pln_ko1b_02_01.loc_text: The vault is going to be in one of these Murkywater shipping containers. Check them!

pln_ko1b_02_02.base_text: Guess the vault is gonna be in a Murky shipping container. Get opening them.
pln_ko1b_02_02.loc_text: Guess the vault is gonna be in a Murky shipping container. Get opening them.

pln_ko1b_02_03.base_text: The vault will be packed for transport, so check those Murky shipping containers.
pln_ko1b_02_03.loc_text: The vault will be packed for transport, so check those Murky shipping containers.

pln_ko1b_03_01.base_text: Remember, check the Murkywater shipping containers for the vault.
pln_ko1b_03_01.loc_text: Remember, check the Murkywater shipping containers for the vault.

pln_ko1b_03_02.base_text: Gang, find that vault. It'll be in a shipping container. Probably those Murkywater ones.
pln_ko1b_03_02.loc_text: Gang, find that vault. It'll be in a shipping container. Probably those Murkywater ones.

pln_ko1b_03_03.base_text: Guys, the vault - find it! Check the Murkywater containers.
pln_ko1b_03_03.loc_text: Guys, the vault - find it! Check the Murkywater containers.

pln_ko1b_04_03.base_text: Vlad wants to talk to you...
pln_ko1b_04_03.loc_text: Vlad wants to talk to you...

pln_ko1b_04_04.base_text: Vlad wants to speak with you...
pln_ko1b_04_04.loc_text: Vlad wants to speak with you...

pln_ko1b_05_01.base_text: Next step - open the vault. Find some crowbars inside the warehouse and jam them into the cooling fans at the back. That'll raise the temperature within, and engage the failsafe.
pln_ko1b_05_01.loc_text: Next step - open the vault. Find some crowbars inside the warehouse and jam them into the cooling fans at the back. That'll raise the temperature within, and engage the failsafe.

pln_ko1b_05_02.base_text: These vaults have one weakness. A failsafe will open the door if the temperature inside gets too high. Look around for crowbars in the warehouse, and jam them into the rear fans.
pln_ko1b_05_02.loc_text: These vaults have one weakness. A failsafe will open the door if the temperature inside gets too high. Look around for crowbars in the warehouse, and jam them into the rear fans.

pln_ko1b_05_03.base_text: This vault's got an Achilles Heel. It's temperature controlled. Jam the vent fans at the back with crowbars. The temperature rises and the failsafe opens the door. Easy.
pln_ko1b_05_03.loc_text: This vault's got an Achilles Heel. It's temperature controlled. Jam the vent fans at the back with crowbars. The temperature rises and the failsafe opens the door. Easy.

pln_ko1b_06_01.base_text: Remember: you need to find crowbars and jam them into the vault's fans. They are most likely inside the warehouse.
pln_ko1b_06_01.loc_text: Remember: you need to find crowbars and jam them into the vault's fans. They are most likely inside the warehouse.

pln_ko1b_06_02.base_text: Look around for crowbars in the warehouse. Stick them into the vault's fans, and wait for thermodynamics to do the rest.
pln_ko1b_06_02.loc_text: Look around for crowbars in the warehouse. Stick them into the vault's fans, and wait for thermodynamics to do the rest.

pln_ko1b_06_03.base_text: You need to find crowbars. They are most likely in the warehouse. Jam them into the vault fans. The heat builds inside, and... voila!
pln_ko1b_06_03.loc_text: You need to find crowbars. They are most likely in the warehouse. Jam them into the vault fans. The heat builds inside, and... voila!

pln_ko1b_07_01.base_text: My guess would be the crowbars are inside the warehouse.
pln_ko1b_07_01.loc_text: My guess would be the crowbars are inside the warehouse.

pln_ko1b_07_02.base_text: The warehouse is where you're most likely to find a crowbar.
pln_ko1b_07_02.loc_text: The warehouse is where you're most likely to find a crowbar.

pln_ko1b_07_03.base_text: Crowbars are probably inside the warehouse. Check it.
pln_ko1b_07_03.loc_text: Crowbars are probably inside the warehouse. Check it.

pln_ko1b_08_01.base_text: All right. That's the first. Heat is building. Disabling more fans will speed this up.
pln_ko1b_08_01.loc_text: All right. That's the first. Heat is building. Disabling more fans will speed this up.

pln_ko1b_08_02.base_text: Okay, great. The temperature is climbing. Wait it out, but jamming more fans will speed it up.
pln_ko1b_08_02.loc_text: Okay, great. The temperature is climbing. Wait it out, but jamming more fans will speed it up.

pln_ko1b_08_03.base_text: That's the first fan. Temperature's rising. Jam more fans to speed things up.
pln_ko1b_08_03.loc_text: That's the first fan. Temperature's rising. Jam more fans to speed things up.

pln_ko1b_09_01.base_text: Nice. It's getting hotter. What the hell is in there?
pln_ko1b_09_01.loc_text: Nice. It's getting hotter. What the hell is in there?

pln_ko1b_09_02.base_text: Good. Temperature is climbing faster. Must be something hot in there.
pln_ko1b_09_02.loc_text: Good. Temperature is climbing faster. Must be something hot in there.

pln_ko1b_09_03.base_text: Great. Look at that temperature climb. Sheesh, must be something hotter than hell in there.
pln_ko1b_09_03.loc_text: Great. Look at that temperature climb. Sheesh, must be something hotter than hell in there.

pln_ko1b_10_01.base_text: That's it for the fans. Temperature is spiking fast. What the hell is in there?
pln_ko1b_10_01.loc_text: That's it for the fans. Temperature is spiking fast. What the hell is in there?

pln_ko1b_10_02.base_text: That's the last fan. Man, look at that temperature climb. I got a bad feeling about this.
pln_ko1b_10_02.loc_text: That's the last fan. Man, look at that temperature climb. I got a bad feeling about this.

pln_ko1b_10_03.base_text: Last fan disabled. Temperature is off the hook. The contents must be scorching!
pln_ko1b_10_03.loc_text: Last fan disabled. Temperature is off the hook. The contents must be scorching!

pln_ko1b_11_01.base_text: Vault door's open. Get in and grab the loot!
pln_ko1b_11_01.loc_text: Vault door's open. Get in and grab the loot!

pln_ko1b_11_02.base_text: That's the door. Now grab the stuff.
pln_ko1b_11_02.loc_text: That's the door. Now grab the stuff.

pln_ko1b_11_03.base_text: Vault's open. Grab whatever's inside, gang!
pln_ko1b_11_03.loc_text: Vault's open. Grab whatever's inside, gang!

pln_ko1b_12_01.base_text: Is that... a nuclear warhead!? I... don't... look, just grab it. Carefully!
pln_ko1b_12_01.loc_text: Is that... a nuclear warhead!? I... don't... look, just grab it. Carefully!

pln_ko1b_12_02.base_text: That can't be... a goddamn nuke!? Vlad!
pln_ko1b_12_02.loc_text: That can't be... a goddamn nuke!? Vlad!

pln_ko1b_12_03.base_text: I... uh... okay. So we're boosting nuclear warheads. Guys, be very, very gentle with those things.
pln_ko1b_12_03.loc_text: I... uh... okay. So we're boosting nuclear warheads. Guys, be very, very gentle with those things.

pln_ko1b_13_02.base_text: Vlad, smashing malls is one thing. Stealing tiaras is one thing. But nukes!?
pln_ko1b_13_02.loc_text: Vlad, smashing malls is one thing. Stealing tiaras is one thing. But nukes!?

pln_ko1b_13_03.base_text: Are you nuts, Vlad? These are live nukes!
pln_ko1b_13_03.loc_text: Are you nuts, Vlad? These are live nukes!

pln_ko1b_14_01.base_text: Those warheads are damned heavy. Use the forklifts to shift them.
pln_ko1b_14_01.loc_text: Those warheads are damned heavy. Use the forklifts to shift them.

pln_ko1b_14_02.base_text: Those forklifts will be useful for moving the warheads.
pln_ko1b_14_02.loc_text: Those forklifts will be useful for moving the warheads.

pln_ko1b_14_03.base_text: Damn, those warheads are heavy. Maybe use the forklifts.
pln_ko1b_14_03.loc_text: Damn, those warheads are heavy. Maybe use the forklifts.

pln_ko1b_15_01.base_text: That train is some distance away. I don't want you handling those nukes for long. See if you can find a car.
pln_ko1b_15_01.loc_text: That train is some distance away. I don't want you handling those nukes for long. See if you can find a car.

pln_ko1b_15_02.base_text: Look for a way to get to the train quickly. Don't want you guys handling those old Russian nukes longer than you need to.
pln_ko1b_15_02.loc_text: Look for a way to get to the train quickly. Don't want you guys handling those old Russian nukes longer than you need to.

pln_ko1b_15_03.base_text: See if there's a car around there. Sooner you get those shady Russian nukes to Vlad's train the better!
pln_ko1b_15_03.loc_text: See if there's a car around there. Sooner you get those shady Russian nukes to Vlad's train the better!

pln_ko1b_16_01.base_text: That's it. Now you can get the hell out of there, or head back and snag more Murky loot.
pln_ko1b_16_01.loc_text: That's it. Now you can get the hell out of there, or head back and snag more Murky loot.

pln_ko1b_16_02.base_text: We're done. You can leave that crazy Ivan with his nukes, or head back and grab more loot.
pln_ko1b_16_02.loc_text: We're done. You can leave that crazy Ivan with his nukes, or head back and grab more loot.

pln_ko1b_16_03.loc_text: That's the last one. Now you can get far away, or return to the warehouse for more loot.

pln_ko1b_17_01.base_text: This is where you boosted the samurai armor. Remember?
pln_ko1b_17_01.loc_text: This is where you boosted the samurai armor. Remember?

pln_ko1b_17_02.base_text: You remember when we hauled the samurai armor out of here? Ahhh, good times!
pln_ko1b_17_02.loc_text: You remember when we hauled the samurai armor out of here? Ahhh, good times!

pln_ko1b_17_03.base_text: We got the armor from here when we did it quiet, you recall?
pln_ko1b_17_03.loc_text: We got the armor from here when we did it quiet, you recall?

pln_ko1b_18_01.base_text: That's it. Now get the hell out of there!
pln_ko1b_18_01.loc_text: That's it. Now get the hell out of there!

pln_ko1b_18_02.base_text: We're done. Now bail! Leave Vlad with his nukes.
