pln_ko1b_18_03.base_text: That's the last one. My advice? Get far away, as fast as you can!.
pln_ko1b_18_03.loc_text: That's the last one. My advice? Get far away, as fast as you can!.

pln_ko1b_intro_01_02.base_text: Got memories of this place at 4am...
pln_ko1b_intro_01_02.loc_text: Got memories of this place at 4am...

pln_mad_01_01.base_text: Welcome to Russia, gang! Nice welcoming party, right?
pln_mad_01_01.loc_text: Welcome to Russia, gang! Nice welcoming party, right?

pln_mad_01_02.base_text: That's Russia for you, gang! These guys do not mess around!
pln_mad_01_02.loc_text: That's Russia for you, gang! These guys do not mess around!

pln_mad_01_03.base_text: Holy... that was close! These Russians really don't want anyone to crash their party.
pln_mad_01_03.loc_text: Holy... that was close! These Russians really don't want anyone to crash their party.

pln_mad_02_01.base_text: As long as those anti-air defenses are functional, Fedor won't be able to drop the EMP. Find a way to disable them, gang.
pln_mad_02_01.loc_text: As long as those anti-air defenses are functional, Fedor won't be able to drop the EMP. Find a way to disable them, gang.

pln_mad_02_02.base_text: You need to disable or destroy the anti-air defenses. Find a way, otherwise we're screwed.
pln_mad_02_02.loc_text: You need to disable or destroy the anti-air defenses. Find a way, otherwise we're screwed.

pln_mad_02_03.base_text: Gang, you need to take care of those anti-air guns ASAP. Find a way!
pln_mad_02_03.loc_text: Gang, you need to take care of those anti-air guns ASAP. Find a way!

pln_mad_03_01.base_text: Gang, the computer station there could be useful. See if you can find me a laptop or something.
pln_mad_03_01.loc_text: Gang, the computer station there could be useful. See if you can find me a laptop or something.

pln_mad_03_02.base_text: That computer station should have a laptop laying around. See if you can find one.
pln_mad_03_02.loc_text: That computer station should have a laptop laying around. See if you can find one.

pln_mad_04_01.loc_text: Hook up the laptop to the anti-aircraft gun!

pln_mad_06_03.loc_text: The hacking has been stopped. Get it up and running again!

pln_mad_07_01.base_text: The AA gun has been disabled! Now, grab the laptop and head over to the next one!

pln_mad_07_02.base_text: That's it, guys. The AA gun has been disabled. But there's still one more.

pln_mad_07_03.base_text: Okay, I got this one disabled, but there's still one more to go!
pln_mad_07_03.loc_text: Okay, I got this one disabled, but there's still one more to go!

pln_mad_08_01.loc_text: Man, these mercenaries have set up for war. There should be some explosives laying around that we could use.

pln_mad_08_02.base_text: I bet you there are some explosives laying around here. See if you can find any.
pln_mad_08_02.loc_text: I bet you there are some explosives laying around here. See if you can find any.

pln_mad_08_03.base_text: These mercenaries must have some C4 or something around here that we could use.
pln_mad_08_03.loc_text: These mercenaries must have some C4 or something around here that we could use.

pln_mad_09_01.base_text: You know what to do. Set the C4 up and let it take care of the rest.

pln_mad_12_02.loc_text: God dammit, Bile... The EMP fell through the roof and is now inside the lumber mill instead of outside.

pln_mad_12_03.base_text: Really, Bile? Gang, the EMP ended up inside the lumber mill instead of outside.Need to get in there now.

pln_mad_13_01.loc_text: Nice drop, Bile! Gang, the EMP is in the yard outside the lumber mill.

pln_mad_13_02.base_text: Okay, guys. Bile dropped the EMP just outside the lumber mill.Go get it!
pln_mad_13_02.loc_text: Okay, guys. Bile dropped the EMP just outside the lumber mill.Go get it!

pln_mad_14_01.base_text: Ok, gang. We need to find a way into the lumber mill. This might be crazy, but maybe we could use the anti-air gun we hacked earlier? Just redirect its position and blow the wall up?
pln_mad_14_01.loc_text: Ok, gang. We need to find a way into the lumber mill. This might be crazy, but maybe we could use the anti-air gun we hacked earlier? Just redirect its position and blow the wall up?

pln_mad_14_02.base_text: We are going to need to find a way inside the lumber mill. Maybe we can blow a hole through the wall using the AA gun we hacked?
pln_mad_14_02.loc_text: We are going to need to find a way inside the lumber mill. Maybe we can blow a hole through the wall using the AA gun we hacked?

pln_mad_14_03.base_text: We need to get inside the lumber mill. Why not see if you could use the anti-air gun we hacked earlier and redirect its position? Might be worth a shot.

pln_mad_15_02.base_text: That's how we do it! Good job, guys. Get inside the mill now.

pln_mad_16_03.base_text: Okay, we need to charge the EMP before can we use it.Patience is a virtue.

pln_mad_18_02.loc_text: The charging has been interrupted! Get it started again!

pln_mad_19_01.loc_text: The mercenaries interrupted the EMP charge! Every time that happens, the EMP is slowly discharged!

pln_mad_19_02.base_text: Shit, the mercenaries stopped the EMP charge! It's beginning to discharge!
pln_mad_19_02.loc_text: Shit, the mercenaries stopped the EMP charge! It's beginning to discharge!

pln_mad_21_01.base_text: Guys, listen! When the EMP goes off I most likely won't be able to communicate with you for a while. You need to get down to the hidden laboratory via the hatch.
pln_mad_21_01.loc_text: Guys, listen! When the EMP goes off I most likely won't be able to communicate with you for a while. You need to get down to the hidden laboratory via the hatch.

pln_mad_21_01a.base_text: The EMP should have released the magnetic lock. Once you're down there, find the scanner and the test-subjects.
pln_mad_21_01a.loc_text: The EMP should have released the magnetic lock. Once you're down there, find the scanner and the test-subjects.

pln_mad_21_02.base_text: Guys, the EMP will most likely take out our communication when it goes off. But you know what to do, enter the laboratory via the hatch and look for the test subjects.
pln_mad_21_02.loc_text: Guys, the EMP will most likely take out our communication when it goes off. But you know what to do, enter the laboratory via the hatch and look for the test subjects.

pln_mad_21_03.base_text: The EMP is almost done, so listen up! This baby is powerful so don't be surprised if it breaks our communication among other things.

pln_mad_21_03a.base_text: But just stick to the plan and we should be good. Get inside the laboratory through the hatch and find the scanner and the test-subjects.
pln_mad_21_03a.loc_text: But just stick to the plan and we should be good. Get inside the laboratory through the hatch and find the scanner and the test-subjects.

pln_mad_22_01.loc_text: Gang? I'm not sure you can hear me, but you know what you're supposed to do: enter the laboratory via the hatchet.

pln_mad_22_02.base_text: The EMP took care of the magnetic lock, so you have free passage to the laboratory.Let's go!

pln_mad_22_03.base_text: That's it! The EMP did its job! Now enter the laboratory via the hatch.

pln_mad_24_02.loc_text: What the hell! The whole room is filled with gas. Quickly! Find out where it's coming from and find a way to shut it off!

pln_mad_30_01.loc_text: Jesus, that's nasty. Well, you got what we need. Place it on the scanner, I guess?

pln_mad_36_03.loc_text: Protect the X-ray device! Don't let the mercenaries get to it!

pln_mad_37_01.loc_text: They stopped the scan! Start it again!

pln_mad_37_02.base_text: Damn, they interrupted the scan! Restart it!
pln_mad_37_02.loc_text: Damn, they interrupted the scan! Restart it!

pln_mad_37_03.base_text: Guys, the bastards stopped the scan! Get it working again!
pln_mad_37_03.loc_text: Guys, the bastards stopped the scan! Get it working again!

pln_mad_38_01.base_text: Great, the scanning is up and running again.
pln_mad_38_01.loc_text: Great, the scanning is up and running again.

pln_mad_38_02.base_text: Good, the scan is under way again.
pln_mad_38_02.loc_text: Good, the scan is under way again.

pln_mad_38_03.loc_text: The scan is back in progress. Now keep it that way.

pln_mad_39_01.base_text: That's it! Scan has been completed.Good job, guys.

pln_mad_39_02.base_text: Great job, gang. The scan is complete.
pln_mad_39_02.loc_text: Great job, gang. The scan is complete.

pln_mad_39_03.base_text: The scan has been completed.Well done, gang.
pln_mad_39_03.loc_text: The scan has been completed.Well done, gang.

pln_mad_40_02.base_text: Argh, they pulled the power for the scanner!
pln_mad_40_02.loc_text: Argh, they pulled the power for the scanner!

pln_mad_40_03.base_text: Damn, they got the power for the scanner!
pln_mad_40_03.loc_text: Damn, they got the power for the scanner!

pln_mad_41_01.base_text: Great! Power is back. Get the scanner working again.
pln_mad_41_01.loc_text: Great! Power is back. Get the scanner working again.

pln_mad_41_02.base_text: Okay, good. You got the power back. Return to the scanning process.
pln_mad_41_02.loc_text: Okay, good. You got the power back. Return to the scanning process.

pln_mad_41_03.base_text: Power is back! Get back to scanning the test-subjects.
pln_mad_41_03.loc_text: Power is back! Get back to scanning the test-subjects.

pln_mad_42_01.base_text: Okay, the data is being transferred to the server in the other room. You can either go and get it or stay and scan more bodies. I'm sure Jimmy can find use for it and that means more cash for us.
pln_mad_42_01.loc_text: Okay, the data is being transferred to the server in the other room. You can either go and get it or stay and scan more bodies. I'm sure Jimmy can find use for it and that means more cash for us.

pln_mad_42_02.base_text: The data from the scanning is being collected on that server in the other room. You can stay and get more data, or you can leave. But I'm sure Jimmy would pay us for the trouble.
pln_mad_42_02.loc_text: The data from the scanning is being collected on that server in the other room. You can stay and get more data, or you can leave. But I'm sure Jimmy would pay us for the trouble.

pln_mad_42_03.base_text: The data is being stored on the server in the other room. You can get it and get the hell outta here, or you can stay and scan more bodies. I'm positive Jimmy will make it worth your while.
pln_mad_42_03.loc_text: The data is being stored on the server in the other room. You can get it and get the hell outta here, or you can stay and scan more bodies. I'm positive Jimmy will make it worth your while.

pln_mad_43_01.base_text: Good choice, gang. It's all about the payday when it comes down to it. You know the drill, keep scanning them bodies for more data.
pln_mad_43_01.loc_text: Good choice, gang. It's all about the payday when it comes down to it. You know the drill, keep scanning them bodies for more data.

pln_mad_43_02.base_text: That's the right choice, guys. Keep scanning away. We didn't come all the way to Russia for a small payout, now did we?
pln_mad_43_02.loc_text: That's the right choice, guys. Keep scanning away. We didn't come all the way to Russia for a small payout, now did we?

pln_mad_43_03.base_text: Excellent decision, guys. If you scan all the bodies Jimmy will pay us good for it. Money doesn't seem to a an issue for him.
pln_mad_43_03.loc_text: Excellent decision, guys. If you scan all the bodies Jimmy will pay us good for it. Money doesn't seem to a an issue for him.

pln_mad_44_01.base_text: That's all of them! No more bodies to scan. Now we need to get the server or we did it all for nothin'.
pln_mad_44_01.loc_text: That's all of them! No more bodies to scan. Now we need to get the server or we did it all for nothin'.

pln_mad_44_02.base_text: Excellent, gang. That's all the bodies scanned. Now we need to get our hands on that server storing the data.
pln_mad_44_02.loc_text: Excellent, gang. That's all the bodies scanned. Now we need to get our hands on that server storing the data.

pln_mad_44_03.base_text: Jimmy will love it if we get all the data we can, really sticking it to Akan.
pln_mad_44_03.loc_text: Jimmy will love it if we get all the data we can, really sticking it to Akan.

pln_mad_45_01.base_text: Great job, guys! That server is worth a lot of cash right now. Don't drop it.
pln_mad_45_01.loc_text: Great job, guys! That server is worth a lot of cash right now. Don't drop it.

pln_mad_45_02.base_text: That's it! Now make sure you get out of there alive.
pln_mad_45_02.loc_text: That's it! Now make sure you get out of there alive.

pln_mad_45_03.base_text: Excellent, the server is secured. Now, let's get out of here.
pln_mad_45_03.loc_text: Excellent, the server is secured. Now, let's get out of here.

pln_mad_46_01.base_text: Wait! I forgot about the briefcase... There should be a briefcase somewhere in the laboratory. You need to get it before you leave. Don't mind what's in it, just do it.
pln_mad_46_01.loc_text: Wait! I forgot about the briefcase... There should be a briefcase somewhere in the laboratory. You need to get it before you leave. Don't mind what's in it, just do it.

pln_mad_46_02.base_text: Damn! I forgot about the briefcase. Gang, listen up. There is a briefcase somewhere in the laboratory.
pln_mad_46_02.loc_text: Damn! I forgot about the briefcase. Gang, listen up. There is a briefcase somewhere in the laboratory.

pln_mad_46_02a.base_text: I need you to find and it and bring it with you. I wouldn't ask if it wasn't important.
pln_mad_46_02a.loc_text: I need you to find and it and bring it with you. I wouldn't ask if it wasn't important.

pln_mad_46_03.base_text: That's right! I almost forgot: there is a briefcase in the laboratory. I'm gonna need you to get it, guys. It's important.
pln_mad_46_03.loc_text: That's right! I almost forgot: there is a briefcase in the laboratory. I'm gonna need you to get it, guys. It's important.

pln_mad_47_01.base_text: You got it? The briefcase? Good! Now let's get out of there.
pln_mad_47_01.loc_text: You got it? The briefcase? Good! Now let's get out of there.

pln_mad_47_02.base_text: You got the briefcase? Excellent! Time to go then!
pln_mad_47_02.loc_text: You got the briefcase? Excellent! Time to go then!

pln_mad_47_03.base_text: That's it? The briefcase? Perfect! Now we can get outta here!
pln_mad_47_03.loc_text: That's it? The briefcase? Perfect! Now we can get outta here!

pln_mad_48_01.base_text: What, are you mind readers? Yes, I do want that briefcase. How did you know?
pln_mad_48_01.loc_text: What, are you mind readers? Yes, I do want that briefcase. How did you know?

pln_mad_48_02.base_text: Haha, you read my mind, guys. I do want that briefcase.
pln_mad_48_02.loc_text: Haha, you read my mind, guys. I do want that briefcase.

pln_mad_48_03.base_text: How did you know I wanted that briefcase? It doesn't matter, good job!
pln_mad_48_03.loc_text: How did you know I wanted that briefcase? It doesn't matter, good job!

pln_mad_49_01.base_text: Guys, Fedor is waiting over at the lake. It's time to leave.
pln_mad_49_01.loc_text: Guys, Fedor is waiting over at the lake. It's time to leave.

pln_mad_49_02.base_text: You heard Fedor. Get your asses to the lake.
pln_mad_49_02.loc_text: You heard Fedor. Get your asses to the lake.

pln_mad_49_03.base_text: We got everything we came for. Now, head for the lake. Fedor is waiting for you.
pln_mad_49_03.loc_text: We got everything we came for. Now, head for the lake. Fedor is waiting for you.

pln_mad_50_01.base_text: Excellent, guys. It actually feels nice knowing we did something good. But don't get any ideas, we're robbing a bank or something next.
pln_mad_50_01.loc_text: Excellent, guys. It actually feels nice knowing we did something good. But don't get any ideas, we're robbing a bank or something next.

pln_mad_50_02.base_text: Good job, gang. The server has been secured and Jimmy will be happy.
pln_mad_50_02.loc_text: Good job, gang. The server has been secured and Jimmy will be happy.

pln_mad_50_03.base_text: Great, the server has been secured. Now Jimmy can shut up about it. We did our part.
pln_mad_50_03.loc_text: Great, the server has been secured. Now Jimmy can shut up about it. We did our part.

pln_mad_51_01.base_text: Nothing more to do here. Let's go.
pln_mad_51_01.loc_text: Nothing more to do here. Let's go.

pln_mad_51_02.base_text: What are you waiting for? Let's leave.
pln_mad_51_02.loc_text: What are you waiting for? Let's leave.

pln_mad_51_03.base_text: We are done, gang. Time to go.
pln_mad_51_03.loc_text: We are done, gang. Time to go.

pln_mad_52_01.base_text: Alright, that's the radar controlling the anti-air gun. Blow it to hell.
pln_mad_52_01.loc_text: Alright, that's the radar controlling the anti-air gun. Blow it to hell.

pln_mad_52_02.base_text: That radar is controlling the anti-air gun. Need to blow it up.
pln_mad_52_02.loc_text: That radar is controlling the anti-air gun. Need to blow it up.

pln_mad_52_03.base_text: Seems that radar is controlling the anti-air gun. You need to blow it up.
pln_mad_52_03.loc_text: Seems that radar is controlling the anti-air gun. You need to blow it up.

pln_mad_53_01.base_text: Bile managed to drop some explosives for you. They should be near where you landed, so grab 'em.
pln_mad_53_01.loc_text: Bile managed to drop some explosives for you. They should be near where you landed, so grab 'em.

pln_mad_53_02.base_text: Bile dropped some explosives close to your landing spot. Find them.
pln_mad_53_02.loc_text: Bile dropped some explosives close to your landing spot. Find them.

pln_mad_53_03.base_text: Guys, search the spot where you landed. Bile has dropped some explosives for you.
pln_mad_53_03.loc_text: Guys, search the spot where you landed. Bile has dropped some explosives for you.

pln_mad_54_01.base_text: Excellent, you got the explosives. Now, plant them on the radar.
pln_mad_54_01.loc_text: Excellent, you got the explosives. Now, plant them on the radar.

pln_mad_54_02.base_text: Good, you found the explosives. Head over to the radar and blow it up.
pln_mad_54_02.loc_text: Good, you found the explosives. Head over to the radar and blow it up.

pln_mad_54_03.base_text: You got the explosives? Great. Get over to the radar and plant them so we can blow it up.
pln_mad_54_03.loc_text: You got the explosives? Great. Get over to the radar and plant them so we can blow it up.

pln_mad_55_01.base_text: Gang, you still need to blow up that radar.
pln_mad_55_01.loc_text: Gang, you still need to blow up that radar.

pln_mad_55_02.base_text: The radar is still operational. Use the explosives and blow it up.
pln_mad_55_02.loc_text: The radar is still operational. Use the explosives and blow it up.

pln_mad_55_03.base_text: Guys, the radar is still operational? You need to destroy it. Use the explosives Bile dropped!
pln_mad_55_03.loc_text: Guys, the radar is still operational? You need to destroy it. Use the explosives Bile dropped!

pln_mad_56_01.base_text: That radar needs to be taken down somehow. See if you can use the anti-air gun to blow it up.
pln_mad_56_01.loc_text: That radar needs to be taken down somehow. See if you can use the anti-air gun to blow it up.

pln_mad_56_02.base_text: We need to take that radar out of action. The missiles from the anti-air gun should do the work. See if you can use it.
pln_mad_56_02.loc_text: We need to take that radar out of action. The missiles from the anti-air gun should do the work. See if you can use it.

pln_mad_56_03.base_text: The radar needs to be taken down ASAP. Maybe you could redirect the anti-air gun and blow it up?
pln_mad_56_03.loc_text: The radar needs to be taken down ASAP. Maybe you could redirect the anti-air gun and blow it up?

pln_mad_57_01.base_text: Bring those missiles over to the radar!
pln_mad_57_01.loc_text: Bring those missiles over to the radar!

pln_mad_57_02.base_text: Those missiles will do the work. Get them over to the radar!
pln_mad_57_02.loc_text: Those missiles will do the work. Get them over to the radar!

pln_mad_57_03.base_text: Hell yeah. Those missiles are perfect. Take them to the radar.
pln_mad_57_03.loc_text: Hell yeah. Those missiles are perfect. Take them to the radar.

pln_mad_58_01.base_text: Place the missiles next to the radar and activate them. Easy peasy.
pln_mad_58_01.loc_text: Place the missiles next to the radar and activate them. Easy peasy.

pln_mad_58_02.base_text: Get the missiles close to the radar and activate them. Things are about to go BOOM.
pln_mad_58_02.loc_text: Get the missiles close to the radar and activate them. Things are about to go BOOM.

pln_mad_58_03.base_text: Place the missiles by the radar and activate them. That should do the trick.
pln_mad_58_03.loc_text: Place the missiles by the radar and activate them. That should do the trick.

pln_mad_59_01.base_text: Great job, gang. Bile is on his way with the EMP now and will drop it close to the lumber mill.
pln_mad_59_01.loc_text: Great job, gang. Bile is on his way with the EMP now and will drop it close to the lumber mill.

pln_mad_59_02.base_text: With the anti-air defenses out of the way, Bile has free passage to drop the EMP close to the lumber mill.
pln_mad_59_02.loc_text: With the anti-air defenses out of the way, Bile has free passage to drop the EMP close to the lumber mill.

pln_mad_59_03.base_text: Excellent, gang. With the anti-air defenses gone, Bile can now drop the EMP close to the lumber mill.
pln_mad_59_03.loc_text: Excellent, gang. With the anti-air defenses gone, Bile can now drop the EMP close to the lumber mill.

pln_mad_60_01.base_text: There's the AA gun. Blowing this up would mean blowing ourselves up. We need to hack it, get me access to that laptop.
pln_mad_60_01.loc_text: There's the AA gun. Blowing this up would mean blowing ourselves up. We need to hack it, get me access to that laptop.

pln_mad_60_02.base_text: To disable this we need to hack the laptop that is hooked up to it.
pln_mad_60_02.loc_text: To disable this we need to hack the laptop that is hooked up to it.

pln_mad_60_03.base_text: Even if we blow up the radar, they can still control this from the laptop. We need to hack it.
pln_mad_60_03.loc_text: Even if we blow up the radar, they can still control this from the laptop. We need to hack it.

pln_mad_61_01.base_text: The EMP will do two things:  It will get us a way in to the hidden lab. But more importantly: It will knock out whoever they are doing tests on, from what I heard fighting them is not an option.
pln_mad_61_01.loc_text: The EMP will do two things:  It will get us a way in to the hidden lab. But more importantly: It will knock out whoever they are doing tests on, from what I heard fighting them is not an option.

pln_mad_61_02.base_text: The EMP will not only give us a way in, but also knock out the test subjects. Trust me you don't want to deal with these guys.
pln_mad_61_02.loc_text: The EMP will not only give us a way in, but also knock out the test subjects. Trust me you don't want to deal with these guys.

pln_mad_61_03.base_text: The emp will give us a way in but it's primary function is to take care of the test subjects for us. If the stories are true, we don't want to take these guys on.
pln_mad_61_03.loc_text: The emp will give us a way in but it's primary function is to take care of the test subjects for us. If the stories are true, we don't want to take these guys on.

pln_mad_62_01.base_text: The elephant specifically told me not to forget the briefcase! Find it!
pln_mad_62_01.loc_text: The elephant specifically told me not to forget the briefcase! Find it!

pln_mad_62_02.base_text: We can not leave without that briefcase!
pln_mad_62_02.loc_text: We can not leave without that briefcase!

pln_mad_62_03.base_text: Gang what's going on? We are not leaving without the briefcase.
pln_mad_62_03.loc_text: Gang what's going on? We are not leaving without the briefcase.

pln_mad_63_01.base_text: What the hell happened to this guy?! Whatever, we need this guys hand.
pln_mad_63_01.loc_text: What the hell happened to this guy?! Whatever, we need this guys hand.

pln_mad_63_02.base_text: What kind of animal would do a thing like this? And now we need to chop off his hand...
pln_mad_63_02.loc_text: What kind of animal would do a thing like this? And now we need to chop off his hand...

pln_mad_63_03.base_text: How convenient, he won't run away now. Cut off his hand and bring it to the scanner.
pln_mad_63_03.loc_text: How convenient, he won't run away now. Cut off his hand and bring it to the scanner.

pln_mad_brf_01_01.base_text: Of all the times to grow a conscience, you decide now is the time? I can't say I like it, but I can't say you are making a mistake either. Based on what this Jimmy character is telling us, Akan really needs to be stopped. Your destination is a lumber mill in the middle of nowhere, that is secretly a laboratory run by a strange Russian organization. Jimmy tells me they are conducting some experiments that involve things out of this reality. Break into the lab and get the data Akan is after. Good luck, gang.
pln_mad_brf_01_01.loc_text: Of all the times to grow a conscience, you decide now is the time? I can't say I like it, but I can't say you are making a mistake either. Based on what this Jimmy character is telling us, Akan really needs to be stopped. Your destination is a lumber mill in the middle of nowhere, that is secretly a laboratory run by a strange Russian organization. Jimmy tells me they are conducting some experiments that involve things out of this reality. Break into the lab and get the data Akan is after. Good luck, gang.

pln_mad_intro_01_01.base_text: Damn! They have anti-air defenses set up around the whole factory. Turn the plane around, Bile! Gang, you need to use the parachutes and get out! Right now!
pln_mad_intro_01_01.loc_text: Damn! They have anti-air defenses set up around the whole factory. Turn the plane around, Bile! Gang, you need to use the parachutes and get out! Right now!

pln_mad_intro_01_02.base_text: Shit! These bastards have anti-air defenses set up! Bile, turn the plane around immediately! Guys, use the parachutes and get out! We'll figure something out!
pln_mad_intro_01_02.loc_text: Shit! These bastards have anti-air defenses set up! Bile, turn the plane around immediately! Guys, use the parachutes and get out! We'll figure something out!

pln_mad_intro_01_03.base_text: Anti-air defenses?! Are you shitting me?! Turn the plane around, Bile! Do it now! Guys, take the parachutes and jump out!
pln_mad_intro_01_03.loc_text: Anti-air defenses?! Are you shitting me?! Turn the plane around, Bile! Do it now! Guys, take the parachutes and jump out!

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_brief_01.base_text: Yep. You heard him right. Vlad is serious. We go into the mall, we destroy as much as we can.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_brief_01.loc_text: Yep. You heard him right. Vlad is serious. We go into the mall, we destroy as much as we can.

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_brief_01b.base_text: Enough destruction and this client will rethink his whole stance on protection money. Dirty job but you like getting dirty, right?
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_brief_01b.loc_text: Enough destruction and this client will rethink his whole stance on protection money. Dirty job but you like getting dirty, right?

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_a_01.base_text: That's it guys. Vlad's going to get his message through. Let's cash in.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_a_01.loc_text: That's it guys. Vlad's going to get his message through. Let's cash in.

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_a_02.base_text: Mall destruction: check. Pissed off police: check. Let's go get paid from old Vlad.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_a_02.loc_text: Mall destruction: check. Pissed off police: check. Let's go get paid from old Vlad.

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_a_03.base_text: OK done. Let's see what the crazy Russian got in store for us next.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_a_03.loc_text: OK done. Let's see what the crazy Russian got in store for us next.

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_a_04.base_text: OK we beat on this sorry mall enough for one day. Well done. Vlad has proven his point and I think we need to lay low for a bit after this.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_a_04.loc_text: OK we beat on this sorry mall enough for one day. Well done. Vlad has proven his point and I think we need to lay low for a bit after this.

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_b_01.base_text: OK that was severe OVERKILL. Vlad will eat this up. This will really work for him.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_b_01.loc_text: OK that was severe OVERKILL. Vlad will eat this up. This will really work for him.

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_b_02.base_text: I think you just wiped out everything. All of it. The farm. Well done.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_b_02.loc_text: I think you just wiped out everything. All of it. The farm. Well done.

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_b_03.base_text: OVERKILL - enough said. See you at the safe house.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_end_b_03.loc_text: OVERKILL - enough said. See you at the safe house.

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_intro_a_01.base_text: Go into the mall and rough up whatever you see. Keep civilians out if you can - we don't need unnecessary heat.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_intro_a_01.loc_text: Go into the mall and rough up whatever you see. Keep civilians out if you can - we don't need unnecessary heat.

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_intro_a_02.base_text: Hit as many stores and glass interiors as you can. If you can snag cash and valuables, opportunistic, you understand.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_intro_a_02.loc_text: Hit as many stores and glass interiors as you can. If you can snag cash and valuables, opportunistic, you understand.

pln_mallcrasch_stage1_intro_a_03.base_text: OK, the mall's up ahead. Get in, hit it with everything you got, and get out. Try to keep people to a minimum. This is strictly material, not personnel damage. This means you, Wolf.
pln_mallcrasch_stage1_intro_a_03.loc_text: OK, the mall's up ahead. Get in, hit it with everything you got, and get out. Try to keep people to a minimum. This is strictly material, not personnel damage. This means you, Wolf.

pln_mallcrash_stage1_01_any_01.base_text: Trash the entire mall. Either destroy each store individually, or look for something to torch them all.
pln_mallcrash_stage1_01_any_01.loc_text: Trash the entire mall. Either destroy each store individually, or look for something to torch them all.

pln_mallcrash_stage1_01_any_02.base_text: To show just how serious Vlad is, we are going to destroy 50 grand worth of pretty things.
pln_mallcrash_stage1_01_any_02.loc_text: To show just how serious Vlad is, we are going to destroy 50 grand worth of pretty things.

pln_mallcrash_stage1_02_any_01.base_text: There's probably some gasoline or detergent somewhere that can be lit on fire.
pln_mallcrash_stage1_02_any_01.loc_text: There's probably some gasoline or detergent somewhere that can be lit on fire.

pln_mallcrash_stage1_03_any_01.base_text: Look for storage closets, they might have stuff in them.
pln_mallcrash_stage1_03_any_01.loc_text: Look for storage closets, they might have stuff in them.

pln_mallcrash_stage1_04_any_01.base_text: That door looks like it's made of balsa, shoot the lock of that thing.
pln_mallcrash_stage1_04_any_01.loc_text: That door looks like it's made of balsa, shoot the lock of that thing.

pln_mallcrash_stage1_08_any_02.base_text: You're at 20 thousand! Keep on going!
pln_mallcrash_stage1_08_any_02.loc_text: You're at 20 thousand! Keep on going!

pln_mallcrash_stage1_12_any_01.base_text: That's 40 thousand, only ten more to go!
pln_mallcrash_stage1_12_any_01.loc_text: That's 40 thousand, only ten more to go!

pln_nightclub_stage1_end_a_01.base_text: Wow. Russians would call this tactic scorched earth. Very aggressive. I'm sure Vlad will pour you a shot of vodka in thanks.
pln_nightclub_stage1_end_a_01.loc_text: Wow. Russians would call this tactic scorched earth. Very aggressive. I'm sure Vlad will pour you a shot of vodka in thanks.

pln_nightclub_stage1_end_a_02.base_text: Cops bloodied our nose on that one - somehow I think Vlad was holding back information... As usual. But you did well... Let's see what old Vlad tells us.
pln_nightclub_stage1_end_a_02.loc_text: Cops bloodied our nose on that one - somehow I think Vlad was holding back information... As usual. But you did well... Let's see what old Vlad tells us.

pln_nightclub_stage1_end_a_03.base_text: That was a hell of a bar brawl. And now Vlad's probably on top, cagey old Russian. Let's go get you that payday.
pln_nightclub_stage1_end_a_03.loc_text: That was a hell of a bar brawl. And now Vlad's probably on top, cagey old Russian. Let's go get you that payday.

pln_nightclub_stage1_end_a_04.base_text: Disco inferno. Nicely done. Let's get paid.
pln_nightclub_stage1_end_a_04.loc_text: Disco inferno. Nicely done. Let's get paid.

pln_nightclub_stage1_end_b_01.base_text: You can dance, I will give you that. Good work. Get the money here and let's talk with Vlad.
pln_nightclub_stage1_end_b_01.loc_text: You can dance, I will give you that. Good work. Get the money here and let's talk with Vlad.

pln_nightclub_stage1_end_b_02.base_text: Not a cop in the world saw this one coming. Russians will be furious and Vlad will OD on vodka. Let's get paid.
pln_nightclub_stage1_end_b_02.loc_text: Not a cop in the world saw this one coming. Russians will be furious and Vlad will OD on vodka. Let's get paid.

pln_nightclub_stage1_end_b_03.base_text: No cop could have seen  this one coming. Perfect. The Russians are going to be pissed and Vlad will OD on vodka. After we get paid.
pln_nightclub_stage1_end_b_03.loc_text: No cop could have seen  this one coming. Perfect. The Russians are going to be pissed and Vlad will OD on vodka. After we get paid.

pln_nightclub_stage1_end_b_04.base_text: I'm sure Vlad wanted some more blood but this was clean and mean. The Russians will know they got hit by pros. See you back at the safe house.
pln_nightclub_stage1_end_b_04.loc_text: I'm sure Vlad wanted some more blood but this was clean and mean. The Russians will know they got hit by pros. See you back at the safe house.

pln_nightclub_stage1_ent_01_01.base_text: Cool, now that entrance's blocked off for a while.
pln_nightclub_stage1_ent_01_01.loc_text: Cool, now that entrance's blocked off for a while.

pln_nightclub_stage1_ent_02_01.base_text: Now the police have to enter from the front door!
pln_nightclub_stage1_ent_02_01.loc_text: Now the police have to enter from the front door!

pln_nightclub_stage1_intro_a_01.base_text: OK, it's an early night. The bouncer looks unusually bright for a bouncer - see if you can get past him or if he needs convincing.
pln_nightclub_stage1_intro_a_01.loc_text: OK, it's an early night. The bouncer looks unusually bright for a bouncer - see if you can get past him or if he needs convincing.

pln_nightclub_stage1_intro_a_01b.base_text: Once you're in find the manager's office, find his safe, and clean it out.
pln_nightclub_stage1_intro_a_01b.loc_text: Once you're in find the manager's office, find his safe, and clean it out.

pln_nightclub_stage1_intro_a_02.base_text: I don't want you hanging around that club for too long. I don't trust this to be as easy as Vlad says. Hit the managers safe and get the hell out. If you get any phone numbers, I don't want to know.
pln_nightclub_stage1_intro_a_02.loc_text: I don't want you hanging around that club for too long. I don't trust this to be as easy as Vlad says. Hit the managers safe and get the hell out. If you get any phone numbers, I don't want to know.

pln_nightclub_stage1_intro_a_03.base_text: Vlad is probably right about the police being quick on the draw here. Get in and get out fast after you empty that manager's safe. And Wolf, stay off the dance floor.
pln_nightclub_stage1_intro_a_03.loc_text: Vlad is probably right about the police being quick on the draw here. Get in and get out fast after you empty that manager's safe. And Wolf, stay off the dance floor.

pln_nightclub_stage1_key_01_01.base_text: A security door? Damn. Well, one of the guards must have a key of his own!
pln_nightclub_stage1_key_01_01.loc_text: A security door? Damn. Well, one of the guards must have a key of his own!

pln_nightclub_stage1_key_01_02.base_text: Security door. Huh... Someone must have a key.
pln_nightclub_stage1_key_01_02.loc_text: Security door. Huh... Someone must have a key.

pln_nightclub_stage1_key_02_01.base_text: Have you found the key yet?
pln_nightclub_stage1_key_02_01.loc_text: Have you found the key yet?

pln_nightclub_stage1_pkp_01_01.base_text: The pick-up truck is gonna be here in a few seconds.
pln_nightclub_stage1_pkp_01_01.loc_text: The pick-up truck is gonna be here in a few seconds.

pln_nightclub_stage1_pkp_02_01.base_text: Throw the bags into the back of the pick-up truck. He's right below the right window.
pln_nightclub_stage1_pkp_02_01.loc_text: Throw the bags into the back of the pick-up truck. He's right below the right window.

pln_nightclub_stage1_pkp_03_01.base_text: As soon as you get the cash, I'm signalling the pick-up guy to come drive by.
pln_nightclub_stage1_pkp_03_01.loc_text: As soon as you get the cash, I'm signalling the pick-up guy to come drive by.

pln_nmh_01_01.base_text: OK, guys. Remember:  computer, blood sample, validation and then get the hell out by the elevator. Oh, and I hope you brought something to take out the security cameras with.
pln_nmh_01_01.loc_text: OK, guys. Remember:  computer, blood sample, validation and then get the hell out by the elevator. Oh, and I hope you brought something to take out the security cameras with.

pln_nmh_02_01.base_text: You'll have about seven seconds to take out the cameras before the alarm goes off.
pln_nmh_02_01.loc_text: You'll have about seven seconds to take out the cameras before the alarm goes off.

pln_nmh_04_01.base_text: Keep a look out for six cameras.
pln_nmh_04_01.loc_text: Keep a look out for six cameras.

pln_nmh_05_01.base_text: You got nine cameras to take care of.
pln_nmh_05_01.loc_text: You got nine cameras to take care of.

pln_nmh_06_01.base_text: I count twelve cameras to deal with.
pln_nmh_06_01.loc_text: I count twelve cameras to deal with.

pln_nmh_07_01.base_text: Not sure exactly how many cameras there are.
pln_nmh_07_01.loc_text: Not sure exactly how many cameras there are.

pln_nmh_08_01.base_text: Once you start, you'll only have a few seconds to take out all the cameras.
pln_nmh_08_01.loc_text: Once you start, you'll only have a few seconds to take out all the cameras.

pln_nmh_103_01.base_text: There goes another one... I can't...
pln_nmh_103_01.loc_text: There goes another one... I can't...

pln_nmh_104_01.base_text: Hang in there guys, you're almost there!
pln_nmh_104_01.loc_text: Hang in there guys, you're almost there!

pln_nmh_105_01.base_text: OK, Bile is on the roof. Get to him ASAP.
pln_nmh_105_01.loc_text: OK, Bile is on the roof. Get to him ASAP.

pln_nmh_106_01.base_text: Use a crowbar on that hatch to get to the roof.
pln_nmh_106_01.loc_text: Use a crowbar on that hatch to get to the roof.

pln_nmh_107_04.base_text: The cooler guys, don't leave what we came for!
pln_nmh_107_04.loc_text: The cooler guys, don't leave what we came for!

pln_nmh_108_01.base_text: It's on fire! The whole damn roof!
pln_nmh_108_01.loc_text: It's on fire! The whole damn roof!

pln_nmh_108_02.base_text: The elevator is burning. Stay away from the doors!
pln_nmh_108_02.loc_text: The elevator is burning. Stay away from the doors!

pln_nmh_109_01.base_text: Get out of that burning steel coffin, gang!
pln_nmh_109_01.loc_text: Get out of that burning steel coffin, gang!

pln_nmh_110_01.base_text: There's a hatch on the floor.
pln_nmh_110_01.loc_text: There's a hatch on the floor.

pln_nmh_111_01.base_text: Get the hell out before they find you!
pln_nmh_111_01.loc_text: Get the hell out before they find you!

pln_nmh_111_02.base_text: Guys, I can't read you. If you're still in there, GET OUT!
pln_nmh_111_02.loc_text: Guys, I can't read you. If you're still in there, GET OUT!

pln_nmh_112_01.base_text: Great, now down the ramp and get outside.
pln_nmh_112_01.loc_text: Great, now down the ramp and get outside.

pln_nmh_112_02.base_text: Ok, now just down the ramp and out.
pln_nmh_112_02.loc_text: Ok, now just down the ramp and out.

pln_nmh_113_01.base_text: Go! Get to the ladder before this place comes crashing down!
pln_nmh_113_01.loc_text: Go! Get to the ladder before this place comes crashing down!

pln_nmh_113_02.base_text: That place is gonna collapse. Climb outta there!
pln_nmh_113_02.loc_text: That place is gonna collapse. Climb outta there!

pln_nmh_113_03.base_text: Use the ladder guys, climb the hell out!
pln_nmh_113_03.loc_text: Use the ladder guys, climb the hell out!

pln_nmh_114_01.base_text: Sorry guys, Bile had to leave you for dead...
pln_nmh_114_01.loc_text: Sorry guys, Bile had to leave you for dead...

pln_nmh_114_02.base_text: Damn it guys, you've been left for dead by Bile. He's gonna get it later...
pln_nmh_114_02.loc_text: Damn it guys, you've been left for dead by Bile. He's gonna get it later...

pln_nmh_115_01.base_text: Whoa. Close one guys. How you feeling?
pln_nmh_115_01.loc_text: Whoa. Close one guys. How you feeling?

pln_nmh_115_02.base_text: Wow. That was a helluva thing. You all right? No missing limbs?
pln_nmh_115_02.loc_text: Wow. That was a helluva thing. You all right? No missing limbs?

pln_nmh_18_01.base_text: Ok, that takes care of the cameras.
pln_nmh_18_01.loc_text: Ok, that takes care of the cameras.

pln_nmh_19_01.base_text: Guys, keep out of that corridor.
pln_nmh_19_01.loc_text: Guys, keep out of that corridor.

pln_nmh_19_02.base_text: Can't go down that way, they'll hear you.
pln_nmh_19_02.loc_text: Can't go down that way, they'll hear you.

pln_nmh_20_01.base_text: Don't let any of the hostages run off and trigger the alarm, got it?
pln_nmh_20_01.loc_text: Don't let any of the hostages run off and trigger the alarm, got it?

pln_nmh_20_02.base_text: Now you just gotta make sure no one gets away and alerts the guards in the ICU.
pln_nmh_20_02.loc_text: Now you just gotta make sure no one gets away and alerts the guards in the ICU.

pln_nmh_21_01.base_text: There's a computer by the reception. Use it to open me an access point so I can locate the patient.
pln_nmh_21_01.loc_text: There's a computer by the reception. Use it to open me an access point so I can locate the patient.

pln_nmh_21_02.base_text: Hook me into the reception computer so that I can see where the doctors are keeping our target.
pln_nmh_21_02.loc_text: Hook me into the reception computer so that I can see where the doctors are keeping our target.

pln_nmh_22_01.base_text: Keep tabs on those hostages, they can still sound the alarm!
pln_nmh_22_01.loc_text: Keep tabs on those hostages, they can still sound the alarm!

pln_nmh_22_02.base_text: Don't let any hostage run off and trigger the alarm!
pln_nmh_22_02.loc_text: Don't let any hostage run off and trigger the alarm!

pln_nmh_23_01.base_text: Great, I'm in. Keep watching those hostages.
pln_nmh_23_01.loc_text: Great, I'm in. Keep watching those hostages.

pln_nmh_24_01.base_text: Keep the civilians away from the alarms.
pln_nmh_24_01.loc_text: Keep the civilians away from the alarms.

pln_nmh_24_02.base_text: Don't let any civilians get near the alarms!
pln_nmh_24_02.loc_text: Don't let any civilians get near the alarms!

pln_nmh_25_01.base_text: There goes the alarm. Guess we gotta do this the hard way.
pln_nmh_25_01.loc_text: There goes the alarm. Guess we gotta do this the hard way.

pln_nmh_25_02.base_text: Crap, someone got to the alarm. Alright, time for plan B.
pln_nmh_25_02.loc_text: Crap, someone got to the alarm. Alright, time for plan B.

pln_nmh_26_01.base_text: Don't kill any hostages! We want to do this low-key.
pln_nmh_26_01.loc_text: Don't kill any hostages! We want to do this low-key.

pln_nmh_26_02.base_text: No killing hostages, guys! You'll attract too much attention.
pln_nmh_26_02.loc_text: No killing hostages, guys! You'll attract too much attention.

pln_nmh_27_01.base_text: Damn, there's the alarm. They're on to us. Get the saw ready.
pln_nmh_27_01.loc_text: Damn, there's the alarm. They're on to us. Get the saw ready.

pln_nmh_27_02.base_text: Plan B guys. Go find the teddy bear, rip it open and use the saw inside to cut open the ICU doors.
pln_nmh_27_02.loc_text: Plan B guys. Go find the teddy bear, rip it open and use the saw inside to cut open the ICU doors.

pln_nmh_27_03.base_text: Go get the teddy bear from the reception, then take out the saw and set it up on the doors.
pln_nmh_27_03.loc_text: Go get the teddy bear from the reception, then take out the saw and set it up on the doors.

pln_nmh_28_01.base_text: How about next time we do it the quiet way?
pln_nmh_28_01.loc_text: How about next time we do it the quiet way?

pln_nmh_29_01.base_text: Answer the phone and put me through.
pln_nmh_29_01.loc_text: Answer the phone and put me through.

pln_nmh_29_02.base_text: Somebody, grab the phone and let me handle it.
pln_nmh_29_02.loc_text: Somebody, grab the phone and let me handle it.

pln_nmh_29_03.base_text: Pick up the phone and let me do the talking.
pln_nmh_29_03.loc_text: Pick up the phone and let me do the talking.

pln_nmh_30_01.base_text: Don't let it keep ringing, someone's gonna get suspicious!
pln_nmh_30_01.loc_text: Don't let it keep ringing, someone's gonna get suspicious!

pln_nmh_30_02.base_text: Pick up the phone and put me through.
pln_nmh_30_02.loc_text: Pick up the phone and put me through.

pln_nmh_30_03.base_text: Hurry up guys, answer the phone!
pln_nmh_30_03.loc_text: Hurry up guys, answer the phone!

pln_nmh_32_01.base_text: Mercy Hospital, please hold... Ok, now how can I help?
pln_nmh_32_01.loc_text: Mercy Hospital, please hold... Ok, now how can I help?

pln_nmh_32_02.base_text: Hi! Yes, what can I do for you?
pln_nmh_32_02.loc_text: Hi! Yes, what can I do for you?

pln_nmh_32_04.base_text: Hello, B-uhm... nurse Bain speaking. What do you need?
pln_nmh_32_04.loc_text: Hello, B-uhm... nurse Bain speaking. What do you need?

pln_nmh_32_05.base_text: Mercy Hospital, what do you want?
pln_nmh_32_05.loc_text: Mercy Hospital, what do you want?

pln_nmh_33_01.base_text: Uhm... didn't we solve this already?
pln_nmh_33_01.loc_text: Uhm... didn't we solve this already?

pln_nmh_33_02.base_text: Uhuh... uhuh... OK, sure. We'll have a look.
pln_nmh_33_02.loc_text: Uhuh... uhuh... OK, sure. We'll have a look.

pln_nmh_33_03.base_text: Yeah, no problem. Not much happening here.
pln_nmh_33_03.loc_text: Yeah, no problem. Not much happening here.

pln_nmh_33_05.base_text: Yeah, the uh... monitor here just broke. Made a lot of noise. Scared an old lady but the janitor took care of her.
pln_nmh_33_05.loc_text: Yeah, the uh... monitor here just broke. Made a lot of noise. Scared an old lady but the janitor took care of her.

pln_nmh_34_02.base_text: Easy enough. I got the next one too.
pln_nmh_34_02.loc_text: Easy enough. I got the next one too.

pln_nmh_35_03.base_text: They sounded convinced. We're in the clear for now.
pln_nmh_35_03.loc_text: They sounded convinced. We're in the clear for now.

pln_nmh_36_01.base_text: They might be onto us, so don't take too long.
pln_nmh_36_01.loc_text: They might be onto us, so don't take too long.

pln_nmh_36_03.base_text: Don't know if I can bluff them again, so let's get this done.
pln_nmh_36_03.loc_text: Don't know if I can bluff them again, so let's get this done.

pln_nmh_36_04.base_text: We might be made, so let's hurry up.
pln_nmh_36_04.loc_text: We might be made, so let's hurry up.

pln_nmh_36_05.base_text: Close one guys, better not take too long.
pln_nmh_36_05.loc_text: Close one guys, better not take too long.

pln_nmh_37_01.base_text: Guys, you got guards coming. Take them out before they find anything.
pln_nmh_37_01.loc_text: Guys, you got guards coming. Take them out before they find anything.

pln_nmh_38_01.base_text: You got to him in time, but someone's going to notice him missing eventually. Work quickly!
pln_nmh_38_01.loc_text: You got to him in time, but someone's going to notice him missing eventually. Work quickly!

pln_nmh_38a_01.base_text: There's someone in the elevator, keep a lookout.
pln_nmh_38a_01.loc_text: There's someone in the elevator, keep a lookout.

pln_nmh_39_01.base_text: Keep the elevator under watch, guys.
pln_nmh_39_01.loc_text: Keep the elevator under watch, guys.

pln_nmh_40_01.base_text: There's a repair man coming to check the cameras.
pln_nmh_40_01.loc_text: There's a repair man coming to check the cameras.

pln_nmh_41_01.base_text: Crap, there goes the alarm. Get the phone next time, damn it.
pln_nmh_41_01.loc_text: Crap, there goes the alarm. Get the phone next time, damn it.

pln_nmh_42_01.base_text: I've arranged a false pager for a first-year resident, but first you need to get hold of a patient file.
pln_nmh_42_01.loc_text: I've arranged a false pager for a first-year resident, but first you need to get hold of a patient file.

pln_nmh_43_01.base_text: You gotta find the patient file, guys.
pln_nmh_43_01.loc_text: You gotta find the patient file, guys.

pln_nmh_44_02.base_text: It's around there somewhere, check them all if you have to.
pln_nmh_44_02.loc_text: It's around there somewhere, check them all if you have to.

pln_nmh_44_03.base_text: It might've been misplaced- check everywhere!
pln_nmh_44_03.loc_text: It might've been misplaced- check everywhere!

pln_nmh_44_04.base_text: Hurry up guys! Get this done fast.
pln_nmh_44_04.loc_text: Hurry up guys! Get this done fast.

pln_nmh_44_06.base_text: You need to look faster gang. Time is running out.
pln_nmh_44_06.loc_text: You need to look faster gang. Time is running out.

pln_nmh_44_07.base_text: OK, where haven't you looked yet?
pln_nmh_44_07.loc_text: OK, where haven't you looked yet?

pln_nmh_45_01.base_text: Find the file for a "Mr A. Petersson".
pln_nmh_45_01.loc_text: Find the file for a "Mr A. Petersson".

pln_nmh_46_01.base_text: He's got some serious condition... and we need his blood.
pln_nmh_46_01.loc_text: He's got some serious condition... and we need his blood.

pln_nmh_47_01.base_text: I know you don't like it guys, but it's a huge payday, and that extra bonus item I need to get my hands on. It's worth not asking too many questions.
pln_nmh_47_01.loc_text: I know you don't like it guys, but it's a huge payday, and that extra bonus item I need to get my hands on. It's worth not asking too many questions.

pln_nmh_49_01.base_text: Ah, great. Now let's have a look.
pln_nmh_49_01.loc_text: Ah, great. Now let's have a look.

pln_nmh_50_01.base_text: It's always in the last place you look, right guys?
pln_nmh_50_01.loc_text: It's always in the last place you look, right guys?

pln_nmh_51_01.base_text: OK, that's the Petersson file. They got him isolated in the ICU and you gotta get to him. Time to play doctor, guys.
pln_nmh_51_01.loc_text: OK, that's the Petersson file. They got him isolated in the ICU and you gotta get to him. Time to play doctor, guys.

pln_nmh_52_01.base_text: Get some fake sentry guns up and running. It'll buy us some time and keep people in place.
pln_nmh_52_01.loc_text: Get some fake sentry guns up and running. It'll buy us some time and keep people in place.

pln_nmh_52_02.base_text: OK, gotta find a way to make sure none of the hostages does anything stupid. Set up the fake sentry guns.
pln_nmh_52_02.loc_text: OK, gotta find a way to make sure none of the hostages does anything stupid. Set up the fake sentry guns.

pln_nmh_53_02.base_text: You need to set up fake sentry guns.
pln_nmh_53_02.loc_text: You need to set up fake sentry guns.

pln_nmh_53_03.base_text: Got those sentry guns set up yet?
pln_nmh_53_03.loc_text: Got those sentry guns set up yet?

pln_nmh_54_01.base_text: Good job, now let's get you into some scrubs.
pln_nmh_54_01.loc_text: Good job, now let's get you into some scrubs.

pln_nmh_54_02.base_text: There you go, nice work. Time for a change of threads. You're gonna need scrubs.
pln_nmh_54_02.loc_text: There you go, nice work. Time for a change of threads. You're gonna need scrubs.

pln_nmh_55_01.base_text: There's a locker room by the reception. Get there and get into some scrubs.
pln_nmh_55_01.loc_text: There's a locker room by the reception. Get there and get into some scrubs.

pln_nmh_56_02.base_text: Get to that locker room and put those scrubs on.
pln_nmh_56_02.loc_text: Get to that locker room and put those scrubs on.

pln_nmh_57_01.base_text: Now get to the ICU. Find and listen to Dr. Schneider, the patient we're looking for should have blood poisoning and an abnormal heart rate.
pln_nmh_57_01.loc_text: Now get to the ICU. Find and listen to Dr. Schneider, the patient we're looking for should have blood poisoning and an abnormal heart rate.

pln_nmh_58_01.base_text: You gotta listen to the diagnosis of each patient so you can find out target.
pln_nmh_58_01.loc_text: You gotta listen to the diagnosis of each patient so you can find out target.

pln_nmh_58_03.base_text: Remember: blood poisoning and abnormal heart rate. Listen to Schneider.
pln_nmh_58_03.loc_text: Remember: blood poisoning and abnormal heart rate. Listen to Schneider.

pln_nmh_59_01.base_text: What're you doing, shooting up the place! They're gonna lock it down, now!
pln_nmh_59_01.loc_text: What're you doing, shooting up the place! They're gonna lock it down, now!

pln_nmh_59_02.base_text: Stop screwing around, guys! Now you gotta grind through metal doors for ages.
pln_nmh_59_02.loc_text: Stop screwing around, guys! Now you gotta grind through metal doors for ages.

pln_nmh_59_03.base_text: Control yourselves! You'll end up chewing through metal until next week!
pln_nmh_59_03.loc_text: Control yourselves! You'll end up chewing through metal until next week!

pln_nmh_60_01.base_text: Good, that's a security door stopped. See if our patient is inside.
pln_nmh_60_01.loc_text: Good, that's a security door stopped. See if our patient is inside.

pln_nmh_60_02.base_text: Door to the ICU is open, get in there and find that patient.
pln_nmh_60_02.loc_text: Door to the ICU is open, get in there and find that patient.

pln_nmh_61_01.base_text: If that's the wrong room, we'll have to cut the other doors with a saw. We gotta get that blood sample...
pln_nmh_61_01.loc_text: If that's the wrong room, we'll have to cut the other doors with a saw. We gotta get that blood sample...

pln_nmh_62_01.base_text: Crack them open one at a time, and watch out for cops.
pln_nmh_62_01.loc_text: Crack them open one at a time, and watch out for cops.

pln_nmh_62_02.base_text: Do them one by one, and keep the cops away.
pln_nmh_62_02.loc_text: Do them one by one, and keep the cops away.

pln_nmh_63_01.base_text: The saw is through, so get in there and check the patient.
pln_nmh_63_01.loc_text: The saw is through, so get in there and check the patient.

pln_nmh_63_02.base_text: OK, it's done. Go have a look at the patient.
pln_nmh_63_02.loc_text: OK, it's done. Go have a look at the patient.

pln_nmh_64_01.base_text: You'll know if it's the right guy, 'cause he has a tattoo on his neck.
pln_nmh_64_01.loc_text: You'll know if it's the right guy, 'cause he has a tattoo on his neck.

pln_nmh_64_02.base_text: Our patient should have a tattoo on his neck.
pln_nmh_64_02.loc_text: Our patient should have a tattoo on his neck.

pln_nmh_65_01.base_text: Great, that's the guy. Start getting blood samples. We gotta validate them before you leave.
pln_nmh_65_01.loc_text: Great, that's the guy. Start getting blood samples. We gotta validate them before you leave.

pln_nmh_65_02.base_text: Ok, now get a blood sample from the target.
pln_nmh_65_02.loc_text: Ok, now get a blood sample from the target.

pln_nmh_65_03.base_text: There you go, that's him. Start drawing some blood.
pln_nmh_65_03.loc_text: There you go, that's him. Start drawing some blood.

pln_nmh_67_01.base_text: There are centrifuges all around there. Use them to start validating blood samples.
pln_nmh_67_01.loc_text: There are centrifuges all around there. Use them to start validating blood samples.

pln_nmh_68_01.base_text: We need a viral concentration of 65% or more.
pln_nmh_68_01.loc_text: We need a viral concentration of 65% or more.

pln_nmh_69_01.base_text: We're gonna need two vials. If one of them fails the test, you gotta get more blood and start again.
pln_nmh_69_01.loc_text: We're gonna need two vials. If one of them fails the test, you gotta get more blood and start again.

pln_nmh_70_03.base_text: Get to a centrifuge and test that sample.
pln_nmh_70_03.loc_text: Get to a centrifuge and test that sample.

pln_nmh_71_01.base_text: That sample didn't cut it. You'll have to get another one, guys.
pln_nmh_71_01.loc_text: That sample didn't cut it. You'll have to get another one, guys.

pln_nmh_71_02.base_text: The concentration in that sample wasn't even close. You need to go again.
pln_nmh_71_02.loc_text: The concentration in that sample wasn't even close. You need to go again.

pln_nmh_71_03.base_text: Crap, not good enough. Get another one.
pln_nmh_71_03.loc_text: Crap, not good enough. Get another one.

pln_nmh_71_04.base_text: Still not enough, you need to take another sample.
pln_nmh_71_04.loc_text: Still not enough, you need to take another sample.

pln_nmh_72_01.base_text: Did you just break a vial? Don't get that stuff on you!
pln_nmh_72_01.loc_text: Did you just break a vial? Don't get that stuff on you!

pln_nmh_72_02.base_text: Was that a vial breaking? Don't touch the blood!
pln_nmh_72_02.loc_text: Was that a vial breaking? Don't touch the blood!

pln_nmh_72_03.base_text: Crap, you just lost a vial.
pln_nmh_72_03.loc_text: Crap, you just lost a vial.

pln_nmh_72_05.base_text: Vials break when they hit the floor, you know...
pln_nmh_72_05.loc_text: Vials break when they hit the floor, you know...

pln_nmh_73_01.base_text: Careful guys. If you go down carrying one of those things, you might break it.
pln_nmh_73_01.loc_text: Careful guys. If you go down carrying one of those things, you might break it.

pln_nmh_73_02.base_text: Don't go down while carrying blood samples guys, they're likely to break.
pln_nmh_73_02.loc_text: Don't go down while carrying blood samples guys, they're likely to break.

pln_nmh_73_03.base_text: Stay on your feet guys. Getting downed will probably break the vials!
pln_nmh_73_03.loc_text: Stay on your feet guys. Getting downed will probably break the vials!

pln_nmh_74_01.base_text: You need two samples. Go get 'em.
pln_nmh_74_01.loc_text: You need two samples. Go get 'em.

pln_nmh_74_02.base_text: You need to draw some blood from the patient.
pln_nmh_74_02.loc_text: You need to draw some blood from the patient.

pln_nmh_74_03.base_text: You afraid of needles or something? Stick him!
pln_nmh_74_03.loc_text: You afraid of needles or something? Stick him!

pln_nmh_75_01.base_text: Might as well call the elevator. One more sample and you can get out of there!
pln_nmh_75_01.loc_text: Might as well call the elevator. One more sample and you can get out of there!

pln_nmh_77_01.base_text: Great, now you just gotta hold out 'till it gets there.
pln_nmh_77_01.loc_text: Great, now you just gotta hold out 'till it gets there.

pln_nmh_78_01.base_text: Damn thing keeps stopping. I gotta override the system. It'll be a while until it reaches you.
pln_nmh_78_01.loc_text: Damn thing keeps stopping. I gotta override the system. It'll be a while until it reaches you.

pln_nmh_79_01.base_text: Maybe... two minutes. IF I don't get interrupted.
pln_nmh_79_01.loc_text: Maybe... two minutes. IF I don't get interrupted.

pln_nmh_80_01.base_text: This is weird guys. The boards are lighting up like crazy. Something's wrong... I think we have major trouble coming. Damn it, I knew this was shady.
pln_nmh_80_01.loc_text: This is weird guys. The boards are lighting up like crazy. Something's wrong... I think we have major trouble coming. Damn it, I knew this was shady.

pln_nmh_80_02.base_text: Guys, I'm getting a bad feeling here. Military-industrial com channels are going like crazy. Looks like we caught some nasty attention.
pln_nmh_80_02.loc_text: Guys, I'm getting a bad feeling here. Military-industrial com channels are going like crazy. Looks like we caught some nasty attention.

pln_nmh_80_03.base_text: Crap guys, the backwater radio chatter is heating up like a mother. Someone is VERY interested in what we're doing. Be ready for major trouble.
pln_nmh_80_03.loc_text: Crap guys, the backwater radio chatter is heating up like a mother. Someone is VERY interested in what we're doing. Be ready for major trouble.

pln_nmh_81_01.base_text: They must have cut the main power, you need to get it back up ASAP!
pln_nmh_81_01.loc_text: They must have cut the main power, you need to get it back up ASAP!

pln_nmh_81_02.base_text: They cut the power, get it back up! Fast! The elevator won't move otherwise.
pln_nmh_81_02.loc_text: They cut the power, get it back up! Fast! The elevator won't move otherwise.

pln_nmh_81_03.base_text: Crap, they're fast. Get the power back on!
pln_nmh_81_03.loc_text: Crap, they're fast. Get the power back on!

pln_nmh_81_04.base_text: They cut the power, get it back up!
pln_nmh_81_04.loc_text: They cut the power, get it back up!

pln_nmh_81_05.base_text: Bastards cut the power. You gotta get it back.
pln_nmh_81_05.loc_text: Bastards cut the power. You gotta get it back.

pln_nmh_82_01.base_text: Elevator aint' going nowhere until you get the power back on.
pln_nmh_82_01.loc_text: Elevator aint' going nowhere until you get the power back on.

pln_nmh_82_02.base_text: You need to get the elevator going again. Restore the power.
pln_nmh_82_02.loc_text: You need to get the elevator going again. Restore the power.

pln_nmh_82_03.base_text: C'mon guys, get that juice flowing again.
pln_nmh_82_03.loc_text: C'mon guys, get that juice flowing again.

pln_nmh_83_01.base_text: Great, nicely done. Now keep moving.
pln_nmh_83_01.loc_text: Great, nicely done. Now keep moving.

pln_nmh_83_02.base_text: Power is back, great. Now don't stop.
pln_nmh_83_02.loc_text: Power is back, great. Now don't stop.

pln_nmh_84_01.base_text: They cut the power again, get it back!
pln_nmh_84_01.loc_text: They cut the power again, get it back!

pln_nmh_84_02.base_text: Another power loss!  Switch it back on!
pln_nmh_84_02.loc_text: Another power loss!  Switch it back on!

pln_nmh_85_01.base_text: There you go. Wait... now I'm getting something about air support? What the hell...
pln_nmh_85_01.loc_text: There you go. Wait... now I'm getting something about air support? What the hell...

pln_nmh_85_02.base_text: OK, good. Now... wait a sec... guys... they're talking about sending in air support! You gotta hurry...!
pln_nmh_85_02.loc_text: OK, good. Now... wait a sec... guys... they're talking about sending in air support! You gotta hurry...!

pln_nmh_86_01.base_text: I had a contact hide a cooler in the elevator for us. Drop the vials in there!
pln_nmh_86_01.loc_text: I had a contact hide a cooler in the elevator for us. Drop the vials in there!

pln_nmh_87_01.base_text: As soon as we got two vials in the cooler, you're ready to bail.
pln_nmh_87_01.loc_text: As soon as we got two vials in the cooler, you're ready to bail.

pln_nmh_87_02.base_text: Put two vials in the cooler so you can leave.
pln_nmh_87_02.loc_text: Put two vials in the cooler so you can leave.

pln_nmh_87_03.base_text: Get the vials into the cooler guys. Both of them. Then you get the hell out.
pln_nmh_87_03.loc_text: Get the vials into the cooler guys. Both of them. Then you get the hell out.

pln_nmh_88_01.base_text: You gotta get more blood into that cooler, guys.
pln_nmh_88_01.loc_text: You gotta get more blood into that cooler, guys.

pln_nmh_88_02.base_text: One more sample in the cooler before you can leave.
pln_nmh_88_02.loc_text: One more sample in the cooler before you can leave.

pln_nmh_88_03.base_text: We're contracted for two samples, so get another one in there!
pln_nmh_88_03.loc_text: We're contracted for two samples, so get another one in there!

pln_nmh_88_04.base_text: We can leave one you've got two samples in the cooler.
pln_nmh_88_04.loc_text: We can leave one you've got two samples in the cooler.

pln_nmh_89_01.base_text: Great, that's enough. Now get in the elevator. You gotta get the hell out of there!
pln_nmh_89_01.loc_text: Great, that's enough. Now get in the elevator. You gotta get the hell out of there!

pln_nmh_90_01.base_text: That's the elevator. Let's go, people! You got military units gathering in the parking lot!
pln_nmh_90_01.loc_text: That's the elevator. Let's go, people! You got military units gathering in the parking lot!

pln_nmh_90_02.base_text: This is crazy, the hospital is surrounded. Looks like private military... mercenaries. You gotta go... NOW.
pln_nmh_90_02.loc_text: This is crazy, the hospital is surrounded. Looks like private military... mercenaries. You gotta go... NOW.

pln_nmh_90_03.base_text: Crap. You got merc units surrounding the building. Don't recognise the logo... looks like a... shark?
pln_nmh_90_03.loc_text: Crap. You got merc units surrounding the building. Don't recognise the logo... looks like a... shark?

pln_nmh_91_01.base_text: Get going or you're gonna be be left for dead!
pln_nmh_91_01.loc_text: Get going or you're gonna be be left for dead!

pln_nmh_91_02.base_text: Get to the roof and I'll send the chopper to pick you up!
pln_nmh_91_02.loc_text: Get to the roof and I'll send the chopper to pick you up!

pln_nmh_91_03.base_text: Come on guys, get to the roof so Bile can pick you up!
pln_nmh_91_03.loc_text: Come on guys, get to the roof so Bile can pick you up!

pln_nmh_92_01.base_text: You guys forget how an elevator works? Push the button!
pln_nmh_92_01.loc_text: You guys forget how an elevator works? Push the button!

pln_nmh_92_03.base_text: Come on guys, express elevator... going up as soon as you push the button.
pln_nmh_92_03.loc_text: Come on guys, express elevator... going up as soon as you push the button.

pln_nmh_92_04.base_text: Hop in the elevator guys, then get your asses to the roof!
pln_nmh_92_04.loc_text: Hop in the elevator guys, then get your asses to the roof!

pln_nmh_93_01.base_text: Awesome. Now just sit tight for 30 floors...
pln_nmh_93_01.loc_text: Awesome. Now just sit tight for 30 floors...

pln_nmh_94_01.base_text: That's strange... merc units are pulling out.
pln_nmh_94_01.loc_text: That's strange... merc units are pulling out.

pln_nmh_95_01.base_text: What the hell... you're not gonna ... other air units in the area.
pln_nmh_95_01.loc_text: What the hell... you're not gonna ... other air units in the area.

pln_nmh_96_01.base_text: Guys, they're trying to jam the comms. Bile is on the way but he's gotta be careful.
pln_nmh_96_01.loc_text: Guys, they're trying to jam the comms. Bile is on the way but he's gotta be careful.

pln_nmh_97_01.base_text: Shit guys! They got an aircraft launching rockets!
pln_nmh_97_01.loc_text: Shit guys! They got an aircraft launching rockets!

pln_nmh_98_01.base_text: They're crazy! Shooting up the building with missiles! What the hell is this?!
pln_nmh_98_01.loc_text: They're crazy! Shooting up the building with missiles! What the hell is this?!

pln_nmh_99_01.base_text: Guys!... Guys! You still there?! Get... -out!
pln_nmh_99_01.loc_text: Guys!... Guys! You still there?! Get... -out!

pln_nmh_brf_01.base_text: Our client needs a blood sample from a patient being kept in the isolation ward of Mercy Hostpital. You gotta go in there, take out the surveillance, subdue the civilians and get me into the patient database so I can ID the guy. With the low security in this place, it should be a nice, clean job. I'll get you out via the roof when you're done. This job is a little shady, brokered through a third party- got some serious shadow-company military industrial vibes, but worth the risk. The payday is something we're gonna need in the future, plus a nice cash bonus.
pln_nmh_brf_01.loc_text: Our client needs a blood sample from a patient being kept in the isolation ward of Mercy Hostpital. You gotta go in there, take out the surveillance, subdue the civilians and get me into the patient database so I can ID the guy. With the low security in this place, it should be a nice, clean job. I'll get you out via the roof when you're done. This job is a little shady, brokered through a third party- got some serious shadow-company military industrial vibes, but worth the risk. The payday is something we're gonna need in the future, plus a nice cash bonus.

pln_nmh_cnc_03.base_text: Time to get those tonsils checked guys. We're going to Mercy Hospital.
pln_nmh_cnc_03.loc_text: Time to get those tonsils checked guys. We're going to Mercy Hospital.

pln_nmh_end_fail_01.base_text: That was one messed up job.
pln_nmh_end_fail_01.loc_text: That was one messed up job.

pln_nmh_end_win_01.base_text: Yeah. That didn't really go according to plan, did it? But we still got the job done and I'm gonna unload the merchandise right away. As soon as we get our payday, I'm cutting ties with the idiot that got us this job. Need to find out what the hell happened and who those mercs were. Got a feeling this job is gonna come back from the dead to haunt us.
pln_nmh_end_win_01.loc_text: Yeah. That didn't really go according to plan, did it? But we still got the job done and I'm gonna unload the merchandise right away. As soon as we get our payday, I'm cutting ties with the idiot that got us this job. Need to find out what the hell happened and who those mercs were. Got a feeling this job is gonna come back from the dead to haunt us.

pln_pal_01_01.base_text: We're here for the plates. They've been printing fortunes over the last months, spending wildly. Blood's in the water and we're the sharks!
pln_pal_01_01.loc_text: We're here for the plates. They've been printing fortunes over the last months, spending wildly. Blood's in the water and we're the sharks!

pln_pal_01_02.base_text: Guys, we're after the counterfeit money plates. Supposed to be stashed in the basement. Get friendly with Mitchell and get them.
pln_pal_01_02.loc_text: Guys, we're after the counterfeit money plates. Supposed to be stashed in the basement. Get friendly with Mitchell and get them.

pln_pal_01_03.base_text: Okay, we got a free lunch here. These guys are printing money in the basement. We're going to relieve them of their plates. If we sell it to the right party we're good for millions!
pln_pal_01_03.loc_text: Okay, we got a free lunch here. These guys are printing money in the basement. We're going to relieve them of their plates. If we sell it to the right party we're good for millions!

pln_pal_02_02.base_text: The leak willl be in the basement. See Mitchell about it.
pln_pal_02_02.loc_text: The leak willl be in the basement. See Mitchell about it.

pln_pal_02_03.base_text: Mitchell's the one in the pink shirt.
pln_pal_02_03.loc_text: Mitchell's the one in the pink shirt.

pln_pal_02_04.base_text: Get in there. Meet up with Mitchell.
pln_pal_02_04.loc_text: Get in there. Meet up with Mitchell.

pln_pal_02_05.base_text: Mitchell's by the pool. Introduce yourselves.
pln_pal_02_05.loc_text: Mitchell's by the pool. Introduce yourselves.

pln_pal_02_06.base_text: Ok, find Mitchell. He's our guy.
pln_pal_02_06.loc_text: Ok, find Mitchell. He's our guy.

pln_pal_03_02.base_text: He's by the barbecue. Get over to him.
pln_pal_03_02.loc_text: He's by the barbecue. Get over to him.

pln_pal_03_03.base_text: Okay, that's him at the barbecue.
pln_pal_03_03.loc_text: Okay, that's him at the barbecue.

pln_pal_03_04.base_text: By the barbecue. That's our man.
pln_pal_03_04.loc_text: By the barbecue. That's our man.

pln_pal_04_01.base_text: OK, keep hidden from the neighbours view people. Let's not have anyone call the boys in blue.
pln_pal_04_01.loc_text: OK, keep hidden from the neighbours view people. Let's not have anyone call the boys in blue.

pln_pal_04_03.base_text: All right. Try and keep out of sight. It's all about control.
pln_pal_04_03.loc_text: All right. Try and keep out of sight. It's all about control.

pln_pal_04_04.base_text: Keep things cool. Don't give the nosey neighbours something to talk about.
pln_pal_04_04.loc_text: Keep things cool. Don't give the nosey neighbours something to talk about.

pln_pal_04_05.base_text: Okay gang. Watch your step. The neighbours will have the cops on speed-dial.
pln_pal_04_05.loc_text: Okay gang. Watch your step. The neighbours will have the cops on speed-dial.

pln_pal_05_01.base_text: The cops have sent an patrol to investigate. They'll be here soon.
pln_pal_05_01.loc_text: The cops have sent an patrol to investigate. They'll be here soon.

pln_pal_05_02.base_text: Someone must've seen something 'cause the police are sending a couple of officers to check out the address.
pln_pal_05_02.loc_text: Someone must've seen something 'cause the police are sending a couple of officers to check out the address.

pln_pal_05_03.base_text: Just picked up a call to a cop patrol. They've been asked to make sure everything's okay. They're on their way.
pln_pal_05_03.loc_text: Just picked up a call to a cop patrol. They've been asked to make sure everything's okay. They're on their way.

pln_pal_05_04.base_text: Someone must've got suspicious. Cops are on their way to check things out.
pln_pal_05_04.loc_text: Someone must've got suspicious. Cops are on their way to check things out.

pln_pal_05_05.base_text: I guess a neighbour saw something. We got cops on the way to check things out.
pln_pal_05_05.loc_text: I guess a neighbour saw something. We got cops on the way to check things out.

pln_pal_06_01.base_text: That's the door, and there's the code lock. See if you can override the system.
pln_pal_06_01.loc_text: That's the door, and there's the code lock. See if you can override the system.

pln_pal_06_02.base_text: Be quick now. It's got two code locks. You need code breakers on both. And stay hidden!
pln_pal_06_02.loc_text: Be quick now. It's got two code locks. You need code breakers on both. And stay hidden!

pln_pal_06_03.base_text: A white MESA box, just as planned. Get the code breakers going on the locks.
pln_pal_06_03.loc_text: A white MESA box, just as planned. Get the code breakers going on the locks.

pln_pal_06_04.base_text: Alright, there's the door and there's the first lock. Get the codebreakers working.
pln_pal_06_04.loc_text: Alright, there's the door and there's the first lock. Get the codebreakers working.

pln_pal_06_05.base_text: Hook the code breakers up, gang. Two locks - get 'em both.
pln_pal_06_05.loc_text: Hook the code breakers up, gang. Two locks - get 'em both.

pln_pal_07_01.base_text: Get a code breaker on that lock, too.
pln_pal_07_01.loc_text: Get a code breaker on that lock, too.

pln_pal_07_02.base_text: OK, no time to lose. Start the codebreaker!
pln_pal_07_02.loc_text: OK, no time to lose. Start the codebreaker!

pln_pal_07_03.base_text: That's the second lock. Get the codebreaker on it too.
pln_pal_07_03.loc_text: That's the second lock. Get the codebreaker on it too.

pln_pal_08_01.base_text: Good work, but these guys are clever. The doors are linked so no one can enter the shelter unless the other one is in on it. You need to override Wilson's system too.
pln_pal_08_01.loc_text: Good work, but these guys are clever. The doors are linked so no one can enter the shelter unless the other one is in on it. You need to override Wilson's system too.

pln_pal_08_02.base_text: All right. Good. But the door's got two locks - one for Mitchell, one for Wilson. You'll need a codebreaker on the second lock.
pln_pal_08_02.loc_text: All right. Good. But the door's got two locks - one for Mitchell, one for Wilson. You'll need a codebreaker on the second lock.

pln_pal_08_03.base_text: Okay, looks like they have two linked locks on this. Find the other lock and get a breaker on it too.
pln_pal_08_03.loc_text: Okay, looks like they have two linked locks on this. Find the other lock and get a breaker on it too.

pln_pal_08a_01.base_text: Ok, now find Wilson's code lock.
pln_pal_08a_01.loc_text: Ok, now find Wilson's code lock.

pln_pal_08a_02.base_text: Now do the same to the second code lock.
pln_pal_08a_02.loc_text: Now do the same to the second code lock.

pln_pal_08a_03.base_text: Good. Now get a breaker on the second code lock.
pln_pal_08a_03.loc_text: Good. Now get a breaker on the second code lock.

pln_pal_09_01.base_text: Dammit, the cops disabled the hacking device! You need to reboot it!
pln_pal_09_01.loc_text: Dammit, the cops disabled the hacking device! You need to reboot it!

pln_pal_09_02.base_text: Don't let the cops reach the hacking device! Now you're gonna have to reboot it.
pln_pal_09_02.loc_text: Don't let the cops reach the hacking device! Now you're gonna have to reboot it.

pln_pal_10_01.base_text: Ok, make sure the codebreaker doesn't stall, they got a pretty secure system here. Guess you just can't be too careful these days
pln_pal_10_01.loc_text: Ok, make sure the codebreaker doesn't stall, they got a pretty secure system here. Guess you just can't be too careful these days

pln_pal_10_02.base_text: These code breakers can fall over sometimes. Stay with 'em till they do their thing.
pln_pal_10_02.loc_text: These code breakers can fall over sometimes. Stay with 'em till they do their thing.

pln_pal_10_03.base_text: The code breakers are pretty old. Prone to crashing. Don't go too far from them.
pln_pal_10_03.loc_text: The code breakers are pretty old. Prone to crashing. Don't go too far from them.

pln_pal_11_01.base_text: Ok, the cops are here to investigate. If you let them inside the house and take 'em out quietly, we'll remain under the radar.
pln_pal_11_01.loc_text: Ok, the cops are here to investigate. If you let them inside the house and take 'em out quietly, we'll remain under the radar.

pln_pal_11_02.base_text: Okay, here comes the cops to investigate. They're just checking things out, so if you can deal with 'em quietly...
pln_pal_11_02.loc_text: Okay, here comes the cops to investigate. They're just checking things out, so if you can deal with 'em quietly...

pln_pal_11_03.base_text: The cops are here to check things out. Take 'em out quietly, and we can still finish this without raising southern hell.
pln_pal_11_03.loc_text: The cops are here to check things out. Take 'em out quietly, and we can still finish this without raising southern hell.

pln_pal_12_01.base_text: Keep going guys - no one's seen you yet.
pln_pal_12_01.loc_text: Keep going guys - no one's seen you yet.

pln_pal_12_03.base_text: Well done, still calm and no alarms.

pln_pal_14_01.loc_text: Pick up the phone or they'll know something is off.

pln_pal_14_02.base_text: All right. Damn. Look, just pick up the phone. Let's wing this.

pln_pal_17_01.base_text: Who fired? You guys are made now. Go to plan B!
pln_pal_17_01.loc_text: Who fired? You guys are made now. Go to plan B!

pln_pal_17_02.base_text: Their neighborhood surely heard that gunshot!
pln_pal_17_02.loc_text: Their neighborhood surely heard that gunshot!

pln_pal_17_03.base_text: Whose shooting?! Someone must've heard that.
pln_pal_17_03.loc_text: Whose shooting?! Someone must've heard that.

pln_pal_18_03.base_text: Damn, I'm sure some nosy curtain twitcher heard that!

pln_pal_19_01.loc_text: Don't go near the neighbours houses.

pln_pal_19_03.loc_text: Don't let the neighbors see you.

pln_pal_21_03.loc_text: Okay, cop switchboard lit up. Think someone must've caught sight of you. Get ready!
