pln_pal_22_02.loc_text: Looks like those patrolmen have been missed. We got responders coming in force. Get ready!

pln_pal_22_03.base_text: Damn. Those patrol men? Looks like they're buddies are coming to find them. Coming in force!
pln_pal_22_03.loc_text: Damn. Those patrol men? Looks like they're buddies are coming to find them. Coming in force!

pln_pal_23_01.base_text: You guys are made now, go to plan B!

pln_pal_29_01.base_text: Apparently that's a Franz Jaeger Safe. That lock cannot be drilled, and the entire safe is heavily reinforced. I ran into one of those back in the days. We filled the safe with water and detonated a bit of C4 inside. The water pressure just threw the door open without damaging any of the content inside the safe.
pln_pal_29_01.loc_text: Apparently that's a Franz Jaeger Safe. That lock cannot be drilled, and the entire safe is heavily reinforced. I ran into one of those back in the days. We filled the safe with water and detonated a bit of C4 inside. The water pressure just threw the door open without damaging any of the content inside the safe.

pln_pal_29_02.base_text: Hey, that's a Franz-Jaeger Safe. This is unexpected. Well, only one way to crack it with the time we got. Water pressure!
pln_pal_29_02.loc_text: Hey, that's a Franz-Jaeger Safe. This is unexpected. Well, only one way to crack it with the time we got. Water pressure!

pln_pal_29_03.base_text: Man, these boys got themselves a Franz-Jaeger safe. Wasn't expecting that! Okay....well, with what we got there's only one way we're cracking that - water!
pln_pal_29_03.loc_text: Man, these boys got themselves a Franz-Jaeger safe. Wasn't expecting that! Okay....well, with what we got there's only one way we're cracking that - water!

pln_pal_30_01.base_text: So the plan is this, drill a hole through the top of the safe, get a garden hose to fill the safe with water and drop some C4 inside. After that you take what's inside the safe and escape. Let's roll.
pln_pal_30_01.loc_text: So the plan is this, drill a hole through the top of the safe, get a garden hose to fill the safe with water and drop some C4 inside. After that you take what's inside the safe and escape. Let's roll.

pln_pal_30_02.loc_text: So, here's the plan. Get a hose down the hole from up top, and blow a pack of C4 inside the water filled safe. After that, grab the loot and get out of there.

pln_pal_59a_02.loc_text: Remember - the explosion may have scattered the loot across the floor.

pln_pal_60_02.base_text: You got it. Now get it out - safely!
pln_pal_60_02.loc_text: You got it. Now get it out - safely!

pln_pal_60_03.base_text: That's it! Now get it out and we can close this caper!
pln_pal_60_03.loc_text: That's it! Now get it out and we can close this caper!

pln_pal_61_01.base_text: Gang, you see those plates? I don't want to be greedy; or yes I do, actually. Why not stick around just a bit and try that printer out?
pln_pal_61_01.loc_text: Gang, you see those plates? I don't want to be greedy; or yes I do, actually. Why not stick around just a bit and try that printer out?

pln_pal_62_01.base_text: You see that sweet money printer under the pool? I'm sure we can use it to gain an extra mountain of cash! Get it working.
pln_pal_62_01.loc_text: You see that sweet money printer under the pool? I'm sure we can use it to gain an extra mountain of cash! Get it working.

pln_pal_62_02.base_text: Hey, you know...there's a printer there. Why don't we make a little extra spending cash while we're here.
pln_pal_62_02.loc_text: Hey, you know...there's a printer there. Why don't we make a little extra spending cash while we're here.

pln_pal_62_03.base_text: Guys, check out the printing press. Whaddya say we make a little extra cash while we're here...literally make it!
pln_pal_62_03.loc_text: Guys, check out the printing press. Whaddya say we make a little extra cash while we're here...literally make it!

pln_pal_63_01.base_text: You are looking for blank paper rolls and ink. Grab both and feed it to the printing machine.
pln_pal_63_01.loc_text: You are looking for blank paper rolls and ink. Grab both and feed it to the printing machine.

pln_pal_63_02.base_text: Okay, so we need paper and ink. Get them going in the press.
pln_pal_63_02.loc_text: Okay, so we need paper and ink. Get them going in the press.

pln_pal_63_03.base_text: All that printing press needs is paper and ink. Cha-ching! Instant cash!
pln_pal_63_03.loc_text: All that printing press needs is paper and ink. Cha-ching! Instant cash!

pln_pal_64_01.base_text: Guys, the printer is out of paper! Fill her up!
pln_pal_64_01.loc_text: Guys, the printer is out of paper! Fill her up!

pln_pal_65_01.base_text: Dammit, the ink seems to have run out! Replace it!
pln_pal_65_01.loc_text: Dammit, the ink seems to have run out! Replace it!

pln_pal_66_01.base_text: Alright, good. That should do it for a while. Try starting her up again.
pln_pal_66_01.loc_text: Alright, good. That should do it for a while. Try starting her up again.

pln_pal_67_01.base_text: Cops shut of the power, go to the box in the street .
pln_pal_67_01.loc_text: Cops shut of the power, go to the box in the street .

pln_pal_67_02.base_text: The cops shut off the power, turn it back on!
pln_pal_67_02.loc_text: The cops shut off the power, turn it back on!

pln_pal_67_03.base_text: Cops cut the power. Get on the street and turn it back on!
pln_pal_67_03.loc_text: Cops cut the power. Get on the street and turn it back on!

pln_pal_68_01.base_text: The cops shut you down. You gotta find the electricity box.
pln_pal_68_01.loc_text: The cops shut you down. You gotta find the electricity box.

pln_pal_68_02.base_text: Cops cut the power, you gotta find the electricity box and turn it back on.
pln_pal_68_02.loc_text: Cops cut the power, you gotta find the electricity box and turn it back on.

pln_pal_68_03.base_text: Ah, no - the cops cut the power. Find a circuit box inside the buildings and turn it back on.
pln_pal_68_03.loc_text: Ah, no - the cops cut the power. Find a circuit box inside the buildings and turn it back on.

pln_pal_69_01.base_text: You need to get the power back up.
pln_pal_69_01.loc_text: You need to get the power back up.

pln_pal_70_01.base_text: Okay, the electricity is back, now just start the printer again
pln_pal_70_01.loc_text: Okay, the electricity is back, now just start the printer again

pln_pal_70_02.base_text: Ok, power's back - restart the printer!
pln_pal_70_02.loc_text: Ok, power's back - restart the printer!

pln_pal_71_01.base_text: Awesome, it's printing away nice and steady again.
pln_pal_71_01.loc_text: Awesome, it's printing away nice and steady again.

pln_pal_72_01.base_text: Great, now start the money maker.
pln_pal_72_01.loc_text: Great, now start the money maker.

pln_pal_72_02.base_text: Both ink and paper roll are in. Now start it up!
pln_pal_72_02.loc_text: Both ink and paper roll are in. Now start it up!

pln_pal_72_03.base_text: That's paper, that's ink - now just power it up and we're in the dollars.
pln_pal_72_03.loc_text: That's paper, that's ink - now just power it up and we're in the dollars.

pln_pal_73_01.base_text: Grab the counterfeit and do another load or take what we have and scram.
pln_pal_73_01.loc_text: Grab the counterfeit and do another load or take what we have and scram.

pln_pal_73_02.base_text: That's a sweet pile of counterfeit cash. Beautiful. Grab it. And if you fancy a little more...
pln_pal_73_02.loc_text: That's a sweet pile of counterfeit cash. Beautiful. Grab it. And if you fancy a little more...

pln_pal_73_03.base_text: Now grab that freshly minted cash. And if you feel like printing more, hey, I'm not going to stop you.
pln_pal_73_03.loc_text: Now grab that freshly minted cash. And if you feel like printing more, hey, I'm not going to stop you.

pln_pal_74_01.base_text: Glad you asked how we get the counterfeit money out of there. I'm dispatching our pilot.
pln_pal_74_01.loc_text: Glad you asked how we get the counterfeit money out of there. I'm dispatching our pilot.

pln_pal_74_02.base_text: I'm sending Bile in to boost that cash out of there.
pln_pal_74_02.loc_text: I'm sending Bile in to boost that cash out of there.

pln_pal_74_03.base_text: All right, Bile is en-route. He'll ferry that counterfeit cash away.
pln_pal_74_03.loc_text: All right, Bile is en-route. He'll ferry that counterfeit cash away.

pln_pal_75_01.base_text: Open the hatch and move into the sewers, they won't see this coming
pln_pal_75_01.loc_text: Open the hatch and move into the sewers, they won't see this coming

pln_pal_75_02.base_text: Now pop the manhole! We're getting out through the sewers!
pln_pal_75_02.loc_text: Now pop the manhole! We're getting out through the sewers!

pln_pal_75_03.base_text: There's a manhole there. Use it. Get out through the sewers.
pln_pal_75_03.loc_text: There's a manhole there. Use it. Get out through the sewers.

pln_pal_76_01.base_text: Get the hell out dammit! Get to the manhole and into the sewers!
pln_pal_76_01.loc_text: Get the hell out dammit! Get to the manhole and into the sewers!

pln_pal_76_02.base_text: All right, we're done here. The manhole leads down to the sewers. It's your way out!
pln_pal_76_02.loc_text: All right, we're done here. The manhole leads down to the sewers. It's your way out!

pln_pal_76_03.base_text: Now let's finish this. Into the manhole, guys! Time for a sewer escape.
pln_pal_76_03.loc_text: Now let's finish this. Into the manhole, guys! Time for a sewer escape.

pln_pal_77_01.base_text: Through the tunnels and get to the beach, gentlemen!
pln_pal_77_01.loc_text: Through the tunnels and get to the beach, gentlemen!

pln_pal_77_02.base_text: This leads all the way to the beach, crew!
pln_pal_77_02.loc_text: This leads all the way to the beach, crew!

pln_pal_77_03.base_text: Just follow it all the way along. The poop pipe deposits into the Gulf.
pln_pal_77_03.loc_text: Just follow it all the way along. The poop pipe deposits into the Gulf.

pln_pal_78_03.base_text: Top side is full of cops, make the escape now!
pln_pal_78_03.loc_text: Top side is full of cops, make the escape now!

pln_pal_79_01.base_text: Last gate! Get your tools on it and get it open!
pln_pal_79_01.loc_text: Last gate! Get your tools on it and get it open!

pln_pal_79_02.base_text: Just get beyond the gate. Get it open!
pln_pal_79_02.loc_text: Just get beyond the gate. Get it open!

pln_pal_79_03.base_text: We're not going to be stopped by a gate now. Get it open!
pln_pal_79_03.loc_text: We're not going to be stopped by a gate now. Get it open!

pln_pal_80_01.base_text: Rey's Pizza, what can I get you?
pln_pal_80_01.loc_text: Rey's Pizza, what can I get you?

pln_pal_80_02.base_text: The Church of Scientology, how I can help you?
pln_pal_80_02.loc_text: The Church of Scientology, how I can help you?

pln_pal_80_03.base_text: Steve's pet shop, how may I be of assistance?
pln_pal_80_03.loc_text: Steve's pet shop, how may I be of assistance?

pln_pal_80_04.base_text: Papa John's long stocking boutique, how can I help you?
pln_pal_80_04.loc_text: Papa John's long stocking boutique, how can I help you?

pln_pal_80_05.base_text: Dragon's buffet, how can I help you?
pln_pal_80_05.loc_text: Dragon's buffet, how can I help you?

pln_pal_80_06.base_text: First World Bank, how can I help you today?
pln_pal_80_06.loc_text: First World Bank, how can I help you today?

pln_pal_80_07.base_text: This is the McKendrick Museum, how can I help you?
pln_pal_80_07.loc_text: This is the McKendrick Museum, how can I help you?

pln_pal_80_08.base_text: Mr. Sturr's office, how can I help you?
pln_pal_80_08.loc_text: Mr. Sturr's office, how can I help you?

pln_pal_80_09.base_text: Almir's burgers, what can I get you?
pln_pal_80_09.loc_text: Almir's burgers, what can I get you?

pln_pal_81_01.base_text: In this messed up world, fake money is still worth a lot. Great job!
pln_pal_81_01.loc_text: In this messed up world, fake money is still worth a lot. Great job!

pln_pal_81_02.base_text: They got cocky and they paid for it. Fake money is still money in the right hands.
pln_pal_81_02.loc_text: They got cocky and they paid for it. Fake money is still money in the right hands.

pln_pal_81_03.base_text: Crash a pool party. Get paid. Not bad at all.
pln_pal_81_03.loc_text: Crash a pool party. Get paid. Not bad at all.

pln_pal_cbf_01.base_text: Pack your bags, gang. This one is south of the Mason-Dixie. We're going after Mitchell and Wilson - couple of counterfeiters down in Pensacola. Running a printing operation out of his basement. It's a discreet operation, and this guy's work is solid, so he's making serious bank. Let's grab a piece!
pln_pal_cbf_01.loc_text: Pack your bags, gang. This one is south of the Mason-Dixie. We're going after Mitchell and Wilson - couple of counterfeiters down in Pensacola. Running a printing operation out of his basement. It's a discreet operation, and this guy's work is solid, so he's making serious bank. Let's grab a piece!

pln_pal_intro_01_01.base_text: He bought it. Fix his leaks.
pln_pal_intro_01_01.loc_text: He bought it. Fix his leaks.

pln_pt1_01_01.base_text: Okay. Well, you heard the man. The product is IN the goats, and the goats are all over downtown. Round 'em up.
pln_pt1_01_01.loc_text: Okay. Well, you heard the man. The product is IN the goats, and the goats are all over downtown. Round 'em up.

pln_pt1_01_02.base_text: Well, as Vlad said...the coke is in the goats, and the goats are...well, all over downtown. Track 'em down.
pln_pt1_01_02.loc_text: Well, as Vlad said...the coke is in the goats, and the goats are...well, all over downtown. Track 'em down.

pln_pt1_01_03.base_text: Vlad, you crazy...okay, guys. That's the deal. Sometimes it's nukes, sometimes it's goats. Get looking.
pln_pt1_01_03.loc_text: Vlad, you crazy...okay, guys. That's the deal. Sometimes it's nukes, sometimes it's goats. Get looking.

pln_pt1_02_01.base_text: Well, what does a goat sound like?
pln_pt1_02_01.loc_text: Well, what does a goat sound like?

pln_pt1_02_02.base_text: What noise does a goat make?
pln_pt1_02_02.loc_text: What noise does a goat make?

pln_pt1_03_01.base_text: That should be all of them! Time to ride out. Get in the wheels and get out of there.
pln_pt1_03_01.loc_text: That should be all of them! Time to ride out. Get in the wheels and get out of there.

pln_pt1_03_02.base_text: That's all the goats secured. Now get in your car and high tail it out of there.
pln_pt1_03_02.loc_text: That's all the goats secured. Now get in your car and high tail it out of there.

pln_pt1_03_03.base_text: That's all of them. Get in the car and scoot!
pln_pt1_03_03.loc_text: That's all of them. Get in the car and scoot!

pln_pt1_04_01.base_text: Gang, it's time to bug. Get in the car!
pln_pt1_04_01.loc_text: Gang, it's time to bug. Get in the car!

pln_pt1_04_02.base_text: Crew, you got the goats, now hit the gas!
pln_pt1_04_02.loc_text: Crew, you got the goats, now hit the gas!

pln_pt1_04_03.base_text: Job's done here, guys. Time to roll! Into the car!
pln_pt1_04_03.loc_text: Job's done here, guys. Time to roll! Into the car!

pln_pt1_05_01.base_text: You'll close this out quicker if you use the car to move the goats.
pln_pt1_05_01.loc_text: You'll close this out quicker if you use the car to move the goats.

pln_pt1_05_02.base_text: Haul the goats in the car. Just don't let 'em crap on the upholstery.
pln_pt1_05_02.loc_text: Haul the goats in the car. Just don't let 'em crap on the upholstery.

pln_pt1_05_03.base_text: Gotta get them goats back quickly. Use the car!
pln_pt1_05_03.loc_text: Gotta get them goats back quickly. Use the car!

pln_pt1_06_01.base_text: Gang, don't forget one of those goats is up in the apartment.
pln_pt1_06_01.loc_text: Gang, don't forget one of those goats is up in the apartment.

pln_pt1_06_02.base_text: Don't forget the goat in that apartment block.
pln_pt1_06_02.loc_text: Don't forget the goat in that apartment block.

pln_pt1_06_03.base_text: There's still a goat in the apartment building there.
pln_pt1_06_03.loc_text: There's still a goat in the apartment building there.

pln_pt1_07_01.base_text: The apartment has a sprinkler system, so there's got to be a valve somewhere.
pln_pt1_07_01.loc_text: The apartment has a sprinkler system, so there's got to be a valve somewhere.

pln_pt1_07_02.base_text: All these apartments have sprinkler systems. Just look for the valve.
pln_pt1_07_02.loc_text: All these apartments have sprinkler systems. Just look for the valve.

pln_pt1_07_03.base_text: These places are required to have sprinkler systems. Find the valve!
pln_pt1_07_03.loc_text: These places are required to have sprinkler systems. Find the valve!

pln_pt1_08_01.base_text: There's valves that control the sprinklers, turn them on!
pln_pt1_08_01.loc_text: There's valves that control the sprinklers, turn them on!

pln_pt1_08_02.base_text: Look for the valves. Get the sprinklers going!
pln_pt1_08_02.loc_text: Look for the valves. Get the sprinklers going!

pln_pt1_08_03.base_text: Find those valves. We need the sprinklers working.
pln_pt1_08_03.loc_text: Find those valves. We need the sprinklers working.

pln_pt1_09_01.base_text: Great, those sprinklers will put out the fire.
pln_pt1_09_01.loc_text: Great, those sprinklers will put out the fire.

pln_pt1_10_02.base_text: Fire's out. And people think all we do is cause chaos!
pln_pt1_10_02.loc_text: Fire's out. And people think all we do is cause chaos!

pln_pt1_10_03.base_text: That's the fire dealt with. You guys are civil heroes!
pln_pt1_10_03.loc_text: That's the fire dealt with. You guys are civil heroes!

pln_pt1_11_01.base_text: How did the goat get up there? Whatever...look for the circuit box to stop the fan.
pln_pt1_11_01.loc_text: How did the goat get up there? Whatever...look for the circuit box to stop the fan.

pln_pt1_11_02.base_text: A goat in a fan? This day gets weirder. Find the circuit box to halt the fan.
pln_pt1_11_02.loc_text: A goat in a fan? This day gets weirder. Find the circuit box to halt the fan.

pln_pt1_11_03.base_text: Sure there's gotta be a good reason that goat is up in the fan. Just find the circuit box. Stop the fan.
pln_pt1_11_03.loc_text: Sure there's gotta be a good reason that goat is up in the fan. Just find the circuit box. Stop the fan.

pln_pt1_12_01.base_text: Hacking the circuit box will stop the fan.
pln_pt1_12_01.loc_text: Hacking the circuit box will stop the fan.

pln_pt1_12_02.base_text: Circuit box is likely outside. Hacking it will stop the fan.
pln_pt1_12_02.loc_text: Circuit box is likely outside. Hacking it will stop the fan.

pln_pt1_12_03.base_text: Find the circuit box, crew. You need to hack it to halt the fan.
pln_pt1_12_03.loc_text: Find the circuit box, crew. You need to hack it to halt the fan.

pln_pt1_13_01.base_text: That goat is carrying a live charge. Disable the power.
pln_pt1_13_01.loc_text: That goat is carrying a live charge. Disable the power.

pln_pt1_13_02.base_text: Goats are great conductors of electricity. Turn off the power.
pln_pt1_13_02.loc_text: Goats are great conductors of electricity. Turn off the power.

pln_pt1_13_03.base_text: That goat has live current running through it! Disable the power!
pln_pt1_13_03.loc_text: That goat has live current running through it! Disable the power!

pln_pt1_14_01.base_text: Beware the goat! Guys, you need to disable the power first!
pln_pt1_14_01.loc_text: Beware the goat! Guys, you need to disable the power first!

pln_pt1_14_02.base_text: The goat is deadly! Kill the electricity first!
pln_pt1_14_02.loc_text: The goat is deadly! Kill the electricity first!

pln_pt1_14_03.base_text: The goat is electrictrified! Turn off the power!
pln_pt1_14_03.loc_text: The goat is electrictrified! Turn off the power!

pln_pt1_15_02.base_text: That didn't do it. Try a different one.
pln_pt1_15_02.loc_text: That didn't do it. Try a different one.

pln_pt1_15_03.base_text: Uhhh...no, that didn't work. Try another one.
pln_pt1_15_03.loc_text: Uhhh...no, that didn't work. Try another one.

pln_pt1_16_02.base_text: Great. You can safely grab the goat now!
pln_pt1_16_02.loc_text: Great. You can safely grab the goat now!

pln_pt1_16_03.base_text: All right, nice. Now fetch the goat!
pln_pt1_16_03.loc_text: All right, nice. Now fetch the goat!

pln_pt1_17_02.base_text: I can't work out how it...
pln_pt1_17_02.loc_text: I can't work out how it...

pln_pt1_17_05.base_text: I still can't figure out how.
pln_pt1_17_05.loc_text: I still can't figure out how.

pln_pt1_17_06.base_text: How it got up there is a mystery.
pln_pt1_17_06.loc_text: How it got up there is a mystery.

pln_pt1_18_01.base_text: There's another one! Caught in the scaffolding! Watch out! Looks like it's electrocuted! Disable the power!
pln_pt1_18_01.loc_text: There's another one! Caught in the scaffolding! Watch out! Looks like it's electrocuted! Disable the power!

pln_pt1_18_02.base_text: Gang, you see it? Another goat in the scaffolds! But - woah, be careful! Looks like that ladder is electrocuted!
pln_pt1_18_02.loc_text: Gang, you see it? Another goat in the scaffolds! But - woah, be careful! Looks like that ladder is electrocuted!

pln_pt1_18_03.base_text: Look, up in the scaffold! Another goat. But, hold up! It looks like that ladder is electrocuted. Disable power!
pln_pt1_18_03.loc_text: Look, up in the scaffold! Another goat. But, hold up! It looks like that ladder is electrocuted. Disable power!

pln_pt1_19_01.base_text: Don't forget the goat in the scaffold.
pln_pt1_19_01.loc_text: Don't forget the goat in the scaffold.

pln_pt1_19_02.base_text: There's still a goat in the scaffold.
pln_pt1_19_02.loc_text: There's still a goat in the scaffold.

pln_pt1_19_03.base_text: Remember - there's a goat stuck in the scaffolds.
pln_pt1_19_03.loc_text: Remember - there's a goat stuck in the scaffolds.

pln_pt1_20_01.loc_text: Looks like the goat managed to nibble through the power. Ladder's electrocuted. Disable the power!

pln_pt1_20_02.base_text: That goat's a trouble maker. He somehow turned on the power. Disable it at the power box.
pln_pt1_20_02.loc_text: That goat's a trouble maker. He somehow turned on the power. Disable it at the power box.

pln_pt1_20_03.base_text: The goat managed to electrify the ladder. Look for the power box to turn it off.
pln_pt1_20_03.loc_text: The goat managed to electrify the ladder. Look for the power box to turn it off.

pln_pt1_21_01.base_text: Don't touch the ladder! Disable the powerboxes!

pln_pt1_21_02.base_text: Ladder's electrified. Disable it at the power box!
pln_pt1_21_02.loc_text: Ladder's electrified. Disable it at the power box!

pln_pt1_21_03.base_text: You need to deal with the power box to use the ladder!

pln_pt1_22_01.base_text: Check inside that store. Likely one of our goats wandered in. Drill it open!
pln_pt1_22_01.loc_text: Check inside that store. Likely one of our goats wandered in. Drill it open!

pln_pt1_22_02.base_text: I'm guessing a goat managed to get into the store. Drill the door!
pln_pt1_22_02.loc_text: I'm guessing a goat managed to get into the store. Drill the door!

pln_pt1_22_03.base_text: That store looks like a good spot to search. Drill the door, gang!
pln_pt1_22_03.loc_text: That store looks like a good spot to search. Drill the door, gang!

pln_pt1_23_01.base_text: Pretty sure there will be a goat inside the store. Get a drill on the door!
pln_pt1_23_01.loc_text: Pretty sure there will be a goat inside the store. Get a drill on the door!

pln_pt1_23_02.base_text: Goats love shopping! Drill your way into the store.
pln_pt1_23_02.loc_text: Goats love shopping! Drill your way into the store.

pln_pt1_23_03.base_text: Don't forget the store. Drill the door. I bet my cut there's a goat inside.
pln_pt1_23_03.loc_text: Don't forget the store. Drill the door. I bet my cut there's a goat inside.

pln_pt1_24_01.base_text: Open for business! The business of finding goats!
pln_pt1_24_01.loc_text: Open for business! The business of finding goats!

pln_pt1_24_02.base_text: Store is open! Find that goat!
pln_pt1_24_02.loc_text: Store is open! Find that goat!

pln_pt1_24_03.base_text: We're in. Now get after that goat!
pln_pt1_24_03.loc_text: We're in. Now get after that goat!

pln_pt1_25_01.base_text: That goat climbed up there. Got stuck. We need him down. Saw the streetlight!
pln_pt1_25_01.loc_text: That goat climbed up there. Got stuck. We need him down. Saw the streetlight!

pln_rat_stage1_33_any_01.base_text: No bags!? The trade will not be good to us. Hope you guys has some tricks up your sleeve for the trade.
pln_rat_stage1_33_any_01.loc_text: No bags!? The trade will not be good to us. Hope you guys has some tricks up your sleeve for the trade.

pln_rat_stage1_34_any_01.base_text: Good thinking! Use those boards to barricade more windows.
pln_rat_stage1_34_any_01.loc_text: Good thinking! Use those boards to barricade more windows.

pln_rat_stage1_end_a_01.base_text: Good work getting the meth out. That was not exactly an easy gig. I'm sure whoever ratted out the lab is going to get Hector's full attention.
pln_rat_stage1_end_a_01.loc_text: Good work getting the meth out. That was not exactly an easy gig. I'm sure whoever ratted out the lab is going to get Hector's full attention.

pln_rat_stage1_end_a_02.base_text: That house is going up in flames. Let's get the product to Hector and get paid. I wonder how much he pays for the blue.
pln_rat_stage1_end_a_02.loc_text: That house is going up in flames. Let's get the product to Hector and get paid. I wonder how much he pays for the blue.

pln_rat_stage1_end_a_03.base_text: If you can't stand the heat get out of the kitchen eh? Well done. We got enough meth to deal with Hector. Let's get back in town.
pln_rat_stage1_end_a_03.loc_text: If you can't stand the heat get out of the kitchen eh? Well done. We got enough meth to deal with Hector. Let's get back in town.

pln_rat_stage1_end_b_01.base_text: You guys can cook! Which one of you is Heisenberg, Hector wants to know.
pln_rat_stage1_end_b_01.loc_text: You guys can cook! Which one of you is Heisenberg, Hector wants to know.

pln_rat_stage1_end_b_02.base_text: My crew, all master chefs. You got so much product out of that cook we should all break bad and do this full time!
pln_rat_stage1_end_b_02.loc_text: My crew, all master chefs. You got so much product out of that cook we should all break bad and do this full time!

pln_rat_stage1_end_b_03.base_text: Deal's on, people. You made enough crystal to make royalty blush. Hector's going to be singing your praises if he isn't high as a kite. Well done.
pln_rat_stage1_end_b_03.loc_text: Deal's on, people. You made enough crystal to make royalty blush. Hector's going to be singing your praises if he isn't high as a kite. Well done.

pln_rat_stage1_end_c_01.base_text: Damn. We don't have enough product to trade, which means we're in a tough spot. Let's keep it quiet and go to Hector. We'll see how it goes.
pln_rat_stage1_end_c_01.loc_text: Damn. We don't have enough product to trade, which means we're in a tough spot. Let's keep it quiet and go to Hector. We'll see how it goes.

pln_rat_stage1_end_c_02.base_text: We're short on product so for now I think we're best keeping Hector in the dark. Maybe we can solve the issue another way.
pln_rat_stage1_end_c_02.loc_text: We're short on product so for now I think we're best keeping Hector in the dark. Maybe we can solve the issue another way.

pln_rat_stage1_end_c_03.base_text: We came up a little short. Let's just play along and try to solve the Rat problem for Hector another way. We're inventive...
pln_rat_stage1_end_c_03.loc_text: We came up a little short. Let's just play along and try to solve the Rat problem for Hector another way. We're inventive...

pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_01.base_text: Straight ahead and to the right, you'll see an old two story house. Surprise, surprise, this is cook central.
pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_01.loc_text: Straight ahead and to the right, you'll see an old two story house. Surprise, surprise, this is cook central.

pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_01b.base_text: Get in, save Hector's cooks and get the drugs out of there before anything else goes wrong.
pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_01b.loc_text: Get in, save Hector's cooks and get the drugs out of there before anything else goes wrong.

pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_02.base_text: The lab, if you can call an rundown dump like this a lab, is straight ahead. Get in and watch for Mendoza's soldiers.
pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_02.loc_text: The lab, if you can call an rundown dump like this a lab, is straight ahead. Get in and watch for Mendoza's soldiers.

pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_02b.base_text: Oh yeah, get the meth out before the FBI arrives - they've been tipped off, as if you weren't feeling lucky already.
pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_02b.loc_text: Oh yeah, get the meth out before the FBI arrives - they've been tipped off, as if you weren't feeling lucky already.

pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_03.base_text: Mendoza's people are on the scene doing the cook - get them clear and reclaim Hector's meth. You can leave right here when you have the stuff. Go for it.
pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_03.loc_text: Mendoza's people are on the scene doing the cook - get them clear and reclaim Hector's meth. You can leave right here when you have the stuff. Go for it.

pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_04.base_text: Man, I swear I can smell that skel bait from here. We're at the meth lab. Go in and snag three sacks of the product before the FBI gets here. What Hector wants, Hector gets. For now, anyway.
pln_rat_stage1_intro_a_04.loc_text: Man, I swear I can smell that skel bait from here. We're at the meth lab. Go in and snag three sacks of the product before the FBI gets here. What Hector wants, Hector gets. For now, anyway.

pln_rat_stage2_end_a_01.base_text: That was easy. Nice work. Unfortunately Hector just told me the FBI has nabbed the remaining Mendoza and are escorting them to the airport in a convoy. Which means we don't have much time.
pln_rat_stage2_end_a_01.loc_text: That was easy. Nice work. Unfortunately Hector just told me the FBI has nabbed the remaining Mendoza and are escorting them to the airport in a convoy. Which means we don't have much time.

pln_rat_stage2_end_a_02.base_text: I guess they cared more about their fix than information. Junkies aren't great with abstraction. Meanwhile the Mendozas are leaving for the airport in a rented bus, escorted by undercover FBI.
pln_rat_stage2_end_a_02.loc_text: I guess they cared more about their fix than information. Junkies aren't great with abstraction. Meanwhile the Mendozas are leaving for the airport in a rented bus, escorted by undercover FBI.

pln_rat_stage2_end_a_02b.base_text: Yeah. So we have our work cut out for us...
pln_rat_stage2_end_a_02b.loc_text: Yeah. So we have our work cut out for us...

pln_rat_stage2_end_b_01.base_text: Guys... Guys... Guys. We were supposed to get info... Not just cash. Hector's going to skin me alive.
pln_rat_stage2_end_b_01.loc_text: Guys... Guys... Guys. We were supposed to get info... Not just cash. Hector's going to skin me alive.

pln_rat_stage2_end_b_01b.base_text: Now you need to go in blind and just take out the Mendozas on the way to the airport, OK? I'd say please but I don't say please.
pln_rat_stage2_end_b_01b.loc_text: Now you need to go in blind and just take out the Mendozas on the way to the airport, OK? I'd say please but I don't say please.

pln_rat_stage2_end_c_01.base_text: Those backstabbing... Well you showed them turnaround's generally very bad for whoever we turn around on.
pln_rat_stage2_end_c_01.loc_text: Those backstabbing... Well you showed them turnaround's generally very bad for whoever we turn around on.

pln_rat_stage2_end_c_01b.base_text: Mendozas are headed for the airport. Bring that briefcase. I bet we can figure out something to do with it.
pln_rat_stage2_end_c_01b.loc_text: Mendozas are headed for the airport. Bring that briefcase. I bet we can figure out something to do with it.

pln_rat_stage2_end_d_01.base_text: That was like Baghdad all over again. You need to roll. Hector's got a line on the Mendozas on their way to the airport. We're gonna hit their convoy like a ten ton hammer.
pln_rat_stage2_end_d_01.loc_text: That was like Baghdad all over again. You need to roll. Hector's got a line on the Mendozas on their way to the airport. We're gonna hit their convoy like a ten ton hammer.

pln_rat_stage2_end_d_02.base_text: No cash and no info. I'd call this one a miss. Hector's going to be very unhappy unless you guys pull my ass out of the fire. I know it's a lot to ask.
pln_rat_stage2_end_d_02.loc_text: No cash and no info. I'd call this one a miss. Hector's going to be very unhappy unless you guys pull my ass out of the fire. I know it's a lot to ask.

pln_rat_stage2_end_e_01.base_text: That's... A lot of money. I guess we're in the meth trade now. We really needed that information, though. Remember?  Saddle up and let's get those pricks - with or without the information.
pln_rat_stage2_end_e_01.loc_text: That's... A lot of money. I guess we're in the meth trade now. We really needed that information, though. Remember?  Saddle up and let's get those pricks - with or without the information.

pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_01.base_text: OK, remember, this should stay peaceful. Trade the meth for the info, surplus meth for cash. Easy and clean, walk away without bloodshed.
pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_01.loc_text: OK, remember, this should stay peaceful. Trade the meth for the info, surplus meth for cash. Easy and clean, walk away without bloodshed.

pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_01b.base_text: We need to catch up with the Mendozas before they jet out of this country.
pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_01b.loc_text: We need to catch up with the Mendozas before they jet out of this country.

pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_02.base_text: The Mendozas are about to leave on a jet plane. We need to trade this product for info on them. These guys are scum, but you don't wanna mess with them.
pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_02.loc_text: The Mendozas are about to leave on a jet plane. We need to trade this product for info on them. These guys are scum, but you don't wanna mess with them.

pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_02b.base_text: Just try to keep it in your pants this once and do the trade quiet. OK? OK.
pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_02b.loc_text: Just try to keep it in your pants this once and do the trade quiet. OK? OK.

pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_03.base_text: The info they have will be in a briefcase or something like that. Make the trade and have them hand over the info to you. These guys are scum so keep your eyes open.
pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_03.loc_text: The info they have will be in a briefcase or something like that. Make the trade and have them hand over the info to you. These guys are scum so keep your eyes open.

pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_03b.base_text: Let's just get it over with and hopefully without bloodshed. We have enough of that ahead of us.
pln_rat_stage2_intro_a_03b.loc_text: Let's just get it over with and hopefully without bloodshed. We have enough of that ahead of us.

pln_rat_stage3_01_any_01.base_text: The convoy's stopped, move toward the bus.
pln_rat_stage3_01_any_01.loc_text: The convoy's stopped, move toward the bus.

pln_rat_stage3_02_any_01.base_text: Remember, we are after the rat, Head for the bus, keep your heads low and move from cover to cover.
pln_rat_stage3_02_any_01.loc_text: Remember, we are after the rat, Head for the bus, keep your heads low and move from cover to cover.

pln_rat_stage3_03_any_01.base_text: There are Heavy FBI units all over the place, be careful.
pln_rat_stage3_03_any_01.loc_text: There are Heavy FBI units all over the place, be careful.

pln_rat_stage3_04_any_01.base_text: That's the bus, take them all out.
pln_rat_stage3_04_any_01.loc_text: That's the bus, take them all out.

pln_rat_stage3_05_any_01.base_text: The money is yours to take. If you have the codes you will be able to defuse the planted C4s.
pln_rat_stage3_05_any_01.loc_text: The money is yours to take. If you have the codes you will be able to defuse the planted C4s.

pln_rat_stage3_06_any_01.base_text: I'm sending a chopper in for you guys to unload the loot. It's close by, shouldn't take too long. Stay tight.
pln_rat_stage3_06_any_01.loc_text: I'm sending a chopper in for you guys to unload the loot. It's close by, shouldn't take too long. Stay tight.

pln_rat_stage3_07_any_01.base_text: Be careful around that C4 guys.
pln_rat_stage3_07_any_01.loc_text: Be careful around that C4 guys.

pln_rat_stage3_08_any_01.base_text: The bus blew up! Be careful and stay out of that fire!
pln_rat_stage3_08_any_01.loc_text: The bus blew up! Be careful and stay out of that fire!

pln_rat_stage3_08_any_02.base_text: Oh no! It exploded, watch out! Stay out of that fire!
pln_rat_stage3_08_any_02.loc_text: Oh no! It exploded, watch out! Stay out of that fire!

pln_rat_stage3_09_any_01.base_text: Chopper is there, throw the bags into the chopper.
pln_rat_stage3_09_any_01.loc_text: Chopper is there, throw the bags into the chopper.

pln_rat_stage3_10_any_01.base_text: Good job, the rat is dead, escape helicopter is waiting, unless you want to try to go for the money in that bus, get to the chopper and well get you the hell out of there.
pln_rat_stage3_10_any_01.loc_text: Good job, the rat is dead, escape helicopter is waiting, unless you want to try to go for the money in that bus, get to the chopper and well get you the hell out of there.

pln_rat_stage3_11_any_01.base_text: I hear the cop radio, law enforcers are on the way, they arrive in 30 seconds.
pln_rat_stage3_11_any_01.loc_text: I hear the cop radio, law enforcers are on the way, they arrive in 30 seconds.

pln_rat_stage3_12_any_01.base_text: Cops and SWATs have arrived, be careful!
pln_rat_stage3_12_any_01.loc_text: Cops and SWATs have arrived, be careful!

pln_rat_stage3_13_any_01.base_text: Watch out for that chopper, it's close enough for the cops to do him some good damage.
pln_rat_stage3_13_any_01.loc_text: Watch out for that chopper, it's close enough for the cops to do him some good damage.

pln_rat_stage3_end_a_01.base_text: You swept that bus clean of Mendozas. A true Viking funeral in flames with their possessions and all.
pln_rat_stage3_end_a_01.loc_text: You swept that bus clean of Mendozas. A true Viking funeral in flames with their possessions and all.

pln_rat_stage3_end_a_02.base_text: No more Mendozas. You gave them a true Viking funeral, except they're not Vikings. Sad.
pln_rat_stage3_end_a_02.loc_text: No more Mendozas. You gave them a true Viking funeral, except they're not Vikings. Sad.

pln_rat_stage3_end_a_03.base_text: Money and Mendozas up in flames. You made a statement and Hector's going to like it. Payday coming up.
pln_rat_stage3_end_a_03.loc_text: Money and Mendozas up in flames. You made a statement and Hector's going to like it. Payday coming up.

pln_rat_stage3_end_b_01.base_text: No one is going to miss this message. The FBI's going to search high and low for you but don't worry... I'll take care of it. Great work.
pln_rat_stage3_end_b_01.loc_text: No one is going to miss this message. The FBI's going to search high and low for you but don't worry... I'll take care of it. Great work.

pln_rat_stage3_end_b_02.base_text: The Mendoza BBQ was a roaring success. Time to see Hector.
pln_rat_stage3_end_b_02.loc_text: The Mendoza BBQ was a roaring success. Time to see Hector.

pln_rat_stage3_end_c_01.base_text: Great job, people. The Mendozas are out of business and their liquidity is riding shotgun in our chopper. Sweet.
pln_rat_stage3_end_c_01.loc_text: Great job, people. The Mendozas are out of business and their liquidity is riding shotgun in our chopper. Sweet.

pln_rat_stage3_end_c_02.base_text: That's a relief, you aced this one. Whatever bad rep we had with Hector is all good now. I feel relaxed enough to smoke a victory cigar, in fact.
pln_rat_stage3_end_c_02.loc_text: That's a relief, you aced this one. Whatever bad rep we had with Hector is all good now. I feel relaxed enough to smoke a victory cigar, in fact.

pln_rat_stage3_end_c_03.base_text: Great score, folks. Let's see if Hector's going to throw us a party, shall we?
pln_rat_stage3_end_c_03.loc_text: Great score, folks. Let's see if Hector's going to throw us a party, shall we?

pln_rat_stage3_intro_a_01.base_text: Crew, this is us ending Mendoza ops in DC right here and right now. Hit that bus hard and take their money. Hector just wants these clowns ended so the money is ours. Set down in 3, 2, 1, go!
pln_rat_stage3_intro_a_01.loc_text: Crew, this is us ending Mendoza ops in DC right here and right now. Hit that bus hard and take their money. Hector just wants these clowns ended so the money is ours. Set down in 3, 2, 1, go!

pln_rat_stage3_intro_a_02.base_text: OK, the chopper's coming over the convoy now, we're on a bridge - well done Alex... For once...  Hit 'em and finish it. The money's ours no matter what. Get it done.
pln_rat_stage3_intro_a_02.loc_text: OK, the chopper's coming over the convoy now, we're on a bridge - well done Alex... For once...  Hit 'em and finish it. The money's ours no matter what. Get it done.

pln_rat_stage3_intro_a_03.base_text: OK, the Mendoza bus is on the bridge, which means we land to take it out in ten minutes. Hit the bus, finish off their people, take the money. Simple.
pln_rat_stage3_intro_a_03.loc_text: OK, the Mendoza bus is on the bridge, which means we land to take it out in ten minutes. Hit the bus, finish off their people, take the money. Simple.

pln_rats_stage1_01_any_01.base_text: Get into the house and see if you can find Hector's cooks.
pln_rats_stage1_01_any_01.loc_text: Get into the house and see if you can find Hector's cooks.

pln_rats_stage1_03_any_01.base_text: Remember we will need at least four bags of meth.
pln_rats_stage1_03_any_01.loc_text: Remember we will need at least four bags of meth.

pln_rats_stage1_04_any_01.base_text: What!? The Mendoza cartel is still there! Take care of them!
pln_rats_stage1_04_any_01.loc_text: What!? The Mendoza cartel is still there! Take care of them!

pln_rats_stage1_05_any_01.base_text: Make sure no one else is there.
pln_rats_stage1_05_any_01.loc_text: Make sure no one else is there.

pln_rats_stage1_06_any_01.base_text: Looks like Hector's cooks are dead. We have to make the meth ourselves!
pln_rats_stage1_06_any_01.loc_text: Looks like Hector's cooks are dead. We have to make the meth ourselves!

pln_rats_stage1_07_any_01.base_text: We have to hurry! The cop's radio is buzzing like crazy. They're already on their way!
pln_rats_stage1_07_any_01.loc_text: We have to hurry! The cop's radio is buzzing like crazy. They're already on their way!

pln_rats_stage1_08_any_01.base_text: Alright, the process is on, it's cooking. I have a contact with a specialist through Hector. I will guide you guys through it.
pln_rats_stage1_08_any_01.loc_text: Alright, the process is on, it's cooking. I have a contact with a specialist through Hector. I will guide you guys through it.

pln_rats_stage1_09_any_01.base_text: Make shure no SWATs get in to the lab. Keep them away at all costs!
pln_rats_stage1_09_any_01.loc_text: Make shure no SWATs get in to the lab. Keep them away at all costs!

pln_rats_stage1_10_any_01.base_text: Here they come guys. Choppers and SWAT vans all over the place around you. Stay on your toes!
pln_rats_stage1_10_any_01.loc_text: Here they come guys. Choppers and SWAT vans all over the place around you. Stay on your toes!

pln_rats_stage1_11_any_01.base_text: SWATs incoming from the lumber mill. Keep them away!
pln_rats_stage1_11_any_01.loc_text: SWATs incoming from the lumber mill. Keep them away!

pln_rats_stage1_11_any_02.base_text: Incoming! From the lumber mill! Stay on your toes!
pln_rats_stage1_11_any_02.loc_text: Incoming! From the lumber mill! Stay on your toes!

pln_rats_stage1_11_any_03.base_text: They are coming in from the lumber mill, watch out!
pln_rats_stage1_11_any_03.loc_text: They are coming in from the lumber mill, watch out!

pln_rats_stage1_12_any_01.base_text: They are coming from the railway bridge! Watch out!
pln_rats_stage1_12_any_01.loc_text: They are coming from the railway bridge! Watch out!

pln_rats_stage1_12_any_02.base_text: The railway bridge! They are coming in from the railway bridge, keep them away.
pln_rats_stage1_12_any_02.loc_text: The railway bridge! They are coming in from the railway bridge, keep them away.

pln_rats_stage1_12_any_03.base_text: SWATs incoming from the lumber mill, keep them away!
pln_rats_stage1_12_any_03.loc_text: SWATs incoming from the lumber mill, keep them away!

pln_rats_stage1_13_any_01.base_text: SWATs are incoming from the forest next to the road, be careful!
pln_rats_stage1_13_any_01.loc_text: SWATs are incoming from the forest next to the road, be careful!

pln_rats_stage1_13_any_02.base_text: They are coming in from the forest next to the road! Keep them away!
pln_rats_stage1_13_any_02.loc_text: They are coming in from the forest next to the road! Keep them away!

pln_rats_stage1_14_any_01.base_text: Be careful! They have snipers incoming!
pln_rats_stage1_14_any_01.loc_text: Be careful! They have snipers incoming!

pln_rats_stage1_15_any_01.base_text: You kept them away. Good stuff! They aren't backing though, so get ready for more of them.
pln_rats_stage1_15_any_01.loc_text: You kept them away. Good stuff! They aren't backing though, so get ready for more of them.

pln_rats_stage1_15_any_02.base_text: Good work! Get back to the cooking. Use the time between waves to find more ingredients.
pln_rats_stage1_15_any_02.loc_text: Good work! Get back to the cooking. Use the time between waves to find more ingredients.

pln_rats_stage1_16_any_01.base_text: We are going to need ingredients, so scout the place and see what you can find.
pln_rats_stage1_16_any_01.loc_text: We are going to need ingredients, so scout the place and see what you can find.

pln_rats_stage1_17_any_01.base_text: You need to add an ingredient, make sure you don't use the wrong thing. One wrong step and the lab will torch up like a christmas tree.
pln_rats_stage1_17_any_01.loc_text: You need to add an ingredient, make sure you don't use the wrong thing. One wrong step and the lab will torch up like a christmas tree.

pln_rats_stage1_18_any_01.base_text: Remember to be careful! We can not use the wrong ingredient. You need to be careful!
pln_rats_stage1_18_any_01.loc_text: Remember to be careful! We can not use the wrong ingredient. You need to be careful!

pln_rats_stage1_19_any_01.base_text: You need to add the muriatic acid to keep the process going!
pln_rats_stage1_19_any_01.loc_text: You need to add the muriatic acid to keep the process going!

pln_rats_stage1_20_any_01.base_text: Add muriatic acid, to continue the process!
pln_rats_stage1_20_any_01.loc_text: Add muriatic acid, to continue the process!

pln_rats_stage1_21_any_01.base_text: You need to add the caustic soda to keep the process going!
pln_rats_stage1_21_any_01.loc_text: You need to add the caustic soda to keep the process going!

pln_rats_stage1_22_any_01.base_text: Add caustic soda to continue the process!
pln_rats_stage1_22_any_01.loc_text: Add caustic soda to continue the process!

pln_rats_stage1_23_any_01.base_text: You need to add the hydrogen chloride to keep the process going!
pln_rats_stage1_23_any_01.loc_text: You need to add the hydrogen chloride to keep the process going!

pln_rats_stage1_24_any_01.base_text: Add hydrogen chloride to continue the process!
pln_rats_stage1_24_any_01.loc_text: Add hydrogen chloride to continue the process!

pln_rats_stage1_25_any_01.base_text: Good, it's continuing. Keep an eye out, and keep defending...
pln_rats_stage1_25_any_01.loc_text: Good, it's continuing. Keep an eye out, and keep defending...

pln_rats_stage1_26_any_01.base_text: Wow! Guys? Are you OK? I told you to be careful!
pln_rats_stage1_26_any_01.loc_text: Wow! Guys? Are you OK? I told you to be careful!

pln_rats_stage1_26_any_02.base_text: Ah,what!? Guys, you have to be careful with that stuff, I told you!
pln_rats_stage1_26_any_02.loc_text: Ah,what!? Guys, you have to be careful with that stuff, I told you!

pln_rats_stage1_27_any_01.base_text: We can't use the lab anymore, it's gone. Take what you have and let's leave.
pln_rats_stage1_27_any_01.loc_text: We can't use the lab anymore, it's gone. Take what you have and let's leave.

pln_rats_stage1_28_any_01.base_text: The process is done! Bag it up, and let's do another round.

pln_rt1b_brf_01_01.base_text: This is a simple job, but that doesn't mean it will be easy. We're going to head out to the forest. You remember the place. We did some work for Hector out there. Anyway, I scoped the place out and it is still intact. So, we're headed there to cook up as much meth as we can. You can stay as long as you want. If you run out of supplies, I'll get more flown in. Should be easy money.

pln_rvd_cbf_01.base_text: Guys, we need to talk about what happened up in Alaska, but I've got another job first, while you're still out west. So, the son of an old friend of mine in L.A., member of the Cabot crime family needs help hitting a jewelry store for a haul of diamonds. I owe him big from years ago, when his dad got me out of a jam, so I promised him a little extra muscle as payback. These guys are pro's, real characters. They even use code names! You guys up for it?

pln_sh21_08_02.loc_text: Dallas! The cops are here, you know what to do!

pln_sh21_08_03.base_text: Damn, the cops arrived faster than I expected! Take 'em down!
pln_sh21_08_03.loc_text: Damn, the cops arrived faster than I expected! Take 'em down!

pln_sh21_09_01.base_text: Holy...! They setup a sniper in the building across the street! Keep your head down and take him out!
pln_sh21_09_01.loc_text: Holy...! They setup a sniper in the building across the street! Keep your head down and take him out!

pln_sh21_09_02.base_text: The bastards brought in a sniper! He's in the building across the street. Find some cover then take him out!
pln_sh21_09_02.loc_text: The bastards brought in a sniper! He's in the building across the street. Find some cover then take him out!

pln_sh21_09_03.base_text: The cops brought in a Sniper! He's in the building across the street. Take your aim and take him out!
pln_sh21_09_03.loc_text: The cops brought in a Sniper! He's in the building across the street. Take your aim and take him out!

pln_sh21_11_01.base_text: Nice job, Dallas. Now, get the cocaine and head back to the van. Our work here is done.
pln_sh21_11_01.loc_text: Nice job, Dallas. Now, get the cocaine and head back to the van. Our work here is done.

pln_sh21_11_02.base_text: That sure showed them not to mess with you. Now, grab the coke and return to the van. Time to get out of here.
pln_sh21_11_02.loc_text: That sure showed them not to mess with you. Now, grab the coke and return to the van. Time to get out of here.

pln_sh21_11_03.base_text: Impressive work, Dallas! Okay, take the cocaine and run back to the van.
pln_sh21_11_03.loc_text: Impressive work, Dallas! Okay, take the cocaine and run back to the van.

pln_sh21_12_01.base_text: That's it, you made it! Throw the coke in the van and let's go.
pln_sh21_12_01.loc_text: That's it, you made it! Throw the coke in the van and let's go.

pln_sh21_12_02.base_text: You did it! Now, throw the cocaine in the back and let's head out.
pln_sh21_12_02.loc_text: You did it! Now, throw the cocaine in the back and let's head out.

pln_sh21_12_03.base_text: Good job! Throw the coke in the van and get out of there!
pln_sh21_12_03.loc_text: Good job! Throw the coke in the van and get out of there!

pln_sh21_brf_01_01.base_text: Okay, Dallas. It's been two years since we worked together, and I need to see that you still got what it takes. We'll start with something simple, all right? An acquaintance of mine recently got robbed on a cocaine deal by some low-life mobster. I need to you to break into his night club and see if you can find the stolen cocaine and get it back. Easy, right?
pln_sh21_brf_01_01.loc_text: Okay, Dallas. It's been two years since we worked together, and I need to see that you still got what it takes. We'll start with something simple, all right? An acquaintance of mine recently got robbed on a cocaine deal by some low-life mobster. I need to you to break into his night club and see if you can find the stolen cocaine and get it back. Easy, right?

pln_sh21_intro_01_01.base_text: Okay, first things first. We begin by "casing" the surroundings like any professional heister.
pln_sh21_intro_01_01.loc_text: Okay, first things first. We begin by "casing" the surroundings like any professional heister.

pln_sh21_intro_01_02.base_text: We're at the night club. Time to get your dance-on. Start by "casing" the place before the fun begins. Take a look around first and keep things casual.
pln_sh21_intro_01_02.loc_text: We're at the night club. Time to get your dance-on. Start by "casing" the place before the fun begins. Take a look around first and keep things casual.

pln_sh21_intro_01_03.base_text: Ready to party like the old days, Dallas?
pln_sh21_intro_01_03.loc_text: Ready to party like the old days, Dallas?

pln_sh22_01_01.base_text: A helicopter is coming to pick you up, but it's going to take a while.
pln_sh22_01_01.loc_text: A helicopter is coming to pick you up, but it's going to take a while.

pln_sh22_01_02.base_text: I'm getting a helicopter to pick you up, but it's gonna take some time.
pln_sh22_01_02.loc_text: I'm getting a helicopter to pick you up, but it's gonna take some time.

pln_sh22_01_03.base_text: I'm calling in a helicopter to pick you up!
pln_sh22_01_03.loc_text: I'm calling in a helicopter to pick you up!

pln_sh22_02_02.base_text: Heads up, the SWAT-team is here!
pln_sh22_02_02.loc_text: Heads up, the SWAT-team is here!

pln_sh22_02_03.base_text: The bastards called in the SWAT-team! Give 'em hell!
pln_sh22_02_03.loc_text: The bastards called in the SWAT-team! Give 'em hell!

pln_sh22_03_01.base_text: Don't just stand around! Help your teammate up!
pln_sh22_03_01.loc_text: Don't just stand around! Help your teammate up!

pln_sh22_03_02.base_text: Your teammate is down! Help him!
pln_sh22_03_02.loc_text: Your teammate is down! Help him!

pln_sh22_03_03.base_text: Your buddy needs your help! Go!
pln_sh22_03_03.loc_text: Your buddy needs your help! Go!

pln_sh22_04_01.base_text: Don't forget the coke in the van, or all of this would be for nothing!
pln_sh22_04_01.loc_text: Don't forget the coke in the van, or all of this would be for nothing!

pln_sh22_04_02.base_text: Get the cocaine from the van!
pln_sh22_04_02.loc_text: Get the cocaine from the van!

pln_sh22_04_03.base_text: Dallas! Get the cocaine from the van before the cops!
pln_sh22_04_03.loc_text: Dallas! Get the cocaine from the van before the cops!

pln_sh22_05_01.base_text: Enter the store and grab a hostage so we can trade back our friend from the cops.
pln_sh22_05_01.loc_text: Enter the store and grab a hostage so we can trade back our friend from the cops.

pln_sh22_05_02.base_text: Get inside the store and take the clerk hostage, so we can make a trade with the cops.
pln_sh22_05_02.loc_text: Get inside the store and take the clerk hostage, so we can make a trade with the cops.

pln_sh22_05_03.base_text: Head for the store and grab a hostage so we can negotiate our friend back from the cops.
pln_sh22_05_03.loc_text: Head for the store and grab a hostage so we can negotiate our friend back from the cops.

pln_sh22_06_01.base_text: Excellent. Now, take the hostage to the back, away from the cops.
pln_sh22_06_01.loc_text: Excellent. Now, take the hostage to the back, away from the cops.

pln_sh22_06_02.base_text: Too many bullets flyin' here! Get the hostage to the room in the back.
pln_sh22_06_02.loc_text: Too many bullets flyin' here! Get the hostage to the room in the back.

pln_sh22_06_03.base_text: Okay, good. Now, take the hostage to the room in the back.
pln_sh22_06_03.loc_text: Okay, good. Now, take the hostage to the room in the back.

pln_sh22_07_01.base_text: Just sit back and let me negotiate a deal with the cops.
pln_sh22_07_01.loc_text: Just sit back and let me negotiate a deal with the cops.

pln_sh22_07_02.base_text: You take it easy for now, while I make a deal with the cops.
pln_sh22_07_02.loc_text: You take it easy for now, while I make a deal with the cops.

pln_sh22_07_03.base_text: I'll negotiate a deal with the cops, so we can get our friend back. You just sit tight.
pln_sh22_07_03.loc_text: I'll negotiate a deal with the cops, so we can get our friend back. You just sit tight.

pln_sh22_08_01.base_text: OK, it's done. Release the hostage now to trade back our friend.
pln_sh22_08_01.loc_text: OK, it's done. Release the hostage now to trade back our friend.

pln_sh22_08_02.base_text: All right, I made the deal. Un-cuff the hostage so we can get our teammate back.
pln_sh22_08_02.loc_text: All right, I made the deal. Un-cuff the hostage so we can get our teammate back.

pln_sh22_08_03.base_text: The deal went through. You can make the trade now.
pln_sh22_08_03.loc_text: The deal went through. You can make the trade now.

pln_sh22_10_01.base_text: Good. Now, don't forget to pick up the coke again.
pln_sh22_10_01.loc_text: Good. Now, don't forget to pick up the coke again.

pln_sh22_10_02.base_text: Nothing some meds can't fix. Pick up the cocaine now.
pln_sh22_10_02.loc_text: Nothing some meds can't fix. Pick up the cocaine now.

pln_sh22_10_03.base_text: Okay, you should be fit for fight again. Grab the cocaine.
pln_sh22_10_03.loc_text: Okay, you should be fit for fight again. Grab the cocaine.

pln_sh22_11_01.base_text: Okay, get out of there. You don't have time to pick the lock, so just shoot the door handle.
pln_sh22_11_01.loc_text: Okay, get out of there. You don't have time to pick the lock, so just shoot the door handle.

pln_sh22_11_02.base_text: Time to go. No time for lock-picking, just shoot off the door handle.
pln_sh22_11_02.loc_text: Time to go. No time for lock-picking, just shoot off the door handle.

pln_sh22_11_03.base_text: OK, time to leave. Don't lock-pick that door, just blow off the door handle.
pln_sh22_11_03.loc_text: OK, time to leave. Don't lock-pick that door, just blow off the door handle.

pln_sh22_12_01.base_text: Wait! Don't shoot that cop, he's alone! Intimidate him to work for us instead!
pln_sh22_12_01.loc_text: Wait! Don't shoot that cop, he's alone! Intimidate him to work for us instead!

pln_sh22_12_02.base_text: Don't shoot that cop! It's three against one. Intimidate him to work for us instead.
pln_sh22_12_02.loc_text: Don't shoot that cop! It's three against one. Intimidate him to work for us instead.

pln_sh22_12_03.base_text: Wait, don't shoot! Make him give up instead by intimidating him. He can be useful to us.
pln_sh22_12_03.loc_text: Wait, don't shoot! Make him give up instead by intimidating him. He can be useful to us.

pln_sh22_13_01.base_text: Time to head for the roof where the helicopter will pick you up!
pln_sh22_13_01.loc_text: Time to head for the roof where the helicopter will pick you up!

pln_sh22_13_02.base_text: Get to the roof now, and wait for the helicopter!
pln_sh22_13_02.loc_text: Get to the roof now, and wait for the helicopter!

pln_sh22_13_03.base_text: Go to the roof and wait for the "choppa"!
pln_sh22_13_03.loc_text: Go to the roof and wait for the "choppa"!

pln_sh22_14_01.base_text: SWATS on the roof! Looks like they won't give up that easily!
pln_sh22_14_01.loc_text: SWATS on the roof! Looks like they won't give up that easily!

pln_sh22_14_02.base_text: Watch out! SWATS on the roof!
pln_sh22_14_02.loc_text: Watch out! SWATS on the roof!

pln_sh22_16_01.base_text: Bastards called in a SHIELD! Try and flank him!
pln_sh22_16_01.loc_text: Bastards called in a SHIELD! Try and flank him!

pln_sh22_16_02.base_text: Damn, that's a SHIELD! Try and get behind him!
pln_sh22_16_02.loc_text: Damn, that's a SHIELD! Try and get behind him!

pln_sh22_16_03.base_text: SHIELD! Get around him and take him out!
pln_sh22_16_03.loc_text: SHIELD! Get around him and take him out!

pln_sh22_18_01.base_text: That's it! Time to go! You still got it, Dallas!
pln_sh22_18_01.loc_text: That's it! Time to go! You still got it, Dallas!

pln_sh22_18_02.base_text: Good job! You proved you still got what it takes, Dallas.
pln_sh22_18_02.loc_text: Good job! You proved you still got what it takes, Dallas.

pln_sh22_18_03.base_text: You have impressed me, Dallas. Two years hasn't slowed you down a bit. Now, get out there!
pln_sh22_18_03.loc_text: You have impressed me, Dallas. Two years hasn't slowed you down a bit. Now, get out there!

pln_sh_int_01_01.base_text: Welcome back! See, you didn't even have to answer the phone, I'm keeping my eyes on you as usual!
pln_sh_int_01_01.loc_text: Welcome back! See, you didn't even have to answer the phone, I'm keeping my eyes on you as usual!

pln_sh_int_02_01.base_text: I trust you have had a vacation worthy of real heisters. You worked hard, you needed it, but you are needed once again.
pln_sh_int_02_01.loc_text: I trust you have had a vacation worthy of real heisters. You worked hard, you needed it, but you are needed once again.

pln_sh_int_03_01.base_text: There is a room behind the kitchen, go there, I've prepared the starting kit for you.
pln_sh_int_03_01.loc_text: There is a room behind the kitchen, go there, I've prepared the starting kit for you.

pln_sh_int_04_01.base_text: I got the pre-order kit in the back for you. Go get it!
pln_sh_int_04_01.loc_text: I got the pre-order kit in the back for you. Go get it!

pln_sh_int_05_01.base_text: There we go, now put your mask on.
pln_sh_int_05_01.loc_text: There we go, now put your mask on.

pln_sh_int_06_01.base_text: OK, I trust you hear me loud and clear. Alright, we don't have any time to waste, let's just get to it.
pln_sh_int_06_01.loc_text: OK, I trust you hear me loud and clear. Alright, we don't have any time to waste, let's just get to it.

pln_sh_int_07_01.base_text: First of all, besides from that starter kit, another package is awaiting you in the back alley.
pln_sh_int_07_01.loc_text: First of all, besides from that starter kit, another package is awaiting you in the back alley.

pln_sh_int_08_01.base_text: My accomplice will assist you. He's waiting.
pln_sh_int_08_01.loc_text: My accomplice will assist you. He's waiting.

pln_sh_int_11_01.base_text: Nice catch! You are ready for this!
pln_sh_int_11_01.loc_text: Nice catch! You are ready for this!

pln_sh_int_12_01.base_text: Nice! That's the money you sent ahead. OVERKILL thanks you!
pln_sh_int_12_01.loc_text: Nice! That's the money you sent ahead. OVERKILL thanks you!

pln_sh_int_13_01.base_text: Pick that bag up, it's some cash to start you off, get it to the living room.
pln_sh_int_13_01.loc_text: Pick that bag up, it's some cash to start you off, get it to the living room.

pln_sh_int_14_01.base_text: Pick it up. It's your money that I laundered. Some extra in there for your generous contribution to OVERKILL.
pln_sh_int_14_01.loc_text: Pick it up. It's your money that I laundered. Some extra in there for your generous contribution to OVERKILL.

pln_sh_int_15_01.base_text: Go inside and drop the bag on the table so you can count it. I hope everything is there.
pln_sh_int_15_01.loc_text: Go inside and drop the bag on the table so you can count it. I hope everything is there.

pln_sh_int_18_01.base_text: OK that should be 5k to start with.
pln_sh_int_18_01.loc_text: OK that should be 5k to start with.

pln_sh_int_19_01.base_text: Some cash, look at it as a welcome gift to get you started. I expect you will pull in much more.
pln_sh_int_19_01.loc_text: Some cash, look at it as a welcome gift to get you started. I expect you will pull in much more.

pln_sh_int_20_01.base_text: Don't worry, no one will hear you back here. But keep it down to be safe...
pln_sh_int_20_01.loc_text: Don't worry, no one will hear you back here. But keep it down to be safe...

pln_sh_int_22_01.base_text: Alright, now, this is your safe house, this is where you spend your time off duty. It's not much at the moment, but give it some time. I'm working on it. I'll let you do some decorating yourself soon.
pln_sh_int_22_01.loc_text: Alright, now, this is your safe house, this is where you spend your time off duty. It's not much at the moment, but give it some time. I'm working on it. I'll let you do some decorating yourself soon.

pln_sh_int_23_01.base_text: So, as you surely know, this isn't everything this safe house has to offer, let me show you what I'm working on.
pln_sh_int_23_01.loc_text: So, as you surely know, this isn't everything this safe house has to offer, let me show you what I'm working on.

pln_sh_int_24_01.base_text: I know you want to get out there and start working, but I have to make sure you know the drill. Times change, new equipment, new toys. I just want to make sure you got it all in check.
pln_sh_int_24_01.loc_text: I know you want to get out there and start working, but I have to make sure you know the drill. Times change, new equipment, new toys. I just want to make sure you got it all in check.

pln_sh_int_25_01.base_text: See that statue - Lady Justice. Hand her some money.
pln_sh_int_25_01.loc_text: See that statue - Lady Justice. Hand her some money.

pln_sh_int_26_01.base_text: Get down there, I'll show you a secret.
pln_sh_int_26_01.loc_text: Get down there, I'll show you a secret.

pln_sh_int_27_01.base_text: Gentlemen... Welcome to your safe house.
pln_sh_int_27_01.loc_text: Gentlemen... Welcome to your safe house.

pln_sh_int_28_01.base_text: OK, to your left is your Crime.net station. This is where you get your contracts. To your right are your security cameras. Look around and I'll tell you more.
pln_sh_int_28_01.loc_text: OK, to your left is your Crime.net station. This is where you get your contracts. To your right are your security cameras. Look around and I'll tell you more.

pln_sh_int_29_01.base_text: Yeah, straight ahead there is your own private vault. We're gonna stack that up.
pln_sh_int_29_01.loc_text: Yeah, straight ahead there is your own private vault. We're gonna stack that up.

pln_sh_int_30_01.base_text: Down there - your own vault. To the right is your camera system. Left your Crime.net station. Let's roll.
pln_sh_int_30_01.loc_text: Down there - your own vault. To the right is your camera system. Left your Crime.net station. Let's roll.

pln_sh_int_31_01.base_text: Welcome to Crime.net. This is your crime community. I will hook you up with crime contacts all over DC looking for guys like you. This net is built on mutual trust and money.
pln_sh_int_31_01.loc_text: Welcome to Crime.net. This is your crime community. I will hook you up with crime contacts all over DC looking for guys like you. This net is built on mutual trust and money.

pln_sh_int_31_01b.base_text: We've been growing this for over two years. There should be plenty of new contacts for you to make on your own as well.
pln_sh_int_31_01b.loc_text: We've been growing this for over two years. There should be plenty of new contacts for you to make on your own as well.

pln_sh_int_32_01.base_text: You got a new contact. His name is Vlad. Look him up on Crime.net and let's see what he can set us up with.
pln_sh_int_32_01.loc_text: You got a new contact. His name is Vlad. Look him up on Crime.net and let's see what he can set us up with.

pln_sh_int_33_01.base_text: New contact on Crime.net, guys. Got a shady politician with ambition. We call him The Elephant for now. Look him up.
pln_sh_int_33_01.loc_text: New contact on Crime.net, guys. Got a shady politician with ambition. We call him The Elephant for now. Look him up.

pln_sh_int_34_01.base_text: Your Crime.net is updated. There is a heavy duty drug cartel head in town. His name his Hector Moralez. Look him up.
pln_sh_int_34_01.loc_text: Your Crime.net is updated. There is a heavy duty drug cartel head in town. His name his Hector Moralez. Look him up.

pln_sh_int_35_01.base_text: Here I put some bags. You can try out the different weights. Gold is heavy, as you know.  Good to get a feel for them and how far you can throw.
pln_sh_int_35_01.loc_text: Here I put some bags. You can try out the different weights. Gold is heavy, as you know.  Good to get a feel for them and how far you can throw.

pln_sh_int_36_01.base_text: Doors. You can try these out too. Keep in mind that there are lots of ways to get one open. In our line of work, closing doors is pointless - opening 'em is what matters.
pln_sh_int_36_01.loc_text: Doors. You can try these out too. Keep in mind that there are lots of ways to get one open. In our line of work, closing doors is pointless - opening 'em is what matters.

pln_sh_int_37_01.base_text: I love this room. Give your weapons a try in here.
pln_sh_int_37_01.loc_text: I love this room. Give your weapons a try in here.

pln_sh_int_38_01.base_text: Light 'em up. They will ping back up.
pln_sh_int_38_01.loc_text: Light 'em up. They will ping back up.

pln_sh_int_39_01.base_text: Let's see, what else. You can test any of the objects out in here - just pick up the equipment and find something it fits on.
pln_sh_int_39_01.loc_text: Let's see, what else. You can test any of the objects out in here - just pick up the equipment and find something it fits on.

pln_sh_int_40_01.base_text: So the safes can be drilled, even picked - if you have the skill.
pln_sh_int_40_01.loc_text: So the safes can be drilled, even picked - if you have the skill.

pln_sh_int_41_01.base_text: I know this is elementary for you, but practice is practice, right?
pln_sh_int_41_01.loc_text: I know this is elementary for you, but practice is practice, right?

pln_sh_int_42_01.base_text: Cameras. Everybody hates cameras. I set up a room with a couple variations for you to test your stealth. No shame in failure and also no one shooting at you, which is nice.
pln_sh_int_42_01.loc_text: Cameras. Everybody hates cameras. I set up a room with a couple variations for you to test your stealth. No shame in failure and also no one shooting at you, which is nice.

pln_sh_int_43_01.base_text: Just go over to the switch and pick the difficulty.
pln_sh_int_43_01.loc_text: Just go over to the switch and pick the difficulty.

pln_sh_int_44_01.base_text: Good luck - those things are tricky.
pln_sh_int_44_01.loc_text: Good luck - those things are tricky.

pln_sh_int_45_01.base_text: In the field, if you trip an alarm, the cops come buzzing. DC's got a lot of them.
pln_sh_int_45_01.loc_text: In the field, if you trip an alarm, the cops come buzzing. DC's got a lot of them.

pln_sh_int_46_01.base_text: Gadgets. You can try out whatever you brought over here.
pln_sh_int_46_01.loc_text: Gadgets. You can try out whatever you brought over here.

pln_sh_int_47_01.base_text: Ammo bags, ECM jammers, medic bags, trip mines, sentry guns.
pln_sh_int_47_01.loc_text: Ammo bags, ECM jammers, medic bags, trip mines, sentry guns.

pln_sh_int_50_01.base_text: Tricky business. Gensec started mandating everyone wear 'em.
pln_sh_int_50_01.loc_text: Tricky business. Gensec started mandating everyone wear 'em.

pln_sh_int_51_01.base_text: I set up a little test case for you to see how these work.
pln_sh_int_51_01.loc_text: I set up a little test case for you to see how these work.

pln_sh_int_52_01.base_text: You'll wanna answer the pager before too long.
pln_sh_int_52_01.loc_text: You'll wanna answer the pager before too long.

pln_sh_int_53_01.base_text: Generally the rule of thumb is, they'll only believe you for a little while once the pager goes off.
pln_sh_int_53_01.loc_text: Generally the rule of thumb is, they'll only believe you for a little while once the pager goes off.

pln_sh_int_54_01.base_text: Living on borrowed time, as it were.
pln_sh_int_54_01.loc_text: Living on borrowed time, as it were.

pln_sh_int_55_01.base_text: But hell, if you're good - that's the edge you need.
pln_sh_int_55_01.loc_text: But hell, if you're good - that's the edge you need.

pln_sh_int_56_01.base_text: Now if you're a good liar... That's a whole other ballgame.
pln_sh_int_56_01.loc_text: Now if you're a good liar... That's a whole other ballgame.

pln_sh_int_57_01.base_text: Oh. The best room in the safe house. The vault.
pln_sh_int_57_01.loc_text: Oh. The best room in the safe house. The vault.

pln_sh_int_58_01.base_text: Your money is here. Your spendable cash is piled on that table.
pln_sh_int_58_01.loc_text: Your money is here. Your spendable cash is piled on that table.

pln_sh_int_59_01.base_text: If you get enough... Maybe we can upgrade this place, huh?
pln_sh_int_59_01.loc_text: If you get enough... Maybe we can upgrade this place, huh?

pln_sh_int_60_01.base_text: For now, just enjoy the view. We'll put more in here, I promise.
pln_sh_int_60_01.loc_text: For now, just enjoy the view. We'll put more in here, I promise.

pln_sh_int_61_01.base_text: That offshore account is your exit fund. When you skip town you'll be glad you put it right there.

pln_spa_brf_01.base_text: You're going to New York tonight. The Continental called - one of their key staff has been ambushed and is being held by unknown assailants at an address in Brooklyn. We have the location from a call he made just as they took him. The target's name is Charon. We need to get there fast, take out whoever's got him and send him back to the Continental safe and sound.
