pln_tr1_09_03.base_text: Damn it. Local channels just lit up! Expect company.
pln_tr1_09_03.loc_text: Damn it. Local channels just lit up! Expect company.

pln_tr1_10_01.base_text: No need for tip-toeing now. I'm sending the chopper with the drill.
pln_tr1_10_01.loc_text: No need for tip-toeing now. I'm sending the chopper with the drill.

pln_tr1_10_02.base_text: There's the alarm. Camera feeds are down. Drill the vaults till you find the turret.
pln_tr1_10_02.loc_text: There's the alarm. Camera feeds are down. Drill the vaults till you find the turret.

pln_tr1_10_03.base_text: Damn! Alright, I'm sending the drill. You'll have to open each vault til you find the turret.
pln_tr1_10_03.loc_text: Damn! Alright, I'm sending the drill. You'll have to open each vault til you find the turret.

pln_tr1_11_01.base_text: That's it. We got the turret. Im sending your pick-up ASAP.
pln_tr1_11_01.loc_text: That's it. We got the turret. Im sending your pick-up ASAP.

pln_tr1_11_02.base_text: That's the turret recovered. Give me a moment. Your pick-up is on its way.
pln_tr1_11_02.loc_text: That's the turret recovered. Give me a moment. Your pick-up is on its way.

pln_tr1_11_03.base_text: Great. That's what we came for. I'm sending your getaway. Just stay alive a little longer.
pln_tr1_11_03.loc_text: Great. That's what we came for. I'm sending your getaway. Just stay alive a little longer.

pln_tr1_12_01.base_text: There it is. Break that down and get each piece out.
pln_tr1_12_01.loc_text: There it is. Break that down and get each piece out.

pln_tr1_12_02.base_text: Great. There it is. Disassemble it and then move the pieces out.
pln_tr1_12_02.loc_text: Great. There it is. Disassemble it and then move the pieces out.

pln_tr1_13_01.base_text: Check the camera and see what's in the vault.
pln_tr1_13_01.loc_text: Check the camera and see what's in the vault.

pln_tr1_13_02.base_text: We're past the first lock. Now let's see what's inside.
pln_tr1_13_02.loc_text: We're past the first lock. Now let's see what's inside.

pln_tr1_13_03.base_text: OK, we're into the railcar. Use the camera to see what's inside.
pln_tr1_13_03.loc_text: OK, we're into the railcar. Use the camera to see what's inside.

pln_tr1_14_01.base_text: Woah! Be careful with that stuff. That's military grade explosives you're throwing around.
pln_tr1_14_01.loc_text: Woah! Be careful with that stuff. That's military grade explosives you're throwing around.

pln_tr1_14_02.base_text: Those shells have an angry temper. And a dollar value. Be careful with them.
pln_tr1_14_02.loc_text: Those shells have an angry temper. And a dollar value. Be careful with them.

pln_tr1_14_03.base_text: Be very careful with those bags, gang. They don't take the rough stuff well.
pln_tr1_14_03.loc_text: Be very careful with those bags, gang. They don't take the rough stuff well.

pln_tr1_15_01.base_text: OK, the chopper is almost there. Stand by.
pln_tr1_15_01.loc_text: OK, the chopper is almost there. Stand by.

pln_tr1_15_02.base_text: The chopper is in the area. Watch the skies.
pln_tr1_15_02.loc_text: The chopper is in the area. Watch the skies.

pln_tr1_15_03.base_text: Keep an eye out for the chopper.
pln_tr1_15_03.loc_text: Keep an eye out for the chopper.

pln_tr1_16_01.base_text: OK, the drill is on the ground. Get it and get those vaults open.
pln_tr1_16_01.loc_text: OK, the drill is on the ground. Get it and get those vaults open.

pln_tr1_16_02.base_text: The chopper just dropped off the drill, gang. You need to fetch it and get it to those vaults.
pln_tr1_16_02.loc_text: The chopper just dropped off the drill, gang. You need to fetch it and get it to those vaults.

pln_tr1_16_03.base_text: The drill has been delivered. Find it and get it to those vaults.
pln_tr1_16_03.loc_text: The drill has been delivered. Find it and get it to those vaults.

pln_tr1_17_01.base_text: Good find. This keycard will get you into the railcars.
pln_tr1_17_01.loc_text: Good find. This keycard will get you into the railcars.

pln_tr1_17_02.base_text: It's a security keycard for the railcars. That should speed things up.
pln_tr1_17_02.loc_text: It's a security keycard for the railcars. That should speed things up.

pln_tr1_17_03.base_text: Nice. That's the keycard for the railcars.
pln_tr1_17_03.loc_text: Nice. That's the keycard for the railcars.

pln_tr1_18_01.base_text: Keep your eyes open for a keycard.
pln_tr1_18_01.loc_text: Keep your eyes open for a keycard.

pln_tr1_18_02.base_text: Maybe some of those workers have a keycard for the railcars.
pln_tr1_18_02.loc_text: Maybe some of those workers have a keycard for the railcars.

pln_tr1_18_03.base_text: Shake those workers down. Maybe one of them has a keycard.
pln_tr1_18_03.loc_text: Shake those workers down. Maybe one of them has a keycard.

pln_tr1_19_01.base_text: Guys, get into those cars and find the one with the turret.
pln_tr1_19_01.loc_text: Guys, get into those cars and find the one with the turret.

pln_tr1_19_02.base_text: Gang, you need to locate that turret.
pln_tr1_19_02.loc_text: Gang, you need to locate that turret.

pln_tr1_20_01.base_text: The drill is in the area. Get it, and get it to work on that vault.
pln_tr1_20_01.loc_text: The drill is in the area. Get it, and get it to work on that vault.

pln_tr1_20_02.base_text: Drill is dropped. Get it working on the vault.
pln_tr1_20_02.loc_text: Drill is dropped. Get it working on the vault.

pln_tr1_21_01.base_text: You need to dismantle that turret.
pln_tr1_21_01.loc_text: You need to dismantle that turret.

pln_tr1_21_02.base_text: Guys, the turret - take it apart.
pln_tr1_21_02.loc_text: Guys, the turret - take it apart.

pln_tr1_22_01.base_text: Guys, you need to get those pieces to the pick-up.
pln_tr1_22_01.loc_text: Guys, you need to get those pieces to the pick-up.

pln_tr1_22_02.base_text: Move the pieces of the cannon to the pick-up, gang.
pln_tr1_22_02.loc_text: Move the pieces of the cannon to the pick-up, gang.

pln_tr1_24_01.base_text: Pilot is on the scene with the lance. Go get it.
pln_tr1_24_01.loc_text: Pilot is on the scene with the lance. Go get it.

pln_tr1_24_02.base_text: That's the pilot with the lance. Get it.
pln_tr1_24_02.loc_text: That's the pilot with the lance. Get it.

pln_tr1_25_01.base_text: Our pilot's deploying the lance. And by deploying I mean kicking out of the window.
pln_tr1_25_01.loc_text: Our pilot's deploying the lance. And by deploying I mean kicking out of the window.

pln_tr1_25_02.base_text: The pilot just signaled that he's deploying the lance. He's done his job, now you do yours.
pln_tr1_25_02.loc_text: The pilot just signaled that he's deploying the lance. He's done his job, now you do yours.

pln_tr1_26_01.base_text: OK, the pilot is on the way with another lance. You guys are greedy. I respect that.
pln_tr1_26_01.loc_text: OK, the pilot is on the way with another lance. You guys are greedy. I respect that.

pln_tr1_26_02.base_text: Chopper is on its way with another lance.
pln_tr1_26_02.loc_text: Chopper is on its way with another lance.

pln_tr1_27_01.base_text: These are the shells for the turret. Valuable, but not the main prize. Get the turret, and then come back for this ordnance.
pln_tr1_27_01.loc_text: These are the shells for the turret. Valuable, but not the main prize. Get the turret, and then come back for this ordnance.

pln_tr1_27_02.base_text: That's the turret ammo. We can take that later, but keep after the turret.
pln_tr1_27_02.loc_text: That's the turret ammo. We can take that later, but keep after the turret.

pln_tr1_28_01.base_text: They're blasting the train doors with demo charges. They really don't want you guys in there!
pln_tr1_28_01.loc_text: They're blasting the train doors with demo charges. They really don't want you guys in there!

pln_tr1_28_02.base_text: They're using C4 to blast those doors. Guess they don't know about all the live ammo that train is carrying.
pln_tr1_28_02.loc_text: They're using C4 to blast those doors. Guess they don't know about all the live ammo that train is carrying.

pln_tr1_28_03.base_text: They're blowing the doors off the railcars. You're going to be exposed to sniper fire in there, so be careful.
pln_tr1_28_03.loc_text: They're blowing the doors off the railcars. You're going to be exposed to sniper fire in there, so be careful.

pln_tr1_29_01.base_text: That's it! That's what we're looking for.
pln_tr1_29_01.loc_text: That's it! That's what we're looking for.

pln_tr1_29_02.base_text: Paydirt! That's what we came for, gang.
pln_tr1_29_02.loc_text: Paydirt! That's what we came for, gang.

pln_tr1_29_03.base_text: One high-tech, high-value piece of military badass right there.
pln_tr1_29_03.loc_text: One high-tech, high-value piece of military badass right there.

pln_tr1_30_01.base_text: We can get the ammo out, but only when the turret pieces are safely gathered in. Hide that ammo for now.
pln_tr1_30_01.loc_text: We can get the ammo out, but only when the turret pieces are safely gathered in. Hide that ammo for now.

pln_tr1_30_02.base_text: We can't get the ammo out until all those turret pieces are in the vehicle. Stash the ammo for later. Focus on securing the turret.
pln_tr1_30_02.loc_text: We can't get the ammo out until all those turret pieces are in the vehicle. Stash the ammo for later. Focus on securing the turret.

pln_tr1_brf_01_01.base_text: That blueprint you found was for a new type of infantry turret - codenamed RC1. Real next-gen shit. Digging a little deeper, I got word of a specially chartered train, headed in to the Pentagon. I've hacked the rail network, and they think they've stopped due to a glitch in the switches. Three railcars. One has the hardware. The other two have its ammo. It all sells, but your priority is the turret. They won't be expecting you.
pln_tr1_brf_01_01.loc_text: That blueprint you found was for a new type of infantry turret - codenamed RC1. Real next-gen shit. Digging a little deeper, I got word of a specially chartered train, headed in to the Pentagon. I've hacked the rail network, and they think they've stopped due to a glitch in the switches. Three railcars. One has the hardware. The other two have its ammo. It all sells, but your priority is the turret. They won't be expecting you.

pln_tr1_end_01_01.base_text: Absolutely outstanding work! There's going to be heads rolling down the corridors of the Pentagon when this train arrives.
pln_tr1_end_01_01.loc_text: Absolutely outstanding work! There's going to be heads rolling down the corridors of the Pentagon when this train arrives.

pln_tr1_end_01_02.base_text: That's how the pros do it! Chalk it up. Payday Gang one, Armadillo corp zero.
pln_tr1_end_01_02.loc_text: That's how the pros do it! Chalk it up. Payday Gang one, Armadillo corp zero.

pln_tr1_end_02_01.base_text: It was messy but you got the job done. Nice work!
pln_tr1_end_02_01.loc_text: It was messy but you got the job done. Nice work!

pln_tr1_end_02_02.base_text: That was a bit of bloody business, but sometimes it gets like that. Still, job done. Great work!
pln_tr1_end_02_02.loc_text: That was a bit of bloody business, but sometimes it gets like that. Still, job done. Great work!

pln_tr1_intro_01_01.base_text: Find the railcar with the turret. You might be able to find an access card somewhere to speed things up.
pln_tr1_intro_01_01.loc_text: Find the railcar with the turret. You might be able to find an access card somewhere to speed things up.

pln_tr1_intro_01_02.base_text: You need to get close and locate the right railcar. Once you've ID'd it, look around - you might be able to find an access card for the railcars.
pln_tr1_intro_01_02.loc_text: You need to get close and locate the right railcar. Once you've ID'd it, look around - you might be able to find an access card for the railcars.

pln_tr1b_01_01.base_text: No need for tip-toeing now. I'm sending the drill.
pln_tr1b_01_01.loc_text: No need for tip-toeing now. I'm sending the drill.

pln_tr1b_01_02.base_text: There's goes the alarm. And our camera feeds with it.
pln_tr1b_01_02.loc_text: There's goes the alarm. And our camera feeds with it.

pln_tr1b_01_03.base_text: Damn! Alright, I'm sending the drill.
pln_tr1b_01_03.loc_text: Damn! Alright, I'm sending the drill.

pln_tr1b_02_01.base_text: That's it. We got the turret. Now all we need is some ammo.
pln_tr1b_02_01.loc_text: That's it. We got the turret. Now all we need is some ammo.

pln_tr1b_02_02.base_text: That's the turret recovered. The driver will be back for the ammo.
pln_tr1b_02_02.loc_text: That's the turret recovered. The driver will be back for the ammo.

pln_tr1b_02_03.base_text: Great! That's what we came for. Once the driver drops 'em off, he'll return for the ammo.
pln_tr1b_02_03.loc_text: Great! That's what we came for. Once the driver drops 'em off, he'll return for the ammo.

pln_tr1b_03_01.base_text: Looks like we got everything, gang, Your pick-up is on its way.
pln_tr1b_03_01.loc_text: Looks like we got everything, gang, Your pick-up is on its way.

pln_tr1b_03_02.base_text: Ammo secured, I'm sending your pick-up ASAP. Be ready!
pln_tr1b_03_02.loc_text: Ammo secured, I'm sending your pick-up ASAP. Be ready!

pln_tr1b_03_03.base_text: The shells are tucked away. Nice work, I'm sending your getaway.
pln_tr1b_03_03.loc_text: The shells are tucked away. Nice work, I'm sending your getaway.

pln_tr1b_04_01.base_text: Plug that hard-drive into one of the train vault security systems, I should be able to hack it open.
pln_tr1b_04_01.loc_text: Plug that hard-drive into one of the train vault security systems, I should be able to hack it open.

pln_tr1b_04_02.base_text: Each vault door has a security system, and that drive will hack it open. Should be useful.
pln_tr1b_04_02.loc_text: Each vault door has a security system, and that drive will hack it open. Should be useful.

pln_tr1b_04_03.base_text: We can hack open a train vault if you plug that hard-drive into its security panel.
pln_tr1b_04_03.loc_text: We can hack open a train vault if you plug that hard-drive into its security panel.

pln_tr1b_05_01.base_text: Nice, I'm in. Wow, pretty nifty security. Who are these guys, section 9?
pln_tr1b_05_01.loc_text: Nice, I'm in. Wow, pretty nifty security. Who are these guys, section 9?

pln_tr1b_05_02.base_text: Alright I'm in! *whistles, impressed* These guys aren't messing around. Lots of additional firewalls.
pln_tr1b_05_02.loc_text: Alright I'm in! *whistles, impressed* These guys aren't messing around. Lots of additional firewalls.

pln_tr1b_05_03.base_text: Great, lets take a peek under the hood. Hmmm, nice. Good security, but nothing I can't handle.
pln_tr1b_05_03.loc_text: Great, lets take a peek under the hood. Hmmm, nice. Good security, but nothing I can't handle.

pln_tr1b_06_01.base_text: They've blocked me. I need you to disconnect their security buffer.
pln_tr1b_06_01.loc_text: They've blocked me. I need you to disconnect their security buffer.

pln_tr1b_06_02.base_text: One of their security buffers just kicked in. Disconnect it!
pln_tr1b_06_02.loc_text: One of their security buffers just kicked in. Disconnect it!

pln_tr1b_06_03.base_text: Another security buffer kicked in.Need to be disconnected manually.
pln_tr1b_06_03.loc_text: Another security buffer kicked in.Need to be disconnected manually.

pln_tr1b_07_02.base_text: I'm back in. *whispers* There is no spoon.
pln_tr1b_07_02.loc_text: I'm back in. *whispers* There is no spoon.

pln_tr1b_cbf_01_01.base_text: The blueprint you found was for a new Type of Turret. It looks like the government is transporting it soon. If we act fast, we can catch them off guard and steal it without anyone noticing.
pln_tr1b_cbf_01_01.loc_text: The blueprint you found was for a new Type of Turret. It looks like the government is transporting it soon. If we act fast, we can catch them off guard and steal it without anyone noticing.

pln_tr1b_cnc_01_01.base_text: The government owes us lunch money. Looks like we'll be taking their turret and a few bags of ammo as compensation.
pln_tr1b_cnc_01_01.loc_text: The government owes us lunch money. Looks like we'll be taking their turret and a few bags of ammo as compensation.

pln_tr1b_cnc_01_02.base_text: We got the train moving the prototype turret stopped at signals outside the city. Get there, get that turret.
pln_tr1b_cnc_01_02.loc_text: We got the train moving the prototype turret stopped at signals outside the city. Get there, get that turret.

pln_tr1b_cnc_01_03.base_text: We're going to steal a prototype turret from the Government. Get to the train outside the city, crack it open and get it.
pln_tr1b_cnc_01_03.loc_text: We're going to steal a prototype turret from the Government. Get to the train outside the city, crack it open and get it.

pln_ukranian_stage1_17_any_01.base_text: Alright, get in there and find the tiara.
pln_ukranian_stage1_17_any_01.loc_text: Alright, get in there and find the tiara.

pln_ukranian_stage1_18_any_01.base_text: It has to be in there somewhere. Check the safes in the back first.
pln_ukranian_stage1_18_any_01.loc_text: It has to be in there somewhere. Check the safes in the back first.

pln_ukranian_stage1_19_any_01.base_text: Too many people in there. Watch the civilians or this will get ugly fast.
pln_ukranian_stage1_19_any_01.loc_text: Too many people in there. Watch the civilians or this will get ugly fast.

pln_ukranian_stage1_22_any_01.base_text: Guys, we're in the middle of the city - try to do this stealthy.
pln_ukranian_stage1_22_any_01.loc_text: Guys, we're in the middle of the city - try to do this stealthy.

pln_ukranian_stage1_22_any_02.base_text: Guys, the place is wired up - stay frosty.
pln_ukranian_stage1_22_any_02.loc_text: Guys, the place is wired up - stay frosty.

pln_ukranian_stage1_23_any_01.base_text: There's the call - cops are on their way!
pln_ukranian_stage1_23_any_01.loc_text: There's the call - cops are on their way!

pln_ukranian_stage1_23_any_02.base_text: Damn it! Someone just tripped the alarm!
pln_ukranian_stage1_23_any_02.loc_text: Damn it! Someone just tripped the alarm!

pln_ukranian_stage1_23_any_03.base_text: We don't have long. The cops are coming now!
pln_ukranian_stage1_23_any_03.loc_text: We don't have long. The cops are coming now!

pln_ukranian_stage1_23_any_04.base_text: Tick tock, guys! Cops are on the way!
pln_ukranian_stage1_23_any_04.loc_text: Tick tock, guys! Cops are on the way!

pln_ukranian_stage1_26_any_01.base_text: Heat is coming in. I'm moving the escape car.
pln_ukranian_stage1_26_any_01.loc_text: Heat is coming in. I'm moving the escape car.

pln_ukranian_stage1_27_any_01.base_text: I'll be back with a new position.
pln_ukranian_stage1_27_any_01.loc_text: I'll be back with a new position.

pln_ukranian_stage1_27_any_02.base_text: Hang tight, I'm looking for another escape point.
pln_ukranian_stage1_27_any_02.loc_text: Hang tight, I'm looking for another escape point.

pln_ukranian_stage1_27_any_03.base_text: We're moving the escape car. Hang on.
pln_ukranian_stage1_27_any_03.loc_text: We're moving the escape car. Hang on.

pln_ukranian_stage1_27_any_04.base_text: We're moving the escape car. Don't blow the horn yet - this place is crawling with cops.
pln_ukranian_stage1_27_any_04.loc_text: We're moving the escape car. Don't blow the horn yet - this place is crawling with cops.

pln_ukranian_stage1_28_any_01.base_text: Escape car is there. You need to be finished soon fellas. Hurry!
pln_ukranian_stage1_28_any_01.loc_text: Escape car is there. You need to be finished soon fellas. Hurry!

pln_ukranian_stage1_29_any_01.base_text: OK, escape is here. You need to push through the cops - there is no other way!
pln_ukranian_stage1_29_any_01.loc_text: OK, escape is here. You need to push through the cops - there is no other way!

pln_ukranian_stage1_29_any_02.base_text: Escape is here, so whenever you're ready!
pln_ukranian_stage1_29_any_02.loc_text: Escape is here, so whenever you're ready!

pln_ukranian_stage1_30_any_01.base_text: The cops are all ready on the scene. They've must have been close by.
pln_ukranian_stage1_30_any_01.loc_text: The cops are all ready on the scene. They've must have been close by.

pln_ukranian_stage1_32_any_01.base_text: Everything except the tiara is for us!
pln_ukranian_stage1_32_any_01.loc_text: Everything except the tiara is for us!

pln_ukranian_stage1_32_any_02.base_text: Get some more loot if you can!
pln_ukranian_stage1_32_any_02.loc_text: Get some more loot if you can!

pln_ukranian_stage1_32_any_03.base_text: Don't pass out, the place is loaded with loot!
pln_ukranian_stage1_32_any_03.loc_text: Don't pass out, the place is loaded with loot!

pln_ukranian_stage1_32_any_04.base_text: There's a lot of money in the shops, there.
pln_ukranian_stage1_32_any_04.loc_text: There's a lot of money in the shops, there.

pln_ukranian_stage1_32_any_05.base_text: I hate to see all that gold go to waste!
pln_ukranian_stage1_32_any_05.loc_text: I hate to see all that gold go to waste!

pln_ukranian_stage1_33_any_01.base_text: Has anyone found the tiara yet?
pln_ukranian_stage1_33_any_01.loc_text: Has anyone found the tiara yet?

pln_ukranian_stage1_33_any_02.base_text: Are you looking for the tiara?
pln_ukranian_stage1_33_any_02.loc_text: Are you looking for the tiara?

pln_ukranian_stage1_33_any_03.base_text: Guys, if you haven't found the tiara yet - you better find it soon. We're running out of time!
pln_ukranian_stage1_33_any_03.loc_text: Guys, if you haven't found the tiara yet - you better find it soon. We're running out of time!

pln_ukranian_stage1_34_any_01.base_text: Check the stands in the shelves.
pln_ukranian_stage1_34_any_01.loc_text: Check the stands in the shelves.

pln_ukranian_stage1_34_any_02.base_text: Check all the cases, maybe it's there.
pln_ukranian_stage1_34_any_02.loc_text: Check all the cases, maybe it's there.

pln_ukranian_stage1_35_any_01.base_text: Did you check the whole place? Check the whole place!
pln_ukranian_stage1_35_any_01.loc_text: Did you check the whole place? Check the whole place!

pln_ukranian_stage1_35_any_02.base_text: It might be in the front too. It doesn't have to be in the back!
pln_ukranian_stage1_35_any_02.loc_text: It might be in the front too. It doesn't have to be in the back!

pln_ukranian_stage1_35_any_03.base_text: It just got to be in there somewhere.
pln_ukranian_stage1_35_any_03.loc_text: It just got to be in there somewhere.

pln_ukranian_stage1_35_any_04.base_text: It's a tiara, keep your eyes open. If it's not in the safe, it could be anywhere.
pln_ukranian_stage1_35_any_04.loc_text: It's a tiara, keep your eyes open. If it's not in the safe, it could be anywhere.

pln_ukranian_stage1_37_any_01.base_text: No one has heard you yet, keep going!
pln_ukranian_stage1_37_any_01.loc_text: No one has heard you yet, keep going!

pln_ukranian_stage1_37_any_02.base_text: You're still good. No one has heard you yet!
pln_ukranian_stage1_37_any_02.loc_text: You're still good. No one has heard you yet!

pln_ukranian_stage1_37_any_03.base_text: Five by five, you're still OK.
pln_ukranian_stage1_37_any_03.loc_text: Five by five, you're still OK.

pln_ukranian_stage1_38_any_02.loc_text: The broken window gave you away!

pln_ukranian_stage1_40_any_01.base_text: Look, there's a girl in the window.

pln_ukranian_stage1_40_any_02.base_text: Girl in the window, get out of sight!

pln_ukranian_stage1_41_any_01.loc_text: A neighbor saw you. She called 911.

pln_ukranian_stage1_42_any_01.base_text: That girl made you, here we go.

pln_ukranian_stage1_43_any_01.loc_text: Aw, there's a metal detector, wasn't in the plan.

pln_ukranian_stage1_43_any_03.loc_text: They must have just installed that metal detector.

pln_ukranian_stage1_43_any_04.loc_text: Aw, no! The metal detector is new!

pln_ukranian_stage1_44_any_01.base_text: Aw, so it's empty!? Keep looking!
pln_ukranian_stage1_44_any_01.loc_text: Aw, so it's empty!? Keep looking!

pln_ukranian_stage1_44_any_02.base_text: Alright, keep going! It's got to be there!
pln_ukranian_stage1_44_any_02.loc_text: Alright, keep going! It's got to be there!

pln_ukranian_stage1_44_any_03.base_text: How can it be empty!? Aah!

pln_ukranian_stage1_44_any_04.base_text: OK! OK, it's empty. Just keep looking!

pln_ukranian_stage1_45_any_01.base_text: Alright, we got spotted by the cameras. We got to go to plan B.
pln_ukranian_stage1_45_any_01.loc_text: Alright, we got spotted by the cameras. We got to go to plan B.

pln_ukranian_stage1_45_any_02.base_text: Cameras got us, time for plan B.
pln_ukranian_stage1_45_any_02.loc_text: Cameras got us, time for plan B.

pln_ukranian_stage1_45_any_03.base_text: Damn it! I think you just tripped the cameras.
pln_ukranian_stage1_45_any_03.loc_text: Damn it! I think you just tripped the cameras.

pln_ukranian_stage1_46_any_02.base_text: Good work! The metal detector is off.

pln_ukranian_stage1_46_any_03.base_text: Metal detector seems to be down. Great work!

pln_ukranian_stage1_47_any_01.base_text: In case you don't have time to drill, use a shape charge if you have one.
pln_ukranian_stage1_47_any_01.loc_text: In case you don't have time to drill, use a shape charge if you have one.

pln_ukranian_stage1_47_any_02.base_text: You can use a shape charge if you have one. It's faster than the drill, someone might hear it though.
pln_ukranian_stage1_47_any_02.loc_text: You can use a shape charge if you have one. It's faster than the drill, someone might hear it though.

pln_ukranian_stage1_48_any_01.base_text: Aw, that's a civilian casualty! Be careful!
pln_ukranian_stage1_48_any_01.loc_text: Aw, that's a civilian casualty! Be careful!

pln_ukranian_stage1_48_any_02.base_text: What did I say about civilians?
pln_ukranian_stage1_48_any_02.loc_text: What did I say about civilians?

pln_ukranian_stage1_48_any_03.base_text: Dead civilians bring the heat, guys!
pln_ukranian_stage1_48_any_03.loc_text: Dead civilians bring the heat, guys!

pln_ukranian_stage1_48_any_04.base_text: All these dead locos, this is messy!
pln_ukranian_stage1_48_any_04.loc_text: All these dead locos, this is messy!

pln_ukranian_stage1_48_any_05.base_text: They're calling in snipers. Too many civilians casualties.
pln_ukranian_stage1_48_any_05.loc_text: They're calling in snipers. Too many civilians casualties.

pln_ukranian_stage1_49_any_01.base_text: Police snipers, damn it! Now we're really in for it!
pln_ukranian_stage1_49_any_01.loc_text: Police snipers, damn it! Now we're really in for it!

pln_ukranian_stage1_49_any_02.base_text: Snipers deployed, keep your heads down!
pln_ukranian_stage1_49_any_02.loc_text: Snipers deployed, keep your heads down!

pln_ukranian_stage1_49_any_03.base_text: Snipers! Too many civilians dead, can't stay there!
pln_ukranian_stage1_49_any_03.loc_text: Snipers! Too many civilians dead, can't stay there!

pln_ukranian_stage1_49_any_04.base_text: Snipers are here. We can't stick around!
pln_ukranian_stage1_49_any_04.loc_text: Snipers are here. We can't stick around!

pln_ukranian_stage1_50_any_01.base_text: Al right, that's the tiara we're looking for!
pln_ukranian_stage1_50_any_01.loc_text: Al right, that's the tiara we're looking for!

pln_ukranian_stage1_51_any_01.base_text: The escape van is ready, go when you're good!
pln_ukranian_stage1_51_any_01.loc_text: The escape van is ready, go when you're good!

pln_ukranian_stage1_52_any_01.base_text: Awesome! That's extra cash for us, drinks are on me!
pln_ukranian_stage1_52_any_01.loc_text: Awesome! That's extra cash for us, drinks are on me!

pln_ukranian_stage1_52_any_02.base_text: All the extra loot goes into all the pockets. The more, the better!
pln_ukranian_stage1_52_any_02.loc_text: All the extra loot goes into all the pockets. The more, the better!

pln_ukranian_stage1_52_any_03.base_text: More loot than I expected. Good work!
pln_ukranian_stage1_52_any_03.loc_text: More loot than I expected. Good work!

pln_ukranian_stage1_52_any_04.base_text: Serious haul. You guys did well!
pln_ukranian_stage1_52_any_04.loc_text: Serious haul. You guys did well!

pln_ukranian_stage1_53_any_01.base_text: No one even heard you. True pros!
pln_ukranian_stage1_53_any_01.loc_text: No one even heard you. True pros!

pln_ukranian_stage1_53_any_02.base_text: I knew you were pros and no one even heard you. Amazing!
pln_ukranian_stage1_53_any_02.loc_text: I knew you were pros and no one even heard you. Amazing!

pln_ukranian_stage1_53_any_03.base_text: Cold and calculated, just like we want it!
pln_ukranian_stage1_53_any_03.loc_text: Cold and calculated, just like we want it!

pln_ukranian_stage1_54_any_01.base_text: Great! You guys can escape now, but choose to go for more of the extra loot.
pln_ukranian_stage1_54_any_01.loc_text: Great! You guys can escape now, but choose to go for more of the extra loot.

pln_ukranian_stage1_54_any_02.base_text: Alright, the choice is: escape now - or - go for more loot, your call!
pln_ukranian_stage1_54_any_02.loc_text: Alright, the choice is: escape now - or - go for more loot, your call!

pln_ukranian_stage1_55_any_01.base_text: There's movement in the alleys. Stay alert!
pln_ukranian_stage1_55_any_01.loc_text: There's movement in the alleys. Stay alert!

pln_ukranian_stage1_55_any_02.base_text: Movement in the alleys. Stay sharp!
pln_ukranian_stage1_55_any_02.loc_text: Movement in the alleys. Stay sharp!

pln_ukranian_stage1_brief_01.base_text: Vlad really doesn't like this Dmitri guy. One of these old-country feuds, maybe he shagged his sister or something.
pln_ukranian_stage1_brief_01.loc_text: Vlad really doesn't like this Dmitri guy. One of these old-country feuds, maybe he shagged his sister or something.

pln_ukranian_stage1_brief_01b.base_text: Anyway let's help the man settle the score. We go for the tiara - back room from what I understand.
pln_ukranian_stage1_brief_01b.loc_text: Anyway let's help the man settle the score. We go for the tiara - back room from what I understand.

pln_ukranian_stage1_brief_01c.base_text: Don't get the heat on you too early or your escape is going to be rough. Check your assets. Let's go.
pln_ukranian_stage1_brief_01c.loc_text: Don't get the heat on you too early or your escape is going to be rough. Check your assets. Let's go.

pln_ukranian_stage1_end_a_01.base_text: OK, we're off. Tiara goes to Vlad and he'll get the revenge he wanted. I'm glad we could accommodate him. See you at the safe house.
pln_ukranian_stage1_end_a_01.loc_text: OK, we're off. Tiara goes to Vlad and he'll get the revenge he wanted. I'm glad we could accommodate him. See you at the safe house.

pln_ukranian_stage1_end_a_02.base_text: Nice work. Vlad got what we came for. A little bonus jewelry would have been nice, I'm not going to lie but there's always another day.
pln_ukranian_stage1_end_a_02.loc_text: Nice work. Vlad got what we came for. A little bonus jewelry would have been nice, I'm not going to lie but there's always another day.

pln_ukranian_stage1_end_a_03.base_text: Time to collect on that tiara. Vlad will be happy. You guys just crashed a wedding.
pln_ukranian_stage1_end_a_03.loc_text: Time to collect on that tiara. Vlad will be happy. You guys just crashed a wedding.

pln_ukranian_stage1_end_b_01.base_text: Nice, jewels and tiara. Time to collect from Vlad. He's going to be happy.
pln_ukranian_stage1_end_b_01.loc_text: Nice, jewels and tiara. Time to collect from Vlad. He's going to be happy.

pln_ukranian_stage1_end_b_02.base_text: Nice run team. The tiara is secured and Vlad can't contain himself with joy. Let's go see the crazy Ruskie.
pln_ukranian_stage1_end_b_02.loc_text: Nice run team. The tiara is secured and Vlad can't contain himself with joy. Let's go see the crazy Ruskie.

pln_ukranian_stage1_end_b_03.base_text: What do they call that? Bling?  Anyway time for a payday.
pln_ukranian_stage1_end_b_03.loc_text: What do they call that? Bling?  Anyway time for a payday.

pln_ukranian_stage1_end_c_01.base_text: Now that's a knockover. Good job getting everything there, that was a lot of work. The tiara is a bonus in this case and Vlad is happy as hell.
pln_ukranian_stage1_end_c_01.loc_text: Now that's a knockover. Good job getting everything there, that was a lot of work. The tiara is a bonus in this case and Vlad is happy as hell.

pln_ukranian_stage1_end_c_02.base_text: Drinks on me for this one... Super fine hit, people.
pln_ukranian_stage1_end_c_02.loc_text: Drinks on me for this one... Super fine hit, people.

pln_ukranian_stage1_end_c_03.base_text: Smooth operation team. You stole everything and the tiara. We are in town and are making a name for ourselves here. Great job.
pln_ukranian_stage1_end_c_03.loc_text: Smooth operation team. You stole everything and the tiara. We are in town and are making a name for ourselves here. Great job.

pln_ukranian_stage1_intro_a_01.base_text: Remember. Go in, get the tiara, hit the store for more jewels if you feel lucky - the place is loaded. But watch out for guards, cameras, metal detectors.
pln_ukranian_stage1_intro_a_01.loc_text: Remember. Go in, get the tiara, hit the store for more jewels if you feel lucky - the place is loaded. But watch out for guards, cameras, metal detectors.

pln_ukranian_stage1_intro_a_01b.base_text: The owner is nuts about security. Escape van will be near the dropoff.
pln_ukranian_stage1_intro_a_01b.loc_text: The owner is nuts about security. Escape van will be near the dropoff.

pln_ukranian_stage1_intro_a_02.base_text: OK, this is business as usual for Vlad. We get the tiara, we get the jewels if you want them. You can do this job any way you want as long as you get the tiara. Back to the van when you are done.
pln_ukranian_stage1_intro_a_02.loc_text: OK, this is business as usual for Vlad. We get the tiara, we get the jewels if you want them. You can do this job any way you want as long as you get the tiara. Back to the van when you are done.

pln_ukranian_stage1_intro_a_03.base_text: Keep an eye on the heat guys don't want cops here too soon. Avoid cameras and guards. Take any extra jewels they have if you can. We leave with the same van we came in.
pln_ukranian_stage1_intro_a_03.loc_text: Keep an eye on the heat guys don't want cops here too soon. Avoid cameras and guards. Take any extra jewels they have if you can. We leave with the same van we came in.

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_01_any_01.loc_text: OK folks, only way out of there is through those doors.

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_01_any_02.base_text: OK listen to me, when those doors open you better be ready to get out.
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_01_any_02.loc_text: OK listen to me, when those doors open you better be ready to get out.

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_01_any_03.base_text: Look - those doors aren't going to hold up when they start shooting.
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_01_any_03.loc_text: Look - those doors aren't going to hold up when they start shooting.

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_02_any_01.base_text: Hey, there's so many cops out there! Get yourself ready to deal with them when the doors open.
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_02_any_01.loc_text: Hey, there's so many cops out there! Get yourself ready to deal with them when the doors open.

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_02_any_02.base_text: Hey, half the God damn police force is out there. Are you ready to defend yourselves!?
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_02_any_02.loc_text: Hey, half the God damn police force is out there. Are you ready to defend yourselves!?

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_02_any_03.base_text: They've got the wagons circled out here. Ready up for a war!
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_02_any_03.loc_text: They've got the wagons circled out here. Ready up for a war!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_03_any_01.base_text: Hold them back, I'm looking for an escape driver as we speak!
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_03_any_01.loc_text: Hold them back, I'm looking for an escape driver as we speak!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_03_any_02.base_text: Hang tight! Hang tight! I'm searching for an escape driver right God damn now!
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_03_any_02.loc_text: Hang tight! Hang tight! I'm searching for an escape driver right God damn now!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_03_any_03.base_text: Return fire! I'm getting you a driver, you need to keep them off the coke!
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_03_any_03.loc_text: Return fire! I'm getting you a driver, you need to keep them off the coke!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_03_any_04.base_text: You return fire and keep them off your position! I'll get you a God damn driver! OK!?
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_03_any_04.loc_text: You return fire and keep them off your position! I'll get you a God damn driver! OK!?

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_04_any_01.loc_text: Alright, I've got your pick-up driver on the line, patching him through now.

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_04_any_02.base_text: OK now, I got you a pick-up driver, patching him through.
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_04_any_02.loc_text: OK now, I got you a pick-up driver, patching him through.

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_04_any_03.loc_text: People, I got the pick-up driver right here.

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_05_any_01.loc_text: Everybody get that!? Three minutes to go till he gets here. Keep them off the coke until then!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_05_any_02.base_text: You hear that everybody? You got three minutes until he gets here. Hold them back!
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_05_any_02.loc_text: You hear that everybody? You got three minutes until he gets here. Hold them back!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_05_any_03.base_text: I hope everyone heard that! Three minutes until the pick-up car arrives!  Defend! Defend! Defend!
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_05_any_03.loc_text: I hope everyone heard that! Three minutes until the pick-up car arrives!  Defend! Defend! Defend!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_06_any_01.loc_text: Two minutes, two minutes till the pick-up car is here! Hold them back!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_06_any_02.base_text: Hey The pick-up car is coming here in two minutes so you just have to fight a little more!
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_06_any_02.loc_text: Hey The pick-up car is coming here in two minutes so you just have to fight a little more!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_06_any_03.base_text: Hey, two minutes, we have two more minutes until the pick-up car! Not much longer!
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_06_any_03.loc_text: Hey, two minutes, we have two more minutes until the pick-up car! Not much longer!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_07_any_01.loc_text: Pick-up coming in one minute. Don't let up now!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_07_any_02.loc_text: One minute, one minute people! Shut these guys down! Pick-up's almost here!

pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_07_any_03.base_text: One more minute! Pick-up's almost here!
pln_watchdogs_new_stage1_07_any_03.loc_text: One more minute! Pick-up's almost here!

pyr_al1_05_06.loc_text: You guys did a great job up there. You wanna join the road crew?

pyr_al1_05_08.loc_text: Holy motherfuckin' shit! That shit fuckin' rocked! Whoooooooooooo!

pyr_al1_06_01.loc_text: Guy, ya gotta do better. Timing means shit if you're firing off the wrong ammo, capische!

pyr_al1_06_03.base_text: What the hell is going on up there, shitwipe?!
pyr_al1_06_03.loc_text: What the hell is going on up there, shitwipe?!

pyr_al1_06_04.base_text: You guys havin' a circle jerk up there? 'cos you're sure pulling on my shit down here! Get it tight!
pyr_al1_06_04.loc_text: You guys havin' a circle jerk up there? 'cos you're sure pulling on my shit down here! Get it tight!

pyr_al1_06_05.base_text: You motherfuckin' shitbirds. Secure your shit up there.
pyr_al1_06_05.loc_text: You motherfuckin' shitbirds. Secure your shit up there.

pyr_al1_07_01.base_text: Man, that was beautiful. Just beautiful. Like my dear old momma. (sniffs)
pyr_al1_07_01.loc_text: Man, that was beautiful. Just beautiful. Like my dear old momma. (sniffs)

pyr_al1_07_02.loc_text: Brother, goddamn that was outstanding! You guys are on fuckin' point - whoooooooo!

pyr_al1_07_04.base_text: Ahhh shit, partner. These kids are going fuckin' ape shit. Whooooooo!
pyr_al1_07_04.loc_text: Ahhh shit, partner. These kids are going fuckin' ape shit. Whooooooo!

pyr_al1_07_05.base_text: Yeah, that's it. Ah fuck! This is beautiful!
pyr_al1_07_05.loc_text: Yeah, that's it. Ah fuck! This is beautiful!

pyr_al1_07_06.base_text: Yeah! That shit was tight. Fuckin' tight!
pyr_al1_07_06.loc_text: Yeah! That shit was tight. Fuckin' tight!

pyr_al1_07_07.base_text: I got one word for you: whooooooooooooooooooooo!
pyr_al1_07_07.loc_text: I got one word for you: whooooooooooooooooooooo!

pyr_al1_07_08.base_text: Great work! Man, these kids are gonna remember this as the greatest night of their lives.
pyr_al1_07_08.loc_text: Great work! Man, these kids are gonna remember this as the greatest night of their lives.

pyr_al1_08_04.base_text: Fucks sake. Assholes! Fucked it. Shape up, or I'm pullin' you out. By the short and curlies.
pyr_al1_08_04.loc_text: Fucks sake. Assholes! Fucked it. Shape up, or I'm pullin' you out. By the short and curlies.

pyr_al1_08_07.base_text: Get it right, or I'll see you fucked from Austin to Amarillo.
pyr_al1_08_07.loc_text: Get it right, or I'll see you fucked from Austin to Amarillo.

pyr_al1_10_04.loc_text: Eye on the ball. Fire it!

pyr_al1_10_05.loc_text: Hands off dicks, hands on button. Now!

pyr_al1_10_07.base_text: No fucking it this time. Drop it!

pyr_al1_10_08.base_text: Don't screw the pooch again. Go!
pyr_al1_10_08.loc_text: Don't screw the pooch again. Go!

pyr_al1_11_03.loc_text: You screwed that pooch good, asshole.

pyr_al1_12_01.base_text: How can you fuck up pressin' a goddamn button?!
pyr_al1_12_01.loc_text: How can you fuck up pressin' a goddamn button?!

pyr_al1_12_02.base_text: You're makin' a disaster here! Straighten your shit, motherfuckers!
pyr_al1_12_02.loc_text: You're makin' a disaster here! Straighten your shit, motherfuckers!

pyr_al1_12_05.base_text: Man, you guys are a train wreck. What a fuckin' mess.
pyr_al1_12_05.loc_text: Man, you guys are a train wreck. What a fuckin' mess.

pyr_al1_13_01.loc_text: All right. (to someone off phone) Dwayne, send some guys up there to kick a little ass.

pyr_al1_13_06.base_text: I've had enough. (to someone off phone) Send security up there. I want fingers pulled.
pyr_al1_13_06.loc_text: I've had enough. (to someone off phone) Send security up there. I want fingers pulled.

pyr_al1_14_04.base_text: (drolly) Good job, fuckface. Great fucking job.
pyr_al1_14_04.loc_text: (drolly) Good job, fuckface. Great fucking job.

pyr_al1_14_07.base_text: And another fuck up. At least you're consistent.
pyr_al1_14_07.loc_text: And another fuck up. At least you're consistent.

pyr_al1_14_08.base_text: I expected nothing less than another fucking fuck up. Fuuuuuuuuck.
pyr_al1_14_08.loc_text: I expected nothing less than another fucking fuck up. Fuuuuuuuuck.

pyr_al1_15_02.base_text: Out-goddamn-standing! You guys are world class (sniffling) World class, ya hear!
pyr_al1_15_02.loc_text: Out-goddamn-standing! You guys are world class (sniffling) World class, ya hear!

pyr_al1_15_03.base_text: Welcome to the greatest night of my fucking life. Great job everyone!
pyr_al1_15_03.loc_text: Welcome to the greatest night of my fucking life. Great job everyone!

pyr_al1_15_07.base_text: And that is how you put on a great show. Great work!
pyr_al1_15_07.loc_text: And that is how you put on a great show. Great work!

pyr_al1_15_08.base_text: Best goddamn crew in the history of music! Can I get a hell yeah.
pyr_al1_15_08.loc_text: Best goddamn crew in the history of music! Can I get a hell yeah.

pyr_al1_16_01.base_text: Well, that was just about the worst goddamn pyro show I've seen.
pyr_al1_16_01.loc_text: Well, that was just about the worst goddamn pyro show I've seen.

pyr_al1_16_03.base_text: You guys need to go back to pyro school. What a bunch of horse crap!
pyr_al1_16_03.loc_text: You guys need to go back to pyro school. What a bunch of horse crap!

pyr_al1_16_06.base_text: I'll be goddamned fucked. That pyro display was some sorry sack of shit.
pyr_al1_16_06.loc_text: I'll be goddamned fucked. That pyro display was some sorry sack of shit.

pyr_al1_17_01.base_text: Did something just come loose? Check it, and fix it!
pyr_al1_17_01.loc_text: Did something just come loose? Check it, and fix it!

pyr_al1_17_02.base_text: Woah, we just lost of whole bucket of lights. Fix the hardware up there.
pyr_al1_17_02.loc_text: Woah, we just lost of whole bucket of lights. Fix the hardware up there.

pyr_al1_17_03.base_text: Crap. You guys seeing this? Something went up there. Pyro team - fix it!
pyr_al1_17_03.loc_text: Crap. You guys seeing this? Something went up there. Pyro team - fix it!

pyr_al1_17_04.base_text: What the hell! We just lost a feed. Fix it you guys!
pyr_al1_17_04.loc_text: What the hell! We just lost a feed. Fix it you guys!

pyr_al1_17_05.base_text: Looks like a hardware malfunction up at the booth. Pyro team, deal with it!
pyr_al1_17_05.loc_text: Looks like a hardware malfunction up at the booth. Pyro team, deal with it!

pyr_al1_17_06.base_text: Something's fucked up there. Pyro guys, you gotta deal with it.
pyr_al1_17_06.loc_text: Something's fucked up there. Pyro guys, you gotta deal with it.

pyr_al1_17_07.base_text: Ummm, just...yeah, something fucked up. Fix it, you guys.
pyr_al1_17_07.loc_text: Ummm, just...yeah, something fucked up. Fix it, you guys.

pyr_al1_17_08.base_text: Just got a hardware problem. Whoever fixes it gets to meet Alesso.
pyr_al1_17_08.loc_text: Just got a hardware problem. Whoever fixes it gets to meet Alesso.

pyr_al1_18_01.base_text: Shit! Somethings burning over there. Get that fire out, quick!
pyr_al1_18_01.loc_text: Shit! Somethings burning over there. Get that fire out, quick!

pyr_al1_18_02.base_text: Fire warning just lit up. Sheeeeeeeeeit. Get it out, now!
pyr_al1_18_02.loc_text: Fire warning just lit up. Sheeeeeeeeeit. Get it out, now!

pyr_al1_18_03.base_text: I can see the fire and smoke from here. Grab an extinguisher and get it out!
pyr_al1_18_03.loc_text: I can see the fire and smoke from here. Grab an extinguisher and get it out!

pyr_al1_18_04.base_text: Something's burning y'all and it doesn't smell like no Texas bbq i've ever had. Put that fire out!
pyr_al1_18_04.loc_text: Something's burning y'all and it doesn't smell like no Texas bbq i've ever had. Put that fire out!

pyr_al1_18_05.base_text: We can't have this place on fire - it's the pyro booth. Put it out!
pyr_al1_18_05.loc_text: We can't have this place on fire - it's the pyro booth. Put it out!

pyr_al1_18_06.base_text: Keep the pyro for the show, guys. Get the fire dealt with, lickety-spit!
pyr_al1_18_06.loc_text: Keep the pyro for the show, guys. Get the fire dealt with, lickety-spit!

pyr_al1_18_07.base_text: That gear's expensive. Like, ten years of your salary expensive. Deal with the fire!
pyr_al1_18_07.loc_text: That gear's expensive. Like, ten years of your salary expensive. Deal with the fire!

pyr_al1_18_08.base_text: Hot shit, there's a fire up there. You in the booth! Deal with it!
pyr_al1_18_08.loc_text: Hot shit, there's a fire up there. You in the booth! Deal with it!

pyr_al1_18_09.base_text: You cooking pork chop sandwiches? Put out the fire. (quietly in the background) I'm a computer.
pyr_al1_18_09.loc_text: You cooking pork chop sandwiches? Put out the fire. (quietly in the background) I'm a computer.

pyr_al1_19_01.base_text: (coming close to the phone)...so then Sid wiped it all over Keith's sandwich, and said it was just mayonnaise! (laughs)
pyr_al1_19_01.loc_text: (coming close to the phone)...so then Sid wiped it all over Keith's sandwich, and said it was just mayonnaise! (laughs)

pyr_al1_19_02.base_text: Man, this music is fucking beautiful. It should be played in church.
pyr_al1_19_02.loc_text: Man, this music is fucking beautiful. It should be played in church.

pyr_al1_19_03.base_text: I wish we had this music when I was a kid. They're fucking loving it.
pyr_al1_19_03.loc_text: I wish we had this music when I was a kid. They're fucking loving it.

pyr_al1_19_04.base_text: Did I ever tell you guys about the weekend me and Jimi smuggled a bale of grass and a goat out of Tijuana?
pyr_al1_19_04.loc_text: Did I ever tell you guys about the weekend me and Jimi smuggled a bale of grass and a goat out of Tijuana?

pyr_al1_19_05.base_text: Take it from an old man, guys. Don't do drugs. Drinkin' and smokin' is fucking great though.
pyr_al1_19_05.loc_text: Take it from an old man, guys. Don't do drugs. Drinkin' and smokin' is fucking great though.

pyr_al1_19_06.loc_text: We played here back when Harry's Wine Box stood here. That was '73.

pyr_al1_19_07.base_text: See this tattoo? Got this off the king himself. Fucking A, man.
pyr_al1_19_07.loc_text: See this tattoo? Got this off the king himself. Fucking A, man.

pyr_al1_19_08.base_text: I was there when The Cockroaches split. Greatest fucking band ever.
pyr_al1_19_08.loc_text: I was there when The Cockroaches split. Greatest fucking band ever.

pyr_al1_20_03.loc_text: Hey hey hey, shithead! Answer the fucking Intercom!

rb1_bph_intro_01d.loc_text: Locke, you're payin' the fuckin' laundry bill this month.

rb1_bph_intro_01f.loc_text: If the Dentist is up there, he's getting his teeth kicked in.

rb1_bph_intro_02d.loc_text: Pretty fucking fitting for a Murkywater hideout.

rb1_bph_intro_03c.loc_text: Whoever gets to Kento first, pays for the drinks.

rb1_bph_intro_04d.loc_text: Hang in there Bain, we're here to get you.

rb22_bph_intro_01a.loc_text: Whose idea was it to go in from here?

rb22_bph_intro_01e.base_text: You would have thought someone like the Dentist could afford a better kept prison to torture people in...
rb22_bph_intro_01e.loc_text: You would have thought someone like the Dentist could afford a better kept prison to torture people in...

rb22_bph_intro_02a.base_text: Bain, old chum, here we come! Oh, such mighty poetry.
rb22_bph_intro_02a.loc_text: Bain, old chum, here we come! Oh, such mighty poetry.

rb22_bph_intro_02e.base_text: Sewers. Why did it have to be sewers.
rb22_bph_intro_02e.loc_text: Sewers. Why did it have to be sewers.

rb22_bph_intro_03d.base_text: Keep an eye out for things that glow green.
rb22_bph_intro_03d.loc_text: Keep an eye out for things that glow green.

rb22_bph_intro_04aa.base_text: I kind of have a bad feeling about this. Should I have a bad feeling about this?
rb22_bph_intro_04aa.loc_text: I kind of have a bad feeling about this. Should I have a bad feeling about this?

rb22_bph_intro_04c.base_text: Did anyone remember to pack rain coats in case we need to make a raft?
rb22_bph_intro_04c.loc_text: Did anyone remember to pack rain coats in case we need to make a raft?

rb22_sah_intro_01a.loc_text: More like we're heisting an HP Lovecraft novel...

rb22_sah_intro_02a.base_text: It'd be rather boring if it was right behind the front door, wouldn't it?
rb22_sah_intro_02a.loc_text: It'd be rather boring if it was right behind the front door, wouldn't it?

rb22_sah_intro_02b.base_text: They're just trying to prove they have imaginations.
rb22_sah_intro_02b.loc_text: They're just trying to prove they have imaginations.

rb22_sah_intro_03a.base_text: I could see myself living in a place like this. If it were, you know, less creepy.
rb22_sah_intro_03a.loc_text: I could see myself living in a place like this. If it were, you know, less creepy.

rb22_sah_intro_03b.base_text: Maybe we'll bring home a couple as pets for you, Locke.
rb22_sah_intro_03b.loc_text: Maybe we'll bring home a couple as pets for you, Locke.

rb22_sah_intro_04a.base_text: I have an odd feeling about this one. Like it's... somehow personal.
rb22_sah_intro_04a.loc_text: I have an odd feeling about this one. Like it's... somehow personal.

rb22_sah_intro_04b.base_text: If the guests smell of fish, I suggest getting the hell out of here.
rb22_sah_intro_04b.loc_text: If the guests smell of fish, I suggest getting the hell out of here.

rb5_bph_intro_01c.base_text: Fuckin' Locke, always gotta spoil the fun.
rb5_bph_intro_01c.loc_text: Fuckin' Locke, always gotta spoil the fun.

rb5_bph_intro_01g.base_text: Right, wankers. We do this one for the boss.
rb5_bph_intro_01g.loc_text: Right, wankers. We do this one for the boss.

rb5_bph_intro_02b.base_text: I hope that piece-of-shit traitor Kento is up there. I really do.
rb5_bph_intro_02b.loc_text: I hope that piece-of-shit traitor Kento is up there. I really do.

rb5_bph_intro_03b.base_text: All of this has happened before. Fuck me.
rb5_bph_intro_03b.loc_text: All of this has happened before. Fuck me.

rb5_bph_intro_04a.base_text: Aw, fuck me. The air in this place...
rb5_bph_intro_04a.loc_text: Aw, fuck me. The air in this place...

rb5_hb2_02_01.base_text: We need to find the Operations Room. That's where we'll find the info we need.
rb5_hb2_02_01.loc_text: We need to find the Operations Room. That's where we'll find the info we need.

rb5_hb2_02_02.base_text: First stop is the Operations Room. It's the Feds' nerve centre. Should be able to find what we need there.
rb5_hb2_02_02.loc_text: First stop is the Operations Room. It's the Feds' nerve centre. Should be able to find what we need there.

rb5_hb2_02_03.base_text: Operations is our first stop. From there, we should be able to find what we need.
rb5_hb2_02_03.loc_text: Operations is our first stop. From there, we should be able to find what we need.

rb5_hb2_03_01.base_text: Here! I'm getting to that server. Kill every last fucker ya see!
rb5_hb2_03_01.loc_text: Here! I'm getting to that server. Kill every last fucker ya see!

rb5_hb2_03_02.base_text: This is it. Right, I need to get on those servers. Clear the room!
rb5_hb2_03_02.loc_text: This is it. Right, I need to get on those servers. Clear the room!

rb5_hb2_03_03.base_text: We're here! I need to get to the server. Drop these feds.
rb5_hb2_03_03.loc_text: We're here! I need to get to the server. Drop these feds.

rb5_hb2_04_01.base_text: OK, I'm inside. I'll get to work on these servers. Keep me covered!
rb5_hb2_04_01.loc_text: OK, I'm inside. I'll get to work on these servers. Keep me covered!

rb5_hb2_04_02.base_text: I'm inside. Keep them fuckers off me while I work.
rb5_hb2_04_02.loc_text: I'm inside. Keep them fuckers off me while I work.

rb5_hb2_05_01.base_text: Shite! Small problem - server's heavily encrypted. The encryption keys are kept in the Security Office. You need to grab them and bring them back here!
rb5_hb2_05_01.loc_text: Shite! Small problem - server's heavily encrypted. The encryption keys are kept in the Security Office. You need to grab them and bring them back here!

rb5_hb2_05_02.base_text: Ah bollocks. Server's encrypted up the arse. The code keys should in the Security Office. Get over there, grab 'em and get them back here.
rb5_hb2_05_02.loc_text: Ah bollocks. Server's encrypted up the arse. The code keys should in the Security Office. Get over there, grab 'em and get them back here.

rb5_hb2_05_03.base_text: Got a little problem, lads. Server is all bolloxed up with encryption. Take ages to crack, so we need encryption keys. Security office should have some.
rb5_hb2_05_03.loc_text: Got a little problem, lads. Server is all bolloxed up with encryption. Take ages to crack, so we need encryption keys. Security office should have some.

rb5_hb2_06_01.base_text: Shit, can't access the interview files. Need direct approval from the FBI Director himself. Find his office. See if you can fill in for him.
rb5_hb2_06_01.loc_text: Shit, can't access the interview files. Need direct approval from the FBI Director himself. Find his office. See if you can fill in for him.

rb5_hb2_06_02.base_text: Ah shite. These interview files are locked. Can only be unlocked with approval from the Director himself. Fuck me, this goes to the top. Any of you guys fancy being king for a day?
rb5_hb2_06_02.loc_text: Ah shite. These interview files are locked. Can only be unlocked with approval from the Director himself. Fuck me, this goes to the top. Any of you guys fancy being king for a day?

rb5_hb2_06_03.base_text: Ah, bloody hell. Some interview files are locked. Need approval from... Fuck me, the Director himself. Whoever this rat is, he's connected. Get to the Director's office!
rb5_hb2_06_03.loc_text: Ah, bloody hell. Some interview files are locked. Need approval from... Fuck me, the Director himself. Whoever this rat is, he's connected. Get to the Director's office!

rb5_hb2_07_01.base_text: OK, you're in! I've sent a security clearance request. You need to approve it.
rb5_hb2_07_01.loc_text: OK, you're in! I've sent a security clearance request. You need to approve it.

rb5_hb2_07_02.base_text: You're in. Ha! His password was: iheartrainbows44. The requests are on the way. Approve them!
rb5_hb2_07_02.loc_text: You're in. Ha! His password was: iheartrainbows44. The requests are on the way. Approve them!

rb5_hb2_07_03.base_text: Alright, you're in. You've got access to the PC of the bloody Director of the fuckin' FB bastard I! Approve the request.
rb5_hb2_07_03.loc_text: Alright, you're in. You've got access to the PC of the bloody Director of the fuckin' FB bastard I! Approve the request.

rb5_hb2_08_01.base_text: Just keep yer lid on. Let me find all the files you need to sign off on.
rb5_hb2_08_01.loc_text: Just keep yer lid on. Let me find all the files you need to sign off on.

rb5_hb2_08_02.base_text: Keep yer knickers on, lads. Need to find all the files for ya to sign off.
rb5_hb2_08_02.loc_text: Keep yer knickers on, lads. Need to find all the files for ya to sign off.

rb5_hb2_08_03.base_text: Hold on, fellas. Just finding the files for ya.
rb5_hb2_08_03.loc_text: Hold on, fellas. Just finding the files for ya.

rb5_hb2_09_01.base_text: OK, another request you need to approve!
rb5_hb2_09_01.loc_text: OK, another request you need to approve!

rb5_hb2_09_02.base_text: Alright, just approve that request. Fuck me, he's got an easy job.
rb5_hb2_09_02.loc_text: Alright, just approve that request. Fuck me, he's got an easy job.

rb5_hb2_09_03.base_text: Another request for you to sign off on.
rb5_hb2_09_03.loc_text: Another request for you to sign off on.

rb5_hb2_10_01.base_text: Great, I've got access to all the restricted files I needed! Get back here and keep this show going!
rb5_hb2_10_01.loc_text: Great, I've got access to all the restricted files I needed! Get back here and keep this show going!

rb5_hb2_10_02.base_text: Unrestricted access. Fuckin' get in! Now, get back here. Let's keep this going.
rb5_hb2_10_02.loc_text: Unrestricted access. Fuckin' get in! Now, get back here. Let's keep this going.

rb5_hb2_10_03.base_text: We got a bollocks-load of clearance now. Get back here. Still work to do.
rb5_hb2_10_03.loc_text: We got a bollocks-load of clearance now. Get back here. Still work to do.

rb5_hb2_11_01.base_text: OK, missing some files. Witness testimonies, kept in the Archives. Get me those files!
rb5_hb2_11_01.loc_text: OK, missing some files. Witness testimonies, kept in the Archives. Get me those files!

rb5_hb2_11_02.base_text: Shite. Need a few files not on the servers. Witness testimonies, kept in the Archives. Get down there.
rb5_hb2_11_02.loc_text: Shite. Need a few files not on the servers. Witness testimonies, kept in the Archives. Get down there.

rb5_hb2_11_03.base_text: Alright, looks like some witness testimonies were missing. Going to have to hit the hard copies. Get to the Archives and grab 'em.
rb5_hb2_11_03.loc_text: Alright, looks like some witness testimonies were missing. Going to have to hit the hard copies. Get to the Archives and grab 'em.

vld_can_cbf_01.base_text: Every Christmas I set up a little operation - gifts for the children, and "gifts" for the parents, yes?  Thing is, supplies are low this year. But! I have found an alternative. A clutch of assholes have an operation near here. Consider it a little toyshop, yes. I need you to get down there, take out the muscle and get the "elves" back to work.

Normally I wouldn't give two shakes of my pisser for that drunken asshole. I'd let him rot there, but, you know... Family. Track that old soak down and get him out. I'll pay a nice Christmas bonus for any of his packages too.

vld_fex_end_01.base_text: Once again, my friends, you have done me a good service. With Buluc now being shit out by fishes, I think the Coyopas are finished. And the Dentist has no more help in Mexico, so he will be desperate and vulnerable. Whatever job you have coming next should be easier for you. Just don't forget about Vlad, yes? There are a lot of things happening, things that could be dangerous for us in the future. But we will talk more... soon. Cheers and goodbye.

vld_fex_tap04_03a.loc_text: Don't you worry about him. Worry about yourself instead.

vld_fex_tap05_01.base_text: Oh, that piece of shit is going to wish he had not fucked with Vlad.
vld_fex_tap05_01.loc_text: Oh, that piece of shit is going to wish he had not fucked with Vlad.

vld_fex_tap05_03.base_text: Such a waste, all this space, for that Mexican shit and his Coyopas...
vld_fex_tap05_03.loc_text: Such a waste, all this space, for that Mexican shit and his Coyopas...

vld_fex_tap05_04.base_text: This is a nice house. Would look better with some of Vlad's furniture.
vld_fex_tap05_04.loc_text: This is a nice house. Would look better with some of Vlad's furniture.

vld_fex_tap06_01.base_text: Tell me, old friend. How many years will you spend in purgatory, before going to hell?
vld_fex_tap06_01.loc_text: Tell me, old friend. How many years will you spend in purgatory, before going to hell?

vld_fex_tap06_01a.base_text: They say a man must spend time in Purgatory before going to hell.
vld_fex_tap06_01a.loc_text: They say a man must spend time in Purgatory before going to hell.

vld_fex_tap06_02.base_text: An old saying in Ukraine is 150 years for every sin, then you burn forever.
vld_fex_tap06_02.loc_text: An old saying in Ukraine is 150 years for every sin, then you burn forever.

vld_fex_tap06_02a.base_text: How long, depends on how many sins you have done. And your sins, they are many, you fucker.
vld_fex_tap06_02a.loc_text: How long, depends on how many sins you have done. And your sins, they are many, you fucker.

vld_fex_tap06_03.base_text: You will see soon enough, my dear Buluc. You will see.
vld_fex_tap06_03.loc_text: You will see soon enough, my dear Buluc. You will see.

vld_ko1b_01_01.base_text: What's taking you clowns so long? Check the Murkywater containers for the vault.
vld_ko1b_01_01.loc_text: What's taking you clowns so long? Check the Murkywater containers for the vault.

vld_ko1b_01_02.base_text: Come on, fingers out of assholes. The vault will be in a Murkywater container.
vld_ko1b_01_02.loc_text: Come on, fingers out of assholes. The vault will be in a Murkywater container.

vld_ko1b_01_03.base_text: Those Murky bastards are going to be trying to ship the goodies out, so check their containers!
vld_ko1b_01_03.loc_text: Those Murky bastards are going to be trying to ship the goodies out, so check their containers!

vld_ko1b_02_01.base_text: Ahhh! The vault. I can almost (deep breath) smell the magic!
vld_ko1b_02_01.loc_text: Ahhh! The vault. I can almost (deep breath) smell the magic!

vld_ko1b_02_02.base_text: You found it. Good! Good. I knew I could depend on you.
vld_ko1b_02_02.loc_text: You found it. Good! Good. I knew I could depend on you.

vld_ko1b_02_03.base_text: Yes. The vault! This is good. This is very good!
vld_ko1b_02_03.loc_text: Yes. The vault! This is good. This is very good!

vld_ko1b_03_01.base_text: Ah, don't wet your knickers, Bain! I have buyer. Very far away. Is all good.
vld_ko1b_03_01.loc_text: Ah, don't wet your knickers, Bain! I have buyer. Very far away. Is all good.

vld_ko1b_03_02.base_text: Keep calm, you big baby. Buyer very far away. Probably won't even use.
vld_ko1b_03_02.loc_text: Keep calm, you big baby. Buyer very far away. Probably won't even use.

vld_ko1b_03_03.base_text: Don't cry, Bain. It's all fine. Buyer pays big for them. They're very far away.
vld_ko1b_03_03.loc_text: Don't cry, Bain. It's all fine. Buyer pays big for them. They're very far away.

vld_ko1b_04_01.base_text: I got a train ready. Not too far away. Bring the warheads. Hurry!
vld_ko1b_04_01.loc_text: I got a train ready. Not too far away. Bring the warheads. Hurry!

vld_ko1b_04_02.base_text: Now bring them to the train yard. You'll be far away before they know it.
vld_ko1b_04_02.loc_text: Now bring them to the train yard. You'll be far away before they know it.

vld_ko1b_04_03.base_text: I have a train waiting for them. It's close by. Bring the nukes. Hurry!
vld_ko1b_04_03.loc_text: I have a train waiting for them. It's close by. Bring the nukes. Hurry!

vld_ko1b_05_01.base_text: Feeling okay? Any rectal bleeding? Check poop holes.
vld_ko1b_05_01.loc_text: Feeling okay? Any rectal bleeding? Check poop holes.

vld_ko1b_05_02.base_text: Tell me if you are feeling sick. Or if hair fall out. Or balls fall off.
vld_ko1b_05_02.loc_text: Tell me if you are feeling sick. Or if hair fall out. Or balls fall off.

vld_ko1b_05_03.base_text: They should be safe, but... any of you feel like little teeth feeding on your bone marrow?
vld_ko1b_05_03.loc_text: They should be safe, but... any of you feel like little teeth feeding on your bone marrow?

vld_ko1b_05_04.base_text: I am sure that they are very safe. But, regardless, make sure you enjoy every day of what life remains to you.
vld_ko1b_05_04.loc_text: I am sure that they are very safe. But, regardless, make sure you enjoy every day of what life remains to you.

vld_ko1b_05_05.base_text: Feeling good? If your piss glows in the dark, consult a doctor.
vld_ko1b_05_05.loc_text: Feeling good? If your piss glows in the dark, consult a doctor.

vld_ko1b_05_06.base_text: Are you all feeling okay? If you suffer radiation poisoning, I send you flowers and grapes.
vld_ko1b_05_06.loc_text: Are you all feeling okay? If you suffer radiation poisoning, I send you flowers and grapes.

vld_ko1b_05_07.base_text: Hope you're not getting sick. Nasty cold going around. Yeah, you probably just have cold.
vld_ko1b_05_07.loc_text: Hope you're not getting sick. Nasty cold going around. Yeah, you probably just have cold.

vld_ko1b_05_08.base_text: Hope the radiation isn't getting to you. But, on bright side, maybe you develop super-powers, yes?
vld_ko1b_05_08.loc_text: Hope the radiation isn't getting to you. But, on bright side, maybe you develop super-powers, yes?

vld_ko1b_05_09.base_text: Everyone feeling good, yes? Anyone with, I don't know, skin peeling away and showing bone?
vld_ko1b_05_09.loc_text: Everyone feeling good, yes? Anyone with, I don't know, skin peeling away and showing bone?

vld_ko1b_06_01.loc_text: You see that muscle car? That's Gaddafi's 1965 original Longfellow. It's your ride now.

vld_ko1b_06_02.base_text: Is that Gaddafi's vintage 1965 Longfellow? Can you think of a more perfect way to bring the nukes to me?
vld_ko1b_06_02.loc_text: Is that Gaddafi's vintage 1965 Longfellow? Can you think of a more perfect way to bring the nukes to me?

vld_ko1b_06_03.base_text: Ah, over there! A Longfellow! 1965, 4.7 litre V8. You guys like to ride in style, right?
vld_ko1b_06_03.loc_text: Ah, over there! A Longfellow! 1965, 4.7 litre V8. You guys like to ride in style, right?

vld_ko1b_07_01.base_text: You see that muscle car? That's Gaddafi's 1965 original. It's your ride now.
vld_ko1b_07_01.loc_text: You see that muscle car? That's Gaddafi's 1965 original. It's your ride now.

vld_ko1b_07_02.base_text: Is that Gaddafi's vintage 1965 muscle car? Can you think of a more perfect way to bring the nukes to me?
vld_ko1b_07_02.loc_text: Is that Gaddafi's vintage 1965 muscle car? Can you think of a more perfect way to bring the nukes to me?

vld_ko1b_07_03.base_text: Ah, over there! 1965, 4.7 litre V8. Second best thing made that year, yes?
vld_ko1b_07_03.loc_text: Ah, over there! 1965, 4.7 litre V8. Second best thing made that year, yes?

vld_ko1b_08_01.base_text: Good! Get the rest and we will get them out of here. I hope this fucking train is a smooth ride.
vld_ko1b_08_01.loc_text: Good! Get the rest and we will get them out of here. I hope this fucking train is a smooth ride.

vld_ko1b_08_02.base_text: That's the first.  Ah, such a small thing, but enough to wipe out Washington.
vld_ko1b_08_02.loc_text: That's the first.  Ah, such a small thing, but enough to wipe out Washington.

vld_ko1b_08_03.base_text: That's it. Ahhhhh, almost tempted. To see two suns in the sunset.  (sighs) Zavorazhivayushiy.
vld_ko1b_08_03.loc_text: That's it. Ahhhhh, almost tempted. To see two suns in the sunset.  (sighs) Zavorazhivayushiy.

vld_ko1b_09_03.loc_text: Each one will bring a King's ransom. That's literally true (laughs)!

vld_ko1b_cbf_01_01.base_text: I heard about the outstanding job you did sneaking into that Murkywater warehouse. Most impressive. I need you to go back there. Those mercenaries've got a 'little something' tucked away. A little something I would like. The Murkies are pulling out, and I need this before it disappears down some rabbit-hole.

Those mercenaries've got a 'little something' tucked away. A little something I would like. The Murkies are pulling out, and I need this before it disappears down some rabbit-hole.

vld_ko1b_cnc_01_01.loc_text: My dear friends. Just a quick pick-up job. Fetch me a 'little something' from the Murkywater warehouse.

vld_ko1b_cnc_01_02.base_text: There's a 'little something' I need you to fetch me from the Murkywater warehouse. Quick smash and grab.

vld_ko1b_cnc_01_03.base_text: There's something at the Murkywater warehouse, down by the river. Something I would like.
vld_ko1b_cnc_01_03.loc_text: There's something at the Murkywater warehouse, down by the river. Something I would like.

vld_ko1b_end_01_01.base_text: Great job, my friends. Again, you have served me well. Don't worry about the nukes. Enjoy your money.

vld_ko1b_end_01_03.base_text: Good work, my friends! Can't wait to see how those Murky bastards explain that one.

vld_moon_01_01.loc_text: My friends, you will save my Christmas.

vld_moon_01_03.loc_text: Go find Santa, my little helpers. We can still have a white Christmas.

vld_moon_02_01.loc_text: A drunk Santa - it's a fucking abomination! And my coke!
