vld_moon_33_02.base_text: This tree is going to fly, my friends!
vld_moon_33_02.loc_text: This tree is going to fly, my friends!

vld_moon_33_03.base_text: It's a nice tree, and we will take it. Don't damage it!
vld_moon_33_03.loc_text: It's a nice tree, and we will take it. Don't damage it!

vld_moon_34_01.base_text: This tree is leaving. So is Santa!
vld_moon_34_01.loc_text: This tree is leaving. So is Santa!

vld_moon_34_02.base_text: Let's make like a tree and leave, my friends!
vld_moon_34_02.loc_text: Let's make like a tree and leave, my friends!

vld_moon_34_03.base_text: Tree is leaving - get Santa aboard!
vld_moon_34_03.loc_text: Tree is leaving - get Santa aboard!

vld_moon_35_01.base_text: He'd better hold on tight. It'd be a shame if he fell out of the sky and died.
vld_moon_35_01.loc_text: He'd better hold on tight. It'd be a shame if he fell out of the sky and died.

vld_moon_35_02.base_text: Maybe he'll get lost walking those 2 meters to the tree.
vld_moon_35_02.loc_text: Maybe he'll get lost walking those 2 meters to the tree.

vld_moon_35_03.base_text: I hope he doesn't pass out again at the last moment.
vld_moon_35_03.loc_text: I hope he doesn't pass out again at the last moment.

vld_moon_36_01.base_text: Bile will be back soon. Hold on my friends!
vld_moon_36_01.loc_text: Bile will be back soon. Hold on my friends!

vld_moon_36_02.base_text: Maybe do some shopping while you wait?
vld_moon_36_02.loc_text: Maybe do some shopping while you wait?

vld_moon_36_03.base_text: Just wait there, you'll be picked up soon. I promise!
vld_moon_36_03.loc_text: Just wait there, you'll be picked up soon. I promise!

vld_moon_37_01.base_text: And off we go my friends!
vld_moon_37_01.loc_text: And off we go my friends!

vld_moon_37_02.base_text: Merry Christmas! Let's get out of here!
vld_moon_37_02.loc_text: Merry Christmas! Let's get out of here!

vld_moon_37_03.base_text: This was fun, yes? But it's time to go!
vld_moon_37_03.loc_text: This was fun, yes? But it's time to go!

vld_moon_38_01.base_text: Every year around christmas I get a little nostalgic you know. Old times, old enemies.
vld_moon_38_01.loc_text: Every year around christmas I get a little nostalgic you know. Old times, old enemies.

vld_moon_38_02.base_text: One of my best Christmases was that one time when I killed a dirty snitch on Christmas morning. Tied him to a Christmas tree in front of his family and set him on fire. It was beautiful.
vld_moon_38_02.loc_text: One of my best Christmases was that one time when I killed a dirty snitch on Christmas morning. Tied him to a Christmas tree in front of his family and set him on fire. It was beautiful.

vld_moon_38_03.base_text: I love shopping. I just don't like to pay. Vlad doesn't pay, he takes what he wants.
vld_moon_38_03.loc_text: I love shopping. I just don't like to pay. Vlad doesn't pay, he takes what he wants.

vld_moon_38_04.base_text: I hope these fucking cops go home and reconsider their actions. They didn't treat Santa very well, so there will be no presents this year.
vld_moon_38_04.loc_text: I hope these fucking cops go home and reconsider their actions. They didn't treat Santa very well, so there will be no presents this year.

vld_moon_38_05.base_text: I always do good business around Christmas. People spend a lot of money. It's the stress, they need my stuff.
vld_moon_38_05.loc_text: I always do good business around Christmas. People spend a lot of money. It's the stress, they need my stuff.

vld_moon_38_06.base_text: They say you should work with family because you can trust them. But this guy, I can only trust him to be an idiot and to fuck up.
vld_moon_38_06.loc_text: They say you should work with family because you can trust them. But this guy, I can only trust him to be an idiot and to fuck up.

vld_moon_38_07.base_text: My wife said she might go shopping here tomorrow. I should warn her that it'll probably be closed. (laughs)
vld_moon_38_07.loc_text: My wife said she might go shopping here tomorrow. I should warn her that it'll probably be closed. (laughs)

vld_moon_38_08.base_text: There is something about the sound of shattering shop windows that I find very pleasing. I don't know why.
vld_moon_38_08.loc_text: There is something about the sound of shattering shop windows that I find very pleasing. I don't know why.

vld_moon_38_09.base_text: They say always treat others like they treat you. And I've been treated very badly, many times.
vld_moon_38_09.loc_text: They say always treat others like they treat you. And I've been treated very badly, many times.

vld_moon_38_10.base_text: I bet these cops don't believe in Santa Claus. But I do! And he's a fucking pain in the ass!
vld_moon_38_10.loc_text: I bet these cops don't believe in Santa Claus. But I do! And he's a fucking pain in the ass!

vld_moon_39_02.base_text: Leave the tree alone! I like it!
vld_moon_39_02.loc_text: Leave the tree alone! I like it!

vld_moon_39_03.base_text: That's a beautiful tree! Stop it, you barbarians!
vld_moon_39_03.loc_text: That's a beautiful tree! Stop it, you barbarians!

vld_moon_39_04.base_text: You can destroy anything you want, and kill anyone you want, but leave the tree alone!
vld_moon_39_04.loc_text: You can destroy anything you want, and kill anyone you want, but leave the tree alone!

vld_moon_39_05.base_text: Don't shoot the tree! You'll ruin Christmas!
vld_moon_39_05.loc_text: Don't shoot the tree! You'll ruin Christmas!

vld_moon_39_06.base_text: Hey, I have plans for that tree! Don't destroy it!
vld_moon_39_06.loc_text: Hey, I have plans for that tree! Don't destroy it!

vld_moon_39_07.base_text: Not the tree! Stop shooting at it!
vld_moon_39_07.loc_text: Not the tree! Stop shooting at it!

vld_moon_39_08.base_text: Don't shoot the tree! It's an endangered species!
vld_moon_39_08.loc_text: Don't shoot the tree! It's an endangered species!

vld_moon_39_10.base_text: What the fuck did that tree do to you? Huh?
vld_moon_39_10.loc_text: What the fuck did that tree do to you? Huh?

vld_moon_intro_01.base_text: They say having family is beautiful but sometimes I don't know. Now find that stupid fuck and free him - hopefully he's not too drunk to remember in which boxes he hid the cocaine.
vld_moon_intro_01.loc_text: They say having family is beautiful but sometimes I don't know. Now find that stupid fuck and free him - hopefully he's not too drunk to remember in which boxes he hid the cocaine.

vld_moon_intro_02.base_text: I wish I didn't have these kinds of problems. It's so hard to find good help these days.
vld_moon_intro_02.loc_text: I wish I didn't have these kinds of problems. It's so hard to find good help these days.

vld_moon_intro_03.base_text: I'll start calling him Rudolph, that red-nosed drunk fuck! Find him, and find my coke!
vld_moon_intro_03.loc_text: I'll start calling him Rudolph, that red-nosed drunk fuck! Find him, and find my coke!

vld_nightclub_brf_outro_01.base_text: Go, men - and get me what I want. The night out has just begun!
vld_nightclub_brf_outro_01.loc_text: Go, men - and get me what I want. The night out has just begun!

vld_nightclub_brf_outro_02.base_text: Go, men - and get me what I want. The night out has just begun!
vld_nightclub_brf_outro_02.loc_text: Go, men - and get me what I want. The night out has just begun!

vld_nightclub_brf_speak_01.base_text: This Tasteful Club was mine. After prison... No longer so. I know the owner and his ways. He's a useless (prick).
vld_nightclub_brf_speak_01.loc_text: This Tasteful Club was mine. After prison... No longer so. I know the owner and his ways. He's a useless (prick).

vld_nightclub_brf_speak_02.base_text: So you go in and you will find his safe and other moneys. He will have lots. He does not trust banks and he trusts only Russians. Go in party - and go out and party!
vld_nightclub_brf_speak_02.loc_text: So you go in and you will find his safe and other moneys. He will have lots. He does not trust banks and he trusts only Russians. Go in party - and go out and party!

vld_nightclub_brf_speak_03.base_text: His club will be full of people - get past them to his safe. He should keep that close to himself. If he dies he dies! If he lives - he is lucky shit.
vld_nightclub_brf_speak_03.loc_text: His club will be full of people - get past them to his safe. He should keep that close to himself. If he dies he dies! If he lives - he is lucky shit.

vld_nightclub_brf_speak_03b.base_text: Get the money and get out! Let them know Vlad started the party!
vld_nightclub_brf_speak_03b.loc_text: Get the money and get out! Let them know Vlad started the party!

vld_nightclub_brf_speak_04.base_text: His party is over - I want all his money for his treason. You go in and you take all from him. Find the safe and fast.
vld_nightclub_brf_speak_04.loc_text: His party is over - I want all his money for his treason. You go in and you take all from him. Find the safe and fast.

vld_nightclub_brf_speak_04b.base_text: This is in a neighbourhood with police. They don't like party crashing.
vld_nightclub_brf_speak_04b.loc_text: This is in a neighbourhood with police. They don't like party crashing.

vld_nightclub_cnc_01.base_text: My old club needs visit. I know owner - he keeps money in safe somewhere. By now much money. Too much, is what I say.
vld_nightclub_cnc_01.loc_text: My old club needs visit. I know owner - he keeps money in safe somewhere. By now much money. Too much, is what I say.

vld_nightclub_cnc_02.base_text: Once we party at my Tasteful club - big money, big times. Now we need to make big take from there.
vld_nightclub_cnc_02.loc_text: Once we party at my Tasteful club - big money, big times. Now we need to make big take from there.

vld_nightclub_cnc_03.base_text: We are going to party. Party all my former money from my (asshole) competitor. You will help?
vld_nightclub_cnc_03.loc_text: We are going to party. Party all my former money from my (asshole) competitor. You will help?

vld_nightclub_debrief_01.base_text: Very good party you had! Thank you! This will make others think twice next time.
vld_nightclub_debrief_01.loc_text: Very good party you had! Thank you! This will make others think twice next time.

vld_nightclub_debrief_02.base_text: You party hard, hahaha! Like night in St. Petersburg. I have now more power and more hunger. We will take this town again.
vld_nightclub_debrief_02.loc_text: You party hard, hahaha! Like night in St. Petersburg. I have now more power and more hunger. We will take this town again.

vld_nightclub_debrief_03.base_text: Hehe, ho-wow! You party like a real Russian. Mhm! Haha. Now spend money and come back to me when ready to take on bigger things. Yeah... Vlad is growing.
vld_nightclub_debrief_03.loc_text: Hehe, ho-wow! You party like a real Russian. Mhm! Haha. Now spend money and come back to me when ready to take on bigger things. Yeah... Vlad is growing.

vld_nightclub_debrief_04.base_text: Police was hurt and Tasteful is no longer party place. I like your style. Thank you for this and have fun with the money. I think we work together well.
vld_nightclub_debrief_04.loc_text: Police was hurt and Tasteful is no longer party place. I like your style. Thank you for this and have fun with the money. I think we work together well.

vld_pt1_01_01.base_text: Keep your eyes open, yes, but especially your ears.
vld_pt1_01_01.loc_text: Keep your eyes open, yes, but especially your ears.

vld_pt1_01_02.base_text: Listen out for the goats. They'll be making...goat noises.
vld_pt1_01_02.loc_text: Listen out for the goats. They'll be making...goat noises.

vld_pt1_02_01.base_text: Just....goat "noises"! Screaming. Well, wouldn't you with 5lbs of coke up your ass?
vld_pt1_02_01.loc_text: Just....goat "noises"! Screaming. Well, wouldn't you with 5lbs of coke up your ass?

vld_pt1_02_02.base_text: I ain't Sir David Attenborough! Or Igor the Croat. Just....goat noises!
vld_pt1_02_02.loc_text: I ain't Sir David Attenborough! Or Igor the Croat. Just....goat noises!

vld_pt1_02_03.base_text: Whatever noise you expect from a farm animal with a bag of coke buried in it's shitpipe.
vld_pt1_02_03.loc_text: Whatever noise you expect from a farm animal with a bag of coke buried in it's shitpipe.

vld_pt1_03_01.base_text: Boris, my driver, will come and pick you guys up.
vld_pt1_03_01.loc_text: Boris, my driver, will come and pick you guys up.

vld_pt1_03_02.base_text: Boris is on his way. Isn't that right, Boris?
vld_pt1_03_02.loc_text: Boris is on his way. Isn't that right, Boris?

vld_pt1_03_03.base_text: I have a man on the way for you. Boris?
vld_pt1_03_03.loc_text: I have a man on the way for you. Boris?

vld_pt1_04_01.base_text: Looks like one of the goats is up in that apartment. Get up there!
vld_pt1_04_01.loc_text: Looks like one of the goats is up in that apartment. Get up there!

vld_pt1_04_02.base_text: A goat got into an apartment up there. Get after it! Look for a way in.
vld_pt1_04_02.loc_text: A goat got into an apartment up there. Get after it! Look for a way in.

vld_pt1_04_03.base_text: Someone tried to take a goat. Make special pet, yeah? Like Igor the Serb and his "special" pets. "Special". Get into that apartment and rescue it.
vld_pt1_04_03.loc_text: Someone tried to take a goat. Make special pet, yeah? Like Igor the Serb and his "special" pets. "Special". Get into that apartment and rescue it.

vld_pt1_05_01.base_text: Yes! Get in there, you hairy little bastard!
vld_pt1_05_01.loc_text: Yes! Get in there, you hairy little bastard!

vld_pt1_05_02.base_text: And stay there, you little shit!
vld_pt1_05_02.loc_text: And stay there, you little shit!

vld_pt1_05_03.base_text: And don't fucking move. Fucking goat prick...
vld_pt1_05_03.loc_text: And don't fucking move. Fucking goat prick...

vld_pt1_05_04.base_text: And stay...you grass-chewin', horn-growin', freaky-eyed MOTHERFUCKER!
vld_pt1_05_04.loc_text: And stay...you grass-chewin', horn-growin', freaky-eyed MOTHERFUCKER!

vld_pt1_05_05.base_text: You move and it is Igor time for you, asshole.
vld_pt1_05_05.loc_text: You move and it is Igor time for you, asshole.

vld_pt1_05_08.base_text: Keep on with the goat catching thing!
vld_pt1_05_08.loc_text: Keep on with the goat catching thing!

vld_pt1_05_10.base_text: Stay there, or it's the halal butcher for you.
vld_pt1_05_10.loc_text: Stay there, or it's the halal butcher for you.

vld_pt1_05_11.base_text: Don't run away again, little goat.
vld_pt1_05_11.loc_text: Don't run away again, little goat.

vld_pt1_05_13.base_text: Don't think about running again, or it's the stewpot for you!
vld_pt1_05_13.loc_text: Don't think about running again, or it's the stewpot for you!

vld_pt1_05_14.base_text: Don't move. Or I'll slow-fucking-roast you.
vld_pt1_05_14.loc_text: Don't move. Or I'll slow-fucking-roast you.

vld_pt1_05_15.base_text: You move, and you'll be in Igors bed before you can say "oh shit".
vld_pt1_05_15.loc_text: You move, and you'll be in Igors bed before you can say "oh shit".

vld_pt1_05_16.base_text: No more runny-run for you, goat-boy.
vld_pt1_05_16.loc_text: No more runny-run for you, goat-boy.

vld_pt1_05_17.base_text: Get in there, ya ugly little fuck!
vld_pt1_05_17.loc_text: Get in there, ya ugly little fuck!

vld_pt1_05_18.base_text: No more adventures for you, little friend.
vld_pt1_05_18.loc_text: No more adventures for you, little friend.

vld_pt1_05_19.base_text: Your adventure is over, you goat-fuck.
vld_pt1_05_19.loc_text: Your adventure is over, you goat-fuck.

vld_pt1_06_03.base_text: There you are, you little fucker!
vld_pt1_06_03.loc_text: There you are, you little fucker!

vld_pt1_07_01.base_text: Nice. Good! Now, Boris is going to lead you to a farm outside the city. There he can...extract the coke.
vld_pt1_07_01.loc_text: Nice. Good! Now, Boris is going to lead you to a farm outside the city. There he can...extract the coke.

vld_pt1_07_02.base_text: I have a pleasant little farm outside the city. Boris will lead you there. He can remove those packets of coke.
vld_pt1_07_02.loc_text: I have a pleasant little farm outside the city. Boris will lead you there. He can remove those packets of coke.

vld_pt1_07_03.base_text: Nice job, friends, but you're only halfway there. Follow Boris. He'll lead you to a farm outside the city, where he can..you know...extract the coke. Protect him.
vld_pt1_07_03.loc_text: Nice job, friends, but you're only halfway there. Follow Boris. He'll lead you to a farm outside the city, where he can..you know...extract the coke. Protect him.

vld_pt1_cbf_01.base_text: Hector's death left a vacuum in the powder trade. Nature abhors a vacuum. Fucking abhors it! There's muck-fuckers crawling in from everywhere. Bunch of Hondurans are trying to spread. Let's hit them before they can take root. Break up their smuggling ring. Steal their product. What can go wrong?
vld_pt1_cbf_01.loc_text: Hector's death left a vacuum in the powder trade. Nature abhors a vacuum. Fucking abhors it! There's muck-fuckers crawling in from everywhere. Bunch of Hondurans are trying to spread. Let's hit them before they can take root. Break up their smuggling ring. Steal their product. What can go wrong?

vld_pt1_cnc_01.base_text: I need you to break up a smuggling operation. Get the coke. There's just one small complication....
vld_pt1_cnc_01.loc_text: I need you to break up a smuggling operation. Get the coke. There's just one small complication....

vld_pt1_cnc_02.base_text: Some fucks are trying to develop a coke operation in DC. Get their product. Break it up. Just one small detail...
vld_pt1_cnc_02.loc_text: Some fucks are trying to develop a coke operation in DC. Get their product. Break it up. Just one small detail...

vld_pt1_cnc_03.base_text: A Honduran cartel are trying to set up in DC. Using mules. Except not mules. You'll see....
vld_pt1_cnc_03.loc_text: A Honduran cartel are trying to set up in DC. Using mules. Except not mules. You'll see....

vld_pt1_intro_01.base_text: Okay, time for...honesty. The coke is packed in...goats. Yes, goats. And they've escaped. Haha, tricky goats, huh?! Find them!
vld_pt1_intro_01.loc_text: Okay, time for...honesty. The coke is packed in...goats. Yes, goats. And they've escaped. Haha, tricky goats, huh?! Find them!

vld_pt1_intro_02.base_text: Ah, my friends. So, the "mules", you see...well, they're actually goats. And they've..errr, escaped. Find them for me.
vld_pt1_intro_02.loc_text: Ah, my friends. So, the "mules", you see...well, they're actually goats. And they've..errr, escaped. Find them for me.

vld_pt1_intro_03.base_text: Ahhh, listen. The coke is being smuggled in goats. Yes, goats. G. O. T's. And they've escaped. Find them all.
vld_pt1_intro_03.loc_text: Ahhh, listen. The coke is being smuggled in goats. Yes, goats. G. O. T's. And they've escaped. Find them all.

vld_pt2_01_01.base_text: Fortunately, you have the criminal mind of Vlad on your side. I have an idea.
vld_pt2_01_01.loc_text: Fortunately, you have the criminal mind of Vlad on your side. I have an idea.

vld_pt2_01_02.base_text: You think your Uncle Vlad would leave you there and not have support? Shame on you!
vld_pt2_01_02.loc_text: You think your Uncle Vlad would leave you there and not have support? Shame on you!

vld_pt2_01_03.base_text: Stay cool, my friends. Vlad has an idea. You like Vlad's ideas, yeah?
vld_pt2_01_03.loc_text: Stay cool, my friends. Vlad has an idea. You like Vlad's ideas, yeah?

vld_pt2_02_01.base_text: My brother-in-law - you remember that old soak - will be coming in with a skyhook cage.
vld_pt2_02_01.loc_text: My brother-in-law - you remember that old soak - will be coming in with a skyhook cage.

vld_pt2_02_02.base_text: I'm sending in my brother-in-law. He'll drop a skyhook cage. If he can avoid crashing.
vld_pt2_02_02.loc_text: I'm sending in my brother-in-law. He'll drop a skyhook cage. If he can avoid crashing.

vld_pt2_02_03.base_text: My brother-in-law is on his way. He will drop a skyhook cage for you.
vld_pt2_02_03.loc_text: My brother-in-law is on his way. He will drop a skyhook cage for you.

vld_pt2_03_01.base_text: Wait, you didn't get ALL of the goats. Is my asshole your plaything? I want ALL the goats.
vld_pt2_03_01.loc_text: Wait, you didn't get ALL of the goats. Is my asshole your plaything? I want ALL the goats.

vld_pt2_03_02.base_text: Hey, we're missing some of the goats. This makes Vlad sad. Trust me, you want a happy Vlad.
vld_pt2_03_02.loc_text: Hey, we're missing some of the goats. This makes Vlad sad. Trust me, you want a happy Vlad.

vld_pt2_03_03.base_text: Wait, some of the goats are missing. Why are some of the goats missing?!
vld_pt2_03_03.loc_text: Wait, some of the goats are missing. Why are some of the goats missing?!

vld_pt2_04_01.base_text: That's it! We got the goats, we got the coke! Ka-ching-fucking-ching, my friends! Now, who wants to come over for a curry?
vld_pt2_04_01.loc_text: That's it! We got the goats, we got the coke! Ka-ching-fucking-ching, my friends! Now, who wants to come over for a curry?

vld_pt2_04_02.base_text: Well done, dear friends. I fucking love you all. Not as much as I love all of this coke, but still quite a lot!
vld_pt2_04_02.loc_text: Well done, dear friends. I fucking love you all. Not as much as I love all of this coke, but still quite a lot!

vld_pt2_04_03.base_text: What a great way to start the year. With a mountain of fucking coke to move! Congratulations, dear friends.
vld_pt2_04_03.loc_text: What a great way to start the year. With a mountain of fucking coke to move! Congratulations, dear friends.

wlf_pal_intro_02.base_text: Sorry to hear that, sir! We'll send our guys over right away!
wlf_pal_intro_02.loc_text: Sorry to hear that, sir! We'll send our guys over right away!
